The linens and mattresses are new.  - 2 full bathrooms with shower (one for each room).  - 1 dining room with everything you need for 6.  - 1 fully equipped kitchen: dishwasher, fridge freezer, microwave, stove and oven, coffee maker, electric mixer and all new cookware. Cutlery for 6 brand new people.  - Living room with large sofa and a sofa bed.  TV and stereo. Direct a pretty courtyard garden, where you can s
neighborhood_overview: Apartment located in one of the best area of Barcelona.  It is a spacious and comfortable apartment of 103m2, for up to 6 people and a beautiful interior garden. It is a newly renovated apartment  with everything you need to feel at home. It’s located in the Gaudi Avenue, a pedestrian avenue filled with sunny terraces, that connect the modernism Hospital de Sant Pau with the amazing the Sagrada Familia monument of famous architect Gaudí just few meters walking.  It’s very pleasant to walk along this avenue away from the noise of cars. The apartment is surrounded by shop, grocery stores, restaurants, etc... in the typical Catalan district "Eixample". The visitor to Barcelona will find themselves in the heart of the city, experiencing true life in Barcelona. It has several metro stations nearby, the closest stop is the "Sagrada Familia" that will take you to the historic city center . Nearby there are also several bus lines.
notes: Tourist tax obligated to pay the day of arrival required by the government in all the tourist establishments of Barcelona. the rate is: € 2.50 per adult and per night over 16 years. The rate is payable for a maximum of 7 nights. Cleaning fee of 50€ is not included in the Airbnb budget, has to pay in cash upon arrival. I can organize a private transfers' airport: T1 and T-2 to the apartment= 45€ (parking included) There're a tax of 30€ for the late check-in: after 9pm. and 45€ after 11pm
transit: You could get the center of the city in 20 minutes walking distance or you could take the metro, they're 2 metro lines nearby the apartment: Sagrada Familia stop and Hospital Sant Pau metro stop.  there're some bus which goes directly to the beach.
access: I'm renting whole apartment. Directly access to the private garden from the living room lock door.
interaction: I am living in Barcelona, it's not too far from the apartment and I drive a motorcycle, so I am always ready to help you if you need some information/ help during your stay. I can help you with anything you need: buying a cultural tickets or whatever you want: (Email hidden by Airbnb)  es There're a tax of 30€ for the late check-in: after 9pm. and 45€ after 11pm
house_rules: It's not allowed to smoke inside the apartment but you could smoke out the garden and relaxing on the private chairs on the terrace.  - Respectful and reasonable quiet noise levels especially after 11pm.  - No loud parties please!  - The garbage bins are located very close to your apartment - near the main front door. They are the big grey plastic containers - you can't miss them!  - Most importantly relax and enjoy your stay! :)

host.host_about:
HOLA, HELLO, BONJOUR, CIAO, HALLO, OI, HEJ, HI, γεια, 嗨...
I have over 10 years taking care of several apartments in Barcelona. I am passionate about my work and I enjoy helping travelers feel at home. I live in Barcelona and I travel by motorcycle so I'm always in the apartments in less than 20minutes. During your stay you will reach me on my cell, by e-mail or text message,  I have my phone on in case they need something. Any questions or problems, you'll locate me easily.

reviews.comments:
Ingrid es una persona tan amable y te hace sentir comoda  y protegida, que es muy importante cuando estas en otro Pais. 
el Dto, muy acogedor, comodo,limpio y muy bien equipado.
Gracias Ingrid!!!!

Ingrid was a great hostess and made sure we were comfortable.The apartment is well-appointed dand would be a great apartment in any city.  A group of us stayed for 10 days and it felt like a second home.   Thanks ingrid!

It was perfect flat and very nice person, who makes everything perfect. Thank you, Ingrid!
The street is not busy too much. 
Opposite the apartment a lovely Italian restaurant.
I recommend!

We LOVED the flat in Sagrada Familia! The morning we arrived Ingrid came by to educate us on the apartment and supply us with the key. It was perfect for our needs and nicely appointed. There was even a hair dryer and flat iron - useful when you come from the States. The flat is only a few blocks from the Sagrada Familia - which is a MUST see, and the metro making it quite convenient.  Ingrid was very friendly and helpful, even arranged to take us to the airport on our departure day! We loved it so much we recommended the same flat to friends traveling in the near future! THANK YOU Ingrid for a great experience!

Wir wurden von Ingrid ganz herzlich empfangen. Wir haben den Abholdienst sehr geschätzt. Sehr schöne grosse und sehr saubere Wohnung. Gute Metro Verbindungen. Angenehmes Quartier. Wohnung in der Fussgängerzone, da Restaurants vis-à-vis sind könnte es immer Sommer etwas lauter werden. Wohnung zu empfehlen, jedoch nicht lichtdurchflutet!

This apartment was excellent.  We stayed two couples and each had our own room and bathrooms which were very comfortable.

You couldn't ask for a better location either.  You step out of the apartment and to your right you have a view if the Sagrada Familia.  It is approximately 3 blocks from the apartment.  You have The Pharoa right across which makes very good sangria and for breakfast you have a few choices, but our favorite was the Chocolate Box which has cafe con leche and a croissant for about two euros.

We stayed down the block last year and if we come back to Barcelona I will definitely stay here again.

Ingrid was very easy to communicate with and very helpful.  

I would very highly recommend it! You don't have all the noise of las Ramblas!
Logement parfait Ingrid très sympa A recommander sans attendre

Ingrid est une hôtesse charmante,prévenante et soucieuse du bien être de ses (Website hidden by Airbnb) a le sens de l'accueil très prononcé.Tout était conforme à la description indiquée sur le site:le lieu,l'aménagement de l'appartement ...pas de mauvaises surprises.
Nous la recommandons vivement

We truly had a great time. The apartment was exactly as described and the neighborhood was very nice and enjoyable. So close from the Sagrada Familia, near a metro station and all services, we couldn't ask for more.

Ingrid was a wonderful hostess and did everything to make sure our stay would be memorable.

I truly recommend it!

l'appartement est très agréable et spacieux,bien équipé, avec une literie  comfortable, parfait pour 2 couples .Nous l'avons trouvé bien situé pour visiter Barcelone grâce à la proximité du métro.
Ingrid est très sympathique et nous a très bien accueillis, nous donnant toutes les explications nécessaires à un bon séjour.
A recommander !
Do

Ingrid est un hôte très agréable et à l'écoute.
l'appartement est très bien situé puisque nous étions à 10 mn de la Sagrada, dans une rue piétonne .
appartement bien équipé , spacieux . Toutefois le jardin est peu utilisable car très en visu des hauts bâtiments qui l'entourent.
et surtout , situé au rez de chaussée, l'appartement est bruyant:
d'une part en raison des fenêtres qui ne sont pas isolées et anciennes , laissant passer les bruits de la rue
et d'autre part, de la porte d'entrée de l'immeuble qui claque très  bruyamment à chaque  passage des locataires

Excellent area eventful day by the many tourists but quiet at night. Spacious home in the new restoration, large bathrooms with showers, good food and good rooms. 
Ingrid was very friendly and hospitable, I would say very good. 
I made a good choice. 
 
Luca

We spent 4 days at this wonderful appartement. The neighbourhood Eixample is lovely, and Sagrafa Familie just a 5 minutes walk away!
The appartement is spacious, very well equipped and modern. And on top of this, the garden! Unique in a City likte Barcelona.
Ingrid is very kind and helpful

This was a great place for us to stay as a family with two young kids. The location is ideal, with easy access to the Metro and everything you could want--groceries, restaurants, cafes, bakeries--right outside the door. The garden is great for having a meal or just a drink. Everything worked just as expected: the dishwasher, washing machine, and so on. Ingrid was very available and responsive and check-in and check-out were easy. I was initially a bit worried about the bars right outside but that was not an issue--they were not loud and they closed down at reasonable times. My only complaint--and it's minor and outside the control of the owner/host--is that the Metro runs right under the building and you can hear it. But that was more than compensated by the fact that the pedestrian street outside has less noise than streets with traffic would. All in all, a great place to choose as your base in Barcelona.

Our host Ingrid was extremely friendly, from emailing us promptly and being flexible on check in and check out times (which was really helpful considering we were coming and going in 2 groups), to meeting her at the apartment. The flat itself is in an excellent location, on a lovely leafy street near sagrada familia with great metro links. The apartment is fitted with new bathrooms, the beds are really comfy and although the flat is warm each bedroom has a fan.  The flat is very spacious and has a nice outdoor area, which I should point out is shaded for the majority of the day unless the sun is directly overhead, but still a nice place to sit. I would definitely recommend this apartment, (which is also very reasonably priced), the only downside I can think of is, you can feel metro's going by in the bedroom but they aren't too loud and didn't really bother us too much. Thanks Ingrid!

Appartement spacieux, tout récemment rénové, très agréable et confortable. Situé à deux pas de la Sagrada Familia, il est un point de chute idéal pour une famille souhaitant visiter Barcelone. 

Merci à Ingrid pour son accueil dès plus chaleureux et ses suggestions de ballades et visites.

Nous sommes conquis par la ville, l'appartement et notre hôte. Nos enfants aussi. Nous reviendrons.

Ingrid is a great host, she catch us on time at the airport. She is very kind and friendly. The apartment is large and clean. It is in good neighbourhood. There are nice restaurants in the area. It's recommended for everyone who wants to visit barcelona. The apartment is as the pictures you seen on airbnb
All very much. Ingrid helped in everything requested. The apartment and the location on 10 I look forward to another meeting.

Ingrid met us on arrival, explained the various workings of the apartment......which was big, clean and modern and very centrally located....and some eateries and sights to see.
Would highly recommend the apartment, and Ingrid, to anyone. 
Ingrid was very accommodating and gave us advice about places to eat and see, which we took on board.

This is a great apartment in a nice neighbourhood. It's very well equipped, with all the little essentials like salt, sugar and coffee provided as well as all the crockery and cooking utensils you could need, plus other useful extras like hairdryer and sewing kit. It was spotlessly clean and in great condition, just like it looks in the photos. The beds were very comfortable, and having two bathrooms as well as the two double bedrooms was very convenient. It was really nice to be able to open the back door onto the courtyard and to sit outside to have breakfast. 

The apartment is on the ground floor, with the bedrooms facing the street, so be aware that you will notice noise in the evenings, although this does quieten down overnight. The street outside is pedestrianised so the traffic noise is from a bit of a greater distance away, which helps. Yes, as other reviewers have commented, you can hear the metro going by underneath, but the rumble is quite low pitched and it wasn't that disturbing (the scooters are worse!). There are many restaurants close by and plenty of bakeries for morning pastries; also fruit and veg shops and a late-opening supermarket, all within two minutes of the front door. The Sagrada Familia is 5 minutes walk in one direction, and Sant Pau hospital 5 minutes in the other direction (also definitely worth a visit - absolutely beautiful, and less touristy). Ingrid was a great host, very accommodating even though our flight was an hour late in arriving due to thunderstorms in Barcelona. All in all a great experience and we'd definitely come back. Thanks, Ingrid!
Ingrid war pünktlich da und sehr herzlich. Sie hatte sogar ein kleines Willkommensgeschenk.

Ingrid met us at the apartment and was very helpful in making us feel at home. My father, my daughter (15) and I stayed for 7 nights in Nov/Dec. This apartment worked out very well for us. It was very clean, perfectly located (not too noisy) and well appointed. We cooked several meals at home (market about a block away) and found everything we needed in the kitchen. We didn't get to appreciate the courtyard due to inclement weather, but it looked lovely. Ingrid was an excellent hostess and worked hard to make our trip more enjoyable. I highly recommend.

Ingrid met us right outside the apartment at exactly the agreed-upon time. She is warm and friendly and awesome. The apartment was absolutely fantastic. This place was the best stay of my entire journey through Spain. The apartment was exactly as described. The backyard is gorgeous. The 2 bedrooms are very roomy with comfortable beds and linens. It was spotless. So clean and with every amenity you would want. It's literally steps from the Sagrada Familia on a great, pedestrian-only street lined with outside tables and many bars and restaurants. The location suited us perfectly for our visit. I highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting this amazing city!

We (with 2 small kids) loved our 10-day stay in Barcelona thanks to this great apartment and thanks to Ingrid being a great and accommodating host. 

The apartment is spacious, clean and everything worked as advertised. It is in a great location, very near La Sagrada and thus very near a Metro station. There is also underground parking nearby if you are driving into Barcelona. There is a supermarket (Caprabo), which was very useful for us. There are several restaurants and pastry shops nearby as well. Our kids loved the garden the few days it was warm enough to play.

Ignrid was a great host. She was there dot on time to receive us and explained all the details and a gave us a good idea of Barcelona and its sights. We had to change our departure time a couple of times and Ingrid was really understanding and accommodating about it. She even helped us load the luggages into the car!

We would love to stay in this apartment if we ever return to Barcelona.

Ingrid was an incredible host! She equipped the Apartment with anything we needed and even arranged to have a driver meet us at the airport! 

The apartment itself is gorgeous and in excellent condition. My mom and I both stayed there and had our own Queen beds and own private bathrooms. Additionally the backyard was a nice place to sit outside and enjoy breakfast.

Located on Avenue Gaudi you are in a great location with the Metro steps away. 

A must stay place when visiting Barcelona!

המארחת היתה מקסימה, נחמדה ומוכנה לעזור בכל דבר...
  הדירה נפלאה, נוחה מאוד וכיפית
מיקום מעולה על שדרה יפהפיה קרובה
 ללה סגרדיה לאילו שרוצים להיות קרובים למרכז אבל במקום שקט יותר 
מומלץ בחום

Ingrid was a lovely host - really friendly and kind. Collecting us from the airport was a huge help as she was able to point out a few things about the local area such as a good supermarket, breakfast place and also a couple of good tips for things to do in Barcelona that wouldn't be on the list usually. She was also flexible on the last day and we were able to leave our cases until 2pm which really helped as our flight was at 5.30pm. 

The apartment was spacious and well equipped with really comfy beds and fabulous showers - always good. I would say the back garden needs a little tidying up/weeding to feel more welcoming. 

I'm a light sleeper and needed earplugs due to traffic and street noise (my partner and daughter slept fine!). You can also hear the tube rumbling but it's not particularly loud or long lasting and doesn't go on all night - in fact you end up not noticing it - a bit like hearing a plane really.

The apartment is in a great location with cafes and restaurants, the Sagrada Familia just up the road and easy access to metro and buses making it simple and quick to get around. It also felt like proper Spain not just a tourist area which is great.

Our delightful host, Ingrid, was waiting for us when we arrived at Barcelona airport.  She made us feel very welcome, and chatted to us about Barcelona on our drive from the airport to the apartment.  We were delighted with the very spacious apartment, especially the luxury of one huge bathroom each.  The king size beds were very comfortable and the apartment had everything we needed.  The location of the apartment was perfect - our front door opened out on to the Av De Gaudi, which is for pedestrians only, and lined with outdoor dining tables.  A beautiful picture in dappled light from the tree lined avenue.  The area is very quiet, but close to transport (metro or bus).   Ingrid is a lovely woman and an ideal ambassador for the very beautiful city of Barcelona.  Muchas Gracias Ingrid.

Ingrid did a fantastic job at welcoming us to her apartment.  We arrived late (almost midnight) and she arranged for a transfer from the airport directly to her apartment, where she was waiting for us.  She pointed out places to buy food nearby, set us up on the private wifi, and the apartment had lots of brochures and travel tips for us.  She was very welcoming.

The apartment was centrally located and exactly as described.  Our only complaint is that the apartment is located on the first/ground floor with the bedrooms facing the street.  As such, there was a good bit of street noise at night (which is likely normal for Barcelona).  The apartment door is located off the main building entrance, so you could hear groups coming back late at night (3:00-4:00am).  The last night we stayed there, everything was quiet, so perhaps it was simply a busy weekend.  Overall, we enjoyed our stay.

Ingrid is a very friendly and accomodating host. Airport transfer was convenient and easily arranged. Her apartment is clean and spacious - might be best suited for a family given its size and location. The only minor drawbacks were the noise level at night and the shower water would not get quite hot enough. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend the apartment :)

The flat was excellent!  Very clean, had everything we needed and very spacious.  Great location near lots of restaurants and bakeries.  Very close to Sagrada Familia (which makes giving directions home to taxi drivers very easy).  Highly recommended!

Ingrid was an exceptionally welcoming host. Not only was the apartment breathtaking, it was also spotless with all the possible amenities you can ever think of. She also made sure she explained about the area surrounding the apartment like the grocery store, the restaurants, the best places to visit ... The location of the apartment is just perfect and the furthest thing you'd want to visit in Barcelona is only 10min away. It also features a quite garden that is for your own peace and quite if you ever needed. Not only do I recommend the place and the Ingrid as an amazing host, you can also bet on it that I'll be visiting Barcelona again soon and staying right there and no where else. It's home away from home!

such a nice trip! we lived in ingrid's apartment for 3 nights. everything is super nice: 2 big bathrooms , a big private garden.
5 min to the Sagarada familia. quiet place.
And Ingrid is so nice and gentil, she gave a lot of info ration to us and recommandation.
i will definitely choose there is i were in Barcelona again!
highly recommend!!!
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Host was excellent. She accomodated us even though our arrival time chaned three times
The apartment was just as described.  Beautiful location
5 minutes walk to Sargada Familia church and the city tour bus
Lots of restaurants
I would go back anytime

Ingrid was a wonderful host! She provided perfect suggestions for restaurants and sights to see. Beautiful apartment with plenty of space to spare. In a great location within walking distance from everywhere we needed to be.

We had an amazing stay at Ingrid's apartment. She was very easy to contact, and very kind and welcoming when we arrived. She made sure to show us around the apartment and gave us maps and tips about traveling around Barcelona. The apartment is very clean and spacious, and the bathrooms were gorgeous. The backyard outside was very cute and pleasant. The apartment is located in a semi-touristy area since its walking distance to the Sagrada Familia, so it can get a little noisy at times, but we were all able to sleep through the night without problems. It was still a very nice and safe area with restaurants and desserts very close by. We were also a few minutes walking distance to 2 different metro stations (Sant Pau and Sagrada Familia) so it was very convenient to get around Barcelona. Overall a great stay! I would definitely recommend this apartment and would be happy to stay here again!

Ingrid was very flexible and communicative, making sure she was there when we arrived, despite the fact that our arrival time changed more than once during the journey. Ingrid helped us find a place to park our car and explained everything we needed to know about the flat.
The flat was exactly as described and well equipped for self-catering. The garden was a real advantage and the location was excellent for popular sights such as the Sagrada Familia. Despite the central location, the flat was peaceful and gave us a great place to unwind after a day of sight-seeing in the heat.

Great location in a walking street with many bars and 24/7 supermarket within 1 min. Sagrada Familia is in walking distance. 
Ingrid was nice and helpful. 
Flat is clean and big with a nice garden. 
Equiped with baby cot and mattrace for kids. 
We had a great time!

The place was very nice, it has a nice kitchen, large rooms, bathrooms and the place in general  had plenty of room. It was located near restaurants that are located outside the door. The metro lines are within close walking distance.
Ingrid was very nice and very helpful with suggestions in where to eat and locations to visit. 
I would definitely go back and rent from her again, we had a great time.

5 * apartment, position was fantastic, 3 mins walking to Sagrada Familia, metro station in 2 mins, minimarket outside from the house.
Very big apartment with a nice garden inside. Lovely place
这个房东很热情,房子的地理位置好,到哪里坐地铁及BUS都很方便｡房间很干净,可以做饭｡餐具都是新的,我们住的很舒适｡谢谢啦!

Merci à Ingrib pour son acceuil chaleureux et ses bons conseils. Cet appartement est spacieux, confortable pour 6 personnes et trés bien situé entre l'hopital san Pau  et la Sagrada Familia. La rue semi pietonne avec ses commerce et bistros et le quartier authentique sont trés agréables. nous recommendons cette adresse.
Good host, good location, and big space.

Minha estadia na casa de Ingrid foi maravilhosa, a casa é grande, muito agradável e a localização não poderia ser melhor!
A Ingrid foi uma excelente anfitriã, pois estava nos aguardando mesmo tento atrasado com o horário de chegada, fiquei sem conexão e não consegui avisar ( desculpas novamente por isso).

Нам все понравилось. Квартира большая, чистая, свежий ремонт, оборудована всем необходимым. Отличное месторасположение. Рядом небольшие ресторанчики, супермаркет за углом, метро в шаговой доступности. Вид на Sagrada Familia.

Very good apartment . Excellent location . Restaurants and supermarket  in front on the street and Careffour Express on the corner of Sagrada Familia ( 3-5 min walk ) You can hear the metro trains time to time , but it is not a big deal . Be sure to read the notes on the back of the door !!! Plenty  of warm water , but the heating in the rooms could work a little bit  better . Over all very good place .
I will recommend your stay at this apt. I had a magnificent stay with my family.
We had a lovely stay. It has a great location. It is spacious and has a quiet garden too. Ingrid was a very communicative and helpful host. Will highly recommend it.
Ingrid is wonderful! She is very accommodating and communicative. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend this apartment to anyone!
Ingrid- it was amazing! Thanks for the great time, the good communication! Highly recommended!!!
Great location near Metro and Sagrada Familia.  Many restaurants near the apartment.

Väldigt bra läge, trevligt område men ganska livligt kvällstid. Vi hade otur och fick stökiga grannar som hyrde lägenheten mittemot. 
Stor och bra lägenhet, rent och välstädat. Ingrid var trevlig och hjälpsam, men höjde vårt pris efter att vi bokat.
Vi bodde där i tre dagar med barn, vilket fungerade bra men lite för oroligt nattetid för vi skulle sova gott. Däremot var som sagt området jättetrevligt och lägenheten ligger toppen.

Ingrid was very welcoming nice and helpful. She gave us lot of information as soon as we got to the Appartment.
The Appartment is massive and nice location, however we had 2 issues , one with the fan, and Ingrid was very helpful and resolved the issue straight away, however the second issue was with cleanliness of the kitchenware. 
We had to wash every single item before using them as they weren't clean. 
I definitely recommend the place though but I hope this issue would be looked after !
La ubicación es muy buena para estar cerca de cualquier sitio .
Appartement très grand très agréable Mais métro trop bruyant.

A wonderful apartment in a great location (just 5 min walk to Sagrada Familia- a MUST SEE!!) The apartment was really spacious with great big bedrooms, huge living areas, a great laundry and located on a quiet pedestrian street where all the locals meet. Great restaurant right outside the front door providing fabulous service and great food! Metro close by and plenty of good coffee shops nearby also! Would definitely go back here if we had the chance! Ingrid was wonderful!!

La posizione su Avenida Gaudì, in prossimità della metro e della Sagrada Familia, è decisamente buona. L'appartamento è ampio, nuovo e pulito. Il giardino è un cortile interno al condominio. Il costo si riferisce a due ospiti.

Very spacious apartment with a great location in Barcelona - restaurants right in front of the building and the Sagrada Familia is just a few minutes away. The apartment's garden is amazing as we didn't expect finding something like that right in the city Center of Barcelona at all. Plus, Ingrid was a great host. She was very nice and responsive and even helped us translating for the parking deck. Great experience, I would totally recommend it to everyone!

Overall Great stay! Clean place, big and spacious, near metro! Just one thing to mention, since the bedrooms face the main street, on weekends it can be noisier than as compared to weekdays. Other than that, host is very accommodating! Thanks!

Ingrid is a wonderful host. Communicating with her was never a problem and she gave us useful information about how to visit various places in Barcelona. She allowed us to check in 3 hours earlier than scheduled time for which we cannot thank her enough.
The house was far better than what is looked in the photos. Big and very clean. Kitchen is fully equipped. Wonderful location. Exceeded our expectations. Anyone can trust this place and the host.
Ingrid's was a nice place to stay. Very big and in a great location.

Amazing location. Close to metro and walking distance to so many cool neighbourhoods. 

Ingrid is a kind, helpful host and communication was top notch. 

Expect to close your window at night because the street stays hopping til late.

Our stay at this spaceous and perfectly located flat was unforgettable. Next time we go to Barsa I know where to stay.
Only good recomendations.
The host canceled this reservation 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

El piso tiene unas calidades muy buenas, es espacioso y está bien decorado. La ubicación es ideal para quien quiera visitar la ciudad. Por su parte, Ingrid es muy atenta para que todo esté en orden a la llegada de los huéspedes.

Ingrid’s Place was amazing. A couple blocks away from la Sagrada Família. Great restaurants nearby. Everything is walking distance. And she even help me to find parking for my car. 10/10 I will visit if I ever come to Barcelona again.
房间很大,也很干净,位置距离圣家堂非常近,交通也方便,唯一缺点就是一楼临街有点吵,不过不太影响,推荐一家人来住｡

The stay was awesome! Ingrid is very nice and helpful! Apartment is really big and comfortable, so the stay was as good as it could be!
Location is great and the garden is just what we wanted :)

Big thanks!
Ha sido una estancia muy buena. La ubicación estaba muy bien y la casa era cómoda y limpia
非常宽敞,非常干净｡旁边就是大教堂,交通也非常方便,非常满意的一次入住体验｡

Very spacious (good size bedrooms and bath as well as kitchen and living room) in a wonderful location. Apartment was immaculate. Street is quaint and Sangrada Familia is at the end of the block. We were very comfortable - metro is in walking distance, lots of taxis near by and the street had both little groceries and restaurants. Much quieter than other areas of Barcelona. I would highly recommend this apartment
Thank you for the nice stay, really large apartment. Quick replies and nice welcome. Overall 4.5 stars :)

Ingrid's place is very spacious with modern fixtures. The backyard is amazing and private. She was responsive and helpful. The location was very convenient for sight seeing. The only negatives I would say is there was no shampoo, when it was listed on the profile. We grabbed shampoo from the supermarket which was extremely close, so that was not a huge deal. Make sure you are aware of the additional cleaning fee and tax that you pay in cash to her once you arrive, we thought the cleaning fee was a little high. However, it was a great stay and I would recommend her place.
Fantastic spot! It is in a great location, is comfy, and is very spacious. Definitely recconmend!

Big apartment, ideal for six guests.  Both bathrooms were well-appointed.  Apartment location was ideal for Sagrada Familia.  Many other great places are within a 1 to 1/5 km walk.  Taxis are also plentiful by the apartment, and the subway is nearby.  Ingrid was a great host, very willing to work with us as our plans (and guest list) evolved during the week before check-in.  I highly recommend this apartment.

Perfect Appartement to stay in Barcelona. Good area with a lot of good places to go out and visit around.
The best for me and my mother: two bedrooms and two bathrooms. 
Ingrid was very helpful. We definitely recommend her place!

My husband and I loved our stay in this home! Ingrid was a great, welcoming host and answered a lot of questions we had about the city! You can't beat the location, right in between Sagrada Familia and Sant Pau Recinte Modernista, close to the metro and lots of restaurants. The unit is VERY large - there were only two of us staying there but if you had 4 or 6 people I think it would still feel spacious! It was very clean and comfortable. The table with tourist brochures & the book of recommendations from other guests was a very nice touch!

Just make sure to read the full listing description which mentions the cleaning fee & tourist tax which needs to be paid in cash upon arrival.

Thanks for hosting us, Ingrid!
Everything was great. Convenient location. It was much better than I expected. We enjoyed staying at Ingrid's place.

We stayed at a nicely updated spacious 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath apartment hosted by Ingrid on  Avenue De Goudi just up the street from  the Sagarda Família. The place is on a non traffic part of the street with restaurants right outside the door with little shops, outdoor cafes,  breakfast places with great pastries, flat breads, illy coffee shops.   Great safe area.  There are so many great places in walking distance.  The hop on, hop off bus that carries you to a lot of the tourist areas is one block away. But just walking around some of the areas, you find the best shops & restaurants. We will definitely be staying in this apartment again. Thanks for making it a pleasant stay.
Spacious clean and a good location . We would definitely stay there again. Ingrid was very accommodating and helpful  it was our first visit to Barcelona can't wait to return to Barcelona.

Ingrid’s place was wonderful! It was very spacious, clean, with a comfortable bed, and the showers had great water pressure (a pet peeve of mine). You’ll need to bring soap and shampoo. The metro station is a 5 min walk, and you have restaurants, shops, and a little grocery store right outside the door. The rooms have great blinds that allow you to sleep in late if need be. 
Ingrid was very helpful with recommendations of where to eat, shop, etc.... We had a great time and would stay there again.

Ingrid è stata un ottimo host. 
L’appartamento è spazioso, molto pulito e con tutti i confort funzionanti. 
Il giardino da un tocco di qualità all’appartamento. 
Assolutamente consigliato !!
Een zeer mooi appartement! Erg goede locatie. Alleen jammer van de metro die de hele nacht onder het huis rijdt. Voor de rest super appartement

We had an excellent time in this spacious and clean apartment. The location is very convenient and easily accessible. The garden is excellent for breakfast or to relax. The only small thing the could bather light slippers is noise coming from passing underground trains. But we were so exhausted from all the walking around the city that did not bother us too much. I highly recommend this place.

We stayed at Ingrid's apartment for 5 nights and had a fantastic time. We are a couple and a 7 year old child, so the apartment was probably bigger than we needed, but it was beautiful, clean, comfortable, and we really enjoyed it. The proximity to sites such as Sagrada Familia, Sant Pau, and the metro station is a huge plus. Also there are some excellent places to eat nearby, with a lot of variety; not everything is touristy. The apartment itself is very clean, and has everything you could need. The garden is lovely, and it was a luxury to have a large and private green space.  Ingrid was extremely patient and helpful, answered all our questions promptly and gave useful tips. Highly recommended.
Muy bueno piso! Recomendo

What a fabulous location! We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay in Barcelona! So convenient to the Sagrada Familia (get tix for the 1st tour of the day!), with stores for everything you'll need, and wonderful restaurants just steps away. Ingrid was a fabulous host - she met us at the apartment, gave us tips, showed us around, and thoughtfully set up the spare bed for our 14-year-old. The kitchen has everything you need to cook, the beds are very comfy, and the bathrooms are luxe! I couldn't recommend this apartment more highly. Enjoy your stay in Barcelona!
appartement spacieux, avec des espaces privés pour chacun, deux salles de bain tout confort, et tout l'équipement necessaire: wifi, fer à repasser, machine à laver, lave vaisselle, etc.
Location was great, lots of restaurants.

Very well located apartment, next to the Sagrada Família, restaurants, commerces and metro station.
Tips for next guests: bring your ear plugs and mosquito lotion (for the garden of the apt). The apartment is well sound proofed from the street noises but not from the corridor and neighbors next door. 
Ingrid is very friendly and communication was nice and easy. Overall we had a nice stay.

The location and apartment were excellent.  The apartment is spacious and the kitchen well equipped, and to have the private spacious courtyard is great.

Ingrid did very well communicating with us and was wonderful about telling us what was immediately around the apartment, how to get to public transport, etc.
Great location and spacious apartment.

L’appartement est idéal : très spacieux, propre, bien équipé, très bien situé.
Ingrid est très avenante et réactive.

A nice apartment, in a decent area of town (restaurants outside so not the quietest), comfortable and convenient for the centre.  Nearby shops etc. and a nice kitchen set up.  I would recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to visit Barcelona for business and pleasure.

Great location.
Lots of space.
Nice and clean.
An enjoyable stay.
Nice apartment. Nice person
Excellent location, great cafes and restaurants in the area and perfect for Gaudí enthusiasts, though it can get a little noisy.  Ingrid is an expert host and the apartment is clean and comfortable.

Todo ha ido muy bien. La casa es bonita y limpia. La posición también esta genial. Dos cosas no me han gustado: pagar la impuestos de limpieza en efectivo y el ruido que hay por la metro y la puerta de entrada del edificio.

La ubicación es muy buena a pocas cuadras de la sagrada familia, donde puedes tomar el metro para ir a todos los puntos de interés. El piso es muy cómodo y espacioso. Tiene un jardín muy bonito. En la zona tienes supermercados y lugares para comer para todos lo gustos. Ingrid ha sido muy atenta y nos ha dado muy buenas recomendaciones. Un sitio muy recomendable.

Very nice apartment, with lots of room. Do be aware that the metro runs under the apartment and you can hear it late at night and first thing in the morning - this did not bother us as the space was good value for money in a lovely location.
Great location and large apartment! No complaints.

Beautiful large apartment in a great location. Two blocks from the metro, Sagrada Familia and Sant Pau. Great tapas restaurant right across from the entrance & lots of pastry & other shops & markets nearby. Nice quiet backyard with table & chairs too. Ingrid is wonderful & has put many personal touches into the apartment such as local recommendations of restaurants & attractions, glassware & dishes and many other things to make you feel at home. Would definitely stay here again.
Una buena experiencia

Ingrid ha sido una anfitriona estupenda, amable y rápida en responder .
La casa es tal cual se muestra en las fotos, muy grande, luminosa, decorada con gusto y sobre todo ubicada en un sitio inmejorable de Barcelona...a 500 metros de la sagrada familia. 
Recomiendo totalmente a toda persona interesada en alojarse unos dias en Barcelona, hacerlo en esta casa!
I met Ingrid’s son when I arrive, and he was kind and generous. The room was spacious and the location is near Sagrada Familia. Also, the metro is near the apartment.
Great location,  very close to metro, restaurants,  grocery stores,  shopping  and La Sagrada familia.  Apartment is clean and the kitchen is fully equipped. Its excellent. Will stay here again.

This apartment is in such an ideal location! The tree-lined avenue is pedestrian-only between the Sagrada Familia and the Sant Pau Hospital museum. What a backdrop! There are plenty of great places to eat within a block in either direction. You could just stay right there! We suggest Arrosseria Gaudi right across the street. Ingrid is a fine host and will help you in any way she can.  The apartment is well appointed and no matter how you like to make your coffee, the device is there. All the necessities are there to cook for yourself, but with the selection a few steps outside the door, there really is little need.

A couple of things to be aware of: The apartment is on the ground floor and the bedrooms face the street. Also, the metro runs under the apartment. We were there in January so the foot traffic was light and the metro noise really wasn't as bad as many hotel HVAC units. It was actually kind of comforting in a strange way. You will hear people coming and going in the building as the entrance is right off the lobby and elevator.

Очень хорошие апартаменты , Ингрид, хорошо объяснила как добраться до дома, быстро отвечала на сообщение, тепло встретила, удобный душ, а их целых два, как и количество туалетов, кровати просто шикарные, высыпался как младенец, кухня вполне себе крутая, есть даже телек с ютубом и Netflix, но телевизор как-то плохо ловил вай-фай и поэтому подтормаживало, лучше брать с собой ноут, не ошибётесь, также есть дворик, а он по факту вообще весь ваш, потому что выход в него есть не у всех, короче всем советую, особенно молодым парочкам, можно в 4 въехать и это вполне выгодно по месту расположения и цене)
An amazing place to stay in Barcelona! We felt right at home. Probably haven't slept as well as in these beds in ages!

Appartement très spacieux et idéalement située!
Cependant, l’appartement est au Rez de chaussée et la porte de l’immeuble est extrêmement bruyante (les gens laissent claquer la porte à n’importe quelle heure du jour ou de la nuit). Le métro passe juste en dessous de l’immeuble et l’appartement vibre toutes les 2 min.

This flat is spectacular. It’s just two blocks from Sagrada Família and super easy to find on Avinguda Gaudí. There’s restaurants and markets in every direction and two metro stops nearby. The place is adorable inside and has more than enough space for a bigger group. We were just a group of 3 and I honestly felt like we could’ve brought 4 more people with us. The kitchen is well equipped for anything you might want to make, the bedrooms are super clean, and the two bathrooms are huge. You can hear the metro rumble underneath every few minutes, but honestly you don’t notice it after long. Everything about this place was great. Thank you!!

este piso es muy espacioso y en una posición perfecta, a 5 min andando de la Sagrada familia y de l' hospital de Sant Pau, dos sitios maravillosos. A pesar de que sea tan céntrico, es un barrio silencioso con todas las tiendas necesarias, varios restaurantes y al lado de la estación de metro.  El jardín privado es un sitio de encanto donde poderse relajar
Good location and warm host. An excellent house.

We had a lovely stay at Ingrid's place. The location was perfect, only a 5 minute walk to the Sagrada Familia, and easy access to both the bus and metro to get further downtown and to the beach. The house is spacious, comfortable, and even has a private outdoor patio where you can enjoy breakfast. Lots of cute cafes and restaurants nearby. I would stay here again!

Ingrid's apartment is large, clean and well located. It is very close to the Sagrada Familia and is well connected to public transport. I was there for a conference at Fira and it was relatively straightforward to get there using the Metro. If you are a light sleeper be aware that the metro runs almost right below the apartment and you will hear it. Overall it was a great place and I would be glad to stay there again.

name: PLATEAU MONT-ROYAL - Le ZENHOUSE
summary: 77 m2 (830 sq. Ft.),  Newly renovated (APRIL 2018) - Newly equipped (brand new kitchen), quiet, sun, garden level, 1 closed bed room, king bed, 1 double bed in living room, washing machine and dryer, 4 comfortable adults. Brick wall, open area, private garden-yard of 20 m2 (215 sq. Ft.), BBQ, 24h alarm system, all inclusive / equipped, wifi, smart TV, Mt-Royal metro and all within 3 min. walk !
space: Newly renovated (APRIL 2018) - Newly equipped (brand new kitchen),  Perfectly located in the heart of the Plateau Mont-Royal district, small private terrace, BBQ, very calm and still : 3 minutes walk from all services, restaurants, bistros, cafes, grocery stores, fruit shops, pastry shops, gym, booksellers and Mont-Royal metro station (orange line)
description: 77 m2 (830 sq. Ft.),  Newly renovated (APRIL 2018) - Newly equipped (brand new kitchen), quiet, sun, garden level, 1 closed bed room, king bed, 1 double bed in living room, washing machine and dryer, 4 comfortable adults. Brick wall, open area, private garden-yard of 20 m2 (215 sq. Ft.), BBQ, 24h alarm system, all inclusive / equipped, wifi, smart TV, Mt-Royal metro and all within 3 min. walk ! Newly renovated (APRIL 2018) - Newly equipped (brand new kitchen),  Perfectly located in the heart of the Plateau Mont-Royal district, small private terrace, BBQ, very calm and still : 3 minutes walk from all services, restaurants, bistros, cafes, grocery stores, fruit shops, pastry shops, gym, booksellers and Mont-Royal metro station (orange line) We will be available if you need help or information. À 3 minutes à pied / 3 minutes walk from Mont-Royal Metro Station, and public buses. Apartment located on St-André str., 50 meters south of Mont-Royal str.
neighborhood_overview: À 3 minutes à pied / 3 minutes walk from Mont-Royal Metro Station, and public buses. Apartment located on St-André str., 50 meters south of Mont-Royal str.
notes: 24h/24 connected alarm system
transit: À 3 minutes à pied / 3 minutes walk from Mont-Royal Metro Station, and public buses. Apartment located on St-André str., 50 meters south of Mont-Royal str.
interaction: We will be available if you need help or information.
house_rules: No smoking, no animal.  No food eating on beds, nor on the living room couch !  (food stains that require special cleanings will be charged to the guest) Thanks ! :)

host.host_about:
Bonjour, 

Mon nom est Martin, j'ai 50 ans, je suis né au Québec, je suis compositeur de musique de films. 

Je suis un citoyen paisible, responsable et bien organisé; j'aime le cinéma, la lecture, les voyages (en Asie ou dans les pays bouddhistes), le yoga, la méditation, la nature, la philosophie, les arts, la culture, la musique.

Si j'avais une devise, elle serait peut-être : "on récolte ce que l'on sème" 

----------

Je suis aussi un voyageur.  Calme, respectueux et ouvert d'esprit : )

Les gens inspirées du même élan de calme et de respect seront toujours les bienvenus chez moi : )

au plaisir,
Martin

reviews.comments: The apartment is perfectly situated in the hearth of Plateau Mt-Royal : the Mt-Royal metro station, groceries, restaurants are just a few steps away.  The host was responsive to our needs, providing a phone so we could make call using our Magic Jack via the internet as no land line is available.  We rented for 1 month and Martin was an excellent host.

This is a very quaint, comfortable 1-bedroom apartment on the main floor of a typical Montreal row house.  It is located in a great area of the city - le Plateau - where you are surrounded by quiet streets for strolling, trendy bars, cafés and restaurants, and unique shopping that Montreal is known for.  We drove to Montreal and overnight street parking was readily available, once you figured out the signage and what sections of the street were non-permit.  The neighbours were also very helpful to point out when we got it wrong, saving us a potential ticket!!  Martin was nice to deal with.  Although we didn't get to meet in person, communication with him was easy - phone, text, email and thru AirBNB.  Check-in and out was easy, and we felt very safe and secure.  The apartment has an alarm system and we were introduced on paper to the upstairs neighbour, who we then met in person over the course of the weekend.  The apartment is clean and the beds are comfortable.  The  bedroom is large (king size bed) and is off the front side of the house, but the street is fairly quiet, so street noise wasn't an issue.  There is no central air conditioning, but a fan in the bedroom and portable a/c unit in the living room.  We were there on a very hot, sticky weekend, and didn't find the apartment overly hot, nor did we need the a/c.  Although well equipped, we didn't do any cooking in the kitchen, apart from making tea.  But we did prepare a nice snack of wine, cheese, crackers, meat, grapes… which we enjoyed sitting out on the quiet and sunny back deck area.  Having this outside space was very nice.  The apartment is also equipped with a washer/dryer - so handy for longer stays.  Decent shower/tub with good water pressure - there is no exhaust fan though, so the room does steam up, making it a bit hard to towel dry.  The only real quirk for us... the toilet is in a small "closet" at the front of the house - literally just room for the toilet - while the shower/tub/sink is in a separate room at the back of the house.  So you have to walk through the dining/living room & kitchen to wash your hands after using the toilet.  Looking back at the photos, we can see this now, but it is not obvious and was a bit of a surprise for us.  Overall though, we were very happy with the apartment.  Great price, great location, great weekend!

The place is super cozy. Very clean and spacious. Close to metro station, shared bikes stations, supermarkets and lots of restaurants. Everything you need is within easy reach. The BBQ station is a lot of fun, especially considering the great selection of amazing sausage at the European market on St.Laurent which is just 10 min away by bike. Martin (the host) was very welcoming and helpful. There was a problem with Wi-Fi, he quickly arranged the fix. Great overall experience!

Martin est un hôte extra, très accueillant et disponible. On a vécu deux mois exceptionnels dans son appartement, ou l'on s'est tout de suite senti très bien car il s'en dégage une grande sérénité et il est très chaleureux. Il est idéalement situé, en plein cœur du Plateau, tout près du metro, de pleins de beaux parcs et d'une multitude de bons commerces. On a tout particulièrement adoré profiter de la terrasse et du barbecue! Bref, on recommanderait les yeux fermés ce logement à tous nos proches et encore merci a Martin et Sarah de leur accueil!

Martin is an amazing host. He is very communicative and available. Check-in was easy and the place is truly a zen house. I used to live in Montreal so new location was best for those wanting to live the local life but his place is truly next to everything. From wonderful brunch place less than 2 blocks away to fresh daily croissant to bars to restaurants to metro.. I can go on.
When we arrived, Martin had left us personal notes about the place, with his phone number, map of the city, trash day during the week an other uselful information. We were able to find parking on the street without using parking permits but he had left us parking permits in case we needed them at a very affordable fee. The place was spotless and I felt is bigger than the pictures show. Lots of storage for your clothes as the closets are empty and ready to use. I will come back to this place next time I come back to Montreal for sure. Martin is very friendly and available and his place is wonderful. Some mentioned the toilet is a separate room than shower and sink, its true but didnt bother me. I didnt use the bbq but its a brand new big one, better than the one shown on the pictures.
Martin's place is the best place to live the local life while staying in a stress free very quiet place next to absolutely everything. If you're into road noise, construction driving you crazy and high rises, go downtown. If you want true Montreal experience, stay at the zenhouse.

Thanks Martin for the wonderful hospitality and great stay!

My family loved the apartment and the location. It is steps away from everything we needed yet quiet enough to relax and unwind. Martin is a great host and responded to all of our messages in a timely manner. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks for a great stay Martin.
Great location, spacious and comfortable flat. Martin was really easy to communicate with. Perfectly as described in the ad.
Very spacious, useful/thoughtful amenities, great location! Definitely recommend!
Un très beau logement bien situé et très fonctionnel
The place is in a great location, clean and setup with everything you need. Martin was quick to respond to messages. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Clean, stylish apartment. The small backyard area was nice to sit out during our downtime.

I had an excellent stay at Martin's place,  the space was super clean and gorgeous ( exactly like in the photos)  very lofty  and close to everything like shops ,restaurants , cafes , bakeries, grocery stores, parks ,cultural events ... the list goes on!   Communication with Martin was easy and quick. Overall a fantastic experience :)

Martins place was perfect for our 4 day stay. The location is superb, we were able to walk out the front door and find great restaurants,  cocktail bars and cafes within a 5 min walk. We found we walked everywhere from his place, even to Old Port.
The beds were both so comfortable that we fell asleep straight away. The townhouse was clean and beautiful. There is even a private terrace with a BBQ which would be lovely in the summer.
The kitchen was well equipped for any type of cooking, that is if you can stop yourself from eating out.
I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend his place.
Fantastic place!  The location is great, it was clean and worked perfect for what we were looking for.  Would definitely recommend!
Great location, great place, great host. Would definitely stay again.

My wife and I decided to stay at Martin’s for our third trip back to Montreal. Very well located. Pretty close to main streets, shopping, and cafés. Very spacious for the price. All in all, we enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to someone looking for a spacious, affordable and stylish Airbnb near fun attractions in Montreal.
Excellent séjour chez Martin! Tout était propre, spacieux et les couchages étaient très confortables! Idéalement situé sur le Plateau, nous avons passé une super semaine!
Excellente adresse, excellent emplacement, je recommande vivement !
You will love this place. Charming, comfortable, close to shops, restaurants, supermarket, and the Metro

Très bel appartement rien à redire, qualité et propreté étaient au rendez-vous! Il est très bien situé proche metro et boutiques en tout genre! Martin est réactif dès que nous lui envoyons un message c’ est parfait! Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir!

Nous avons passé mon copain et moi une semaine idyllique dans l'appartement de Martin.  L'emplacement de l'appartement est idéal, dans le quartier du plateau où nous pouvons tout trouver à proximité, jeune et dynamique avec la station de métro à 500m, à 2 stations de Berry UQAM ( la principale station de métro). 
L'appartement est décoré avec goût, lumineux, propre et j'en passe.. On se sent comme à la maison ( parfois un peu trop au point de ne plus avoir envie de bouger ). 
Nous n'avons malheureusement pas eu le plaisir de voir Martin mais celui ci a toujours été très réactif dès que j'avais une question, c'etait parfait. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés. 
Bon voyage à tous.
Absolument rien à redire!! Appartement spacieux, propre, décoré avec goût, cosy et magnifiquement bien placé.

Un lieu calme et propre où l'on se sent comme à la maison (même un écureuil vient  sur la terrasse pour remplir son petit ventre...), Martin est très sympathique avec sa touche d'attention il est très agréable n'hésitez pas à le contacter...

name: Bamboo Hideaway, Upstairs Aina Nalu~VALUE~Boutique
summary: Beautiful Second Floor Unit – Stairs only – No elevator Upgraded tropical decor Amazing sheets and linens 1 King bed and 1 Queen sofa bed Maximum 4 persons (including children) Amazing Pool (Tension Edge – salt water) Air conditioning Alarm clock/radio Cable TV Kaba lock keyless entry Ceiling fans Complimentary Wi-Fi Hair dryer Iron and board Full kitchen: dishwasher, stovetop/oven, microwave, toaster refrigerator,  cookware, tableware Stone/slate walk in shower  Washer/Dryer
space: Set amidst serene gardens, this boutique-style Lahaina vacation condo situated on the 2nd floor features open-beam ceilings, Asian-inspired décor, and a wonderful kitchen.  The property is home to two swimming pools, a whirlpool spa, private cabanas and two barbecue areas.  What’s more, Lahaina’s harbor and the many shops and restaurants of Front Street are just two blocks away.
description: Beautiful Second Floor Unit – Stairs only – No elevator Upgraded tropical decor Amazing sheets and linens 1 King bed and 1 Queen sofa bed Maximum 4 persons (including children) Amazing Pool (Tension Edge – salt water) Air conditioning Alarm clock/radio Cable TV Kaba lock keyless entry Ceiling fans Complimentary Wi-Fi Hair dryer Iron and board Full kitchen: dishwasher, stovetop/oven, microwave, toaster refrigerator,  cookware, tableware Stone/slate walk in shower  Washer/Dryer Set amidst serene gardens, this boutique-style Lahaina vacation condo situated on the 2nd floor features open-beam ceilings, Asian-inspired décor, and a wonderful kitchen.  The property is home to two swimming pools, a whirlpool spa, private cabanas and two barbecue areas.  What’s more, Lahaina’s harbor and the many shops and restaurants of Front Street are just two blocks away. All areas of the property are for your use, Pools, BBQ's grounds.... Parking is paid upon arrival to the front desk, OR free parking on t
neighborhood_overview: Lahaina town is small quaint and fun! Lahaina’s harbor and the many shops and restaurants of Front Street are just two blocks away.
notes: We always do our best to make sure your vacation is great! We are close by should you need extra towels or anything.... this is the precious time where memories are made.
transit: Renting a bike is a great time while staying at Aina Nalu. There are many shops with bike rentals. We highly recommend a car so you can see all that Maui has to offer.
access: All areas of the property are for your use, Pools, BBQ's grounds.... Parking is paid upon arrival to the front desk, OR free parking on the street.
interaction: I live close by and I understand wanting total privacy. However, I am just a phone call away but do not need any interaction, it's your vacation!
house_rules: ALWAYS rinse SAND OFF before entering unit. Be courteous of the electric bill. Turn off A/C, lights, fans etc...when leaving. Blow out candles for fire safety. Please always lock doors. Beach equipment (2 beach chairs, cooler and umbrella) is in bedroom closet. Please return rinsed and dried off. Be careful when opening the front door. Gusts of wind will make things blow away!  Please do not throw or hang any objects from lanai or window. Including towels and clothing. No personal items can be left in hallways, including shoes. Respect common areas and other guests. Be courteous of quiet hours. 10 pm-8am. Pool hours: Large pool 9am-10pm  / Small pool 9am-9pm  No smoking please! Security can be reached at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) In case of lock out please call security. You are responsible for disposing of your rubbish upon check out. There are rubbish receptacles located in the basement of the building.   Please leave key cards on kitchen counter before you check out. There is

host.host_about: Aloha I have lived in Maui for 25 years and this is my paradise! I take great pride in the comfort of my guests. My wish is for you to have a wonderful time and come back! I have 3 beautiful kids, two of which are pro surfers and a 16 year old daughter.

reviews.comments: Jill’s place is in such a great location. The apartment was clean a beautifully decorated. The pools were also a plus!! Would definitely recommend!!

This bamboo hideaway condo was a great find for us. We loved how close it was to front street, but still set back enough to be very private and quiet. Matress is comfortable, all the necessities are stocked in the kitchen and a nice spread of beach equipment to use. We really love that it felt like a home, not a hotel. It was a nice place to go home to relax after each day of adventures. A/C blows cold and the fans are great. We will definitely recommend to our friends. Also love how fast responses are from the host during our stay.

Jill’s place was perfect for our stay in Lahaina. A lot of the shops and restaurants were walkable and the area is nice and quiet. Jill’s place is just as pictured and clean. She is great at answering questions and communicating with you throughout your stay if need be. Definitely recommend her place for a lovely time in Lahaina.

We enjoyed staying at bamboo hideaway. The condo was very clean and the perfect size for our family of three. The kitchen was well stocked with all the essentials and the sand toys and beach equipment were a nice bonus to have. The place was conveniently located close to Front street as well as the bus stop. Jill and her assistant Melanie were prompt and pleasant to communicate with. I would definitely recommend her place as a great alternative if you're looking for something a little more homey to a typical beach resort hotel.
Great spot! Thank you, Jill!

Beautiful space in a great spot. Loved the thoughtful line up of beach and pool gear and toys—as well as a Pack n Play for the baby. Only downside was the ants that took over the countertops each day, making us resort to carrying food to living room to prepare and eat. Probably just an unavoidable consequence of the rain.
숙소가 깨끗하고 필요한 물건의 대부분의 비치되어 있었습니다.

The place is absolutely incredible - one of the greatest places we ever stayed! The location is excellent, appartment are large, stylish and very Hawaian - we had much more than we expected! Will definitely choose this place once we are back to Maui! Totally in love :)
The accommodation was excellent. We would highly recommend it. It is very close to the Main Street in Lahaina, to shops and restaurants. It was clean and well equipped!

FANTASTIC location if you want to spend lots of time in beautiful Lahaina. Walking distance to parks, grocery stores, tons of restaurants--everything! The pool was great as well and the condo itself was clean, comfortable, and had everything we needed (including a washer and dryer, beach stuff, kitchen). Will definitely stay again next time we come to Lahaina! Jill was an incredibly responsive host and very helpful and accommodating. Five star host! :)

Very nice remodeled condo! Communication was a breeze and it was an easy walk to restaurants in Lahaina. Family-friendly with lots of kids in the pool and spa. Only thing it note is that the unit looks over the parking lot and it can be noisy in the morning with travelers leaving. Besides that, very nice place!

A wonderful place with easy access to front street and the beaches. The suite is nicely furnished and updated and the kitchen is well stocked for your needs. 
Street parking was easily accessible for our entire stay if you don’t wish to pay extra. Hope to return again in the near future.

We rented this condo for my father and his bride and when they opened the door to this darling condo - their mouth fell open with delight!  Bright and fresh with current décor it has everything for a great Hawaiian stay. Located in condo complex which felt safe and secure - had a pool and BBQ area with lots of native flowers everywhere. Walk to Front Street, Marina, shops, restaurants, beaches just a short few blocks. Jill our host was remarkable in accomodating our special request for champagne and flowers even on a Sunday. She was awesome and this is our new favorite place to stay in Maui!!

Really enjoyed our stay here. Perfect location to walk to restaurants, shops and the ocean...2 blocks away. The apartment is spacious and beautifully decorated with a comfy king size bed. The shower was our favorite with its earthy and open feel. We would definitely stay again! Note that parking is $20 per day, our only complaint.

Jill's place was great! Very clean, nice updated furnishings, A/C in both the living room and bedroom, beach towels and gear were provided. Jill and her assistants were very responsive to various questions I had. We opted to pay for the $20 parking on site for convenience and there were plenty of parking spots available at all times of the day/night. Note that there's no shampoo/bath soap provided, but there's a ABC Store and Whalers General Store on Front St. 5 min walk away where you can quickly pick some up. We'll definitely think of Jill's place again when we're back in Maui!

I highly recommend Jill’s place for future Lahaina guests. Location was perfect - so close to great food, coffee and drinks (no driving necessary). The condo itself had great views and was super cozy. Would 100% return.

We had a wonderful stay here! It was efficient and effortless. We really appreciated how clean the apartment and absolutely loved the location. It's a block or two away from Front st (where all the restaurants, bars and shops are). It was also conveniently located a block away from the scuba dive shop we dove with. Parking is super pricey in Lahina, but if you're lucky you can find street parking for free. We look forward to paying another visit here!
Great location , value , and cleanliness.  What more can you ask for?!

This was our second time staying at the aina nalu but first time Jill’s rental for the 2nd half of our Maui trip.  We love the location of this place! It’s a block away from front street and plenty of restaurants! We are discovered a few food trucks down the road that had amazing breakfast tacos and açaí bowls. Jill’s place is exactly as described in the listing - spacious, clean and a good amount of amenities. She had a pack play which for us was a huge plus since we were traveling with our 14 month old. She also had plenty of towels and beach gear too. We loved having the washer/dryer in the unit as well. Communication and the check-in/check out process was easy. Would stay here again. 

Mahalo
Tiffanie, Mike and Emma
This place is awesome. Super clean, good location, and has everything you need to cook. Parking can be somewhat of a hassle, but overall I highly recommend staying here if you’re ever in Maui.

This unit is perfectly located in walking distance to pretty much everything in Lahaina. Amazing shops, food, and excursions are just around the corner. The unit is clean, cozy, and really a perfect spot. You can barbecue while the family plays in the pool or head down to listen to some music while having a cocktail. Love this spot!

This place was the perfect space for my group of 3! Everything was exactly like the photos and the location was perfect for our needs! Located just a short walk from The Dwarf, and a short drive to all the beaches. 
Check in was easy and the place came with everything you would need for a day at the beach. It was a life saver! I would recommend Jill’s place and would love to stay here again :)
Great place to stay in Lahaina and great host!
Absolutely perfect in every way!!

We had a question about check-in and Jill responded immediately.  Great host!  The place was awesome - has everything you need, and then some.  Also enjoyed the A/C (other places on the island didn't have any).  Close enough to walk to everything, and also really enjoyed the relaxing pool.  Great place to stay in Lahaina!

Jill’s place is 100 our vibe!! It is perfectly modern, stylish and charming. She provided so many  things for us, anticipating our every need. It made our stay seamless.  We look forward to staying again! Aloha!

Jill was helpful and communicative from beginning to end. Her listing is exactly what we expected and in a great location in Lahaina - walking distance to Front Street shops/restaurants. Jill's place provided amenities that were so useful during our stay on Maui (beach chairs, umbrella, beach towels etc). The kitchen was totally usable and allowed us to cook our own meals during our week. The place was immaculate and it was also super helpful to have a washer/dryer in the unit. The pools were great and really quiet. Aina Nalu is really quiet and feels like you have your "own place" in the neighborhood rather than a big resort like most other hotels on the island. We didn't have trouble looking for free street parking unless you come home late, but then you just park a block away. Thank you Jill for inviting us into your home during our trip!
위치가 정말 최고인 곳이에요. 라하이나 올드타운에서 걸어서 3분거리에요. 마우이에 다시 방문해도 묵고 싶은 훌륭한 숙소입니다
Everything was as described. Great location and value.
This is a fantastic location and we will be recommending this spot to friends and family!

The space was great! Everything was clean and nicely decorated. We loved how close it was to all the shops and restaurants. The communication was great, which made for a very easy check-in/out. We'd definitely stay here again!
We will definitely stay again! Appreciated that everything was just as pictured.
Great value with exceptional ambiance, a real find.  We thoroughly enjoyed coming "home" to Aina Nalu after long days exploring Maui.  Being so close to Front Street is an added plus.

My husband and I loved staying at Jill’s condo during our honeymoon. The space is beautiful and spacious. You do have to pay for parking, but it’s within walking distance to busy Lahaina, which was fantastic! I would definitely recommend staying here.
Wonderful condo that is located in a perfect area for fun.  Jill responded at lightning speed and was so gracious.  Highly recommended.

Absolutely loved our stay here! Great location and really comfortable place that was very clean and nicely decorated. Perfect place for our stay, we were very impressed and would definitely recommend.
Beautiful condo very close to down town Lahaina! Located walking distance away from the harbor. Beautiful pools at the facility. There is an additional fee for parking but street parking is a ailabe.
Loved our stay in Maui! Jill's place was awesome! Clean, quiet, and in a great area. Highly recommended.
Such a great apartment! We loved staying here and being able to feel at home! Plus the shower is stellar!

What a fabulous location, if you love Lahaina... you can walk any place you would want to visit.  This place is a secret hidden gem !  Wow we wish we had spent our entire 10 days at Jill’s place!  We are sure to return!  Jill, is absolutely amazing!  AC works great, place is cute and very comfortable and has everything you will ever need, owners have thought of everything!   Parking is 20.00 a night but street parking was easy and convenient!  Thank You Jill!  See you soon! Nikki and Lloyd K.

What more can you ask for in a place? New, clean, amazing bathroom, central to everything, pool, cold AC and full kitchen with the appliances and utensils you’d need. Slight inconvenience was that we had to pay $20 parking per night but I’d expect that for a condo hotel.  Thanks Jill for An amazing stay!

The condo is in a perfect location. Jill even had beach supplies that saved us $$. It is located in the heart of downtown Lahaina. We rarely used the car and instead walked to most places. The pools are great, not overwhelming with people. I also like that there is security on the grounds.  Parking fees are something to consider but like I said, there is security.  Checking in and out was very painless. Communication with our host was quick. Thanks for a great stay!

Jill's unit in the Ainu Nalu gets a big thumbs-up from us! Everything you need for a great stay in Maui... comfortable, clean, great amenities and a great pool area. Throw in good communication from the host and the location in Lahaina and it's an easy five stars.
Wonderful location, great pool, excellent communication with the host. Highly recommend this place. :)

name: Kuuipo Cottage Romantic Volcano Rainforest Retreat
summary: Kuuipo Cottage is a clean, secluded and relaxing slice of paradise. You won't want to leave, as many of our guests have commented in our guestbook. It's only a 7-minute drive to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. There is plenty to do and see with nearby golfing, hiking, horseback riding, art galleries and much more. The city of Hilo is only twenty six miles away with access to beaches, shopping, restaurants and the Hilo International Airport.
space: This home is tastefully decorated and impeccably maintained. It offers a full kitchen including stainless appliances and granite bar top. you can also get cozy in front of the gas fireplace or read a book on the newly expanded lanai.
description: Kuuipo Cottage is a clean, secluded and relaxing slice of paradise. You won't want to leave, as many of our guests have commented in our guestbook. It's only a 7-minute drive to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. There is plenty to do and see with nearby golfing, hiking, horseback riding, art galleries and much more. The city of Hilo is only twenty six miles away with access to beaches, shopping, restaurants and the Hilo International Airport. This home is tastefully decorated and impeccably maintained. It offers a full kitchen including stainless appliances and granite bar top. you can also get cozy in front of the gas fireplace or read a book on the newly expanded lanai. All areas in the home except locked closets are accessible to guests. You're welcome to email, message, text or call should you need anything. This is a very rural, peaceful little village that offers rest and relaxation for those who are looking to get away from it all. When you're ready for some outdoor adventure ther
neighborhood_overview: This is a very rural, peaceful little village that offers rest and relaxation for those who are looking to get away from it all. When you're ready for some outdoor adventure there's plenty to be had.
transit: Public transportation is extremely limited. Taxi service is available in most cases but isn't very affordable. Guests should plan on renting their own vehicle.
access: All areas in the home except locked closets are accessible to guests.
interaction: You're welcome to email, message, text or call should you need anything.
house_rules: Check out is at 11 am sharp, guests will be charged an additional cleaning fee ($50) for any check out past 11:30 am.  In the event your late check out does not leave us enough time to prepare the home for subsequent guests, you will be charged an additional night stay in addition to this cleaning fee. You will also be held liable for any and all charges and fees associated with their relocation/alternative accommodations.

reviews.comments: Beautiful and quiet with all the amenities one would expect in a luxury hotel, the host was friendly and very accommodating this place is a value for the price.
Excellent location close to the park and food.  House was clean with all the amenities.
This place was secluded and exactly what we needed. Looks a little bigger in the photos, but a slice of awesome nonetheless. Danielle let us check in day of, really swift communication. Loved it!

The house is same as the pic shows, very close to the Park, clean and warm. We arrive at house around 7:00pm, lights and heater are (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very warm, just like back home.
Danielle is also very kindly to support my family. 
But that area is not very close to big super market, so be sure you take enough food if you come to the house very late.
Awesome place.
I really like that place! It has got really good position, it was clean a nice inside. Nature around was beautiful. I really recommend this place.
Very nice place. We very much enjoyed our stay.  Thanks you.
Easy check in and good communication. Great location.

The Ku‘uipo Cottage truly embodies what Big Island living should be like. Very secluded and away from the bustle of town, with all the amenities and charm of a home. This cottage was clean, had a beautiful interior, and was very comfortable. Loved waking up to the ‘ōhi‘a forest every morning! 

Danielle was also very responsive and helpful before checking in as well! This home was such a nice central location if you plan on driving to both Hilo and Kona side during your stay, and I definitely recommend it. Can't wait for our next visit back!
A perfect place with a calm and quiet atmosphere. It is clean and Danielle is a wonderful host. You can’t go wrong with her place!
super awesome !

Mahalo Danielle for such a quick response on our last minute booking! We booked at another place and the host did not provide us with the code to get in the room.

I booked this beautiful house on a whim hoping we'd be able to rest. She was very accommodating and sweet over the phone. 

Mahalo!!!
Awesome experience ,very private home .
Very, clean, cozy and accurate in description! Will stay again if ever in the area!
very stunning and beautiful property. nice location. will rent again when in the area again. would reccomend this place to future renters.

Danielle’s place is super cozy and private. I didn’t have a problem finding the street off Highway 11, it’s between the 23rd and 24th mile markers. Pay close attention to mile markers they use them a lot around here. I love the area of Volcano. It pretty much rained every night and most days but the temp was still in the 80’s. I’m from CA where it hardly ever rains so i enjoyed it. Kona Coast is 96 miles, easy day trip and back from house. Hilo and Rainbow falls just a short trip down the mountain. Town of Volcano is about 3 miles away, there’s a couple of restaurants with a great menu. I would definitely stay again, thanks Danielle.
Close to the National Park. Host responds to our questions quickly. We have a nice trip here.
Lovely little spot in the heart of volcano.
Nice, exceptionally clean place very close to the volcano park.

This is a beautiful, impeccably clean space so close to Volcanoes National Park. Checkin was a breeze (using door code) Very private area- we hardly ever even saw another car. We would absolutely stay here again. Thank you!

This a great location for travelers looking for peace and quiet while also being within reasonable range of many great outdoor activities. Volcanoes National Park is right next door, the punalu'u black sand beach is 40 min away, and not much farther is the green sand beach. You can also do an easy day trip to Kona with an amazing coastline drive to get there!
Danielle gave very quick responses when I ask some questions.  It was very easy to check in.  The nature environment was very nice.  If you want to have a quiet and a private time, I recommend here.

name: Elegant studio in old town Barcelona, El Gothic
summary: A very elegant studio flat that contains two double beds. Kitchen, working table, fibre connected internet - the bathroom is pleasant with a generous shower.
space: Couples or 2-4 friends
description: A very elegant studio flat that contains two double beds. Kitchen, working table, fibre connected internet - the bathroom is pleasant with a generous shower. Couples or 2-4 friends Terrace on top of the building I might not be in Spain, but often in Norway and  then in the same time zone. Might be in Florida and 6 hours behind you, but try my phone or airbnb message, it seldom takes long before I respond. The place is close to absolutely everything: supermarkets, shopping, harbor, beaches, music, culture, living art, museums, restaurants. A parking garage is nearby, but you really do not need a car. The city is perfect for walking and jogging. ,Rental bikes are nearby, the same goes for taxis and the subway I really do care that you have a pleasant stay.
