host.host_about: Grown - up lady that is fond of people. I really will see to that you have a great stay. And - I am a quick responder to your requests.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

name: Oceanfront 1 bedroom 2 bath in the heart of Kona
summary: Breathtaking oceanfront view from our recently remodeled 1 bedroom 2 bathroom condo right in Kailua Kona. There are shops, restaurants, historical sites and thrilling ocean activities all within minutes of our condo. The fabulous panoramic views from the spacious lanai are amazing and if you like to people watch then this is the place for you. Our condo has a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable seating and dining both inside and on the lanai. One assigned parking space. Tax is included in price.
description: Breathtaking oceanfront view from our recently remodeled 1 bedroom 2 bathroom condo right in Kailua Kona. There are shops, restaurants, historical sites and thrilling ocean activities all within minutes of our condo. The fabulous panoramic views from the spacious lanai are amazing and if you like to people watch then this is the place for you. Our condo has a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable seating and dining both inside and on the lanai. One assigned parking space. Tax is included in price. You are welcome to use the pool and the BBQ's located near the pool.  Please observe the pool hours and the quiet time for the complex.  The house rules for the complex are included in the welcome book in the condo.  Please read them. Check out information is also posted in the condo. Our on island manager is available to help you with any questions or to address any problems with the condo. You can find the manager's phone number and email in the welcome book. If the manager is unavailable, pl
neighborhood_overview: The condo is in downtown Kailua Kona. The condo is on Alii Drive, which runs along Kailua Bay. Within a few blocks are a farmers' market, coffee shops, many restaurants and bars, and various shops. There are more than 25 restaurants within 0.7 miles.
transit: A trolley runs along Alii Drive from the pier to the north to the Sheraton to the south. There are several wonderful beaches along the trolley route. You don't need a car, but you will probably want one to explore the rest of the Big Island.
access: You are welcome to use the pool and the BBQ's located near the pool.  Please observe the pool hours and the quiet time for the complex.  The house rules for the complex are included in the welcome book in the condo.  Please read them. Check out information is also posted in the condo.
interaction: Our on island manager is available to help you with any questions or to address any problems with the condo. You can find the manager's phone number and email in the welcome book. If the manager is unavailable, please feel free to contact me.

reviews.comments: You can virtually walk to restaurants and any other activities going on in the city.
Nice condo in the heart of downtown kona. The location couldn't be beat and the views off of the lanai were great. Very comfortable place to call home for our stay.
Excelent location. Clean. All things you need for a normal life are available.

name: Minha casa, sua casa!
summary: O apartamento é silencioso e bem dividido, com cômodos independentes e completamente equipado para conforto dos hóspedes.
space: Mercado enfrente, farmácia ao lado, a 100m da praia de Copacabana (posto 6 _ área nobre), lavanderia, Bancos (Brasil, Santander, Bradesco, praticamente vizinhos). Bares e restaurantes na quadra da praia onde está o apartamento. Divisa com Ipanema (Rua Francisco Sá liga Ipanema à Copacabana). A 1 quadra da estação de metrô General Osório. Área mais residencial de Copacabana com comércio regular e legalizado e serviços diversos à disposição quase 24h.
description: O apartamento é silencioso e bem dividido, com cômodos independentes e completamente equipado para conforto dos hóspedes. Mercado enfrente, farmácia ao lado, a 100m da praia de Copacabana (posto 6 _ área nobre), lavanderia, Bancos (Brasil, Santander, Bradesco, praticamente vizinhos). Bares e restaurantes na quadra da praia onde está o apartamento. Divisa com Ipanema (Rua Francisco Sá liga Ipanema à Copacabana). A 1 quadra da estação de metrô General Osório. Área mais residencial de Copacabana com comércio regular e legalizado e serviços diversos à disposição quase 24h. Acesso a todo imóvel. Manter contato através de mensagens de texto se necessitarem. Informações serão repassadas aos hóspedes no check-in. Bairro agradável e dinâmico, "nunca dorme"! Táxi, metrô para todas as áreas da cidade, Uber, etc... Sempre disponíveis! Natureza espetacular; o mar de Copacabana, a vista para o Pão de Açúcar, opções de lazer (Stand-up paddle, ciclismo, caminhada/corrida diurna ou noturna pelo famoso
neighborhood_overview: Bairro agradável e dinâmico, "nunca dorme"! Táxi, metrô para todas as áreas da cidade, Uber, etc... Sempre disponíveis! Natureza espetacular; o mar de Copacabana, a vista para o Pão de Açúcar, opções de lazer (Stand-up paddle, ciclismo, caminhada/corrida diurna ou noturna pelo famoso "calçadão de Copacabana"). O forte de copacabana prestigiando a nossa área nesse imenso bairro.
transit: Todos os meios de transporte à disposição. Vc chega e sai do bairro de metrô, táxi, Uber, ônibus, bicicleta, skate,...
access: Acesso a todo imóvel.
interaction: Manter contato através de mensagens de texto se necessitarem. Informações serão repassadas aos hóspedes no check-in.
house_rules: Mantenha o apartamento limpo. Ao sair desligue as luzes e mantenha as janelas fechadas. Não utilizar a máquina de lavar. Não está permitida a entrada de nenhuma pessoa no imóvel à exceção dos hóspedes que o contratou (sujeito à multa). Recolher a roupa de cama e banho no ato do check-out e deixá-la na área de serviço do imóvel. Ter cuidado ao manusear as persianas das janelas, não levantá-la excessivamente. Respeitar o limite de abertura das persianas!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: I am a forty-year-old  physiotherapist who has been working as a Pilates instructor for 18 years. I was born in Rio de Janeiro and have already worked as a guide in the past in pair with Dad, who knows a lot of Rio, its culture and the most genuine and incredible places to visit besides the usual ones. I consider myself as a great hostess and I will do my very best in case of doubts or troubles if it happens. To deal with the stress, "I breath the roses and blow the candles"  several times if needed ;)

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Fernanda foi desde o início muito simpática e muito solícita. Respondia com muita agilidade e nos ajudou com várias questões, inclusive dicas sobre a cidade. Ficamos em contato por todo o tempo pré, durante e após a reserva, o que pra mim foi um fator diferencial. O apto tinha uma localização ótima! Apenas 1 quarteirão da praia, acesso a ônibus, mercado e lojas com muita facilidade. O apto estava limpo e organizado. Adoramos a experiência e indicamos a todos!

name: Retreat in Chic Cozy 2BR APT - ❤️ of SYD CBD
summary: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION !!!  Explore and live like a local in Surry Hills which ranks as the 23rd most stylish neighborhood in the world & No.1 in Australia! If you are looking for an amazing apartment in the best location in SYDNEY CBD look no further. Step outside to the vibrant and colourful Elizabeth St with easy 3 min walk to Central Station, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, World Square and short stroll to Opera House & the Rocks.   2 Bedrooms + Double Sofa Bed, 1 Bathroom, Free Wifi.
space: This is without doubt THE BEST LOCATION you could ever ask for when visiting Sydney. Surry Hills is an amazing inner city neighbourhood in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs, recently voted 23rd most sytlish suburb in the world! Incredibly relaxed place, great facilities including a start of the art new library, awesome bars, cafes & restaurants. 2 minute walk to everything that is wonderful and local in the inner-city village of Surry Hills, and a short walk further to Sydney's CBD, Hyde Park or Centennial Park. Across the road from the iconic Sydney Cricket Ground and other sporting venues, 15 minutes to Sydney's beautiful eastern suburbs beaches including the world famous Bondi Beach. Start your day with a coffee at the amazing Bourke Street Bakery just few minutes away. Fantastic mix of creative types, families, professionals & interesting locals :-) You will love it here. While in the neighbourhood, be sure to enjoy a well-known Sydney pub, there are many to choose from! Enjoy a meal at one
description: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION !!!  Explore and live like a local in Surry Hills which ranks as the 23rd most stylish neighborhood in the world & No.1 in Australia! If you are looking for an amazing apartment in the best location in SYDNEY CBD look no further. Step outside to the vibrant and colourful Elizabeth St with easy 3 min walk to Central Station, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, World Square and short stroll to Opera House & the Rocks.   2 Bedrooms + Double Sofa Bed, 1 Bathroom, Free Wifi. This is without doubt THE BEST LOCATION you could ever ask for when visiting Sydney. Surry Hills is an amazing inner city neighbourhood in Sydney's Eastern Suburbs, recently voted 23rd most sytlish suburb in the world! Incredibly relaxed place, great facilities including a start of the art new library, awesome bars, cafes & restaurants. 2 minute walk to everything that is wonderful and local in the inner-city village of Surry Hills, and a short walk further to Sydney's CBD, Hyde Park or Centennial Par
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is just 1km South-East of Sydney city and the area has an abundance of restaurants, pubs, cafes, shopping and parks. Great coffee! Fabulous shops to explore, and local places to dine, you will love living locally or enjoy the location for easy access to all of Sydney. You are within walking distance to Central Station, CBD, Oxford St and Circular Quay. With great public transport links, grab an Opal Card and get to Bondi Beach, Centennial Park and enjoy Sydney. Central PIZZA is right next to our building if you're too hungry :)
notes: NOTE: Please take off your shoes at the entrance and please leave the apartment clean and tidy as when you first find it. We really appreciate your courtesy! Take advantage of our LATEST PROMOTION and SPECIAL OFFERS and make your stay with us truly unique! Book early to secure your accommodation because we are often booked out during this period. Sydney is a bustling city and we're located right in the heart of it (which is part of the reasons why we love it!) so noise is inevitable. There is a construction going on from the right hand side of the complex so you might hear some noise during the day but hopefully it won’t affect you much as you’ll be exploring Sydney during daytime. This pad accommodates 4 adults comfortably but a max of 6 overnight. Any more than 4 adult guests overnight or extra sofa will attract an extra AU$30 per night, per additional guest. The sleeping arrangement for the 5th to 6th adult would be on a 2-seater sofa bed which folds out to a double with extra quilt
transit: 2 minutes walk to Central train station and bus interchange this apartment is perfectly located to get around Sydney. Leave the car and just walk everywhere! The City Centre is a 3 minute walk, Sydney Opera House 20 minutes and the Botanical Gardens 25 minutes. If you want to go further afield or just prefer public transport there are several bus stops within a 5 minute walk, which can take you around Sydney, including to Circular Quay, Bondi Beach or Centennial Park and of course you can get anywhere from Central train station. All public transport is close by. On street parking is available and the airport is literally 15 minutes away by cab or train.
access: Everything is yours to enjoy so treat the apartment as your own. Up to 2 x Key Fob and apartment keys will be given to each party or individual to access the apartment, and I will meet you in person or make suitable arrangements if I can not make it.  FAMILY & CHILD-FRIENDLY Accommodation! Baby travel cot, high baby chair and stroller can be provided at additional cost. There is also a laundry/dry cleaners below and they're amazing at ironing! and you can store bags at this location before and after you check in and out. There is no left luggage or luggage storage available at the property before you check in and after you check out. There is a Storage Service in the Laundromat below this building (Sydney Laundry @ 234 Elizabeth St). Costs are definitely the cheapest in Sydney CBD: only $2/day for small bag, $5-6/day for large luggage. Another options: Across the road at Central Station called Smart Carte (5 minutes walk) or World Square Shopping Centre (4 minutes walk).
interaction: You'll be the only guests staying, so enjoy the space! We will be there to welcome you in and answer any questions you might have, then we will be just a quick text or phone call away! Guests will check themselves out and leave keys on the table. All we ask is that you be respectful to our neighbours.  Please note I like to accommodate my guests arrivals and departures as best as possible, just let me know what time you would like to check in and check out and we will do our best to let you stay as long as possible, but at times we will need the apartment to be vacated by 10am and the check in to be after 3pm.  The best way to contact us is via AirBnb. Otherwise you can also reach us via SMS or Mobile when necessary. Rest assured, my response time is pretty much instant. I or a trusted friend will be available leading up to and during your stay to answer any questions you may have.
house_rules: - Welcome to our cozy and comfortable apartment - located in the most convenient location in Sydney CBD!  We want you to feel like home, this is our policy and it worked for a very long time. Many of our guests are friends now and we do keep in touch and visit. If this property is booked, look at the other one which is linked to this one.  Respectful, quiet (no parties) and clean & tidy people are welcomed in my home. NO rowdiness please consider other guests.  The house is always spotless as I am a very proud home owner. I love to socialise but privacy is also respected and assured. Happy to give you directions & ideas about touring Sydney etc. Smoking is only allowed outside if required. Please leave the room as nice and tidy as you found it.  *Key pick-up:* Please text me via Airbnb few days before the check-in date to arrange key pick-up.  *Keys: A LOST KEY WILL BE CHARGED $250 - THIS IS NON NEGOTIABLE FOR WHAT A KEY FOB COSTS TO REPLACE IN THIS BUILDING.   *Check-in time*: Check-i

host.host_about:
We can't live without sunshine, an open mind, kind hearted people, good food and our family. 
We are crazy about the artistry of food and always on the hunt for new creative food experiences, and the Surry Hills/Darlinghurst and CBD are sure bets for all foodies out there!
We love travelling, getting to know new cultures and people.
We try to make each day count. 
We choose to be happy. 
We love my Airbnb experience, both as a host and a traveller and cannot recommend it highly enough.

We are blessed with amazing opportunities everyday, and lucky enough to not work for anyone, instead we manage our own portfolio of properties and our clients'. We are providers of boutique executive and holiday accommodation in popular locations across the city. Our properties are selected for their style, features, luxury, amenities and convenient locations. Our aim is to provide a modern and vibrant approach to short term accommodation. 

We frequently service corporate relocations, business travellers, extended holiday makers and families that prefer “home-style” accommodation with kitchen and laundry facilities. Our properties come complete with linen, towels, kitchenware and free wifi internet.

If you are a property owner or would like to know more please contact us.

reviews.comments:
Su was an exceptionally accommodating host and her apartment is as lovely and well appointed as it looks! Su was extremely responsive and helpful in the lead-up to my arrival.
 Unfortunately, I had to cut my trip short because of a personal issue in my family, and Su couldn't have been more understanding or gracious about the situation
A great place, comfy bed, decorated very nicely and was bigger than expected! Hosts were lovely, with prompt replies and were very accomodating. Would definitely recommend and stay again :-)

Su is a great person and also a great host, she was willing to answer any questions and to chat about anything that came up and she is a great company to be with. Her place is really nice and clean and comfortable. Th location is just fantastic, close to everything in the center by foot, don't need to use any transportation services (except for the train/taxi from/to the airport). I loved my stay at Su's place and I would gladly come back and I recommend it to others.
It's really a good apartment with grat location. Have a good time there.

We stayed two nights in Max's apartment. Host is very considerate and warm-hearted. Ready to serve and answer your need and questions. Room is pretty clean and tidy, also located just near central station. Had great time there. Thanks.
sooooo convenient and clean apartment! The owner is very nice and if you are planning stay in Sydney,this place definitely is your first choice!
A lovely, clean and conveniently located apartment, well appointed and communication with Max and Su was exceptional. A few broken item items that can be easily fixed would have made my visit 5 star.
Su的房子地段很好,central 站出来步行5分钟之内,去市区基本都可以步行到达｡房子内部装修较新,特别要提的是,床垫很舒服｡两房的房型非常适合家庭出游｡房东总是能及时的有问必答,下次来悉尼应该还会预订Su的房子｡
Not too bad
Wonderful place, location so nice... Central station only 3-5 min reached. Surrounded by cafe and coffees store...and affordable too
Su's place is nice 2 bedrooms apartment, close to public transport, restaurant and walking distance to everywhere. Su was quick response and helpful.
Great location and value! Much recommended to everyone traveling in Sydney. Max is a great host.
Very central apartment, really spacious and clean and decorated lovely. Fully equipped with washing machine and dryer and kitchen
Great apartment in a fantastic location, close to public transport.

This is a charming apartment in a great location. Easy walking distance to many places and just a block from the train if using public transportation.  Unfortunately our TV did not work (not that we were using it much) to Su's credit, it was changed the next day. However, the wifi then broke, which left us a drift as we did not have a local phone and could only communicate via texting. Overall, lovely apartment. If you plan to cook any meals, be warned the kitchen is not well stocked. bring your own French press if you can't wait to visit one of the wonderful cafe's near by. Overall , good value with. A few glitches to be worked out.

Family of five (including 2 small kids) came to stay at Max's place. Max was such a generous and accommodating host and allowed us to check-in earlier upon our request. Fantastic location near Central train station and bus stops, and easy walk to Paddy's Market/ Chinatown/ Powerhouse Museum. Apartment is clean, spacious, and has all the amenities travelers could possibly need (i.e. cooking utensils, plenty of dishes and cutlery, dishwasher, full-length mirrors on the closet doors, built-in wardrobes with hangers, airconditioning, washer/dryer). Would definitely recommend this home to families with kids or up to 6 adults.

Great place to stay. Max was very quick in his responses and was always very informative and patient.

The flat was exactly as described and is in a great location in Surry Hills
An excellent trip with warm reception and convenient location : )

Good location, near to Central Station, with 15-20 minutes to the downtown areas, 10 minutes walk-able distance to Chinatown. Easily accessible to popular places like Circular Quay, Daring Harbour, Bondi via trains/buses and there are few fast-food restaurants and convenience store, supermarket downstairs. Quiet most of the time except a bit of noise during daytime from the construction work opposite to apartment building. The apartment main door is located in main road which is easily to find.

There are minor issues on the smoke-alert, disk washer, except these other facilities in the apartment are well-operated. TV is small comparatively (think under 20-25"), Kitchen stuff are well-equipped, Beds / Sofa-Bed are comfortable.

Apartment host responds to the inquiries in reasonable time, and willing to help most of the times, during my stay, the host provides extended baggage storage services which is excellent.
Great stay, will be back in the future
Fantastic location

위치가 정말 좋았다. 근처에 있는 카페에 그냥 들렀는데 퀄리티 좋은 식사를 했고, 버스와 트레인 등 교통에 대한 접근성이 정말 좋은 위치였다. 

화장실이 다소 물조절하는 방식이 낯설고 옛날 방식인 것과 와이파이가 ADSL이라 느린점을 제외하고는 정말 만족했다.
The place is exactly as pictures. Comfortable and convenience. Had AC breakdown but other than that, everything was good. Thank you!

A very uncomfortable stay. We turned up to find there was no air con and could not reach the host as soon as they realised they had done wrong. The apartment had had its fire alarm removed for some reason also.
Very nice location in Sydney!
중앙역과 가까워 교통이 편리하고 걸어서 주변을 관광하기에 좋았음
Great place to stay with close to all amenities.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Su's gorgeous apartment! Modern and tidy yet bright in personality - a very homely space! The location was perfect, close to Central and all things fun within the city. Communicated mostly with Max who was very helpful in assisting our check-in and other info - definitely helped make our stay as easy and enjoyable as possible. Would 100% book again! Thanks :)
房子附近很方便,房間很乾淨,但房東的訊息回覆很慢｡

Su’s apartment is in an amazing location, just a 30-minute walk from Circular Quay and close to lots of lovely restaurants. Apartment is really lovely and Su and the team were so accommodating about letting us check in early. A great stay.

The location was perfect for us, very close to both Central Station (and therefore the airport), and cafes and shops around Surry Hills and Oxford Street. The apartment is larger than we expected and was nice and clean. Having an additional set of keys readily available for larger groups of people would be good to save some hassles.

El departamento es como figura en las fotos, quizás un poco más chico de lo que pueden sugerir las imágenes. Una de las habitaciones es solo una división del salón, por lo cual no cuenta con la privacidad adecuada.  
Si bien la ubicación es buena, el departamento no tiene ventilación,las ventanas son fijas y el departamento tiene olor a humedad .
Por lo demás si no tenes presupuesto, esta bien.

Su & Max's place is in a great location, close to the main CBD and awesome cafes and restaurants. However a few things caused me to leave a 4 star review - the cleanliness was not up to standard, bedheads and shelves were dusty. Also, the washing machine was left on when we arrived causing a blockage and subsequently water all over the bathroom floor with no apology or explanation. The most confusing part was the host/cleaner knocking on the door and entering to grab a vacuum cleaner/put away some clean towels in the middle of our stay. We all stared in confusion as she walked in without saying anything, entered a bedroom and then left again. It doesn't seem like a huge deal but I keep thinking, what if I had been in the shower and exited to the bedroom to find someone in it - I would have been terrified.
There was also no dishwasher tablets, no clean sponge and no clean tea towels for us to use. For this reason I am leaving a 4 star review.
Good communication although cancelled stay
Very good location and very clean, comfortable!
Such a great location! We enjoyed exploring the neighborhood, and it was a lovely walk down to the harbor, through the Botanic Gardens and to the Opera House. The apartment was very comfortable.

Peddy's market, central station, world squre, korean mart (한호마트, 코스코스)와 매우 인접하며 세인트 메리성당까지 10-15분 거리. 2)비행기가 오전 10시 30분 도착이라 체크인 시간 3시까지 짐을 들고 다닐것이 걱정이었으나 친절하게도 10시 30분에 짐을 맡겨놓을 수 있게 해주셔서  편하게 다닐수 있었다 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 3)세탁기 건조기 구비되어 있어서 매우 편리함 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 4)번화가에 위치하나 아파트 주변 조용하고 저녁 8시까지도 근처 coles마트로 장보러 다닐수 있을 정도로 안전함 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 5)전반적으로 청결함 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 6)day tour 만남 장소인 리지스 스퀘어까지 7분 거리.
Great location. Walking distance to amazing restaurants and bars. Really enjoyed our stay.
very nice view from the apartment!
这件公寓简直像家一样,我喜欢它别致的格局,更喜欢和享受房东Max热心的建议和帮助｡虽然一直没能见面,但是Max为我们营造了家一样舒服的环境和氛围｡期待下一次悉尼之行!

We enjoyed the fact that the apartment was close to everything that we needed and public transportation. Max responded to all of our requests really promptly and even gave us extra service by transferring our bags to one of his other properties so that we could stay an extra night.

Highly recommend

Great location minutes away from Central Station and all Surry Hills has to offer. Stayed here for a business trip and would definitely recommend again. Having towels, toiletries, etc provided was a nice touch as well.

Lovely comfortable apartment in a great location. Was very impressed with the host. Communication was excellent and no trouble dropping our luggage early. Great having our own washing machine and dryer. I would recommend staying here.

Good.

You really can’t beat the location - close to central station, only a block from secure parking and a short walk to Darling Harbour.

Fantastic location! Great place to stay if you're just looking for a comfortable bed and amenities such as a washing machine and dryer. After the cleaning fee and airbnb VAT fees, it cost $307 AUD a night, which is quite expensive compared to a hotel. But in saying that, you won't get some amenities mentioned and location may not be as ideal as Surry Hills. I was a little disappointed initially (looked better in the photos) but if you take into account this fantastic suburb location and want a clean and comfortable stay, then look no further. Lastly, it's a bit of an inconvenience with one set of keys when the listing stated two would be provided. The host did let us drop our luggage earlier but we couldn't officially check in til after 3pm.
公寓位于这座美丽城市的中心地带, 距离达令港和悉尼国际会议中心 ､悉尼大桥､歌剧院､植物园､当代艺术博物馆 等著名景点都不远,地理位置优越

A great, central place to stay! Short travelling distances to places to explore in Sydney. BNB was clean and exactly as the photo - nothing to fault. 

Host has quick responses and is very understanding. He sorted out  a small problem in our stay very professionally. 

Overall, would definitely recommend this place if you are looking to explore what Sydney has to offer.
The location is great and Max is very helpful for our stay.
A great place to stay, would definitely recommend. a wonderful location with a nice modern feel, only issue is the host took multiple messages to reply.
房间较小,办公楼隔断而成,主卧与客厅厨房链接,墙体无法封闭,与客厅相通,私密空间较差｡

Good location but it ends there. Very old apartment for the price that was paid for 3 nights accomodation in Surry Hills, Sydney.
Listing looks nicer in the pictures. Quite evident that the apartment has gone through some wear and tear. On check in, keys were not in the specified area. Host was quick to help with that.
Awesome location!

Location and the appartments foyer was the highlight. The apartment itself was a little older than expected, the city views were not as shown.
Hosts communication was friendly and check in was painless.
很小,卧室是用木板隔开来的.没有窗户,很闷.当我打开被子,床上还有两只蟑螂,住得很不愉快
Really convenient apartment which close to the central station.

Overall our stay was good, and the apartment is as it is represented except for the view has been totally blocked out. On my booking I requested the sofa bed but that was not organised, but the manager was good to fix we just had to wait till later in the afternoon and they charged extra. The wifi didn’t work and I had no response when I asked for it to be looked at. And on check out , the care taker came in before 10am asking when we will be out. I said sorry running a little late and the response was we have to charge you for 30min!! Unfortunately this was a terrible way to end the stay and also does not represent Airbnb’s hosting model.
clean, comfortable, quiet hotel.
Thank you so much for me a great experience.

The place was exactly as expected. We had a great stay. The place is nice and modern. It's within minutes of central station, a lot closer than I thought which was a great bonus. 
Communication was good throughout.
To have none
Great appartment as shown in the photos. Would recommend as it is easy to access in the cbd area.
Was a nice space in a great location.

name: Cozy Stay Steps from Beach! AC, WiFi, Kitchenette Ease, TV–Waikiki Grand 604
summary: It’s a pleasure to come home to this stylish studio with air conditioning, ceiling fan, tile floors, flat screen, and WiFi. Easy living lets you prep meals in the kitchenette to share at the dining table.
space: Style and taste put this air-conditioned 254sf haven in a class of its own! You’ll love the cool color scheme, tile flooring, Queen platform bed, ceiling fan, flat screen TV, dining table, and shower with pebble tile floor. A kitchenette with full refrigerator, stovetop, and microwave add to the appeal. Conveniently located in Waikiki steps from the Pacific and Kapiolani Park, this casual hotel features individually decorated rooms with Diamond Head as a beautiful backdrop. Enjoy kitchenettes, open-air lanais, free WiFi, and easy access to Waikiki’s endless

host.host_about:
Located a block from the golden sands of Waikiki Beach is the Waikiki Grand Hotel. Submit to the easygoing lifestyle of Hawaii in one of our condominiums steps to the shore. Imagine a day-hike to the top of majestic Diamond Head Crater or a bike ride around Kapiolani Park. With the Pacific Ocean at your feet, anything is possible.

Waikiki Grand’s affordable vacation rentals occupy a location just at the edge of Kapiolani Park, home to the Honolulu Zoo and Waikiki Aquarium. We’re just steps to a broad stretch of sandy beach and Kapahulu Pier, which is known for great surfing and boogie boarding.

Whether wading in a calm ocean pool or exploring the urban landscape, there’s a ton to do in and out of the ocean.

- Catch a concert at the Waikiki Shell
- Snorkel with tropical fish at Sans Souci Beach
- Hit the trail to Diamond Head Lookout
- Learn to surf with the legendary Waikiki Beach Boys
- Check out live music along Kalakaua Avenue
- Dive into Waikiki’s sumptuous global cuisine scene
- Get the most value for your money, eat well and have fun

During your stay, you’ll explore a virtual buffet of international cuisine along Kalakaua Avenue. Cafes with macadamia nut pancakes, fresh mahi mahi, poke, and handmade noodles dot the streets. Stay nearby and grab Teddy’s Bigger Burgers, then cocktails with an ocean view at Hula’s Bar & Lei Stand.

Waikiki Grand Hotel is LGBT-friendly and TAG approved, offering an affordable price and a great location. Hawaii is a celebration of color and friendliness, and the place you stay should be, too.

reviews.comments: Good location and great staff, The building and facilities are rather old but mostly in good condition and adequate - nothing flash.

name: Room in Pointe Claire heritage home
summary: Beautiful, sunny, large, upstairs room, newly renovated with a king size bed overlooking the back garden. Just one block from Lake St Louis and the village. Easy access to many restaurants, cute coffee shops and boutiques. Bus stop on the corner for an 30 min ride to downtown Montreal.
space: There is also a small room with a single bed available without A/C.
description: Beautiful, sunny, large, upstairs room, newly renovated with a king size bed overlooking the back garden. Just one block from Lake St Louis and the village. Easy access to many restaurants, cute coffee shops and boutiques. Bus stop on the corner for an 30 min ride to downtown Montreal. There is also a small room with a single bed available without A/C.
house_rules: - Quiet after 11 pm - Preferably no shoes inside

host.host_about: Young spirited energetic senior. Immigrated from the Netherlands many years ago. Speaks Dutch, German and English.

reviews.comments: Jose is an awesome host. We had some nice social time with her chatting and she even shared an evenings meal with us unexpectedly. She is there to meet your every need and she has a great space to stay in. It is clean, large, the bed is very comfortable and it is very welcoming. There are many shops, restaurants and coffee shops that you can walk to in 2 minutes and the river is 2 minutes the other way. We loved exploring Pointe Claire, Dorval and Lachine which are very close to her and there is a beautiful and safe cycling route all the way into Montreal. Thank you Jose for being such a caring and interesting host.  We would recommend staying at her place!

Jose is Super Nice and Interesting : ) Her roommate Marlene is very friendly. Her cat is cute and fluffy! Our room is spacious and clean and full of artistic decorations. It's a lovely town with lots of water around. 5 star experience!

The place was spotless and very spacious. We felt perfectly at home even thought the thought of staying in another persons home sometimes makes me feel uncomfortable. In the morning we were recommend to a delightful coffee shop down the road with beautiful art. The area is beautiful for walking by the river and has delightful shops. The host was absolutely lovely and I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.

You will love everything about Jose's place and surroundings.
Renata

This is a keeper. Great location by being quiet and also closed to the Pointe-Claire touristic street with coffee shops and bakeries. The hospitality is awesome with a beautiful and clean room with a king size bed. We will come back and I highly recommend Jose's place.
A nice, clean with a good location and the best of the good people .

Logerment idéalement situé dans le petit village de Pointe-Claire, pittoresque à souhait avec quelques maisons pluri-centenaires, ce qui est suffisamment rare en Amérique du Nord pour être mentionné. A l’étage d’une maison sans doute bien ancienne, dans une ruelle qui donne sur le fleuve, une grande chambre lumineuse, manifestement récemment mordernisée, avec un dressing et une salle de bain (Website hidden by Airbnb) d’une douche à l’italienne très spacieuse. À noter, un vaste lit - un vrai king size - très très confortable, on y passerait sa journée! L’hôte est une délicieuse dame d’origine hollandaise, installée au Canada depuis 1956, très amicale. Elle vit en compagnie d’un petit chat plein de poils, très timide, et d’une autre personne dont la chambre se situe à l’étage, comme notre logement, mais qui était absente pour les fêtes.
Au total, entière satisfaction!

Jose's place is awesome! I was staying in town after writing an exam in Pointe-Claire. I was greeted right away at the door and whisked inside to join her and her friend for an awesome meal. Very lucky that they had decided to share there meal and some great conversation with me. I went to bed early and got up and left on the morning of a big storm in Montreal, so unfortunately I did not get to say goodbye. Hoping to stay again when I next write an exam in Pointe-Claire.

Cheers,
Wonderful hostess and location.  Lovely, clean and comfortable bedroom.  Highly recommend it.

This is the second time I've stayed at Jose's place, and it was even better this time! Marlene is a total sweetheart and awesome cook and let us try some of her amazing food. It was definitely like coming home again. Pointe Claire village is as charming as always, with lovely shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance of the house. I will definitely stay again.
Séjour tranquille et grande chambre comfortable . Représentante de l’hôtesse était sympathique. De plus accommodante puisque je devenais partir très tôt le matin et n’a pas causé de problèmes.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis, la chambre est grande et agréable et les environs sont très jolis.

Jose was a wonderful host...warm, friendly and just a lovely person.  The space was just as pictured and exactly as described.  It was a very large, nicely decorated room with a super comfortable king size bed.  Beautiful new bathroom, just outside the room, and lots of space to hang your clothes etc. in the alcove of the room itself.  There was a small fridge, and tea and a kettle as well as a welcome bowl of fresh fruit. The location was terrific...half an hour drive from downtown Montreal, about a 1 minute walk to downtown Pointe Claire and 1 minute walk to the water .  This was an oasis of peace and quiet.

Jose was so lovely.  She made me tea and we shared a lemon loaf while chatting.  Her roommate was equally friendly, and was so interesting.  The room looked like a hotel room, and the shower was really nice.  This is such a convenient location in Pointe-Claire.

This place was so cute! I loved the room and the king sized bed! There was a little nook in the room with a mini fridge which was perfect for me because I brought a lot of my own food. The place was easy to find and very close to adorable shops and a scenic lake! We loved our stay!

I stayed only one short night at Jose's place and everything is simply perfect, the warm welcome from Jose who makes you feel at home, the room is spacious and very clean with all the amenities, the bed is big and let you sleep like a baby. I highly recommend this place :-)

Jose's place was perfect! It is in a great location in the Pointe Claire village. The room is large, clean and the bed is extremely comfortable. We were staying in Pointe Claire to visit family and we loved staying at Jose's - it was so welcoming. Jose is extremely warm and pleasant. We enjoyed chatting with her and meeting her sweet cat. We had a very positive experience and we will definitely stay here again!

That was our second time at Jose’s place. Again it was awesome. The king bed is so confortable and the sector is charming. Above all, Jose is a superb host. My wife and I will be back when we have to stay in Montreal.
Jose’s place was exactly as advertised. She was very friendly and welcoming and the room was perfect. I will definitely stay again if I find myself in the area.

The room was a great size - plenty of space and I appreciated the small fridge and the ample closet space. As someone who grew up in the neighborhood I am very familiar with the location and enjoyed the time when I was not visiting family to meander about and enjoy the local cafes and shops. I highly recommend the location. Jose was a great host and very welcoming.
Great place and a super hostess!!!

Great place to stay - just a block away from the Village where there are lots of lovely shops. Jose is an amicable and cordialhost, always very helpful offering me tea and snacks. I will definitely stay there during my next visit to Montreal.  The room had a comfy king size bed and there is lots of room. It is truly a good deal .  Thank you.

Host was kind and welcoming. Location was fantastic, just steps away from the water front and a beautiful park in one direction, and 30 seconds away from the bustling main street in the other. Beautiful weather saw the streets alive as folks took to the streets to check out all the lovely shops and cafés.
Wonderful host lovely clean bright comfortable room. The location in the village is perfect. Terrific restaurants and beautiful walks. We will stay there again.

Jose was very nice! her place was nicely renovated upstairs and the bathroom was gorgeous. The bed was one of the most comfy ones I've slept on! 

A quiet little down with many small bars and restaurants within walking distance. 

Highly recommended! will definitely be back!

The space is exactly as advertised; a private home with modern amenities (TV, small fridge, coffee maker, air conditioner).  The bed is divine!   Jose and her roommate were very warm and welcoming.  The location is perfect; only a block from the lakefront, coffee shops, boutiques and markets.  Public transit runs along Lakeshore.  There is a sweet cat on the premises who doesn't come upstairs.  The guest washroom is shared with one person but this was never an issue.  Excellent value! I highly recommend Jose's house for those looking for peace, comfort and convenience.
Jose and her home were wonderful!  I fear sharing this great place as I would like it available every time I pass through and visit.

Reviews were accurate. If you are in the Montreal area and want a fabulous place to stay then look no further than Jose’s place.  Five star bed and bathroom. Jose is an excellent host and a wealth of information about the area.

Jose's place was great, the room is comfortable, squeeky clean and quiet. The shared bathroom is modern and very nice. Jose is accommodating, fast to respond and very nice as well. It's a home away from home.
Excellent in every way.
Très belle chambre spacieuse. Josée est très accueillante, serviable et souriante.

Nous avons découvert le vieux Pointe Claire...belle surprise !
La grande chambre confortable est tout simplement parfaite ! Dans les tops !
Et José est charmante ! On ne peut demander plus !

Jose's place is amazing and Jose is a lovely host with so much knowledge to share.  The shower is one of the nicest showers I've ever used and the bed is extremely comfortable.  The neighborhood has a great village feel with a sailing club, swimming pool and large park along with restaurants and shops.  All in all a great experience.

Jose and Usha were great hosts. Very receptive and accommodating. The location is absolutely perfect for a visit to Pointe-Claire. Situated close to everything within walking distance. The space is great and well setup. We would highly recommend visiting.
Céline & Mike

What a surprise to find this place. Pointe Claire is a quaint little town with so much character & friendliness and only minutes from downtown Montreal. Jose is so warm and welcoming and her home is clean and comfortable. I really liked the big bedroom and big shower. I hope to stay here again on my return visit.

Jose's house is in a nice little town with history going back to American Indians, a block from bars and restaurants, two blocks from the river. We actually had pretty much all upstairs for our-self - very private. The room and a private bathroom are freshly renovated and everything is sparkling clean. Jose is a great host with stories to tell. We will definitely stay over there every time we are in the area.
Jose, thank you for all your hospitality.

This is a wonderful place right by the water. Jose was a truly professional host. The suite upstairs is like a luxury hotel room. She knew I was there to get some work done so she left me to myself yet still was very friendly when we crossed paths. Tip for those doing a similar work holiday: half a block one way is the serene water, half a block another way (on St. Anne's) is a great yoga studio with drop in classes, half a black another way is a pool with lane swimming for $5. Great stay and fantastic host!
Thanks for all Jose.

Jose 's place is very nice. Clean, cozy, comfortable. The room was big enough, big bed, clean and big bathroom. You feel like your home and Jose' s hospitality is excellent. If you are in Montreal and you want a great,  quiet place to stay , you must book to Jose' s.
It was an absolute delight staying at Jose's house and she was a fantastic host.  I would definitely stay there again!

Jose is a fantastic host, thoughtful and respectful. Her house is charming and eclectic, and the proximity of Pointe-Claire village and the lake truly made my stay feel like a holiday. Highly recommend.

I enjoyed the hospitality at Jose's place very much.  Pointe-Claire is a suburb of Montreal but has an entirely different, laid-back feel than staying in the city centre.  It is well connected by bus (journey takes 45 mins to an hour) and saves the hassle of finding parking in the city.  Jose was very welcoming.  We enjoyed the upgraded features in the upstairs of her home (beautiful shower, classy lighting in the bedroom, all amenities for preparing tea/coffee in the dressing room, and air conditioning!) and we enjoyed the helpful local tips from Jose herself -- a great experience.

We had a most wonderful stay with Jose!  The location of her home is right in the heart of the enchanted Pointe-Claire village:  the sprawling lake front is 2 mins down her street, and all the charming amenities of the main street are 2 mins up from her home. Jose is the epitome of hospitable, welcoming, helpful.  She's a pleasure to interact with and her home was a pleasure to stay in.  We look forward to our next stay with you, Jose!

The house is cute and comfortable. The rooms are bright and the view of the neighborhood is quaint. The king size bed feels like a cloud, I haven’t been that comfy in I don’t know how long. The extra bed room is also cute and looks like if you are traveling with a child it would be perfect(even with out AC). The windows in the home are usually open letting in a very nice breeze off of the lake. The bathroom is aesthetically pleasing and very clean. The host (Jose)is very helpful and kind and informative. She has newspaper clips and brochures of things that are in the area and gave us tips on things to do. Her home is right at the shore and a windmill from 1709 so the walks always seem to have an amazing view, especially accompanied with some ice cream from a little shop around the corner from her place. The town seems to have a very safe feel, to the point that you could be comfortable sending your children out to play without worry. I would recommend this home and host to anyone. Definitely an experience I am glad I took the time for.
Second time...and always perfect,  Jose is a warm and generous host ! The room is very comfortable ! Nice coffee shops close by ....don't hesitate !! Great place  !
Very clean and nice.  Thanks!
Excellent hospitality and a quiet neighborhood.
Nice stay with José to be recommended !

La chambre et la salle de bains sont magnifiques
L’endroit est très beau, le lac a 2 minutes de la maison
Jose est une hôte très sympathique, généreuse et réactive
Endroit a recommander vivement
Merci beaucoup Jose
Jose is a great host in a wonderful space. Quiet, clean, spacious and a beautiful area as well.
Travellers staying at this Heritage Home will discover more than the listing suggests. Jose is an excellent host, helpful and genuine. A rare find!
Our stay at Jose's house was lovely. She is seconds from the water and a beautiful little town with great cafes. The bed and room were cozy and large. We would book again!

Tolle Unterkunft in der Nähe des Flughafens Trudeau. Sehr sympathische Gastgeberin, bei der man sich sofort wie zuhause fühlt. Die benutzen Räume sind hochwertig und gemütlich ausgestattet, der Garten lädt zum Verweilen ein. Die Umgebung ist durch die vielen Grünanlagen und des Sees sehr reizvoll. Tipp topp.

Again it was a pleasure....Jose's place is so comfortable and warm !
And she is a great, funny and generous lady !!
Rien à dire un peu déçu.
Jose is a wonderful hostess, friendly and welcoming. Her place is very homey, with lots of nice touches. And a wonderful location to boot!!

A wonderful, spacious room with a large TV, desk, mini fridge and beautiful, spotless bathroom with large shower.  A comparable suite in a hotel would cost 3 to 4 times more. Jose is a friendly, generous host and we would definitely return to her lovely home.
A cozy lovely spot right in the village close to resturants and shops. Jose is very warm and welcoming.  Really enjoyed our stay far more then a hotel.
Spacious , great value ,lovely hostess,and was perfect for all our needs . We would definitely stay here in the future.

Excellent location within walking distance of the lake and many shops in the village of Pointe Claire.  And, only 15 minutes from YUL airport.  Accommodations were very clean and comfortable, and spacious.  Jose is a very kind and welcoming host.  It was an incredible value, and I highly recommend it to anyone visiting in the area.

Jose is a very engaging host, curious and open and very respectful. Her house is charming and is wonderfully located in a part of Pointe-Claire that feels like the country. I’ve experienced a few Air BnBs in the area and hers is unique!
welcoming host. very clean. great location! I great place to stsy!' We'll be back!
Feel like you re taken care of from a close family member.
Nice place and great time in Jose’s house, we will come again for sure.

Jose is so very welcoming and everything is nice and perfectly clean! The place is cute and cosy and  unique. I definitely recommend it! Very close to the airport and to the water, it is a wonderful option for travellers ✈️ and for a vacation on the lake!
Just PERFECT!!
Belle grande chambre à l'étage, tout confort près du lac et près du centre du village. Très tranquille.
Exceptional host. Very clean room and bathroom. No regrets.
Jose is a great host. She is very kind. She is friendly, and also private and respects your space. The location was perfect, the place is very clean.
Super endroit. Hôte attentionné et très aimable. Chambre impeccable. Tout était parfait. Un grand merci à José

My husband and I felt totally at home here. Jose was most welcoming without being intrusive, and her home is comfortable, clean and cosy. The location is on a quiet street but just a hop and a skip from restaurants and stores. The modern private bathroom is also a plus!  :)

Séjour d'une nuit chez Jose, tout s'est très bien passé. Merci pour l'accueil. 
Thanks Jose
Jose is very friendly and easy going. She gave some insight about the local food.

name: Cozy designer room in Art-loving Prime Bushwick
summary: Enjoy your stay in a cozy, sunny, plant filled room in our designer’s apartment in trendy Bushwick neighborhood. Stay in our lovely, sunny and huge guest room with exposed bricks. Room has new recently bought orthopedic mattress, organic linen/ cotton sheets and vintage cute decoration.

host.host_about: We are a creative couple...I am a Fashion designer and Julien (my fiance) is an interior designer. We love traveling, meeting people and we are very easy going.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great place to stay! The decor is charming, the location is great, with L train a couple of blocks away. Elena is a great host, she was easy to reach with any questions and gave great tips on local spots. Elena’s apartment felt safe, was so adorable, comfortable and had everything that I needed. I had a wonderful time!

Elena is the greatest! 
The communication was good, the apartment was clean, warm, fast wi-if and got all you need. The area is quite, but got shops, the sub and bus stop just next door. 
It only take around 15 min to get into the heart of Manhattan! 

Elena recommend her best spot in the area and is easy to reach if you need anything or got any questions! I will differently recommend you to stay at Elena’s place!

name: Maison neuve et luxueuse pour séjour enchanteur!
summary: Super cottage neuf! Dans une quartier paisible tout en étant près à distance de marche de tous les commerces et le métro honoré-beaugrand.

host.host_about:
A proximité à pied de la nouvelle zone Commerciale à venir en 2018.
 

Construite dans la partie nord du projet Faubourg Contrecoeur et adossées à l'arrondissement Anjou, le quartier est très bien desservi, métro, aux abonnements de Car to Go et à Automobile, bus 141, 26 et 85, Ecole, Parc pour enfant, Commerçants à venir, plus ceux déjà existants. Il n'en demeure pas moins que ce quartier reste très calme.Cette maison unifamiliale propose un design urbain, propre au Faubourg Contrecoeur.

Cette maison propose une superficie 2184pi2 sur 2 étages. Le garage de 21x19, les 3chambres à coucher à l'étage, un foyer au gaz design 3 faces, Aménagement paysager, système d'irrigation automatique, bac à fleur ou potager, système d'alarme plus intercom avec caméra, une terrasse en béton 12X12 avec un grand terrain de 4 200pieds carrés.

À l'intérieur de la maison, les 2 planchers sont insonorisés, le sous-sol comprend une porte coupe son, il devient alors très intime. 

Vous êtes les bienvenues pour une visite préliminaire, mais l'emballement est garantie.

name: Gavea - Daniela Penthouse
summary: Beautiful apartment, tastefully decorated and a splendid view of the Corcovado. On the top floor of a secure building in the district of Gavéa, with a beautiful room with a comfortable bed, a large living room with a sofa-bed, a bathroom and a large terrace with a swimming pool and barbecue. Quiet and bright, with WiFi internet, cable TV and air conditioning in all rooms, the apartment offers all the modern comforts for a pleasant stay in Rio de Janeiro.
space: In the secure area of Gavéa, on the top floor with incredible views of Rio de Janeiro and Corcovado, the apartment is designed with a beautiful entrance and a fully equipped kitchen (fridge, freezer, coffee machine, toaster, micro- wave, oven, dishes, washing machine, dishwasher). Wifi Internet and television with a big screen. Large terrace with outdoor lounge and barbecue. Pool / Jacuzzi with sunbeds to enjoy the Rio sun. Living room with a sofa-bed and beautiful bedroom with storage and a large comfortable bed for 2 people. A bathroom with shower. The apartment is very quiet and bright.
description: Beautiful apartment, tastefully decorated and a splendid view of the Corcovado. On the top floor of a secure building in the district of Gavéa, with a beautiful room with a comfortable bed, a large living room with a sofa-bed, a bathroom and a large terrace with a swimming pool and barbecue. neighborhood_overview: In the heart of the chic and secured district of Gavea, the apartment is calm and is located close of everything : supermarkets, restaurants, shoppings, leblon and ipanema districts.
notes: The entrance to the apartment is shared, but the entire top floor with the apartment and the terrace is private and will only be yours.
transit: Very easy access.
access: All is available at the apartment : AC, Internet wifi, Cable TV, pool/jacuzzi, barbecue, fitted-kitchen, washing machine, bed linen and bath towels.
interaction: You will have a personal welcome upon your arrival and we remains available during your stay in case of any need.

host.host_about:
Hello,
I manage many great properties and i am pleased to offer you the possibility to rent them. I have carefully selected the places i am offering to you, to be sure you will have a wonderful stay. This strict selection of the places we manage is to offer you the best experience you can ever had. All the places are well furnished and ready to welcome you. With an 9 years experience in the vacation rental, we are pleased to work in 20 countries.
See you soon in one of our places.
Ben

reviews.comments: Awesome view and nice decoration!

name: Apartamento entre a Praia de Copacabana e o Metrô
summary: Entre a praia de Copacabana posto 3 e o Metrô e comércio variado. O apartamento foi recém reformado, tem todos os acessórios necessários para o hóspede usar com conforto, possui wifi e tv a cabo na sala.   Ar condicionado, black out ,tv e armário no quarto do casal.  Todo apartamento é muito bem iluminado com luzes diretas e indiretas.   Espaço muito calmo por ser um prédio de 10 andares com apenas 2 apartamentos por andar. Entregamos o apartamento ao hóspede todo arrumado e limpo.
space: Sala com TV a cabo, internet wifi, 2 sofás e mesa de jantar para 4 pessoas. Quarto de casal com cama de casal box, armário embutido de 4 portas, black out, ar condicionado e tv.  Quartinho menor com sofá cama e ventilador de teto. Banheiro com pia sobreposta e box de vidro e secador de cabelo. Cozinha com fogão cocktop, geladeira, microondas, mix, cafeteira e acessórios.  Área de serviço com tanque e varal.

neighborhood_overview: Copacabana é o bairro mais tradicional e turístico do Rio de Janeiro.   Rico comércio e restaurantes. A praia é própria para banho e lindíssima. Ao lado de Copacabana, temos Ipanema e Leblon.
notes: Não existe autorização do condomínio para acesso de visitas, festas e animais domésticos.   Apenas  as pessoas contratadas terão livre acesso por medidas de segurança. Lei do Silencio após 22 horas.
transit: Muito próximo ao Metrô que é o melhor e mais seguro transporte do Rio e acesso a todos os outros transportes como ônibus e taxi incluindo Uber e outros.
access: O apartamento é entregue limpo e o hóspede terá acesso e exclusividade no apartamento por inteiro.  Sala, 2 quartos, banheiro e área de serviço.
interaction: Estarei disponível ao hóspede no que desejar e estiver ao meu alcance. O apartamento é entregue com roupa de cama e banho completo.
house_rules: Silêncio a partir das 22 horas IMPORTANTE - Não é autorizado visitas

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Esta ubicado muy cerca a la estación del metro lo que facilita los traslados, en un edificio muy tranquilo y seguro, cuenta con una persona en portería de día y ascensor. Al llegar a pesar de estar preocupados por no tener comentarios previos en la aplicación tuvimos una muy buena impresión del lugar pues las fotos no son suficiente para describir el diseño y belleza del lugar. Es muy cómodo, ventilado, iluminado y María Lucía es perfecta cuidando cada detalle para hacer de nuestra estadía la mejor. Detalles bonitos en la mesa del comedor y la sala, baño impecable y en perfecto estado. Ropa de cama y toallas perfectamente limpias y diría que nuevas. La cocina tiene todas las comodidades necesarias y excelente diseño y la habitación es muy cómoda. La Host es una señora muy calida, amable, servicial y muy atenta con nosotros. Recomendado lugar al 100% pues el precio del lugar es excelente para las comodidades que ofrece. Muy felices de haber pasado casi una semana en tan bello lugar.//Está localizado muito perto da estação de metrô, que facilita as transferências, num edifício muito calmo e seguro, tem uma pessoa no porteiro de día e elevador. Ao chegar, apesar de estar preocupado em não ter comentários anteriores na aplicação, tivemos uma boa impressão do lugar porque as fotos não são suficientes para descrever o design e a beleza do lugar. É muito confortável, ventilado, iluminado e María Lucía é perfeita cuidando todos os detalhes para tornar a nossa estadia melhor. Lindos detalhes na mesa de jantar e sala de estar, banheiro impecável e em perfeitas condições. Roupa de cama e toalhas perfeitamente limpas e diriam novas. A cozinha tem todos os confortos necessários e excelente design e a sala é muito confortável. O anfitrião é uma senhora muito calorosa, gentil, útil e muito atenciosa. Lugar recomendado em 100%, pois o preço do lugar é excelente para as comodidades oferecidas. Muito feliz por ter passado quase uma semana em um lugar tão lindo.//It is located very close to the subway station which facilitates transfers, in a very quiet and safe building, has one person in day porter and elevator. When arriving in spite of being worried about not having previous comments in the application we had a very good impression of the place because the photos are not enough to describe the design and beauty of the place. It is very comfortable, ventilated, illuminated and María Lucía is perfect taking care of every detail to make our stay the best. Beautiful details on the dining table and living room, impeccable bathroom and in perfect condition. Bed linen and towels perfectly clean and would say new. The kitchen has all the necessary comforts and excellent design and the room is very comfortable. The Host is a very warm, kind, helpful and very attentive lady. Recommended place at 100% as the price of the place is excellent for the amenities offered. Very happy to have spent almost a week in such...
Han sido muy agradables en todo momento. Nos dejaron hacer el check out más tarde y se agradece mucho. Muy bien comunicado, lugar muy recomendable . Repetiría

So tenho excelentes comentários a fazer. Apartamento muito bom tudo muito lindo e a anfitriã Maria Lucia foi muito receptiva e atenciosa. Local muito proximo da praia com  varios restaurantes, lojas e supermercados. Muito bem localizado.
Foi ótima minha viagem e lindo o lugar onde fiquei!!
Tuvimos una muy buena experiencia, fueron muy amables y serviciales con nosotros, es un punto céntrico, a partir de ahí podés moverte para conocer diferentes lugares. Muy recomendable

El apartamento de Maria Lucía está en el centro de Copacabana, con una estación de metro a una calle y media, y la play (Website hidden by Airbnb) calles cortas. A pesar de estar en un edificio relativamente antiguo el apartamento ha sido remodelado y tiene un ambiente acogedor y moderno. El baño y la cocina son prácticos, renovados y muy limpios, la sala, comedor y habitación ofrecen espacios agradables y confortables.

Al llegar Maria Lucía nos recibió con gran amabilidad y nos explicó al detalle las condiciones y recomendaciones del apartamento, nos tenía agua embotellada, galletas y otros detalles. Realmente su amabilidad merece 5 estrellas.  

Fue inesperado que nos hiciera firmar un contrato durante el hospedaje indicando las fechas de estadía y el valor de cada uno de los artículos dentro del apartamento en caso de daño. Esto nunca lo había hecho en oportunidades anteriores. Esto no fue problema toda vez que devolvimos el apartamento en las mismas condiciones pero fue curioso.

El Sector: Es una zona céntrica de  Copacabana, con mucho comercio informal y formal. Eso significa vendedores ambulantes, transeúntes, supermercados y restaurantes. No recomendaría caminar después de 10PM por temas de seguridad, aunque es sólo mi percepción. 

Después de mi estadía en la apartamento de Maria Lucía, sólo mejoraría la velocidad de la conexión a internet (es de 1 Mb).

Recomiendo el sitio y a Maria Lucía como superhost!

Anfitriã atenciosa, acolhedora e prestativa. O apartamento é num prédio antigo, porém foi reformado. Ficou bonito e aconchegante. A rua é tranquila e o apartamento é silencioso. Muito bem localizado, perto do metrô, supermercado, hortifruti, restaurantes, lanchonetes, padaria... Espero voltar outras vezes.  Me senti em casa. Adorei!

Adoramos não apenas o apartamento, mas todo o cuidado e carinho com que fomos recebidos. Tudo muito limpo, organizado e aconchegante. Só temos a agradecer. A localização é ótima, com mercados, lojas, farmácias, metrô e tudo que é necessário por perto, poucas ruas até a praia de copacabana. A rua onde se localiza o prédio é super tranquila. A Maria Lucia sempre nos dando atenção e suporte em tudo. Um amor de pessoa. A estadia foi maravilhosa! Esperamos voltar em breve!
A receptividade e simpatia da Maria Lúcia são incríveis. Minha estadia foi agradável e o apartamento um charme. Recomendo à todos!

É a segunda vez que me hospedo neste apartamento, o qual é muito bem localizado, limpo, acolhedor e contém tudo que a gente precisa. Maria Lúcia é super atenciosa,  gentil e sempre disposta a auxiliar. Além disso, tem tudo por perto: metrô, teatro, bares, restaurante, supermercado,  hortifruti e outros serviços.

Apartamento sensacional. Fui surpreendida com tudo. Cheiroso, bonito, limpo, organizado, perto de tudo. Anfitriã e o porteiro são nota 10! Perto de tudo, lojas, bares, supermercados, farmácias, praia. Adorei os mimos da anfitrã. Recomendadíssimo!
Excelente lugar, nos sentimos en casa, lo recomiendo sin duda alguna, espacio maravillo  y acogedor!!!

Maria est une personne chaleureuse et accueillante. Elle vous conseillera avec réactivité si vous avez des questions.
L'appartement est bien situé, agréable et propre.
The place is amazing and with a 5 stars view!! I highly recommend this place
Thank you for your hospitality. Highly recommended!

We loved staying at Maria Lucia's; it is very stylish, pretty, cozy, and clean. The building is safe (it has a lock outside), it has two elevators and there is no noise from the neighbors (there is only the normal Copacabana noise, but it is appreciated). She had water and snacks for us and everything was set for us to stay, and she even gifted us a bottle of champagne for New Years Eve! It is three blocks from the beach in Copacabana; there are a lot of stores right downstairs. The only thing that should be considered is that the second room is small (but sufficient for one person) and does not have air conditioning, which may be a a problem during the summer. The living room is cozy, with the internet moden and a TV, but it does not have air conditioning either, though it gets better if you open the window. I would definitely stay at Maria Lucia's in the future. Thank you very much!

name: Chambre privée à deux pas du métro
summary: Belle petite chambre avec salle de bain privée dans un quartier de choix à Montréal. Tout près des commodités et attractions touristiques. Bienvenue!
space: Belle chambre intime au sous-sol avec salle de bain et entrée privée, grande douche et commodités: frigidaire, micro-onde et grille-pain. Possibilité d'utiliser notre laveuse et sécheuse.  Nous avons aussi une grande terrasse et une piscine pour les journée chaudes.  La maison est située dans le quartier Hochelaga, à deux pas du métro Viau et des attractions touristiques de Montréal: le Stade olympique, le Biodôme, le planétarium, le jardin botanique, le parc Maisonneuve et le cinéma Starcité. Il est possible de se rendre à pied dans le coeur du quartier Hochelaga, où l'on retrouve de bons petits restaurants, boutiques, cafés et autres endroits sympathiques.
description: Belle petite chambre avec salle de bain privée dans un quartier de choix à Montréal. Tout près des commodités et attractions touristiques. Bienvenue! Belle chambre intime au sous-sol avec salle de bain et entrée privée, grande douche et commodités: frigidaire, micro-onde et grille-pain. Possibilité d'utiliser notre laveuse et sécheuse.  Nous avons aussi une grande terrasse et une piscine pour les journée chaudes.  La maison est située dans le quartier Hochelaga, à deux pas du métro Viau et des attractions touristiques de Montréal: le Stade olympique, le Biodôme, le planétarium, le jardin botanique, le parc Maisonneuve et le cinéma Starcité. Il est possible de se rendre à pied dans le coeur du quartier Hochelaga, où l'on retrouve de bons petits restaurants, boutiques, cafés et autres endroits sympathiques. La chambre et la salle de bain du sous-sol vous sont réservées, mais vous pouvez profiter du reste de l'étage sans problème comme les autres membres de la maisonnée. Nous habitons le
access: La chambre et la salle de bain du sous-sol vous sont réservées, mais vous pouvez profiter du reste de l'étage sans problème comme les autres membres de la maisonnée. Nous habitons le rez-de-chaussée où nous passons la majorité de notre temps, donc le sous-sol reste plutôt intime même si nous y avons accès.
interaction: Il nous fera plaisir de vous accueillir et de vous conseiller pendant votre séjour sur les endroits à visiter et le meilleur moyen de s'y rendre.

reviews.comments: Great hosts! Would stay with them again!!

J'ai passé un très  bon séjour L'habitation est bien situé, et les hôtes sont formidables.
 Je vous le conseille.

Accueil sympa et chaleureux. Nos hôtes font tout pour qu'on se sente à l'aise et bienvenus! Plusieurs petites attention très appréciées (café et coin repas pour le déjeuner). Je recommande chaudement cette hôte!
Super hôte. Andréanne est dévouée à vous faire passer un agréable séjour.
Hôtes très sympathiques! Intimité au sous-sol et près du metro. J'y retournerais sans hésiter!

We had a great stay at Adréanne & David's place. They are both amazing people, very welcoming and caring. They always asked if we had anything we needed and answered all our questions. Apart from that everything was very clean and you kinda have the entire basement to yourself which is great!

Chez Andréane, il ne manque rien. Un endroit spacieux, meublé, tout près du métro et d'une des attractions touristiques principales de Montréal (biodome, jardin botanique, planétarium). Nous avons fait beaucoup de bonnes expériences avec Airbnb, mais cette fois là, impossible de trouver mieux !
Très bon accueil. Des hôtes prêts à donner tout conseil pour faire le meilleur séjour possible. Logement bien confortable. Je recommande!

We were very impressed with our overnight stay here and would definitely stay again on a subsequent trip to Montreal. This family went out of their way to accommodate our needs. The location was perfect for us......walking distance from the Olympic Stadium!

My daughter and I had a fantastic weekend attending the Gymnastics World Championships. The home was so close to the Olympic Stadium, it made coming and going to the events there stress-free. We could walk everywhere. Our hosts were open, accommodating and responsive. We had fun exploring the Hochelaga-Maisonneuve neighbourhood, enjoying Thanksgiving poutine at Gerry's Delicatessen, delicious baking and coffee from the counter at Marché Maisonneuve and a pub dinner at Le Blind Pig.
La même accueil que si nous serions allé chez des amis de longue date. Un séjour très agréable une maison charmante. Nous recommandons à tous !!! Merci encore !!
Tranquille et privé. Un séjour fort agréable.

station de métro très proche.
salle de bain avec grande douche à  l'italienne.
le fait que le logement soit semi-enterré n'est pas gênant ( sensation de cocon ).
petite cour-jardinet au calme, très agréable dès qu'il y a un rayon de soleil.
Andreanne was great on communication and has the best possible setup for a short stay or long term visit. Would for sure stay here again

I enjoyed my first air bnb experience staying at  Andreanne's home. The private entrance, bathroom, sitting area and bedroom that could lock made me feel secure and like I had my own space. The house is so close to the metro station that I used transit for my whole 4-day visit and that saved a lot of money. She was generous and had a re-loadable transit card, travel guides, milk and coffee available. Everything was clean and welcoming. Being so close to the Olympic Stadium and all of its activities made it easy to check out the attractions and there is a Cineplex movie theatre right there, too. Nice when travelling with children. She was always responsive to my questions and texted back quickly. I would recommend without a doubt for anyone who wants an easy, enjoyable experience.

Excellent endroit pour séjourner le temps d'un week-end à Montréal! Le fait d'être près du métro est un avantage indéniable de même que l'entrée indépendante. De plus, Andréanne et son copain sont très gentils.

If you are attending an event at the Olympic Stadium or visiting Montreal in general, this is the place to stay! Andréanne and her husband could not have been nicer and made me feel completely welcome in their home. Their space was extremely clean and was full of helpful amenities.

I would highly recommend staying with Andreanne and her family. I have stayed at a few Airbnb before, but this one was by far the best. They deserve a 10star review. Next time I travel to Montreal, I’m staying here 100%

Andréanne is an excellent communicator, and she went out of her way to accommodate us. We arrived late and she organized our check in very well. The space is beautiful, better than the pictures and has everything you would need. It feels kind of like a little apartment in the basement, and it does have a separate entrance to the basement, making things even more private. I liked this because I felt I could go in and out at night without bothering Andréanne and her family. The neighbourhood had plenty of parking and was quiet but a short drive to everything.
L'emplacement est génial et la chambre avec cuisinette est très pratique! Le prix est un peu cher pour ce quartier, mais l'accueil est très chaleureux.

Simplement, un séjour génial!! Andréanne et son conjoint sont des hôtes super sympas et très agreables! La chambre est fidèle aux photos, très propre. La maison est à 5 minutes à pied du métro et en 10 minutes on est dans le centre ville. On se sent en sécurité. Autour de la maison il y a plusieurs restaurants et cafés. Si vous pensez séjourner à Montréal n’hésitez pas et aller chez Andreanne!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Andréanne et David! Ils ont été très réactifs pour nous recevoir et extrêmement acceuillant!
Le logement est très propre, bien équipé et bien décoré et ce, a quelques pas des transports en commun et du jardin botanique!
Merci beaucoup! Si c etait a refaire nous renouvellerions l'expérience sans hésiter!
Wonderful people, great hospitality, awesome room and space to stay.
Clean, quiet and well located near the Olympic park.  Everything you need for a short stay in Montreal.

Andreanne’s place was great for us. It was perfectly located for our needs, clean, comfortable and affordable. Our trip was enhanced through our experience of getting to know our hosts a bit and their efforts in making our stay comfortable, convenient and enjoyable. We would not hesitate to re-book.

name: Cómoda Habitación L'Eixample, Gracia
summary: En el Eixample, una de las zonas más populares de Barcelona, podrás apreciar el corazón de la ciudad, paseo de Gracia, plaza Cataluña, museos, ramblas, sitios nocturnos, fiestas de los barrios y está perfectamente comunicado con toda la ciudad con tren, bus, metro y bicicletas, además de estar súper bien conectado con el aeropuerto para aprovechar al máximo tu estancia.
space: Te encantará el lugar porque es muy luminoso, acogedor espacio, muy bien comunicado, limpio y cómodo. El alojamiento es bueno para parejas, padres e hijos, aventureros y viajeros de negocios.
description: En el Eixample, una de las zonas más populares de Barcelona, podrás apreciar el corazón de la ciudad, paseo de Gracia, plaza Cataluña, museos, ramblas, sitios nocturnos, fiestas de los barrios y está perfectamente comunicado con toda la ciudad con tren, bus, metro y bicicletas, además de estar súper bien conectado con el aeropuerto para aprovechar al máximo tu estancia. Te encantará el lugar porque es muy luminoso, acogedor espacio, muy bien comunicado, limpio y cómodo. El alojamiento es bueno para parejas, padres e hijos, aventureros y viajeros de negocios. Desayuno incluido. Siempre hay una persona disponible para cualquier circunstancia que se puede presentar. En el Eixample, una de las zonas más populares de Barcelona, podrás apreciar el corazón de la ciudad, paseo de Gracia, plaza Cataluña, museos, ramblas, sitios nocturnos, fiestas de los barrios y está perfectamente comunicado con toda la ciudad con tren, bus, metro y bicicletas, además de estar súper bien conectado con el aerop
neighborhood_overview: En el Eixample, una de las zonas más populares de Barcelona, podrás apreciar el corazón de la ciudad, paseo de Gracia, plaza Cataluña, museos, ramblas, sitios nocturnos, fiestas de los barrios y está perfectamente comunicado con toda la ciudad con tren, bus, metro y bicicletas, además de estar súper bien conectado con el aeropuerto para aprovechar al máximo tu estancia.
notes: Un ambiente agradable y relajado siempre favorece un buen clima de casa, estamos cerca de la estación principal de tren de Barcelona, La Diagonal, paseo de Gracia, plaza Cataluña.
transit: El alojamiento esta ubicado perfectamente con la estación de trenes principal del la ciudad ''Sants Estació'' a poca distancia, también cuenta con la estación de metro Entença L5 y diferentes paradas de autobuses.
access: Desayuno incluido.
interaction: Siempre hay una persona disponible para cualquier circunstancia que se puede presentar.

host.host_about: Soy una persona sencilla, muy solidaria, sin complicaciones, dispuesta ayudar cuando sea necesario, soy organizada, limpia ,responsable y me encanta conocer a personas de diferentes culturas.

name: Amazing Loft in BCN Center (B0132)
summary: My name is Alex, I serve as an architect and my apartment is designed by me which I offer you to enjoy during your stay in Barcelona. It is located in the heart of the most eccentric neighborhood of Gràcia on a semi-pedestrian and quiet street.Apartment is bright and modern, it´s high ceilings and materials I used (stone walls, wooden beams) merge in a modern and contemporary design, creating a warm and welcoming ambiance. There are two bedrooms (double and twin) and enough space for 4 people. Kitchen and bathroom are fully equipped with everything you may need.It is perfect for business trips or vacations with a family. In walking distance you´ve Gaudi´s masterpieces as La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, Tourist Bus stop, a subway stop Diagonal (L5-L3) and many options to go to the Beach, Sagrada Familia or Parc Guell. General info: The owners do not accept groups of young people under 25 years. Parties and celebrations are not allowed. IT´S A 3rd FLOOR WITHOUT AN ELEVATOR. Tourist license n
