Hi there,

I am a very friendly person who loves animals and people. I am open to every kind of culture. I have two cats, a dog and a parrot. I speak English and Italian.

name: The plaza suite in brooklyn. Bedstuy style
summary: Huge floor thru suite with bedroom with skylight. Full beautiful bathroom private with shower and bathtub and gorgeous office with stereo air conditioning and record player stocked with records. I like old school rock and roll and r and b. You have the whole third floor. On the first floor is a giant kitchen and washer dryer. For an extra fee I will do your laundry ! There is also street parking and 3 gardens all at your disposal. It's magic
space: You have an entire 3rd floor suite including beautiful antique double bed , full new bathroom an amazing wallpapered sitting room with my furniture that I make. The office has a stereo and turntable with vintage rock and soul records also just plug in your phone to my stereo and listen to your sounds too!! The office window looks out on our private garden for your use as well. There is a full pro kitchen wide screen tv with giant sound system and I play guitar in case you do too !! I have 3 ! The porch is absolve for morning coffee a lux lunch or moonlight dinner all private with the moon above you and the gentle sounds of music. The neighbors are wonderful. That's why we are proud to live on hart street.  I am a working artist. My husband is s mechanical engineer from Dominican Republic. We speak English and spanish fluently.  We sleep on the second floor but you have full privacy to relax have fun in brooklyn and New York. We are 4 blocks to the subway. Our train is the best. 10 min

neighborhood_overview: We are in the historic old middle clsss bed stuy. border near bushwick. It's a 15 min walk but our neighborhood is been named the newest cool most expensive place to be. Our rates are very fair as you are basically having full run of my home. Restaurants and if you like clubbing. The House of Yes Output and Mr Sunday are great and very close. We have the soul food coffee shop around the corner and some of the best southern soul food restaurants in the world. This is the neighborhood of cool Want to go african. Go to the african neighbor near me. All types of good food still really cheap !!!Beautiful people. So different than New York !!! Family !!!also the best cheapest vintage stores everywhere within walking distance. Also cheap antiques !! Just ask !! I know everybody!
notes: You have everything here towels ,sheets,blankets ,soap. Bring your own favorite shampoo   We have your blow dryer ready !! Need laundry. I will do for 20$. A load. Folded!!!also full kitchen you are free to cook but please clean up after yourself !!! Do your dishes !! We have a dishwasher
transit: Bike taxi train Lyft Uber gypsy cab skateboard we have it all. 4 bills from train to manhattan. 15 min ride to downtown !
access: Bedroom full bath office full kitchen porch garden full wifi
interaction: I am fully available as I am so proud of my home and want other people from all over the world to have a wonderful experience. I know New York and brooklyn inside out. I'm Proud to say I'm one of the last true born and bred New Yorkers. I am a silkscreen artist my studio is on the street level of my home. You can inquire for a printing lesson for an afternoon and print some tshirts for your memento of me and my home. I will help you to the utmost. I serve you morning coffee, want a BBQ. Just buy the food no worries !! Want a tour. Just ask away !!! Welcome to brooklyn and Joann and Papi !!!
house_rules: Guests should be responsible for their dishes in the kitchen. For a fee of 20 dollars I will do your laundry. All guest must abide by the rules. I am here in the house I have my art studio but you have total privacy on your floor. You may not hold parties but can enjoy the back porch and garden please just respect us as we will you and make you have a great trip

host.host_about: I am a person that loves an adventure. I'll go anywhere and happy to have a long conversation with strangers

name: Próx. Jeunesse, RioCentro, Praias, Parque Olímpico
summary: O Condomínio Minha Praia 1, fica em frente a estação do BRT Minha Praia, próx. a Transolímpica, ao lado do Habib's e de alguns barzinhos super bacanas; perto tbm do Parque Olímpico, Parque dos Atletas, Jeunesse Arena e Rio Centro. Supermercados como o Mundial e o Super Market a poucos metros, assim como algumas farmácias, salões de beleza, padarias, etc. Resumindo, a localização é ótima! O condomínio é imenso e muito lindo para fotos, passeios e conversas! Além disso, o apê é super clean e fofo!

reviews.comments: Excelente hospedagem. Apartamento limpo, funcional e aconchegante. Acesso ao BRT logo em frente ao condomínio proporcionou facilidade de deslocamento pela cidade. O melhor da hospedagem foram os anfitriões: um casal adorável e atencioso que desde o primeiro dia me deixaram a vontade e tornaram minha estadia muito agradável. Recomendo sem restrições.
Daiana e Rodrigo foram nota 10! Nos receberam muito bem! Pessoas queridas, atenciosas, que nos deixaram super a vontade!

name: Immaculate 1Bed/1Bath Villa, in Heart of Poipu!
summary: SPECTACULAR NEW LISTING as of August 2017! Be one of the first to stay at our beautiful, newly furnished, modern villa located in the heart of the Poipu Beach Resort area! Desirably located on the sunny side of Kauai, Waikomo Stream Villas is one of the South Shores best kept secrets surrounded by lush gardens, walking distance from beaches, restaurants and popular attractions.
space: Our immaculate, spacious, 2nd floor villa is right at 1000sq.ft of island comfort! It has bran new modern furnishings, including a new plush queen-sized sleeper sofa, a super comfortable king sized bed in the master bedroom, contemporary furnishings blended with a traditional Hawaiian touch throughout, and is equipped with everything you need and more to feel at home.  You will find the villa stocked full of your essentials to prepare a gourmet meal and Hawaiian cocktails in the spacious kitchen. You will find all the glassware, utensils, pot and pans that you need as well as a blender, toaster and microwave for your convenience. Enjoy local Kauai coffee brewed from the Keurig provided at the coffee bar just off the kitchen. We took no shortcuts on your comfort by providing 100% Turkish Cotton Hotel Collection towels and 1200 thread count luxury sheets on both the comfortable master king-sized bed and the new sleeper sofa with extra padding for comfort. The bathroom is also equipped wi
description: SPECTACULAR NEW LISTING as of August 2017! Be one of the first to stay at our beautiful, newly furnished, modern villa located in the heart of the Poipu Beach Resort area! Desirably located on the sunny side of Kauai, Waikomo Stream Villas is one of the South Shores best kept secrets surrounded by lush gardens, walking distance from beaches, restaurants and popular attractions. Our immaculate, spacious, 2nd floor villa is right at 1000sq.ft of island comfort! It has bran new modern furnishings, including a new plush queen-sized sleeper sofa, a super comfortable king sized bed in the master bedroom, contemporary furnishings blended with a traditional Hawaiian touch throughout, and is equipped with everything you need and more to feel at home.  You will find the villa stocked full of your essentials to prepare a gourmet meal and Hawaiian cocktails in the spacious kitchen. You will find all the glassware, utensils, pot and pans that you need as well as a blender, toaster and microwave for
neighborhood_overview: The Neighborhood is all walkable from every direction to great restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, beaches and entertainment.
notes: The villa is spectacular, but let’s face it, it’s all about LOCATON, LOCATION, LOCATION!  You are steps away from all you will want to do and see in Poipu! BEACH, SNORKELING, SCUBA DIVING: BABY BEACH  This wonderful stretch of sand has calm waves and relaxing warm water. This is a nice, short walk from the villa.  KOLOA LANDING Also known as Whaler's Cove, is located just across the street from the villa and is known as one of the best spots on the island! This hot spot is a favorite for diving and snorkeling and known for its spectacular sunsets.  SHERATON BEACHES  A quick 5-10 minute walk will take you to the popular area for more great snorkeling, snuba, and scuba. LAWA’I BEACH, KIAHUNA BEACH, POIPU BEACH PARK and BRENNECKE BEACH  These beautiful beaches are great for surfing and snorkeling and are just a short 2-4 minute drive from our convenient location.  SHOPPING & DINNING:  KUKUI`ULA VILLAGE A quick walk across the street takes you to the most exciting Kauai shopping and dining
transit: There is a convenient parking lot designated specifically for Waikomo Stream Villas.
access: There will be a smart lock with punch code provided as well as a pool key waiting for you inside of the villa. Waikomo Stream Villas is an intimate resort property consisting of only 60 villas. Enjoy a lovely, large mosaic titled pool plus a small kiddie pool, changing rooms and large pergala with several gas grills.  You are surrounded by nearly 4 acres of lush, tropical, manicured gardens with a meandering stream, koi ponds and walking bridges. Waikomo Stream Villas was voted 'Solid Gold Value' by The Ultimate Kauai Guidebook and USA Today.
interaction: We strive to be the extremely accommodating hosts to make your stay in paradise an unforgettable experience. We are just a phone call away to assist you with any or your needs. We would love to share our home with you and hope you fall in love with this magical garden isle as we have. Mahalo.

host.host_about: Hi, we are Krystal and Eric, Texas natives but our hearts belong in Kauai, we literally fell in love with this Garden Isle the first time we visited in 2010. After returning just about every year since then, we are now blessed to own this villa here on the sunny South Shore of Kauai. We hope to live here full-time someday, but in the meantime, we are so happy to share our home and our love of Kauai with you!  As hosts, we strive to exceed your expectations and provide you with a joyful and memorable experience to last a lifetime. We hope you keep coming back year after year, just as we have! As a Nutritionist, Krystal owns her own Health & Wellness business with flexible hours to accommodate your needs. Eric works in IT and has provided this Kauai villa with some extra gadgets & devices to satisfy your technology needs. Our local, on-island representative, Heather, is willing and ready to answer your calls locally in any times of need. We are all just a phone call away!

reviews.comments: We LOVED Krystal and Eric's beautiful condo in Poipu. I wish we could have stayed longer. The condo was incredibly spacious with every amenity you would need. Plus it was in a great location just minutes from beaches, shops, restaurants - everything. The bed was very comfortable, the shower water pressure was so nice, the living room was beautifully furnished (totally my style) - not that we used it, because we were always on the lanai with views of the tropical banana trees outside. The condo doesn't have air conditioning, which wasn't a problem because there are three ceiling fans and then five floor fans that you can move around and point wherever you need to. We felt very comfortable. We loved that they had a guide book in the condo and enjoyed reading about the island. Also, check in/out was super easy with the keypad on the door. We can't wait to stay here again! We highly recommend it!

I mostly communicated with Krystal who was extremely quick to respond to any questions or concerns I had. The condo was very nicely furnished with all the conveniences for a comfortable stay. I would highly recommend staying in Krystal and Eric's condo.

I had a wonderful time here at their place 
The place was easy to find a great location to get around 
Loved how quiet it was with a great kitchen for a family or a couple to stay in 
Krystal was very helpful in many ways she was very responsive and tried hard to solve problems 
All the activities were all printed out well in the condo 
I wish I can give a 5star but there was no air conditioner and it was alittle loud to have fans 
Sleeping at nite wasn't a problem if only u r ok with rain every nite

It's truly a wonderful place, we felt immediately at home and it's got everything you need and more! Also very well located. Communication was very easy, Eric and Krystal were good to reach and very helpful! Just perfect - would love to return some day. Definitely to recommend!
10/10 all the way around. Excellent location but also quiet and tucked away. Very clean, relaxing, and perfect for our getaway.
Krystal&Eric have a great and large condo. Loved the location and two huge flat screens w/roku was icing on the .

Krystal and Eric have thought of everything you could possibly need on vacation to Kauai and provided it along with great recommendations for how to spend your time. The space was very chic, the kitchen was fully stocked with pots/utensils/measuring cups/Tupperware wear - literally they did not leave us wanting anything. It's also a great location to some fabulous snorkeling, relaxing beaches and great places to eat. Highly recommend!!
Great place to stay, very close to Poipu Beach and walking distance to Kukui’ula shopping center. Tvs are huge! Snorkel gear and beach equipment on site made our beach days very easy.
Such a cozy and lovely place to stay in.  Everything is provided from snorkeling gears to kitchen amenities. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone.

Krystal and Eric were great hosts and—wow, what a fantastic apartment!
Perfect location, spacious and stylish!
Will definitely be back!

Great location.  I had to leave shortly after arriving due to a family emergency, however, my family loved the condo, the location and it convenient walk to the  beach, listening to the ocean at night and the island.  Much different experience than Maui or The Big Island.  We hope to return and I would not hesitate to contact Krystal.  She was timely and prompt at answering questions pre-arrival and checked in with us again during our stay.  An excellent Airbnb experience.
Place is exactly as advertised - beautiful space in a very convenient location in the heart of Poipu.

This condo is a great choice if you're looking for a quiet place to stay in Kauai. It's close to many shops and restaurants as well as a lot of attractions like the Spouting Horn, Allerton Gardens, McBryde Gardens, and Poipu Beach. We really didn't make much use of the kitchen as there were so many great dining options nearby, but it appeared to be well equipped for most cooking needs. Our time spent at Poipu Beach was the highlight of our trip as we saw Hawaiian monk seals and at least two different species of endangered sea turtles and enjoyed snorkeling and sunbathing on the beautiful beach. There's no air conditioning but this was not an issue at all for us during our January stay. The temperature in the evening made the condo quite comfortable with open windows and fans. The condo is well furnished and we found the bed to be extremely comfortable - definitely important for a restful vacation!

This place is absolutely beautiful. Very quiet but close enough to shops and restaurants nearby within walking distance. Everything you need is here, beach towels, chairs, cooler, snorkel gear, kitchen gadgets, keurig and huge big screen TVs! Looks and feels like a luxury hotel. Krystal was always quick to answer any questions I had leading up to our stay and even while we were there. Wish we could of stayed longer to enjoy it more.
We loved our stay here! It is a great location, good privacy, and a large living space. We highly recommend stating here!

Everything about our stay here exceeded expectations! Krystal and Eric really thought of everything. I especially appreciated the thoughtful touches like a super nice Bose speaker that you could connect your phone to. It really set the mood for a relaxing stay. They also provide beach loungers, snorkels, flippers, towels, a cooler--literally anything you can think of that normally you'd have to rent. Really above and beyond! The location is amazing, too. It was like staying in a really nice hotel suite, with more privacy. We really looked forward to heading "home" after a long day of adventuring. Thanks so much!

We both think you were outstanding hosts who were very very quick to respond to all of our questions/inquiries. Your place was super comfy, clean and having streaming for your TV was a great bonus. We liked the location and pretty much everything else about your rental. Thanks so much for everything, Nikki and Juanita

A very clean and convenient place to stay, walking distance to beaches and shops.  Krystal was very responsive, helpful and kind with all the questions I asked before arrival and upon arrival.  The area is beautiful, as is the whole island!
This adorable home was quiet & easy to find. Next to a shopping center.
Die Wohnung ist bestens geeignet für gute Erholung aber auch für tägliche Exkursionen. Die Ausstattung ist komfortable und vollständig.
Perfect place to spend some days at Poipu. The appartment brings all you need (included beach toys etc.). We would love to come again.

Everything is as described and pictured. The hosts have thought of everything you might need during your stay and then some. We had a wonderful week long stay in this villa and it was just wonderful. Krystal’s place was the perfect home away from home. Ideal location and amazing value. She was easy to reach out to and I felt like I had a local I could trust in. Tip: the pool can get a bit crowded. We still enjoyed it, everyone at the Villas is super friendly but we also had the opportunity to visit the Koloa Landing (next door) and their resort pool is amazing. If you’re looking to enjoy a more resort style pool, go over to Koloa Landing and use their pool for the day. You can rent out a cabana, even if you’re not a guest. 
With that said, there is not enough space to express how much I loved Krystal’s home.
Great villa, lovely surroundings and perfect location. Close to wonderful beaches. Nearby a good selection of restaurants and shops.

We had a wonderful, restful stay at this beautifully appointed condo.  It was spacious and comfy, and provided extras that we thoroughly enjoyed, including the Bose speaker and use of the computer.  We took advantage of the beach chairs, towels and boogie board, and enjoyed evenings on the lanai.  It is a lovely place, in the perfect location, close to beaches, shops and restaurants.   Krystal was quick to welcome us, providing all of the information we needed to settle in.  We had a lovely vacation!
We loved Krystal and Eric's place in Poipu. It was the perfect location. We will definitely be back!
Perfectly well located. Free parking. Quiet. Great hosts. We really enjoyed the Bose speaker. We also appreciated the binder and the book with suggestions on what to do on the island.

Great location right in Poipu. Beaches and several restaurants and shops within walking distance. We also rented a car for 2 days and everything we wanted to do was within a beautiful 30 minute drive..Zip lining, beaches, restaurants, boat tours, Lihue airport, spouting horn. Beautiful apartment with a nice pool and extra touches such as a roku, games, computer/printer and snorkel and beach gear. Would highly recommend!

Loved our time at Krystal and Eric's condo in Poipu! Perfect location and in walking distance to Poipu beach with Sea Turtles and Hawaiian Monk Seal, shopping and wonderful restaurants! The condo was clean, spacious and had all the amenities that we needed. We loved all of the local tips provided by Krystal and Eric and definitely took advantage of the zip line right now the road! We will definitely be back again very soon! Thank you for being such wonderful hosts!
Excellent location and comfortable
Love the property there. It was very peaceful and relaxing. Apartment was super cute! Host was very  accommodating and responses to emails was fast. Location on point.

We have vacationed in Kauai for eight years. This is a superbly furnished accommodation with tons of amenities. The hosts responds to any inquiry promptly. A very spacious condo snuggled in a forest like ambiance.  We enjoyed our breakfasts in the lanai and enjoyed the multitude of activities located near by. Mahalo to the hosts.

This place is central to the Southern Kauai lifestyle. We had a great time and everything was very close to the place. Krystal and Blythe were able to help us out on checking in a bit early due to a previous scheduling conflict. Would stay again! Would recommend.
Splendid place! The gem of our holidays!
Fantastic spot, walking distance from beaches, shopping, and restaurants! Clean, spacious, and great amenities. Would stay again for sure!

We loved our stay in this condo! The location was convenient to visit the sights on the west/east shores and up canyon and it was easy to catch the sunrise/sunset on any of the spectacular nearby beaches. My husband and I are techies so the extra touches (Roku, Bose Speakers, computer) were appreciated. It is just a bit of a walk from the parking area and up a set of stairs, but it was only a tad inconvenient on arrival/departure since we had a lot of groceries/bags, and there is a dolly to help if you have a lot of things. This was a wonderful, relaxing abode to call home at the end of our day of adventuring. Mahalo, Krystal and Eric!
This villa is absolutely amazing! A quick walk to beach, very close to grocery stores and restaurants and very clean! The bed was so comfy too! Would love to come back very soon.

Just like it says, immaculate! Very spacious 1 bedroom with a great deck/balcony. Was the perfect place for our 1 week stay in Kauai. Close to shops and eateries and a quick drive to the beach too. But there's always the pool too =) Couldn't have asked for more really.

Krystal & Eric’s condo was beautiful! Much bigger than we expected, very homely and extremely well designed. Although I didn’t meet Krystal in person she was very prompt to respond to any questions and really made us feel at home. Thanks once again.

Our family had a great time at Krystal and Eric's place in Poipu. The condo is very spacious and easily accommodates a family of four. There are shopping, groceries and restaurants nearby, and the beach is only a 10 min walk. The condo complex has a beautifully maintained garden with water features that attracts many birds to the trees, so the atmosphere is truly tropical.
The space was great for my husband and I! It was super close to all the shopping/restaurants and beaches. The perfect location to be in.

This is a fantastic place to stay in a great location near several shops and places to eat. Also a quick walk to several beaches that offer some of the best snorkeling! Krystal and Eric gave us ample suggestions of things to do on the island. Also the bed was super comfy we slept like a dream. Thank you! There is plenty of airflow with fans and windows but it would have been a bit more pleasant in the heat with AC.

Krystal & Eric’s place is super convenient because of its location and because they supply everything you would need while on vacation. The floor fans and
ceiling fans were life savers as it was a lot warmer than we had expected. We enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it!

Very nice, clean unit in a beautifully lush garden setting. All amenities provided for a comfortable stay. Having a washer/dryer in unit was very convenient. When we arrived and realized there was no A/C I was worried it would be too hot but there are so many windows that let the wonderfully cool breezes flow through (and plenty of fans provided) that we were quite comfortable. The location was fantastic...we loved snorkeling and watching the Monk Seals and turtles sunning on the sand at Poipu Beach which is just a short drive away. La Spezia in Koloa Town, also just a short drive away, was delicious. Drug stores, grocery stores, shopping and restaurants all available in the area.
This condo was larger than we'd expected and it felt very private and secluded. It had many nice touches and had everything we needed. Overall, it was a terrific place to stay.

It is hard to say anything bad about this place! It was exactly how it was described with a few little extras. The location was perfect; beaches all around the area, shopping was a short walk away, and there was some of the best restaurants in the area right next to the location. The unit was spacious, quite, and had anything you needed; even techie stuff. The host were great! They gave us all sorts of information about the unit and the island. Furthermore, they answered any questions we had and gave suggestions based on what we were looking to do! We couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay during our time in Kauai!
Highly recommend! Krystal was great and quick with communication. 5 star condo and location. Hope to stay here next time we visit Kauai!

This is a wonderful little condo set amongst lush gardens. It is quiet, yet inviting. It is within walking distance to beaches, stores and restaurants! I’d highly recommend this little gem in the Poipu area!
Krystal & Eric's place was as described. Good location and comfortable.
Krystal and Eric's place was great! Awesome amenities, provided lots of great beach things, awesome to-do tips, and big TVs too!

As folks can read, this unit gets five stars. I concur with almost all the positive statements such as a large unit, wonderful and responsive hosts, great value,  gorgeous grounds, well stocked kitchen and supplies (especially for the beach), and one of the most comfortable beds I have slept in. However, there were a few surprises that I didn't expect. If you are not fastidious, many or all of these may not matter, but for those of you who are, I think it is good to know before you rent. Although the unit is quiet from street noise and even sounds from neighboring units, you will hear roosters during the night. (Maybe this is seasonal, so I guess I can't say with certainty if this happens every night of the year.) And, at least when we were there, the crowing didn't begin just before sunrise, but beginning around midnight--and every hour after that. After a night or two, we habituate to the sound, but it still disrupted our sleep. Many reviews state it is quiet (which was one of the main reasons I chose this place), so for those of you who will be bothered by occasional rooster crowing, you should keep this in mind. Regarding the unit itself, it overall is very nice and is a great value. However, be prepared for at best average cabinets, lack of down pillows,  and a subpar bathroom (e.g., hard to turn on shower, lack of color coordination). Even though I think overall this is a wonderful unit and Krystal and Eric are outstanding, and we enjoyed our stay (the positives strongly outweighed the negatives), for future travellers who care about some of the minuses I listed, I thought you should know.

Krystal and Eric’s place was perfect for our getaway in Kaua’i. The location was ideal with multiple restaurants, stores, and beaches nearby. They have a closet full of necessities for the beach which was an awesome touch. Krystal was extremely easy to communicate with and very accommodating! Overall, incredible hosts. 

As mentioned in the description, there is no air conditioning, but Krystal has multiple fans set up and the windows help cool the place down. I had no trouble sleeping, but my fiancé who tends to get warm while he sleeps definitely had a little trouble. But other than that we would absolutely recommend this b’ n b’.
Sehr schönes Appartment, komplette Ausstattung, es fehlt an nichts. Super gute Lage, sehr ruhig. Sehr gepflegte Gartenanlage. Bequemes Bett. 2 riesen grosse TV's. Wir können es empfehlen! :-)

Very pleasant and satisfying experience of a stay, the house is very good location, close to the most beautiful beach on the lovely island, there is a shopping mall next to, shopping and eating is very convenient! The house is great! We cooked breakfast and dinner in the kitchen. Everything was very convenient!

summary: I'll be glad to share a room in my apartment with you. The room is very light and cosy, as well it's fully equiped for your comfortable staying in Barcelona.  The apartment is located in very beautiful and green district of Barcelona. We have very good transport connection with whole the city. The neighborhood is very green, clean & happy. name: MODERN DESIGNED STUDIO APARTMENT IN TAKSIM PLACE
summary: A glowing trip to Beyoglu and exotic history of Pera  Luce Di Pera is a boutique hotel enviably located in the heart of Istanbul -  Taksim, Beyoglu of the historical Pera region;  right in the center Beyoglu’s most popular attractions. The boutique hotel has 9 large, design and elegant rooms provide a refreshing night’s rest in the city that never sleeps. Our staff takes great pride in consistently offering an exceptional experience to our guests.
space: Situated a 2-minute walk from the famous Nevizade Street with its rows of historic pubs and trendy restaurants and cafes, Luce Di Pera is located 200 metres from the vibrant Istiklal Sreet. It offers accommodation with modern amenities and free Wi-Fi throughout the premises. Luce Di Pera provides air-conditioned units featuring a minibar, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Complimentary tea and coffee setup, as well as water bottles are available in each room. For your meals, you can venture out and try one of the numerous restaurants, cafes and popular venues serving both traditional and modern Turkish cuisine. Free coffee and tea service is offered throughout the day. Taksim Square is 750 metres from the property and Sishane Metro Station is 700 metres away, offering easy access to other sites in the city, including the historic Sultanahmet area. The iconic Galata Tower is within 1 km.

reviews.comments:
Отличное место! Очень хорошее расположение в богемной части Стамбула. Рядом с самой известной барной улицей города, но в тоже время очень тихое и уютное. Рядом веселые бары, отличные галереи, очень вкусные уличные места с едой. 
Прекрасный владелец, с которым обсудили все детали перед приездом. Перед приездом составили план каждого дня. Идеальное расположение, чтобы увидеть весь Стамбул: туристический, богемный, калорийный и странный) Мы обязательно вернёмся! За маршрутами и советами обращайтесь)

Very much enjoyed staying here. Very friendly & helpfull staff, really good location, nicely furnished, clean.
Enjoyed The Complimentary tea coffee in the foyer. Great 24hour reception.
I’m so glad to spent my vacations on this place!

We stayed 3 nights, but when my girlfriend checked out she didn’t realize at the time she left her ‘make up bag’ full of make up in the room, which also has some jewelry in it. She called the mgr a couple days later, and the Mgr said she should have called same day bc it’s gone even if they did find it, it wouldn’t be there anymore... as hotel staff there’s gotta be a place for lost and found at least for a week or something.

What a wonderful place! What wonderful people....
Brilliant safe location - just off the busy Balik market and Istiklal Caddesi so it was quiet at night but just a step away from the hectic excitement of the street-life, and only a 5 minute walk from the Taksim or Sishane  metro stops, making to very accessible for exploring the rest of Istanbul.
Our room (22) was great - perfectly clean and tidy with some beautiful touches and the most amazing, powerful and hot, if uniquely shaped, shower.
The friendliness and recommendations from our hosts were spot-on and added to the incredible experience that is Istanbul. Definitely recommended. Thank you Pelin for your hospitality.

5 Harika gün geçirdik! çok güzel ve güleryüzlü bir karşılama ile karşılandık. Oda beklediğimiz gibi çok güzeldi, resimlerle aynıydı. Konumu İstiklal caddesinin tam ortasında yani mükemmel bi lokasyonda. Sadece odada giderlerden kaynaklı küçük bi koku sorunu vardı bunun için ellerinden geldiğince bu sorunu çözüp bize yardımcı oldular, hatta odamızı değiştirdiler :) Her zaman çok (Website hidden by Airbnb) çok memnun kaldık. Bir daha ki sefere görüşmek üzere.
Sevgiler :)

Location is fantastic and room bedding is romantic fabricated, colors and design. 
Room size is decent compared to other hotels of the same category. 
Will come back again :-)

Everything was great, we had a good time 
The staff were really helpful 
I would stay there again
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It’s on a very good location easy to reach everywhere. The hotel was so nice it was perfect for my honeymoon! The staff was very kind and friendly on a professional level. The hotel was very clean also. I will return here again thank you very much.
See you guys again !!

Nice hotel located on Balil Sokak, a street that is very lively at night filled with clubs and bars, the hotel is located on a side road so it's just a few minutes walk away from some attractions and 10 mins from the tram, far enough away from the party scene to easily get a good nights rest.

Me and my family booked two rooms here because of the great interior. Thanks to our host Pelin that she complied with my wish and gave us rooms on the same floor. 
The hotel by itself was clean, comfortable and so close to istiklal caddesi (less than 5 minutes walk). Pelin and her staff were very helpful and friendly. 
I can highly recommend this place since its price and location are really attractive.
Amazing location and cute place overall.

Location was the best thing about the place. We stayed in a different hotel on the first night which wasn’t as nice as the Luce di Pera and was only informed the day before. Other the host is friendly and helpful. The room was modern and clean and set away from the noise of the Taksim night life

Менеджер сказала что для нас забронировали номер с балконом, однако дала прокуренный и темный номер на первом этаже (единственный и на проходе) с выходом на маленький грязный дворик вместо балкона. После моего возражения и просьбы поменять номер сказала что грязный дворик - это и есть балкон, и что свободных номеров больше нет, не нравится - уходите, что мы собственно и сделали. Не рекомендую!

We had a lovely stay in our room at Pelin's. The cute decoration of the place and the good location were very nice. 
There were not table and chairs on the balcony as on the photos but otherwise the photos are completely the same as in reality.
The service and location are valuable! I totally recommend this place.
Luce di Pera has fantastic rooms, very well decorated and clean. All the staff has been kind and friendly

Great location, really close to public transit and an amazing pedestrian area. The alley it is located on is full with great restaurants and shops. Extremely easy to find your way to Galata Kulesi or the metro/tram/funicular and then Sultanahmet or any other neighborhood one would like to visit. The room was clean, bed was comfy and the heated floors in the bathroom were a very nice touch! 10/10 would come again.
Great location and the hotel was nice at some point i huess but maintenance is very poor. Needs urgent work
This pictures presented are not an accurate representation of the rooms. There is no lighting, making it difficult to get ready. There is no bin. No table. Shower was broken.

We had an amazing stay in Istambul. Of course the rooms has “little details” and can be improved, but they are more than good for the price and the unbeatable location just 3 blocks away from Istliklal st. close enough to be in the middle of everything and far enough to have a pleasant rest during the night. 

Tuvimos una estancia maravillosa en Estambul. Las habitaciones tienen “pequeños detalles” que pueden ser corregidos, pero están más que bien por el precio y por la inmejorable ubicación a tan solo 3 cuadras de la calle Istliklal, lo suficientemente cerca para estar en el medio de todo y lo suficientemente apartado para tener un descanso placentero durante la noche.
excellent location, good value, wonderful hosts and excellent stay... will visit again for sure...
Everything was great. The accommodation was just 2 minutes walk from the Istiklal Street which is the main street. The room was good. Everybody was nice and helpful. Thank you for everything Pelin.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Wonderful place, great location close to everything needed, the staff was very helpful especially Mert ! thank you guys for making our trip beautiful.

name: Porto By The River Apartments - Ribeira A2
summary: Porto By the River Apartments is a house comprising 2 fully equipped holiday studio apartments and 1 duplex apartment situated in Ribeira, on the water front of the Douro River, and in the heart of Porto’s Historic Centre. All the apartments have amazing spectacular views over the river, the world famous Luis I Bridge and the Port Wine cellars across the river in Gaia.  Breakfast is included. The products will be in your room at check in time. Fresh bread and croissants will be delivered daily.
space: The house was completely remodelled in 2017 and is situated in one of the Ribeira’s most iconic streets – Rua Cimo do Muro – with a history that goes back to the XIV century as a part of the Fernandine Wall. Its location means that the apartments are perfect for couples, friends, leisure and business travellers. You will be very close to all the tourist attractions and historical monuments that Porto offers. Business travellers will have access to the nearby Alfândega do Porto Congress Centre.  The apartment has a double bed. Bed linen is provided. An additional cot/bed can be provided but must be requested at the time of booking (there will be no charge for a child under 4 years of age).  The apartment has free Wi-Fi and TV.  It is equipped with a hob on which simple meals can be cooked.  Kitchen utensils, plates, cups and saucers and cutlery are provided. A kettle and coffee machine and a welcome pack to get you started – with salt, pepper, olive oil, coffee, tea and sugar - are also
description: Porto By the River Apartments is a house comprising 2 fully equipped holiday studio apartments and 1 duplex apartment situated in Ribeira, on the water front of the Douro River, and in the heart of Porto’s Historic Centre. All the apartments have amazing spectacular views over the river, the world famous Luis I Bridge and the Port Wine cellars across the river in Gaia.  Breakfast is included. The products will be in your room at check in time. Fresh bread and croissants will be delivered daily. The house was completely remodelled in 2017 and is situated in one of the Ribeira’s most iconic streets – Rua Cimo do Muro – with a history that goes back to the XIV century as a part of the Fernandine Wall. Its location means that the apartments are perfect for couples, friends, leisure and business travellers. You will be very close to all the tourist attractions and historical monuments that Porto offers. Business travellers will have access to the nearby Alfândega do Porto Congress Centre.
neighborhood_overview: Ribeira do Porto is a touristic area, where you can find bars and restaurants.  There you can visit Ribeira Square, Fonte Taurina Street, Muro dos Bacalhoeiros and Casa do Infante. Port Wine cellars are just across the D. Luis Bridge.  From there you can visit all Porto’s major touristic sites on foot.
notes: For LEGAL REASONS all guests at the time of check-in must present a valid identification document (PASSPORT OR IDENTITY CARD).
transit: The apartment is some 20 minutes away from Francisco de Sá Carneiro Airport and a 10min walking distance from the train and metro stations of São Bento. Funicular dos Guindais is 200m away. There are 3 public car parks nearby. Costs will apply.
access: Guests will have access to the common areas of the building and their own studio.
interaction: We will always contact our guests by e-mail after receiving the confirmation of their booking, and again a few days before their arrival to check all the details are correct.  When guests first arrive in Porto we will greet them with a complementary Port Wine at our bar in Ribeira, Peter Café Sport.  We will then accompany the guests to their apartment which is a 2 minute walk away to settle them in and complete the check-in.  We will provide a comprehensive list of key contacts such as police, hospitals, fire department etc. During the stay our guests can contact us by phone or e-mail in case they need any information or help.
house_rules: - Silent hours from 23h00 to 08h00

host.host_about:
Considero-me uma pessoa divertida e acessível. Gosto muito de viajar principalmente pela Europa e já estive nos principais pontos da Europa Central.
Como anfitrião sou uma pessoa calma e disponível, sempre pronto a responder às necessidades dos meus hóspedes permitindo que conheçam e aproveitem ao máximo este fabuloso cantinho da Europa que é o Porto.
Como hóspede sou calmo e tento deixar as casas como as encontrei.

reviews.comments: The location of this Airbnb is unparalleled!  The host was super responsive and easy to get in touch with!  Very easy process to check in and out.  The breakfast included was AWESOME!  So friendly and accommodating...we would definitely stay here again.  Please note that the bathroom and upstairs bedroom are difficult to access for anyone with limited mobility.  Otherwise this is an excellent option in Porto with amazing views!

The view is really spectacular! The location is perfect. Breakfast was delicious. I would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends. Communication was great. They were very accommodating about early check in and keeping our bags for the whole day when we checked out.

name: Belle chambre avec balcon privé sur Laurier
summary: Chambre avec balcon privé disponible dans un bel appartement situé entre le Plateau Mont-Royal et le Mile-end, à 3 minutes à pied du métro Laurier et proche de toutes commodités (métro, épicerie, dépanneurs, bars, restaurants ...)
space: La chambre dispose d'un lit double, d'une penderie, d'un bureau et d'un balcon privé, idéal pour prendre son café tranquillement le matin. Le reste du logement est composé d'une cuisine ouverte donnant sur le salon, d'une salle de bain où se trouve une laveuse et une sécheuse ainsi qu'un deuxième balcon partagé pour profiter du soleil en fin de journée.

reviews.comments: The location is perfect and her roomates too, but the room was not clean and everything was smelling smoke. If you know that you have allergy of smoke, then this place is not for you. Also I advice you not to use the balcony table to avoide surprise. Finally, you may be very carefully about the accessories in the toillet as they are very old to avoid breaking them.
Emeline was a great host. We didn't meet but everything worked well. Her place is in a perfect location for discovering Montreal.

host.host_location: United Kingdom / Canada / Australia / France / Italy / United States
host.host_about:
We have lived in Kailua for nearly 15 years.  
It is a great little beach community - we love it here.
Favorites:  (Guests are welcome to come along too)
 - Walking our dog on Kailua beach in the morning.  
- Power Core yoga at our dojo (downtown).
- Stand-up paddleboarding.

reviews.comments:
Our stay with Matthew and Lisa was amazing. I doubt you will find a more comfortable cottage or nicer hosts. Their attention to the little things is simply fantastic. If you are in Kailua and want to be close to everything but still in a lovely neighborhood, look no further! :)
Mahalo for being your guests.

The cottage was homey, airy, and well appointed.  It’s in a quiet neighborhood with a secure gate.  It takes only a few minutes to walk to Kailua beach, which is surprisingly uncrowded and peaceful.  The town center is a long walk or 5 minute drive away.

Matthew and Lisa were incredibly kind and welcoming.  We were greeted by Lisa, Ella, and their dog Roxy, and immediately felt welcome.  They loaned us their beach umbrella, beach towels, and beach mats, and even offered to do a load of laundry since we booked a long stay.  They definitely have this host thing down!

This is a cozy cottage nestled steps from the beach. When I say steps, I mean it’s literally down the street and around the corner from Kailua beach which is beautiful and has a “locals only” vibe which means it’s far from crowded for such a gorgeous beach.

We checked in and were greeted by Lisa, her daughter, and their dog Roxy. Prior to arrival, Lisa answered any and all questions that I had (it’s my first time in Hawai‘i) and suggested activities that we could do depending on our interests.

Lisa and her husband Matthew helped us with multiple things during our trip; we borrowed mats and beach towels, borrowed an umbrella for the beach, asked for a small cooler to pack our lunch away in and they had one, and Lisa washed/dried our beach towels as it had been raining at night and who wants to wake up to wet towels, am I right???

Our stay was amazing, this family truly embodies the spirit of Aloha and made my first days in Hawai‘i unforgettable.
Perfect place and hospitality. The cottage is spotless and new, and A/C was a godsend! Lisa provided everything we needed and was very helpful!

Very cozy cottage! For starters, the cottage is very clean and stylish. The bed was super comfortable and the shower head was really nice. 

Our hosts were very helpful and willing. They made sure the property was secure. 

I felt very relaxed during my stay here.

Lisa’s beach cottage exudes aloha spirit. Lisa and Matt are excellent hosts. They were quick to respond to my online questions, wonderful communicators, and welcoming upon arrival. Their positive energy enhanced our stay. The cottage is spotless, well-appointed, and has a beautiful high ceiling. The bed is extremely comfortable with quality lines. The cottage has a quiet AC, but we did not need it. The ceiling fans and trade winds allowed us to keep the windows open, soothed by the sounds of ocean waves and rustling palms. In fact, we slept the best we have in months. The area is peaceful, safe, and an easy walk to the beach and town, where we went to the farmer’s market and bought local fruit, veggies, and baked goods. The kitchenette has a great fridge, good knife for cutting pineapple, nice dishes, microwave, coffeemaker & Keurig machine, and Lisa gave us wonderful Hawaiian coffee. There are plenty of electrical outlets to plug in devices and Wifi is fine. The shower has a strong water flow, and there are plush towels. We enjoyed sitting on the covered porch and seeing island flora and birds. Lisa and Matt have thought of every detail, including beach gear—towels, mats, boogey boards, and umbrella. Our time at the beach cottage was restorative, and when we return to Oahu, we will definitely stay here. Thank you Matt and Lisa for making the cottage available. Mahalo.
“No brainer” stay here!

We had a fantastic stay at Lisa and Matthew's beach cottage! The space was private and sparkling clean, the hosts incredibly sweet and helpful, and the location can't be beat. Everything was comfortable and well appointed, with plenty of towels, amenities, etc. We didn't need the AC at all, fans and ocean breezes make for perfect comfort every time. 

Lisa and Matthew was fantastic, making sure we had everything we needed and were always on hand with great recommendations for enjoying Kailua to the fullest. A special shout-out to Roxy, the sweetest Lab you want! We had a fantastic time and will be back as soon as we can. Mahalo!

Dear Lisa, 
Emanuele and I have been so glad and happy to stay at your place. 

You are such a nice person, always so kind and attentive towards your guests, and the cottage is perfect and beautifully furnished. 

We loved all your family and hope to meet you again.

We absolutely recommend your B&B also for the walking distanze to the white sandy beach of Kailua!

Hugs to everyone.
Alessandra & Emanuele
It was such a beautiful modern space. They did a great job it looks great. We were accommodated for our early arrival and our stay was wonderful.

Lisa is awesome! Super kind and generous host.  Everything was exactly as described.  Accommodations were modern, clean, and comfortable.  Incredible location near the beach.  Very quiet neighborhood,  but if you are a light sleeper, the morning chorus of tropical birds/doves may work like a sound machine or in my case, earplugs.  Lisa had many great, local recommendations and mine for you would be the tempura Ahi bites and frozen coconut Mojito at Nico's.  Most definitely would stay here again.

This is a quiet new studio where you are welcomed by a lovely family, or where you can be private & just get away from the urban life & meet some locals in this friendly and quieter part of O'Ahu. Shops, the beach & cafes etc are all walking distance. The hosts are second to none & went way above our expectations. I highly recommend you stay here. Aussies Suzanne and Brian

Lisa's cottage was perfect for my husband and me. It was located on the property where Lisa and her family live. They were very welcoming. Lisa was thoughtful and had beverages cold and ready for our arrival. The house is located very close to the beach and not too far from shops and good eats. The house came with gear ready for the beach. Would recommend!

What a great place to stay! My husband and I stayed here for a week and cannot say enough nice things about the cottage and especially the host, Lisa. Lisa and her family were so welcoming and friendly, but also gave us plenty of privacy. The location is a quick walk to the beach and just a short drive to town. The cottage was clean and comfortable. Would definitely recommend this place!

The cottage is the best place to relax, go to the beach and have fun. So clean, cool and romantic. Everything you need included. If not, you just msg Lisa. She will help you.

And the neighborhood (Kailua) is silent and convenient (markets, 7-eleven and restaurants).

Lisa and Matthew are very nice people and their girls and Roxy are also very kind and lovely!
Lisa prepared everything for her hospitality. 

If you stay here, you will never forget the memory.

I and my wife really appreciate their kindness.

I don’t even know where to begin! First, the cottage: this space was absolute perfection. Lisa definitely took the time to create a welcoming space, missing no detail. From the comfortable bed to the beautiful and spotless bathroom (including a shower with amazing water pressure) to being walking distance from the beach, it is impossible not to love this place. Next, the hospitality: Lisa offered the most fitting recommendations for shopping, activities, and dining. She was great at getting a feel for what we were in the mood for and suggesting a few options. That was invaluable for finding great local spots. Lastly, the town: Kailua is SO gorgeous! The beach is picturesque and the city center has all the comforts like a Whole Foods and great coffee, but also so many local shops, restaurants, yoga, farmers markets, etc.. We were on the island for a week and could have stayed longer. I would 100% stay in this cottage again and have actually recommended it to a few friends who are visiting the island.
Great space, amazing hosts, very quick access to the beach and not too far away from the town’s food and shopping. Pretty much perfect.

Lisa's beach cottage in Kailua was the perfect space for my husband and I to entertain a week getaway on Oahu. Kailua is the ideal location for those who want to be far away, but close enough to Honolulu, and have accessibility to explore other areas like the north shore. The cottage is in a beautiful area within a very short walking distance to gorgeous Kailua beach and nearby Lanikai beach. The laid back town has many great local shops and eateries and any services that you may require. Whole Foods is well-stocked and there are two local markets during the week. My husband and I particularly enjoyed walking along Kailua beach and stopping at the Kalapawai Market for a coffee in the morning. We had a beautiful dinner featuring the local daily catch at the Kalapawai Deli and Cafe. Buzz's Original Steak House is a bit pricey, but has a great history with nicely prepared dinner entress (loved the cajun-style ahi and grass-fed tenderloin with garlic mash) and famous mai tais that certainly pack a beautiful punch. The Pill Box hike provides an amazing view of the entire area and is certainly worth the mild climb to the top and continues across the ridge if you desire.

The cottage itself was absolutely spotless and just beautiful! Newly renovated and tastefully decorated in an ocean theme with an airy and fresh open ceiling, two ceiling fans, shutter windows, and the option for air-conditioning was just fantastic. The sound of the waves and waking up to the songs of the local birds each morning created a serene and relaxing atmosphere. The kitchen is fully stocked to make light meals and snacks. Lisa was so thoughtful in leaving us some local cookies and providing me with organic decaf coffee upon our arrival after I asked her where I could find some. We were able to purchase local tropical fruit and made beautiful smoothies each morning with the Ninja blender that conveniently included to-go containers. The lanai was a lovely place to eat breakfast after walking the beach in the morning. Beach gear was also provided including boogie boards, fresh beach towels and mats, umbrella, and beach chairs. There are even two bikes available to tour the local area.

The very best part was the warmth and hospitality of Lisa and her family! We were given the privacy we needed along with friendly conversation and open communication. Lisa was always available to recommend places to visit, answer any questions that we had, and provide us with anything additional we might need. We even had the chance to share some stories and walk with their lovely golden lab who was happy to tour us around the best parts of the beach as only a great dog can do!

Communication from our initial contact with Lisa to the end of our trip was friendly, expedient and efficient. We would definitely recommend the beach cottage to others and look forward to returning again! 

Aloha Lisa!!!

This private bungalow sits behind the main house and is cute and efficient. Very clean, lots of windows for fresh air.  Lisa and Matt are great hosts, very friendly, and gave us tips on directions and some local places to visit.  They have a beautiful family, and we enjoyed meeting them.  Enjoyed our stay and the location as it was nice to not have to go through town each time to get to their place as traffic can be a bit heavy. 

Will definitely recommend to others.

We absolutely loved our stay at Lisa's place! It was clean, spacious for the two of us, and private. Lisa gave us a very warm welcome and made certain that we had everything we needed throughout our stay. The proximity to the beach can't be beat, and Lisa provided us with beach mats, chairs, and a cooler.  We highly recommend staying at Lisa's place!

We truly enjoyed our stay at Lisa's&Matthew's beach house and in the company of their amazing family. Cottage is behind their main residence house,it's new,well kept,spotless clean,decorated with style and offers lots of privacy,terrace with green views and additional beach amenities such as umbrella,chairs,cooler and even beach towels. No negatives we could spot, the communication was quick and easy with Lisa. It's very close to the beach as well. We would come back in a heartbeat.

Matt and Lisa were wonderful hosts! They really went above and beyond during my few days there. The beach cottage is clean, beautifully decorated, very comfortable, and only a 5 minute walk to one of the most beautiful beaches on Oahu. Would absolutely stay there again!
Lisa is such a great host, she gave us a lot of tips on where to eat and things to do. I would highly recommend her place. It was very clean and private and very cute!
Beautiful little place!!! Very cozy and quiet, great beaches near by, and amazing hikes close by. Lisa is awsome to deal with and very helpful with everything. For sure would stay there again!

My husband and I stayed at this cottage for 3 nights. It was exactly what we were hoping for! Super clean, beautiful, newly renovated, close to the beach, and extremely hospitable hosts! We felt right at home and relaxed. Lisa was so helpful and accommodating. We were able to use their bikes to ride all around town. The little town of Kailua has great restaurants, a cute farmers market, and everything you need for the perfect vacation. I definitely recommend this cottage and plan to stay here again the next time we visit!

Beautiful, bright, clean cottage.  Recently and tastefully remodelled.  Loved the color scheme, lamps, materials, accessories which created a clean, comfortable, beach cottage feel.  Convenient location: less than five minute walk to the beach or a couple minutes drive to the best restaurants. Highly recommend this host, cottage and the town of Kailua.

Lisa and her place are great!  A 5 minute walk to one of the best beaches on the island.  The accomodations are accurate and relaxing.  Lisa was a tremendous host, answering all our questions and ensuring we had everything we needed to make the most of our stay.  You cannot underestimate the value of having a local's insight into deciding what and when to do things.  Lisa was more than willing to share and help guide our plans. Kailua is a short drive from Honolulu and the airport.  Easy place to get around. Thank you Lisa, we will be back!

Lisa was very attentive and communication was a breeze. The location is within a 5-minute walk to the Kailua beach and roughly a mile walk to a local market. 

Lisa offered to help with any questions/concerns we had and my wife and I were very happy to stay. Would book again.

Lisa, Matt and their family we so incredibly gracious and hospitable. We truly felt right at home like family. The beach house was amazing, clean, very comfortable and has any amenities you could want and more. We’ll miss our time and the wonderful memories will always be cherished.  Thank you again for everything and allowing us to take Roxy for a stroll on the beach.

Great location in a quiet residential neighbourhood near the beach. Pics are accurate. Communication is fast. The cottage is detached from the main house in the back yard. 

The cottage is the perfect size for two people. It has been renovated and is tastefully decorated. The cottage is self contained with everything including wifi and AC. The bed was super comfortable. Kitchen was fully stocked - though we didn’t use it much aside from coffee and fresh fruit in the am. The bathroom is 3 piece. Water temp and pressure was superb. 

Lisa has boogie boards, beach chairs, towels, umbrella and a cooler to use. She even washed n dried our beach towels for us after a few days. That was nice!  

The place is near some great restaurants in the area which Lisa and her husband are a wealth of knowledge on. 

If your looking for a quiet, modern clean place, within 5 min by foot to the beach stay here.

Lisa's beach cottage is the perfect get away. Lisa and her family gave me the warmest welcome and made me feel very comfortable staying on their property. The cottage itself was very clean, cozy and beautifully decorated. The bed was comfortable and the shower head pressure was just right! The kitchenette was well stocked with all the  essentials if you choose to cook. The cottage is 5 minute walking distance to the beach. I would absolutely love to stay here again!

Wir nutzen schon seit einigen Jahren weltweit Airbnb in unseren Urlauben. Diese Unterkunft war definitiv eine der Besten in der wir jemals übernachten durften. Lisa und ihre Familien haben uns sehr herzlich empfangen und wir wohnten in ihrem wunderschönen, liebevoll eingerichteten Gästehaus. 
Gleichzeitig befindet sich das Häuschen in einer sehr gepflegten und ruhigen Wohngegend. Kailua ist ein Ort der sich ideal zur Erkundung der Insel eignet oder man bleibt einfach vor Ort und genießt den riesigen Strand.

Our girls trip to Kailua was unimaginable thank you to Matt Lisa and the girls! The beach cottage and all that it had to offer made us feel right at home. Leaving the windows open, to the sound of the ocean with the perfect breeze, made each night. The mornings were just as peaceful especially being steps away from watching the sunrise with a cup of coffee. The location on the island was exactly what we were looking for. Our days were busy but our favorite part of the day was coming back to OUR place! We cannot thank you enough for such an immaculate experience. Highly recommend this remarkable family!

Wonderful, wonderful, wonderful! Lisa's place was a lovely oasis to return to after a day of trips to the beach and local sights. The location was perfect for our long weekend stay with just a short drive from the airport (20ish minutes) outside of the crazy traffic in downtown Honolulu. Lisa was warm and very generous with her time and local expertise. She had amazing recommendations on places to eat and things to do. It's less than 2 blocks from the most perfect sandy beach you can imagine! The small shopping area is about a mile away and easy to get to by car or bike with solid breakfast options and a Whole Foods for groceries. The room was breezy and comfortable with the absence of a TV a welcome change of pace. Many good books were read on the comfy bed, the sunny patio chairs outside, or down at the beach.

Our trip to Kailua was a return venture for us, but a first time stay with Lisa. Even though we knew the town, she and her husband had great advice and suggestions that we had never known on places to eat and things to do. The space was gorgeous and newly remodeled with all the amenities one would need on a beach vacation. Riding around this beautiful town on the provided bikes and living truly like a local was invaluable. Not to forget the hop and skip across the small street to the shoreline of a secluded local beach.  We will definitely be back!! 

PS, that sweet yellow Labrador (Roxy) was the cherry on top with her enthusiasm for dog walks and Lisa's willingness to let us practically adopt her for the week.
A great place to rest and relax away from the world! Convenient and superbly decorated! Super friendly and attentive host!

Lisa and family are fantastic hosts.  Lisa is full of information about the area, and very responsive.  We can't say enough about how perfect this place was.

Side note... The beach chairs provided are amazing, we lived in those :)

Our stay was wonderful! It’s the perfect little beach cottage with everything you need. It was a perfect location for a sleepy beach town and a great landing pad to come back to after adventures across the island. The book Lisa made with local tips was really helpful and definitely added the local touches- in addition to the countless suggestions from Matt and Lisa. The house was incredibly clean and we had everything we needed and more- they were so willing to help us with EVERYTHING. They have a wonderful family and they made our honeymoon that much more memorable. We know exactly where we’ll be staying when we come back to O’ahu!

It’s all about location with this perfect little beach house cottage just a block from the beautiful beach on Oahu’s windward side! The entire cottage was completely renovated and served our needs perfectly. The kitchenette was more than adequate for our week-long stay and the on-site parking was a major bonus! Lisa and her wonderful family were very accommodating throughout our entire stay and are always accessible should anything come up, but are more than happy to give you space if that’s what you desire. Wi-fi, A/C, full size fridge, and all the beach amenities you could ask for are all included.

Lisa's cottage is absolutely wonderful. I loved every minute of my stay - it truly could not have been nicer. Lisa and Matt are incredibly thoughtful hosts and my trip was all the better because I stayed at their place. The cottage has everything anyone could need: it's beautiful, immaculate, 2 blocks from the beach, and comfortable, cozy, and well, perfect.

We loved everything about this cottage! Immaculate, looks like Chip & Joanna Gaines of TV fame decorated it, 4 minutes walk to the beach, bicycles to use, and amazing hosts who treated us like family. If you are looking for a place in Kailua THIS is the place to book. They provided all the essentials and more...beach chairs, beach towels, boogie boards, and even a cooler. The cottage is close enough to walk to Kailua Town where you will find restaurants and shopping. It also sports an efficiency kitchen with everything you need to make your vacation absolutely perfect!! We lucked into finding this gem!!!!!!!

The beach house cottage is an amazing place to stay in Kailua. It is clean and decorated to be light and airy (so relaxing). Lisa and her family are so incredibly nice and accommodating and offer such great tips for things to do and places to eat. It is minutes from the beach (walking) and the cottage has AC if you’re not a fan of the heat and humidity. We felt so welcomed and taken care of and it was a beautiful place to spend our honeymoon at. We can’t wait to come back!

I traveled to HI on a work trip and found this cozy spot right by the ocean. It is an easy walk to the ocean, no joke. My favorite part about my stay was the privacy, cleanliness, and style of the cottage.  For the eight days I stayed here I felt at home. It was the right size of space for me and I always had plenty of privacy. The bed was comfy and the sheets smelled good. If you are searching for a home away from away at a great price, I would recommend this location, without a doubt. Kailua is a paradise.

Lisa&family were just super-hosts!!
Great advice on what to do on oahu and when, always nice and helpful! Very clean and nice cottage, it was such a nice stay and just a few minutes from one of the most beautiful beaches of the world! Nearby you find everything you need (Wholefoods, Coffee, Surfschool, etc)...you will feel instantly at home!

Lisa's cottage was perfect for the two of us. It had everything we needed, and we especially appreciated the beach umbrella and chairs, which we used every day. The bikes were great for riding into town, too. The location was amazing - walking distance to the beach and biking/walking distance to town. Lisa gave great advice on sightseeing options, and told us about a walk we otherwise wouldn't have known about. Great idea to have keyless locks on the gate and door - it saved us having to hide keys when we went to the beach! We can wholeheartedly recommend staying here.

My mother and I stayed here for the majority of our week long Hawaii trip. We definitely made the right choice booking with Lisa! The beach house is in a wonderful location with great hosts. We appreciated all the communication we had with Lisa and her family who recommended different hikes, places to eat, and shopping. This Air BandB is cozy, stocked with all the essentials, very clean, and came with a safe place to park our rental car. We had a amazing trip! I would recommend this Air BandB, and would definitely stay here again if given the chance.

Lisa and her family are amazing hosts! we had such a wonderful time staying in Kailua. The beach house was sparkling clean and had coffee stocked waiting for us. Lisa has everything you’ll need for your stay. Things like: beach towels, beach chairs, umbrella and even boogie boards to enjoy the waves. Bikes to ride into town too!! Kailua is the perfect place to unwind and relax. You will not be disappointed!

This place is amazing!  Steps from the best beach in Oahu, it has everything you need for the quintessential beach vacation.  Lisa and her family are always around to help, I would highly recommend to anyone.  Skip Waikiki and spend your time here instead...
It‘s a beautiful beach house in a great place. The beach and kailua town are very close and there are bicycles you can use and everything you need for the beach as well.

This place is a real gem.  Location is everything and this place is a block away from one of the world's best beaches and within easy walking distance of great dining.  There's always almost a breeze on this side of the island, but the AC provided cools you down super fast.  The kitchenette is a great touch.  The hosts are friendly and welcoming.  Highly recommended.

This place is absolutely unbelievable. The family was very personable and accomadating. Perfect location to be close to the  beach and away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki.  Webster has yet to come up with a word that could describe all of the positives we experienced during our stay here.
Lovely cottage with semi-private porch and yard to enjoy the Oahu breezes. Short walk to amazing clean family beach. Above and beyond hospitality. Our stay could not have been more perfect.

Great place to stay! The space was clean and lots of nice, little touches. They provided everything we needed for the beach- towels, chairs, umbrella, boogie boards. Easy walk to the beach and short bike ride (which they also provided) to town. Lisa and Matt provided a whole book on things to do and recommended places to eat. Loved our stay here, exactly what we wanted after the hustle and bustle of Honolulu!

We can’t begin to express how lovely our stay was. Not only did Lisa and her family provide a warm welcome, they made our entire stay so comfortable and memorable. Lisa is very kind and easy to communicate with. She makes herself available as much as you may need her to be. Her tips and recommendations made us feel like true locals. She provided a binder full of recommendations for places to eat, hike, and explore. Along with with many other personal touches, her cottage felt like home. We highly recommend staying with Lisa, you won’t regret it!

What a lovely beach house! Lisa and Matt were amazing hosts and gave us such a warm welcome when we arrived. Their cottage is beautifully decorated and we loved being able to walk to the beach and explore everything Kailua has to offer! And the boogie boards and beach chairs were such a great bonus. This was the best Airbnb experience I’ve had thus far and would definitely stay here again!

By far the best air bnb I have experienced.  Lisa and family are amazing people. Every thing was clean and perfect. The cottage is beautifully designed and up to date. The location is great for a walk to the beach or a 5min drive into town. The town is charming and very quiet but offers plenty of things to do (shops, food, drink). We Ioved everything and can't wait to return.

Lisa and Matt are the best hosts! Their kindness, generosity, and thoughtfulness made me feel like a part of their family, yet they respected my space and were never intrusive. The cottage is absolutely beautiful and I slept like a rock. Bonus that it’s so close to the beaches and downtown! I will definitely rebook on my next trip to Oahu, and highly recommend to other visitors!

Lisa and her family made us feel very comfortable and we knew we could count on them if we needed something or advice about the island. Lisa was so sweet and thoughtful the whole time. She made our wedding day special by telling us where to go to dinner and placing a lei on myself (Hawaiian tradition).  
   You’ll never forget this family and how comfy the beach house is...

We had a great stay at Lisa's place, everything was as described and our hosts Lisa and Mathew and their family made us feel at home. The beach house is a separate, small self-contained unit near the main house, with secure parking and easy street access. Kailua Beach is a 5 minute walk away, and having visited 10+ 'name beaches' on Oahu and the Big Island this trip, Kailua was our favorite. Miles of powder white, clean, soft sand, gentle warm surf, and mostly locals and families without the big crowds found on nearby beaches like Lanikai, let alone Waikiki. Unit was spotlessly clean, simple but modern with all the essentials. Very comfortable large bed, A/C present but we never used it as overhead fans and constant ocean breeze with surf sound in background kept us cool at night, very quiet for sleeping (and no roosters, sometimes a night noise issue in other Hawaiian towns!) Small kitchen with everything required, including both drip and keurig-style coffee makers, and bottled water and other starter supplies in fridge.  Beach towels, chairs, boards, bikes etc. all available if wanted. In line with quiet, simple beach lifestyle, no TV or stereo distractions, but excellent house high speed internet for those needing some screen time, with good mobile phone service across rest of Kailua. Lisa was always available for help or tips, and we thoroughly enjoyed meeting her and her family and learning about their life in Kailua. Kaillua town itself was pleasant and modern small town with good array of shops, services, and places suggested by Lisa to purchase food or eat out. We had good meals at nearby Nico's (couple of times, our favorite), walk up pizza at Bob's by the beach, good Thai at Champa's, and enjoyed slightly more formal meals at Baci Bistro and Buzz's (latter two restaurants we suggest reservations).  Though quiet and beach focused, Lisa's place was only a 25 min. drive from airport and Pearl Harbour (along spectacular IH3 through mid-island mountains and tunnels). Despite gov. shutdown we had excellent visit to PH sites spread over 2 days, leaving afternoons free for beach! All in all our stay at Lisa's  place was great and we hope to return some day from snowy Ontario! Aloha!
This place is all around perfect! Quite, cozy, clean, comfy and in the best location for a relaxing beach experience.

Espaço muito acolhedor, bem decorado, a 3 min a pé de uma praia paradisíaca. Perfeito para descansar.
A Lisa é muito simpática e prestável.

Ana Pinto

This airy, creative cottage is the perfect beach house.  My husband and I spent 9 nights and had the most restful vacation.  Lisa and Matt and family are the best hosts and really are the AirB&B concept in action.  We enjoyed beach time, hikes, tennis, bike rides,lap swimming, jogs, and the town/village vibe of Kailua-while always looking forward to returning to the quiet of the beach house!  This is a find...

Hi Lisa, 
We had a great time.  Thank you for all your great tips, info package in cottage was great.
We LOVED the bikes, boogie boards and sand chairs.
So close to beach in lovely quiet residential area. 
People in Kailua are so friendly. Very easy to walk, bike or Uber. 
We felt like part of the family but we had total privacy. 
All the best.
Lynn and Bryan 
Manitoba, Canada

We very much enjoyed Matt and Lisa’s place. They were such kind and gracious hosts and made us feel like we were part of their family and community. They gave great recommendations on places to go and we ate/drank very well while in Kailua! The space was beautifully decorated, spotless and had whatever we needed and more. It is a 5 min walk to the beach and we went almost every day. It was a wonderful week and we are very grateful to Matt and Lisa so being so kind.

Lisa's place was awesome, everything was clean and all of the amenities that were provided made me feel like I was in my own cozy home. Her suggestions and tips on local Kailua spots were awesome and definitely worth checking out, she even let me borrow one of the family's beach cruiser bicycles! Getting to and from her place is a breeze by bus/car/taxi and the local beaches are really close.

Thank you Lisa and family for letting me stay here while I explored Kailua! I hope to visit again sooner than later.

name: Paradise Studio on the North Shore
summary: This cozy apartment has the feel of a hotel, without the high price. We offer free parking I. quiet residential neighborhood, walk to the best beaches that Oahu has to offer. Watch the sunrise and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere of tropical North Shore Oahu, all within walking distance to restaurants, entertainment, and world surfing beaches and hiking trails. Polynesian Culture Is one mile.  ***All reservation owe a 10% transient accommodation tax additional, Cash or App
space: This cozy studio includes high speed WIFI, parking, flat screen TV, full bathroom, kitchenette, coin washer and dryer, full size refrigerator, small dining table, and four windows allowing breezes to enter. Additionally there is a high velocity fan to keep you cool at night. The first bed is a queen and second bed is a pull-out twin temperpedic bed.
description: This cozy apartment has the feel of a hotel, without the high price. We offer free parking I. quiet residential neighborhood, walk to the best beaches that Oahu has to offer. Watch the sunrise and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere of tropical North Shore Oahu, all within walking distance to restaurants, entertainment, and world surfing beaches and hiking trails. Polynesian Culture Is one mile.  ***All reservation owe a 10% transient accommodation tax additional, Cash or App This cozy studio includes high speed WIFI, parking, flat screen TV, full bathroom, kitchenette, coin washer and dryer, full size refrigerator, small dining table, and four windows allowing breezes to enter. Additionally there is a high velocity fan to keep you cool at night. The first bed is a queen and second bed is a pull-out twin temperpedic bed. This neighborhood is a peaceful yet lively small beach town with a college, surf breaks, hikes, restaurants and shopping, great cycling and hiking, and amazing world class b
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is a peaceful yet lively small beach town with a college, surf breaks, hikes, restaurants and shopping, great cycling and hiking, and amazing world class beaches. There is a supermarket and a cinema as well as world class beaches within walking distance. Polynesian Culture Center, LDS temple, and BYU Hawaii campus are just blocks away.
notes: This location is ideal for someone who wants to be on the North Shore but prefers to be away from the 'circus' of crowds. Polynesian culture center is just five minutes walk and also the market place and the university! All bookings must pay a 10% Transient tax. If you stay over one month you can be exempt.
transit: Bicycle and bus will take you around the island but for true freedom renting a car works well. Busses run both north and south every 20 minutes from 5 am to 11pm. Cost is 2.50usd per bus ride, regardless of distance. Uber is available too.
house_rules: Do not track sand inside and wash all dishes before leaving. Unplug refrigerator before checking out. Please respect this area as it is a quiet residential neighborhood that is very peaceful.

reviews.comments: It was nice and suited our needs well. It is small, but kind of just feels like the size of a hotel room.
Great host, great place! Would certainly recommend to anyone visiting the North Shore and wanting a lovely, quiet spot to rest their head post-surf.
The place was good.
This is a wonderful place and the host is very cordial and accommodating especially Linda.
