Recommend if you’re wanting a getaway
Douglas was a great host. So was Linda. Had formed a great relationship, was kind to me and to my partner.
Clean place.  no A/C.  Supplies in kitchen acceptable. Good location. Quiet, friendly neighborhood.
Douglas has everything you need in a clean space with extra couches.
Nice place with all the basics needed.  Doug is a great host, offered surfboards and boogie boards for use.  Little tight for 2 people, parking was limited.
Very friendly host! Extremely accommodating! Had a hiccup on my reservations and was willing to work with me so that it could be a win on both ends.
The place was great, stylish and clean.  Parking is tight, but Douglas is there to help when you areive.  It was a great place to crash for the night and explore the North Shore during the day.

The studio that we stayed in was room with a queen sized bed taking up most of it, a wall of kitchen and a small bathroom was also attached. Every thing was updated and very clean. It would be perfect for one person on a business trip not planning to spend much time in the room aside to sleep. 
The studio was very tight. It seemed as if it were a part of one of the connecting units before and seperated as it's own. It did not have the extra bed, room, tvs, or table and chairs as listed. There was a folding chair in the closet but really no room to set it up anywhere. Host did confirm that it were only two people but never said of any differences or changed the price. 
It is completely residential. Families and quiet time in tight housing units. It felt like a safe area but perhaps not a vacation spot. I was glad to see that a spot was available at the beginning of a long driveway, otherwise parking was limited. I wouldn't consider it walking distance to as much as listed but definitely a short and easy drive.

name: GOTHIC RAMBLAS 2 APARTMENT
summary: Modern apartment for 4 people located in the Gothic Quarter, in the heart of Las Ramblas in Barcelona. Enjoy a few days of relaxation with ClassBedroom. Book now!
space: Comfortable, light-filled and recently reformed to ensure a pleasant stay, this 2nd floor apartment, with no lift, is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, very close to Las Ramblas. Las Ramblas Apartments are located in a strategic position in the centre of Barcelona, from where visitors can enjoy all the cultural, gastronomic and leisure activities the city has to offer. In fact, the apartment is only 20 minutes away from La Barceloneta Beaches, where one can take pleasant walks or enjoy the summer at the Olympic Port. The apartment, which is ideal for groups of friends or couples, offers a double bedroom, fully appointed bathroom with shower stall, lounge-dining room with a double sofa-bed and a kitchenette. From Las Ramblas Apartments one can visit typical quarters, such as El Born, with its magnificent Santa Maria del Mar Church or take a walk through the district of El Raval, a hub of different cultures, traditions and people. The apartment is also very close to the famous Paseo
description: Modern apartment for 4 people located in the Gothic Quarter, in the heart of Las Ramblas in Barcelona. Enjoy a few days of relaxation with ClassBedroom. Book now! Comfortable, light-filled and recently reformed to ensure a pleasant stay, this 2nd floor apartment, with no lift, is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, very close to Las Ramblas. Las Ramblas Apartments are located in a strategic position in the centre of Barcelona, from where visitors can enjoy all the cultural, gastronomic and leisure activities the city has to offer. In fact, the apartment is only 20 minutes away from La Barceloneta Beaches, where one can take pleasant walks or enjoy the summer at the Olympic Port. The apartment, which is ideal for groups of friends or couples, offers a double bedroom, fully appointed bathroom with shower stall, lounge-dining room with a double sofa-bed and a kitchenette. From Las Ramblas Apartments one can visit typical quarters, such as El Born, with its magnificent Santa Maria del M
neighborhood_overview: The "Ramblas" apartments are on Las Ramblas boulevard, in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona. Here, the remains of the old Roman city can be found, as well as the group of medieval palaces and convents that are the heritage of a splendid past. Barcelona was the capital of the Catalan counts and monarchs for five hundred years. This building is in the center of the medieval city, surrounded by leisure establishments that will make your stay unforgettable. Stroll around the most beautiful walk in the world, once, twice or even more. You will never tire of watching the ebullient life that has left its imprint on this boulevard.
notes: - Barcelona Bedroom es una pequeña empresa familiar con más de 50 apartamentos en Barcelona. - Nuestros apartamentos están equipados con todo lo necesario para realizar la estancia. La cocina dispone de menaje, cubiertos, vajilla, cafetera y pequeño electrodoméstico aunque no encontrarás productos básicos de cocina como aceite, azúcar o sal. - Hay ropa de cama y toallas para todos los ocupantes. - Hacemos un cambio de ropa de cama y toallas en estancias superiores a 7 noches. - Disponemos de wifi por un pequeño coste extra. ***Tasa turística no incluida:  2,48€ por noche y persona***
access: Hay 2 lavadoras y 2 secadoras en un cuarto habilitado en la quinta planta. Edificio sin ascensor
interaction: .INFORMATION TO THE GUESTS:- An 24/7 emergency phone number will be provided at your arrival for anything what could happen during your stay- According to the Barcelona law we are committed to register all occupants information, so you will receive an email with a form that you will need to fill in with all the occupants data- We remind you that you will need to call 30 minutes prior your arrival at the apartment to the check-in phone numb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) If you don't call the check-in phone number nobody will be waiting for youat the apartment
house_rules: .GUESTS REGISTRATION:  - The registration of all occupants data is an obligation by Barcelona law. You will receive an E-mail enabling you to supply us with these details online  - The guest assumes responsibility to return the apartment and all its furniture and equipment in good condition on the day of departure. The apartment and sets of keys should be handed back in the same conditions as that of the arrival date  - The guest agrees to respect the residents of neighbouring apartments and to not cause excessive noise at any time of day. The failure to complete with the above conditions may result in immediate eviction from the Terrallar S.L. property without receiving any refund.  - The client assumes the responsibility of the apartment as well as the furniture and utensils, having to leave it in the same conditions as on arrival, the day of departure. Leaving in the apartment as many sets of keys as received on the day of arrival.  - Each set of missing keys will be charged € 30 /

host.host_about:
Barcelona Bedroom es una pequeña empresa familiar con más de 50 apartamentos propios repartidos por toda la cuidad de Barcelona.
Estaremos encantados de recibirte y ayudarte en todo lo necesario para que que tengas una agradable estancia. No dudes en contactar con nosotros. Gracias y esperamos verte pronto.


Un saludo!

reviews.comments: It was easy to connect with the checkin folks. The apartment was what we were expecting. It was a really cute little place near les ramblas. The only thing was that the washer and dryers were not working at the time and we spent part of one day getting to a laundry mat. Much thanks!
Excellent! Location is perfect, the service is superb! Very accommodating host!

We (young family with two kids) had a nice stay in the R2 Apartment next to ramblas. Perfect situated at the George Orwell square in the middle of the old town. It is not a design or extraordinary type of apartment but clean and all you need. Everything was as descripted and the handover of the key was very friendly and uncomplicated. The apartment is at the second floor and the stairway is very narrow and steep (no elevator) – but we were informed about this and even with two small kids it was no problem. A baby cot and baby chair was provided without additional cots – what is a very good service!! It can be noisy from outside (weekends) but this is always the case if you live in the old town of BCN and the bedroom is located at the quiet side of the apartment – just for the person(s) sleeping on the coach-bed (what is a good quality of bed) it can be a bit disturbing. We can absolutely recommend this apartment for a short stay.

We arrived Friday night and our flight was running late.  We called right away to inform the host once we landed (23:00).  Our host was very kind and understanding and waited for our arrival.  We had a great taxi driver as he knew that area quite well.  The only fall back is that the taxi driver had to drop us off a few blocks before our building because the garbage truck was blocking the way (one-way street).  We finally arrived and our journey was just starting.  We still had to walk up several flights of stairs -58 stairs to be exact in a very small narrow walk way (about 30 inches wide/ .75 meters wide ) to reach the 2nd floor.  We had 4 suitcase and our host so was so nice he helped by taking one up THE SMALLEST suitcase of them all!!  By the time we reached the 2nd floor we were sweating like dogs. 

The apartment itself and the décor was run downed.  The pictures definitely fooled us!  The black plastic chairs drove me crazy, especially when you slide them out to sit.  Its like nails on a chalkboard.  The walls of the apartment are very, very thin.  We could hear our neighbors above and below playing music, talking, and I also believe they have they same plastic chairs as they dragged them across the floor.  

Warning! Be careful in the shower not to touch the cylinder spout, (it is where the shower handled sits on to turn on/off or hot or cold) IT WILL BURN you.  Also there are no shelves in the shower to hold hygiene products which was unpleasant.  Keep the toilet lid closed as much as possible because the water smells like urine.  The host only left one extra roll of toilet paper which was not enough for our stay so, we just went to the supermarket to buy a pack.  The beds were stiff but we managed.  The one nice amenity was the washer and dryer, but again we had to walk up another 50+ stairs to reach the top floor.

All and all, other than the apartment the location was good.  It was walking distance to everything we wanted to see and do.  I love the placas where you can enjoy a nice dinner or take a break for a cappuccino.  

From all my travels…no matter how much research or pictures you look at to find the perfect place, you really won’t know until you actually go and experience it for yourself.  Everyone has their own preference and expectations.

My experience at the R2 apartment was overall a pleasant one. My flight was several hours late and without cell service in Spain, I was stressed about getting in touch with the owners for the key exchange. The drop off went off without a hitch; everything was explained clearly and the host was very accommodating and friendly. 

This apartment is in a fantastic location. The Barri Gothic is definitely one of the cooler parts of the city to stay in. Nearby dining, shops, and walking are awesome. The apartment is furnished simply but the furniture was comfortable and I found the pictures accurate. For the price, I think it really is a bargain. 

For the not-so-great: it's true, the apartment is up a decent flight of stairs and hauling luggage up and down isn't fun. I think this is pretty standard for the area and the owners clearly outline this in the description. 

Unfortunately, the apartment also smells weird. I suspect this has something to do with the sewer system in the building/bathroom, I wasn't quite able to pin down the exact source. My travel mate described it as "an airplane urinal smell" and although the apartment appeared well-cleaned and perhaps this was beyond the owners' control, this issue was undeniable. Probably the worst part of the stay was the fact that there was loud, early morning construction right outside our bedroom window two of the days we were there. This definitely stunk. Yet again, might not be the owners' fault but with the jet lag and Barcelona late night schedule, this was less than ideal. Hopefully this is a temporary situation.

Overall, I think you get what you pay for. If you're looking for a basic relatively comfortable flat in the heart of an awesome district, this apartment is perfect for you. If you're envisioning pristine, hotel-esque lodging you might be disappointed. Keep your expectations in check and you'll be happy here.
Host was friendly & Flexible. Great location.

We liked the place a lot. It has a great location in the heart of the city. Lots of good food available just steps away. Ruben was very friendly, made us welcome and offered additional information about the city. The apartment is spacious and very well equipped with everything you could think of (hairdryer, toaster, AirCon, lots of clean towels...), WiFi working perfectly. We would definitely stay here again.

L’appartement est situé au 2éme étage d’une étroite maison qui en compte 5  ( donc 5 locations ) La rue des Escudelleres est bien située ; très animée de jour comme de nuit. 
Accueil plutôt expéditif par quelqu’un qui n’est probablement pas le propriétaire 
L’appartement est conforme aux photos, propre, à part les housses de matelas..; équipé du strict minimum ( par exemple pas de brosse pour les toilettes.. ) La chambre est petite mais au calme. 
Nous avons payé le supplément pour le wi-fi ; impossible de se connecter . Nous avons laissé un message sur le numéro d’urgence : aucun retour..
En conclusion : trop cher pour la prestation fournie
Lovely location, had great stay

We enjoyed staying in the apartment on the second floor (July, 2017). The place is small but sufficient for one or two. It's clean, bright and relatively quiet, provided you keep windows shut. Air conditioning and wi-fi worked well. Guys at the ClassBedroom, the owner of all flats in the house, were attentive and efficient. The flat would benefit from a shelf and couple of hooks in the bathroom. Otherwise, it lacks nothing.
Great apartment in top location for Gothic exploration & La Rambla. Easy check in & admin.  But have to be prepared for the nightlife noise.

The apartment is really true to the pictures and description. Location is great - in the thick of the narrow, winding streets.  It's a no frills kind of place but if you're looking for something clean and convenient for a city break - it's ideal.

This is such a great spot. Close to everything, and so adorable. Perfectly situated in the Gothic Quarter with restaurants and shopping all very close. I won’t harp on about the stairs—I think that was covered pretty well in the other reviews—but they were definitely not for the faint-hearted. I liked the free laundry facility—just need to bring your own soap! The check-in process was very professional, and everything was clean, if utilitarian. Good value!
Great accomodation in the heart of Barrì Gotìc, just off the Rambla and near the port. Plenty of restaurants, shops and clubs just out of the door.
It was the perfect location, even though it’s surrounded with bars and Restaurants it’s nice an quiet. We really oiked it and would love to stay there again.

Salió todo perfecto!!mejor imposible cerca de las ramblas a 3 cuadras del subte para ir a cualquier parte de Barcelona y con muchos bares y restaurantes cerca,muchas gracias por todo la pasamos muy bien

A great apartment in the heart of Las Ramblas. We were 3 people and were comfortable staying here. The apartment was clean and the host was very easy to contact. Only problem we had was that WiFi did not reach the bedroom. Lots of stairs up to the apartment which wasn’t a problem for us but definitely could be for someone with limited mobility.
Great location and clean and comfortable apartment. The location is amazing and the apartment safe and clean , would recommend this place for sure !
Un lugar acorde a su precio, limpieza aceptable, bien ubicado en el barrio Gotico, cerca de todo, solo presenta problema la escalera ya que no cuenta con elevador
great apartment in a centric location.
Appartement très bien placé, petit mais fonctionnel.

la ubicación es buena, pero había mucha bulla en las calles. no hay ascensor y la escalera es muy estrecha si andan con maletas. las camas no son tan cómodas, y el sofacama es muy regular por el tamaño del espacio.
房间比预想中要小一些,楼梯实在有点窄,有大件行李的话会很不方便｡热水大概只够两个人左右连着洗澡｡睡在客厅沙发床的人会有点吵,街上和楼梯里的隔音效果不太好｡沙发床有点不太干净｡位置比较便利,离地铁和公交都还算近,附近有很多不错的餐厅｡

Appartement conforme
A la description , très bien placé et silencieux .

Messages were answered at a timely fashion. Not enough toilet  paper and trash bags. When I needed to do the laundry, the person on the phone with Indian accent did  not provide answer to my question regarding use of washing and Dyer machines. I ended up going outside to. laundry mat to do my laundry. Such an inconvenience. The last night of our stay, the stair lights were off and had to maneuver our way up and down which could have been disastrous if someone fall on the stairs. It was very unsafe. Lastly, the WiFi sucked really bad. Overall the location is very convenient to everything. Location is awesome, but the apartment was just okay!
Utmärkt läge men luriga gubbar i gathörnen utanför. Lite slitet men rent.
good value, amazing location

Расположение просто шикарное, прям на главной улице Барселоны. В апартаментах очень чисто, все убрано, хороший фен, полотенец много, чистая ванная комната, всегда горячая вода, есть холодильник, полно посуды, если вдруг кто захочет готовить, понравилось абсолютно все, приехали в 11:30, нас сразу разместили, не ждали и 5 минут, всем советую.
Absolutely brilliant location

L’emplacement est le seul vrai point positif de ce logement. À deux pas de la place royale.

Autrement, deuxième étage sans ascenseur. Ménage plus que sommaire. Lit double (un canapé lit) très inconfortable.
Le matériel ne fonctionne pas (alarme incendie qui ressort du mur, coffre fort qui ne fonctionne pas)
Des lumières des appareils empêchent de dormir pour la personne dans le salon).

Obligation de signer des conditions générales autres que celles d’Airbnb à notre arrivée, ceci est innaceptable ! 

Bref, c’est fonctionnel, mais vous serez aussi bien à l’hôtel, et sûrement pour moins cher.
appartement appartement sympathique bien placé

The place was in a perfect location.  Our favorite bar (L'Antiquari) was just around the corner and great restaurants all around you.  As far as the apartment goes, you get what you pay for.  Make sure you bring ear plugs  and some Lysol wipes and spray.
Apartamento localizado em zona central e bastante próximo de estação de metro. Espaço limpo e suficiente para 3 pessoas. Estadia bastante agradável e a repetir.
The location is gorgeous, everything is within walking distance, communication with the owner is simple and straightforward. The apartment has everything you need.

name: Next to the Airport/up to 2+1 people double room
summary: A brand new room and bathroom, beautifully decorated and so comfortable. Just 500m (5 min) away by foot from the airport. The metro station is just across the street, it will take you to Porto center in 20 min. Next to our house you may find: restaurants, coffee shops, Baker,  a small market and pharmacy. You may try the famous Francesinha in a restaurant, 100m away from our house. All car rental companies are at a walking distance. Everything you need will be right here.
space: The room is big. It fits 1 double bed and 1 single bed. Ideal for a couple with 1 children. The bathroom is situated on the first floor of the house, has towels, shower gel and shampoo. Wi-Fi and a flat screen TV is in the room.
description: A brand new room and bathroom, beautifully decorated and so comfortable. Just 500m (5 min) away by foot from the airport. The metro station is just across the street, it will take you to Porto center in 20 min. Next to our house you may find: restaurants, coffee shops, Baker,  a small market and pharmacy. You may try the famous Francesinha in a restaurant, 100m away from our house. All car rental companies are at a walking distance. Everything you need will be right here. The room is big. It fits 1 double bed and 1 single bed. Ideal for a couple with 1 children. The bathroom is situated on the first floor of the house, has towels, shower gel and shampoo. Wi-Fi and a flat screen TV is in the room. You may sit outside and enjoy the beautiful Garden and marvelous weather that we have.
transit: Próximo do nosso espaço existe o metro, paragem de autocarro. Existe inúmeros parques estacionamento low-cost e estacionamento grátis na rua.
access: You may sit outside and enjoy the beautiful Garden and marvelous weather that we have.

reviews.comments: Very kind people, beautyfull and clean house, absolutely suggest to reach the airport.
Located just near the airport...quiet place...wonderful accomodation...great dervice....was a pleasure to stay

Just a perfect place with a charming host like Maria Rosa..! The house is modern, very clean, big bathrooms, king size comfortable bed. We had very good communication and Maria Rosa hosted us like kings. 100 % recommended
The room was clean and nice. We liked our stay and wish Maria and her family all the best.

We had to stay overnight due to our late arrival of the flight, in order to fully seize the next day. If you're looking for a stay near the airport of Porto, this is it. The rooms and the house in general are really clean and modern. It's easy to find and you could easily reach it walking from the airport. The check-in time is great, so late flights are no problem. We also got a small bottle of water and a little snack when we arrived. The contact with Maria Rosa Pereira was easy, she always answered very fast. There was really nothing negative about our stay. We had a little issue with our room door but that was solved within a couple of minutes.
Chambre et salle de bain très propre. Logement Accessible à pied à l aéroport en 10 minutes. Accueil très sympathique et attentionné.
Great host, and friendly. Just next to the airport in a great location.

Nous avons apprécié notre séjour. L'appartement est vraiment tout proche de l'aéroport (pas de bruit, bonne insonorisation). Nous sommes arrivées vers 22 heures de manière à bien profiter au maximum de notre dernière journée à Porto. Maria a bien voulu nous mettre une bouilloire pour que je puisse me faire ma petite tasse de café avant de partir, ce qui est vraiment très appréciable. Tout est fait pour que l'hôte passe une nuit agréable avant de prendre l'avion.

Très bon rapport qualité prix. Grande maison moderne rénovée très bien entretenue, propreté irréprochable. Propriétaires avenants. Bouteille d'eau et petits gateaux de bienvenue! Et le matin de notre départ des fruits nous ont été proposés. On s'est rendu á l'aéroport à pied en quelques minutes. En métro la station Botica est à 2 min à pied du logement pour se rendre au centre historique ( 25 min). Salle de bain privative à l'étage, notre chambre en rez de chaussée était celle coté route, literie confortable, un effort a été fait pour atténuer le bruit de la rue liée aux voitures (double fenetre avec triple vitrage) mais pour les plus sensibles ils ont une deuxième chambre coté jardin.Nous avons remarqué qu'ils étaient équipés d'un lit bébé pour les couples avec jeune enfant. Nous recommandons sans hésiter.
Very nice apartment.

La camera è spaziosa al piano terra , il bagno con una grande doccia è al primo piano ma a completa disposizione! Sia per il check in che per il check out è possibile farlo a qualsiasi ora! Comodo per aeroporto

Excellent séjour chez Rosa et sa famille.
De l’accueil chaleureux au confort de la maison, nous avons été très contents de cette expérience.
Très proche de l’aéroport, pourtant aucun bruit d’avion. A côté du métro, c’est vraiment le lieu idéal pour séjourner à Porto. 
A recommander vivement
Très bien accueilli même si je suis arrivé très tard dans la nuit

This place is very near to the airport about 10-15 mins of walk and near Botíca metro station. But you literally don't hear any noise from planes or other traffic. The whole family is very welcoming and caring. We really enjoyed our short stay! Best wishes!
该房源十分清洁时尚,全家人都很友好｡有机会我还会去住的｡
Vraiment proche de l'aeroport, c'est très pratique, et la propreté de la maison un vrai plaisir.

I really enjoyed my short stay, Maria Rosa and her husband gave me a warm welcome. They are very friendly and always ready to help. The house is very spacious, tidy and super clean. From the terminal it takes literally 5-8 minutes to get to the house and even though its really close to the airport it is a very quiet neighborhood. For me it was perfect since I had to get to the airport every morning, so I could walk easily and without having any time pressure on me. 
Definitely reccomended.
Espaço muito bom e limpo , perto dá estação de metro.
葡萄牙旅行中住得最舒服的一次了｡房子很干净,主人很友好,很有礼貌｡房子离机场走路10-15分钟,不过还是需要地图导航一下｡ 我们对这次住宿很满意｡

Logement refait à neuf, très propre, bien situé  10 mn l'aéroport à pied,
Bien pour passer une nuit, Je n'ai pas eu le plaisir de rencontrer ROSA
Je suis arrivé avec mon épouse vers 16 heures et parti le lendemain 6 heures,
Très bien reçu par Monsieur Pereira

Só queremos agradecer à Maria e à sua família pela sua hospitalidade e amabilidade com que fomos tratados. Um agradecimento muito especial pelo (Website hidden by Airbnb) toda a certeza que iremos voltar.

Maria ist eine sehr nette und zuvorkommende Gastgeberin. Obwohl sie selbst kein Englisch spricht (und ich kein Portugisisch) war der Umgang mit ihr angemehn. Sie hat uns sogar ein kleines Fühstück gezaubert. Mit ihrem Mann und ihrer Tocher konnten wir alles absprechen.
Das Haus liegt 10 Gehminuten vom Flughafen und 3 Gehminuten von der Metro in die Stadt entfernt. Von den Flugzeugen bekommt man im Haus überhaupt nichts mit. Es ist still (außerdem sehr modern und komfortabel).
Conveniently situated within walking distance from Porto´s Airport. Rosa and all her familly are remarkably warm and welcoming.

Superbe maison récente à 10mn à pieds de l'aéroport et à 2mn de la station de métro suivante. La chambre est très confortable avec tv. Nous avions une salle de bain privative à l'étage parfaitement équipée. Nous avons été très bien accueilli, Maria a tout fait pour nous arranger en venant nous chercher en voiture et rentrant plus tôt que prévu.  Le petit dej' nous attendait même à 6h30. La chambre idéale avant de reprendre la route de la France !

The house is very modern and neat. Everything is very clean. The location is not very close to the city center (half hour by metro) but if you need to be close to the airport the location is very good. The owners are very friendly and helpfull. Communication went very well.
It was a clean room close to the airport and Maria and her family were very kind.

I stayed one night in Rosa´s house to fetch my early morning flight. The house seems new and very clean; from airport, it is about 10 mins walk with a suitcase; Rosa and husband are very kind and friendly, speak good English, and even arranged a morning ride for me to the airport with their nephew.

Nous avons passé une nuit dans le logement de Maria qui nous a très bien accueilli avec sa famille et l'en remercions. L'emplacement est idéal pour rejoindre l'aéroport. La chambre privée est très propre et conforme aux photos.
The place is perfect location and very clean!

Superbe maison à 12 minutes de l’aéroport de Porto, idéale pour une dernière nuit avant un départ tot le matin ! 
Très bon accueil, très propre. Je recommande particulièrement
Excelente! Recomendo a todos que desejam ter uma estadia sem problemas!

Très belle maison située à quelques minutes de l’aéroport de Porto.
La chambre au rez de chaussée est très propre et très bien équipée (super insonorisation !) avec belle salle de bain privative à l'étage.
C'est idéal pour une dernière nuit avant un départ très tôt le matin ! 
L'accueil a été très sympathique et attentionné.
Nous recommandons !
如果要赶早上的飞机,Rosa这里绝对是最佳的选择｡离机场坐地铁只需要一分钟｡步行十几分钟｡距离市中心地铁不超过30分钟｡一栋别墅,有自己单独的淋浴间厕所｡房子很新很干净,被罩床单也很舒服｡房东夫妻更是好的没话说｡特别的满意｡
Confortable, très jolie, propreté impeccable, petites attentions et hôtes très sympathiques : PARFAIT !
Hyvä sijainti lentokentän vieressä, hieno huone ja erittäin mukavat isännät!
A casa é linda, super limpa e aconchegante. Fica muito próximo ao aeroporto, pode-se ir andando. Fomos super bem recebidos. Recomendo totalmente.
Great place close to the airport. Nice and friendly people.

Espaço novo, limpo e confortável. 
A d. Rosa responde rápido e todos em casa são extremamente simpáticos e acolhedores. Fizemos o check in tarde sem qualquer tipo de problema. 
100% recomendado!
포르토에서 바르셀로나로 가기위해 1박을 했어요. 너무 지친상태로 숙소에 들어갔는데 친절하게 맞아줘서 좋았습니다. 근처에 마켓은 없고 음식점이 있는데 맛있어요. 숙소는 안락하고 깨끗해요. 참, 구글에 공항검색해서 찾아갈때 잘못하면 이상한길로 갈수도있으니 조심하셔야됩니다.

Gostamos muito.
Espectacular. Super limpo, camas óptimas, casa de banho excelente (tipo hotel). 
Vale a pena.

Famille tres gentille agreable serviable service parfait 
Qualiter confort irreprochable ....
Stationnement interieur securiser .....
Localisation ideal pour dernier nuit au portugal et meme pour sejour 

Irreprochable je reviendrai

Excelente! Muito Perto do aeroporto! Muito simpáticos! É uma boa opção se precisar de apanhar voos!
离机场很近 房东十分热情 得知我们要赶早班机 还送我们去机场 十分干净与舒适!
Thank you for the perfect stay. It was extraordinary comfortable. Highly recommandable!!
Vvery helpful family. I recommend with a clear conscience, everything as described.

Maria and her family were amazing! Contact with her was super fast. The apartment was perfectly clean and very beautiful. Restaurants and airport were close to the apartment. For sure we will come back there if we will visit Porto for next time! Thank you Maria! Fully recommended.
Otima casa, muito nova, limpa e bem localizada proximo ao aeroporto. Rosa e sua familia foram muito simpaticos!
Very nice place close to the airport. Bus to the city center 100 m from the house. Wonderful hosts. Fully recommended.

We stayed at Rosa's place because we had to catch an early flight and didn't want to take a taxi to the airport in the middle of the night. The house is within walking distance to the airport which made it very convenient, we could get a good night's sleep before a full day of travelling. Our hosts were incredibly nice and flexible, they were open and willing to provide us with everything necessary for a comfortable stay in their home. The room was very clean and nicely decorated. We'd definitely stay with them again and we fully recommend it!

Do not hesitate to book this place. The hosts were great! The house felt very homey and cozy. Everything was clean and gorgeous. Felt welcomed with open arms. We arrived late and they stayed up for us.
Nice host. Very clean place close to Porto airport!

Wir waren für leider ur für eine Nacht dort. Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen und unsere vom Regen durchnässten Sachen sofort getrocknet. Wir haben sogar extra Handtücher bekommen um unsere Haare zu trocknen. Alles in einem ein super Aufenthalt und gerne wieder!
Don't hesitate to stay here if you have an early departure or late arrival. It's right next to the airport and the accommodation is faultless

Maria und ihre Familie sind sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Die Wohnung ist besonders sauber, und gut ausgerüstet. Modern und ganz ruhig, obwohl die 10 Gehminuten von Flughafen liegt. Nächstes mal würde ich wieder bei ihr übernachten...
Top! Accueil chaleureux

Easy 15 min walk from/to airport, close to tram stop. Had a very late incoming flight and it was not a problem for Rosa and her husband to meet me as they knew I was going in late. Lovely clean modern house, great bed, great shower. Would stay 100% again.

Thank you Rosa for your hospitality, we felt very welcomed at your home. We had all things we need, unfortunately we only stayed one night, so not a lot time to get to know the city better. We can totally recommend Rosa's place.
Good location, excellent services and beautiful atmosphere. We would love to come back
Chambre très propre et calme. Idéalement placée à proximité de l’aéroport.
Merci à Maria. Chambre au rez-de-chaussée agréable. Salle de bains à l’étage. Sols froids. Couverture du lit en synthétique, à éviter lors de nuits froides, comme en mars.

We thank Rosa for her friendlyness and kindness, we had a good time in Porto. She welcomed us warmly and was always helpful. She answered quickly to our questions, and it was no problem to check in and out to early hours. The room and bath were nice and clean. We can totally recommend her home. Best Regards from Germany!
Very hospitable and nice family! Great!

We had such a nice stay at Maria’s. The place is in walking distance to the airport and everything was clean and really nice. Maria and her husband wer also super helpful and we would come back anytime.

Maria Rosa and the family were very welcoming and we really enjoyed our stay. The room was clean and comfortable and my husband loved the homemade chocolate cake!
The house is very close to the airport and once we had got the hang of the one way streets, very easy to find!
We will definitely stay again - thank you!

Liegt etwas versteckt, aber selbst kurz vor 12 Uhr nachts wurde uns sehr herzlich das Tor und die Tür geöffnet. Die Bettwäsche war weicher als zuhause und das Bad fast schon luxuriös. Wir waren begeistert

Another great stay, Marie Rosa and the family made our stay very enjoyable, especially as my husband was feeling unwell.
We will definitely come again!
Dobrá dostupnost, nedaleko letiště

Marias Appartement is 10 mins by foot from the airport, yet you can’t hear the planes. We flew into Porto really late, and Maria and her husband let us into the house at 2 am. We can absolutely recommend staying here before or after a flight. Maria and her husbands are wonderful people and very friendly hosts
Ci siamo trovati molto bene in questa suite. È molto comoda per raggiungere l'aeroporto, da cui dista solo 10 minuti a piedi. Davvero molto gentili i proprietari. Fortemente consigliata

Great location, very close to the airport departure area. Maria Rosa and her husband welcomed us late in the evening, made us some tea and provided all the necessary info. Unfortunately we left very early in the morning and couldn’t enjoy breakfast. Recommended!
房子距离机场很近,房东叔叔阿姨特别和蔼,房子很舒服也很安静,还有一只羞涩可爱的猫,跟她玩了好一会儿｡如果为了搭乘飞机方便的话,强烈推荐这套房子!

Amazing clean stylish place we used for our trip before we left from Portugal. Very close to airport was the main reason we booked this place and it was worth it. Very modern place with everything you need :) warm welcoming from hosts. Highly reccommended
Super clean, comfy. Arround 7 minutes walking from the airport. I do recomend!

Nous avons été très bien accueillit, la chambre était très propre. Maria et son mari sont arrangeant et disponible.
n’hésitez pas.

Maria e il marito sono due persone dolcissime e super disponibili, la casa è molto bella e pulitissima. Si trova a 12 minuti dall’aeroporto di Porto, molto comodo per arrivi o partenze! Mi è dispiaciuto rimanere per così poche ore.
Consigliatissima!!

Une maison à 5 min à pied de l'aéroport. Maison très jolie, et entretenu, c'est très propre. Merci pour les attentions dans la chambre et salle de bain. Nous avons bien dormi. Merci de nous avoir accueilli dans votre belle maison. Obrigada

We stay only night at Maria Rosa ‘s house..We had a flight the next morning , the airport is at proximity .We were welcomed by her husband Jose, very polite and accommodant. He scheduled our transport  at the airport with his gender at 4 AM .We appreciate a lot . It was a perfect stay, very beautiful house and people.
Thank you.
Une famille pleine d attention et de gentillesse envers leurs hôtes

Accueil très chaleureux de nos hôtes dans une  villa tout confort. Une très bonne adresse à ne pas manquer !
A moins de 15 minutes à pied de l'aéroport dans un quartier calme et résidentiel. Station de métro à 5 minutes. A seulement 20 minutes du centre ville.
Prima kamer op loopafstand van het vliegveld. Alles netjes en goed geregeld, en maria rosa en haar man zijn erg vriendelijk en gastvrij

We had a flight very early in the morning and Maria's house was at 10 minutes walk from the airport. If we had to go there from Porto we were forced to take a taxi because the metro opens too late for us. Staying at Maria's place, anything was easy and we hadn't awake too early. That said, the room was clean, comfortable, nice. Also, Maria and her husband are very nice and offer great hospitality.
Beautiful big house with garden near to the airport (10 minutes walk...). We stayed only for two nights, but everething was great. Maria Rosa and her husband are really kind hosts.

Потрясающие и очень гостеприимные хозяева! Ответили мне меньше, чем за час, и подтвердили бронирование на этот же день, за что им огромное спасибо :)
Комната уютная, есть телевизор, на кровати отдыхается не хуже, чем в отеле. Безумно порадовало наличие собственного душа, при том очень комфортного. До аэропорта идти минут 5-10, так что можно поспать подольше и с удобствами
Anfitriones amabilísimos, ubicado a 10 min andando del aeropuerto y casa muy cómoda y limpia. Gebial, para repetir

Stylish house, wonderful hosts, spotless accommodation, great location for airport and metro and unbelievable value.
What’s not to like!!

Sehr freundlicher Empfang. Tolle Versorgung mit dem Nötigen nach der Ankunft. Jeder Wunsch wurde umgehend erfüllt. Alle Kommunikation wurde rasch und zufriedenstellend beantwortet. Wir waren zufrieden mit der Unterkunft und der perfekten Lage für unseren Abflug nach Hause.
Ras

Nous avons été tr très bien accueilli. Logement d'une propreté irréprochable et très bien situé, à quelques minutes à pied de l'aéroport. Tout a été fait pour que nous nous sentions à notre aise. Hôtes très sympathiques et accueillants.

Chambre idéalement située à 10 minutes de l’aéroport. 
Le gendre de Maria nous a accueillis chaleureusement dans un français impeccable, même tard dans la soirée.
Maison très propre et touche d’attention pour le petit déjeuner.

Heel fijn om zo dicht bij het vliegveld te zitten als je  vroeg moet vertrekken Maria en Jose zijn heel prettige mensen, hartelijk en zorgzaam. Het was precies wat we nodig hadden . Onze (prive) badkamer was op de eerste verdieping, terwijl onze slaapkamer beneden was, maar dat was voor ons geen probleem en het was allemaal heel luxieus.
Super Gastfreundschaft, sehr gute Lage beim Flughafen.immer wieder sehr empfehlenswert
Très bonne adresse bien située aussi bien pour l aéroport que pour visiter centre ville avec le métro.les proporietaires sont très accueillants et au petit soin.
Modern and nice house in walking distance to the airport. Perfect for an early flight. Very warm hearted and lovely hosts.

Logement idealement situé pour se rendre a laeroport de Porto et tres calme malgré la proximité avec les passages des avions. Nos hôtes étaient réactifs et prévenants et se sont adaptés a notre heure d'arrivée. La chambre est moderne et spacieuse ainsi que la sdb et propre. Super!
Excelente acomodação e hospitalidade nota mil!!! Obrigada pela hospedagem

This is an awesome place to stay at if you're planning to stay near Porto airport. Rosa and João were such a friendly and thoughtful couple, we felt so welcome! We would definitely recommend them! 
El alojamiento es ideal si planeas quedarte cerca del aeropuerto de Oporto. Rosa y João son una pareja encantadora y super considerada, nos sentimos como en casa! Recomendamos este alojamiento sin duda! Obrigada pela sua hospitalidade João e Rosa! Foi um prazer! :)
Maria Rosa and her husband were very welcoming on there beautiful house. The house is very well located, 10 min walk from the airport. Totally recommended.
Very nice, the place was very clean and close to the airport !
A recommander tout proche de l'aéroport pas besoin de voiture

Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen und waren mit allem sehr zufrieden. Es war alles sehr sauber und die Kommunikation war super! Da wir sehr früh morgens zum Flughafen mussten, war das die perfekte Unterkunft für uns. Immer wieder gern!

Die Gastgeber haben mich sehr freundlich empfangen und gaben mir ein paar Tipps, was ich mit meiner Zeit am Abend anfangen könnte. Ich war unten im Zweibettzimmer untergebracht und hatte alles was ich für die eine Nacht brauchte.

Der Fußweg zum Flughafen ist sehr kurz. Die Anbindung zur Metro ebenfalls.

Rosa and her husband are so kind and lovely people! We arrived at midnight because of our flight and we were warmly received. Their house is very tidy, rhe room big enough and on top, we‘ve got our own bathroom. 
We will be back!
Super clean, friendly host, quiet, and right next to the airport and transit. You can walk to the airport terminal yet there’s very little plane noise. Highly recommended!
Nice place, very close to the airport and kind invitation.
The best Portuguese hospitality. Very generous and warm hosts. Perfectly tidy!

optimale Lage für den, der Nähe zum Flughafen braucht (z.B. wegen frühem Abflug) , zu Fuß 10 Minuten, kein Fluglärm zu hören, 
sehr nette Gastgeber

Tout est parfait chez Maria Rosa chambre coquette ,superbe salle de bain ,Maria Rosa trés accueillante ainsi que sa famille et le top métro et aéroport à proximité allez y sans hésitation que du bonheur
Nierby airport, very accomodating and nice hosts

Superbe chambre dans une très jolie maison, hôtes adorables, très proche de l’aéroport à pied. Expérience 100% positive !
Je recommande sans hésitation !
Merci encore

La perfection ! 
Nous n'y avons passé qu'une nuit pour prendre l'avion à 5h du matin, mais avons été très agréablement surpris par l'accueil de nos hôtes . Si vous cherchez les personnes les plus accueillantes et sincèrement amicales de la terre, c'est là !!
Ayant rendu notre voiture à l'aeroport le matin, nous avons été autorisés à déposer nos bagages avant d'aller vagabonder en ville même si notre chambre n'était pas encore disponible. Nous avions pris la chambre triple au RdC, avec salle de bain ( superbe) privée, mais à l'étage :  Parfaite pour une nuit, mais pour un séjour + long, préférer 2 chambres, ou une + grande. La literie était très bonne qualité. Et en bonus, nous avions même des petites bouteilles d'eau et des snacks !
La station de  métro pour aller en ville est à 5 mn à pied (durée 40 mn) et l'aeroport à 15 mn chrono.  Vous pouvez aussi leur demander un transport en voiture ( payant) si vous êtes lourdement chargés.
Bref, on ne peut pas trouver mieux . Une vraie adresse coup de coeur !
Encore merci Mr et Mme Pereira pour votre accueil si généreux !
We had a very comfortable stay at Rosa's and made to feel very welcome . Rosa has a lovely home .  Will definately be back next time we are in Porto
Excellent place, we especially appreciated the proximity to the airport. The place was super clean, modern and we had a private bathroom. Both host were very friendly and spoke english.
Very comfortable and clean place to stay, convenient transport, shops around are basic.

Excellent host, very helpful, for an airport transfer night or two, it is perfect. Though, also the connection by metro is ok -5 min walk to the station.
No worries - pick that place !

Nous recommandons vivement ce airbnb ! Il est situé à deux pas de l'aéroport, c'est un gros point positif. Les hôtes sont très accueillants et gentils, et arrangeants au niveau des horaires d'arrivée ou de départ des avions. Nous avons séjourné une nuit dans la "suite" et une nuit dans la chambre "standard". Dans les deux cas nous n'avons rien à redire, tout était nickel, hyper propre, confortable, moderne,... Que du positif !
Nice people, good place to stay close to the AirPort.

Rosa and her husband were very nice and kind. The room is clean and spacious. Very close to the metro station and walkable to the airport which was very convenient. 

Rosa and her husband also went out of their way to help us store our bags after we had checked out which was definite above and beyond. Would definitely recommend!!
Nous avons passé un court séjour d'une nuit chez Maria Rosa et son mari, la chambre était impeccable, et la maison très fonctionnelle. Merci pour l'accueil de dernière minute !

O lugar perfeito se você precisa de um lugar para ficar ao lado do aeroporto. Apenas dez minutos caminhando.
The perfect place if you need somewhere to stay next to the airport. Only ten minutes walking.

First class place. Immaculate and stylish.
Very welcoming hosts. Highly recommended

L'accueil chez Maria Rosa est parfait. Elle était très gentille à répondu à toutes nos interrogations et besoins. Le logement est très propre et le lit est super comfortable. La Salle de bain est super, surtout la douche ! Le logement est à 15 minutes à pied de l'aéroport c'est qui est très pratique.
They are so kind and took very good care of my daughter and the apartment is very clean and comfy, would definitely book again
Great hosts in a great location. I would recommend it 100%

Maria Rosa's house is absolutely beautiful! Very close to the airport. The room and the toilet we used were very clean and comfortable.
We only met her husband who was really nice to us. 
Best place if you need to take an early flight!

Our stay at Maria Rosa's house was great. She and her family were very nice and kind :)
Very good communication, super clean and tidy house. I definitely recommend future guests to stay at her house.

This place is exactly as it is described, and the hosts are better than expected (they kindly even ordered us a cab to find dinner when the local restaurants were closed ;0). It's right next to the airport, and has all the amenities you could hope to have, though MUCH better than a hotel!
Świetne miejsce na pobyt blisko lotniska. Cudowni gospodarze - nad wyraz mili, pomocni, godzina zameldowania nie ma znaczenia, pokój super czysty. Bardzo polecam!

A very clean bedroom in a nice family house. This was more like staying at a hotel than an airbnb!

The house is very close to the airport so very easy to get flights (the reason we stayed here, an early flight).

The only downside is that there is no hanging out space apart from your bedroom or the garden (luckily the weather was nice so we hung out in the garden).
very clean, good welcoming, so perfect. So closed to the airport, very easy to find the house. I recommended !

Quite new , modern house. Very clean and nice. We had room with very good standard downstairs with bathroom upstairs but for our private use only. Close to the airport - about 10 minutes walk, 3-4 minutes to metro station, about 30 minutes to the center of Porto by metro. Host was very helpful. Thank you for all.
Immaculately clean bedroom and bathroom. Rosa and her husband were very welcoming, friendly and helpful hosts. Really convenient location for walking to our early flight.

Accueil très chaleureux de la famille de Maria ( accueil en français et en anglais ).
Idéalement placé pour rejoindre l'aéroport à pieds ( 15 min ) , de plus le quartier est très calme.
La chambre et la salle de bain se trouvent dans la maison de Maria ne posant aucun problème tant nos hôtes ont été discrets.
Propretés irréprochable des lieux .
Literie d'un grand confort .
Nous sommes partis très tôt ce qui n'as posé aucun problème .
Je recommande fortement cette adresse avant de quitter porto .

Great place, great friendly people, very clean and stylish.
Pleasure to deal with
Nice clean plce at walking distance from airport and metro station. Ask the host for tips on where to eat in town. Excellent suggestions
Je recommande
A perfect place to stay in Porto next to the airport and more. A lovely family welcome you in a very nice and comfort home. A cocoon ! We stayed twice, and i hope to come back and see them again.
Best hosts of our trip. Very friendly even tho we came much later than planned. Excellent placement close to the airport. Would stay with them again.
Everything corresponds to the description and photos. Hospitable owner, pleasant communication.
Espaço limpo, cuidado e super perto do aeroporto. Anfitriões flexíveis e muito simpáticos. Recomendo!
We arrived at midnight while Rosa and her husband were received us in lovely reception. We felt welcome and had a comfortable stay

Very nice place near the airport. We were arriving very late and we were welcomed even after 24 o'clock. Everything was clean and welcoming. Bathroom was at second floor and the room at the first, but the great thing was that it was only for us. Owners suggested super nice place near the house to eat the breakfast.
Très belle maison ! Très facile d’accès je recommande fortement

La habitación es muy cómoda y amplia con aire acondicionado y televisor.  Los anfitriones fueron muy amables y me recomendaron algunos lugares cercanos para cenar.
Esta muy cerca del aeropuerto caminando alrededor de 10 o 15 minutos.
Stayed for one night because we had an early flight the next morning. Rosa and her husband were very warm and welcoming and our short stay in their house was really pleasant.
very nine room. very close to the airport.

La chambre est très agréable, ainsi que la salle d'eau mise à disposition des voyageurs.
Les hôtes sont à l'écoute, disponible et tellement (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande fortement MARIA ROSA
Host gentilissimo e location veramente vicina all'aeroporto. Assolutamente consigliato!
Everything is perfect.
tutto perfetto

Perfekt geeignet als Unterkunft vor oder nach einem Flug ab/bis Porto.
Schöne und saubere Unterkunft.

Beautiful modern house, great location, evethough it is so close to the airport, it was very quite place. Connection to city centre is perfect. We enjoyed it. And Maria Rosa and her husband are very very nice couple.

Maria Rosa and her husband are very hospitable, friendly and helpful.  Their house is in a good location, near the airport. There is also a good connection to the city center. Our short stay here was very pleasant. Jitka and family
We stayed at Maria and Jose's place for 2 nights: they were super nice and the place was nice and clean. Would definitely stay with them again!

Familie Pereira hat uns sehr herzlich aufgenommen und sich um unser Wohlergehen sehr bemüht.Darüber haben sie uns hilfreiche Tipps für den Aufenthalt in Porto gegeben. Es war eine saubere, moderne und schicke Unterkunft, ich habe in Hotels teilweise schlechter  geschlafen. Die Unterkunft liegt in  der Nähe von 2 Restaurants, einer Bäckerei, einer Metrostation und dem Flughafen. Wir waren rundum zufrieden und werden, wenn wir wieder eine Unterkunft benötigen in Porto gerne wieder zu Familie Pereira gehen. Prädikat: Sehr empfehlenswert.
Super logement aux abords de l’aéroport. Maria et son mari m’ont très bien accueilli et m’ont fourni toutes les informations nécessaires pour me rendre facilement à l’aéroport.

Great place and outstanding hospitality! We stay just for one night, needed place near the airport, it’s just 15 min walk - very convenient. We were able to check in after midnight ( because of the arrival time ) - and had no problem with that at all. Highly recommend!
Un lugar precioso, cómodo, y muy cerca del aeropuerto. Perfecto para coger un vuelo muy temprano.
uncomplicated even if you arrive (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable and clean, friendly host!
Personne tres accueillante et disponible par message. La proximité avec l'aéroport est un vrai plus sautant que la maison est très bien insonnorisée et permet un bon confort du sommeil.
Great Time, thank you!
The accomodation was great and hosts were nice and helpful. I recommend this place especially when you are looking for an accomodation near the airport.
Estadia muito confortável e agradável. A localização, a limpeza e a hospitalidade foram maravilhosos! Voltaremos com certeza!
Très bien placé par rapport à l'aéroport et accueillant.
Lovely and clean, superb location for a very early flight the next morning. Comfortable beds!
Thanks for the awesome hosting! 2 minutes from the airport, for people who need it. highly recommended to stay there

Never has such lovely hosts before! The apartment is perfect if you need to go to the airport early in the morning, it’s just a 15min walk. We had our own bathroom upstairs & everything was super clean. Highly recommended!
Tutto molto curato e estremamente pulito. Non avevo capito, o non era chiaro, che il bagno fosse su un piano diverso rispetto alla camera.

If you need a place that is conveniently located near the airport in Porto this is the place for you. Maria and Jose are the best. They are very accommodating and helpful and our stay was very comfortable. The accommodations are very clean and you have access to your own private bathroom. If you want to leave your car and explore Porto they are located near a metro station. We could not recommend this accommodation more.
Une adresse à garder dans ses favoris. Les hôtes très accueillants et une propreté exemplaires. vivement une troisième fois. :-)

It was an extraordinary experience to stay at Joze and Marias lovely place. Best of all was a warm welcome, opportunity to leave kids under safe supervision while I was picking up a car and on top of that great local tips. I also appreciate honest talks and true example of faith. Cheers!
Perfect!

Maria and her husband were extremely accommodating! Their house was sparkly clean and felt so comfortable to get a good nights rest before our early flight. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a close stay to the airport. They accomplished a hotel feel in their home that made us feel very relaxed.

Very kind host, comfortable room, 10 minutes walk to the airport. Everything was perfect.
Fully recommend.

Es war ein sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt, besonders praktisch wenn man früh/ spät am Flughafen ankommt/ losfliegt und man hört auch keinen Fluglärm. Jeder Zeit wieder. Danke für die nette Gastfreundschaft.
Very convenient location as very close to airport but still quiet for a good night's sleep. Hosts were very friendly and helpful. Would recommend.

Great location, comfort, sparkling clean and the best hospitality.
Highly recommended.

Hôte très accueillant et logement très bien situé près de l'aéroport.
Nous reviendrons

The room is in a nice house really close to the airport. It is reachable on foot in 10 minutes. The bathroom is outside the room but it is big and private. The hosts are really nice and available. We did a really late check-in and they were waiting for us. I totally recommend this accommodation !
very modern and super close to the airport

Our stay was comfortable, clean and our hosts were very accommodating - even creating a nice space outside so we could eat dinner. We had a flight early the next morning and were super close to the airport!

My daughter (3 years old and very tired out after a long trip) and I (equally tired!) arrived very late and yet Jose went above and beyond what I'd expect to make sure we were comfortable and settled in. We both slept soundly and had a lovely relaxed morning before continuing our journey to visit family in Oliveria do Hospital. We travel to Portugal a few times a year and having found this lovely accommodation we will try to always book in. I will understand if it's not available, though, as it such a wonderful place. Really recommend this superb B&B!
Lovely, accomodating host. Clean and neat stay . walking distance to Airport.  Good eatery places nearby.

We have really enjoyed our stay at Rosa and Jose’s place. Their house is conveniently located very close to the airport (12 min walk), just what we needed. The room and the bathroom were sparkling clean with all the amenities you might need. The host was extremely helpful and hospitable.
Excellent stay! Actually the best I ever had with Airbnb. My plane was very delayed but there have been no problems with check in. Thank you!
What amazing hosts. So kind and friendly. It made for an easy stay. Also perfect location for the airport.

Merci pour votre accueil exceptionnel.
Maryse et Claude
Great location! Clean room! I highly recommend !
Proximidade ao aeroporto. Muito boa hospitalidade. Recomendo!

Un couple des plus chaleureux, dévoué & sympathique. 
Un hébergement d'exception juste à côté de l'aéroport, et pourtant si calme, reposant et silencieux.
Je le recommande sans soucis
Ótima hospedagem, foram super atenciosos e solícitos conosco. O espaço é exatamente como descrito e muito mais, recomendo muito!

Share  the house with the family that they live upstair so can not use  the kitchen and no breakfast but should be ok.  As everyone will rush to airport and have breakfast there  . Maybe the owner should give more details for walking route to airport. And even draw it on paper that is useful.
Rosa oferece um espaço muito bom, limpo e organizado. A casa está muito próxima do aeroporto, que se alcança com uma caminhada de 15 minutos.
5 estrelas em tudo, recomendo vivamente!
Bien limpio y localizado, super practico desde el aeropuerto. Las camas son confortables

La maison de  notre hôte  Rosa est parfaitement située par rapport à l'aéroport Agréables et discrets, Rosa et son mari, ont su  rendre notre halte confortable et parfaite.
Merci à vous deux.
Host was very accomodating and welcoming. Location is truly near to the airport. Greatly recommend
acceuillant et convivial

Accueil charmant, chambre avec salle de bain parfaite, lit et linge de qualité ...  petites notes d'attention très appréciables !
Accès aéroport et/ou métro 10 minutes à pied très pratique !
Nous reviendrons et nous recommandons !
Nathalie & Franck
Très très pratique quand on doit prendre un avion a 5:00 du matin
O quarto é muito bom, aconchegante e limpo. Banho excelente. Rosa e seu marido muito atenciosos.
Muito obrigada por tudo. Rosa e a sua família são exatamente simpáticos! Temos uma noite perfeita. Recomendo!
Excellenter Service, very friendly and anxious.

Jose & Rosa are very welcoming hosts.
They were truly attentive to make my stay the most pleasant.
The house is as shown on the photos. Modern and cosy :-)
It's within 15 min walk from airport making it an ideal location to catch an earlier flight.
The place is really comfortable. I could easily consider stayer long and rent a car to visit the North of Portugal from there in future.
The owner is very very helpful!Their house is good and so easy to get to the airport!
Nice place, had a good stay.
Das Zimmer mit privatem Bad hat alles was mann für eine Übernachtung vor einem frühen Flug braucht. (Bequemes Bett!)

This is the second time I stay this amazing location.
The accommodation is as shown on the photos flawless & the hospitality of Jose & Rosa is impeccable. They were so kind and very attentive to make my stay a perfect one.
So happy I found such a nice place and hosts nearby OPO airport (15 min by walk).
Highly Recommended!!
É uma boa experiência!

The couple are nice and helpful. It's kind of them to wait for our check-in at mid-night and wait for us to get our forgotten clothes in another night. And they gave us many useful information on tourism. The house is clean and tidy, with awesome location(13min walk to airport, 5min walk to metro station and many good restaurant around) .Highly Recommend!
Close to airport, caring host

We stayed our last night in Porto there because of the proximity with the airport. That said, the house could not be better located, you can easily walk to the airport if you want / need.
The bedroom was sparkling clean, well heated, with comfortable beds and a nice shower. Everything we needed to have a good night of sleep ahead of a long trip back home.
The hosts are also extremely friendly and helpful, we loved them.

Thank you for the wonderful stay. Rosa and José are very warm and attentive hosts. We felt very comfortable. Hosts, equipment and location of the apartment to the airport are perfect and just as described! The accommodation is highly recommended !!!
Perfect, clean place & lovely people!!! 100%

name: Sunny apartment + 2 bikes
summary: Very bright and sunny apartment in the noble district of Boavista , near the embematic " Casa da Música" and about 4 km from the Atlantic ocean.
description: Very bright and sunny apartment in the noble district of Boavista , near the embematic " Casa da Música" and about 4 km from the Atlantic ocean.
house_rules: - take off your shoes - silence after 20h

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Mucho mejor que en las fotos. Todo nuevo. Terraza. Todas las comodidades de la cocina. Sofá-cama a parte de la cama de matrimonio en otra habitación.

Muy recomendable!
O apartamento era muito bom, recomendo !

Mooi en goed ingericht appartement. Ligt wel aan een zeer drukke straat.
Overdag het verkeer duidelijk hoorbaar, 's nachts geen last van. Wij hebben veel gebruik gemaakt van de fietsen.
Francelina is an excellent host and the appartment is great. Thanks for usefull tips and a cab. Bikes enabled us to fully enjoy the city in just a couple of days. We've had a wonderfull stay.

Francelinas place is just as described, very comfortable and located near all the important public transfer options. Casa de Musica metro station is right around the corner and the bus stops to the seafront are also close by.
The option to have bikes to use is also great, although we didn't find time to try them.
The kitchen is well stocked and there is a Lidl about 5 minutes walking distance from the place to get whatever you'd need.
We didn't get a chance to meet Francelina herself, but her friend who handled the check-in was very friendly and helpful.
Francelina foi muito atenciosa. O apartamento é muito bom, melhor que mostram as fotos. A localização é ótima, fácil acesso a qualquer parte. As bicicletas a disposição foram ótimas também.
A nuestra llegada recogimos las llaves en un bar a unos 200m del apartamento, el garage era amplio y de fácil acceso.

I picked the place basically because the location suited my stay. It was easy to find, and had a parking-garage( I came by car ). 
The metro is also 5-10 min away, and the bus stops right outside. The area is safe to walk in at any time of the day/night.  
You have several small restaurants close by, and also a shopping-center, two convenient-stores and a McDonald’s. 
The place was nice and clean. 
Francelina is very pleasant and friendly, though I did not require her help for anything after the first day. 
I would definately stay here again

Die Wohnung bot alle Merkmale, die ich zuvor bei der Suche angegeben habe. Sehr angenehm war der Tiefgaragenstellplatz mit freundlichem Mitarbeiter, der in der Garage sein Office hat. Ich war angenehm überrascht, als ich die Wohnung betrat. Sie ist groß und hat eine neuwertige Einrichtung, in der ich mich direkt wohl gefühlt habe. Ich würde die Wohnung sehr gerne uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen. Aber in der ersten Nacht wusste ich, dass die Fenster den Straßenlärm von außen nicht wirklich abhalten. Des Weiteren waren die Nachbarn, die oberhalb in der abgetrennten Maisonette-Etage wohnen im Wohnzimmer sehr deutlich hörbar. Wem diese Negativpunkte nicht stören und sich mit Ohrenstöpsel behelfen kann, genießt eine großzügige Wohnung mit moderner Ausstattung.
El apartamento es mejor que en las fotos! Muy acogedor, limpio, tranquilo y con todos los servicios. Francelina nos atendió de maravilla y las bicis genial!!

The apartment match 100% with the description. Nice, clean, top amenities. Very good location. It's a very functionnal apartment + car park. Francelina is really kind and helpful.  All was easy with her. Very good experience and I recommand warmly this apartment.

This was my second stay in this apartement. I come by car, so it is easy access to everything. It also has a garage underneath. 
Francelina is very nice, and the apartement is nice and clean. I will probably come back again

Wonderful stay! 
Easy communication with Francelina, the apartment just as described.
Special mention goes for the bikes, which allowed us to enjoy fully this beautiful city.

Francelina was very nice! It was very rainy at the day of our arrival, so she wanted to come pick us up. She showed us where to go with the bikes and gave us hints for our trip. The appartement was as expected. We really enjoyed our stay.
El alojamiento es tal y como se ve en las fotos. El parking está al lado de la entrada al piso y está muy bien. La cama es muy cómoda. Repetiriamos sin dudas.
We had a lovely weekend in Porto and at Francelina's place. The metro station to the centrum is closeby and we also made use of the bicycles for a short visit to the beach :)
This was my third stay in the same apartement

Rien à redire quand à l'appartement en lui-même et à l'accueil de Francelina, cependant il faut penser aux bouche oreilles car l'Avenue Boavista est très fréquentée et bruyante à cause d'une circulation intense même la nuit.

Super appartement bien agencé et bien équipé. Le petit balcon est très appréciable. A 10mn à peine a pied de l'arrêt de métro casa musica. L'immeuble est situé dans une jolie résidence. La rue est très passante (simple vitrage seul bémol pour le bruit le soir). Francelina à été très réactive et sympathique. Je recommande!

Totalmente recomendable, cuando llegamos nos estaba esperando,  estuvo muy atenta todo el tiempo, nos explicó para recorrer la ciudad en bici de la mejor manera y nos dijo donde podríamos comer, estuvimos muy cómodas en su casa.

L'appartement est spacieux et bien équipé. Un peu bruyant car situé sur une grande artère, mais à 10 minutes de marche de la station de metro Casa da Musica et pour nous qui avions une voiture, un parking en sous-sol bien pratique.
Nous aurions aimé rencontrer Francelina qui n'a pu se déplacer car coincée au boulot. Cela nous aurait facilité la vie sur plusieurs points comme la vie du quartier et l'utilisation des appareils ménagers. Mais nous avons pu communiquer aisément avec Francelina qui était toujours disponible au téléphone.
Je recommande cet appartement qui est d'un excellent rapport qualité/prix

appartement très bien, correspondant complètement à la description faite, accès rapide au centre ville, un peu bruyant à cause de l'avenue principale, mais séjour très agréable. Encore merci à Francelina
Clean and in a good location.
très joli lieu pour passer quelques jours à Porto, les vélos super sympa pour visiter la ville.. Merci. je recommande ce lieu
Sweet, clean, well located apartment. Very safe and central. A great place to stay!

Gostámos muito da estadia. A casa é muito agradável. Apesar de se ouvir algum barulho da rua, é ótima para descansar. Como tem acesso a garagem e transportes públicos muito perto, não é necessário usar o carro para conhecer a cidade. A cozinha está bem equipada para preparar refeições. A Franceline foi muito prestável na estadia.

pro: Nice place, very friendly host, spacious appartment with everything you need. Bicycles are very convenient. Having some cooking basics (olive oil, coffee, dishwashing liquid) makes the stay much more convenient, thanks for that!
con: Avenue can be noisy with traffic, which you hear in the bedroom.
overall impression: good value for money!
Our stay in Francelina’s appartment went very well. The appartment is spacious and well furnished! I highly recommend.

Un superbe appartement, avec des photos qui ne sont pas forcément représentative de la réalité ! (Et ce dans le bon sens du terme) Grande superficie, bon équipement, très agréable ! Un logement que je ne peux que conseiller ! L’accueil de Franceline a été très apprécié (malgré plus d’une heure de retard que ce qui était prévu de notre côté ) !!! Son Français est un réel plus pour l’accueil des francophones. La situation de l’appartement est très appréciable ! Proximité de la plage (vélos à disposition pour y aller) et pour le centre ville, un arrêt de bus très proche permettant d éviter la circulation d’une grande ville. 

En résumé un bel appartement, dont la situation nous a parfaitement convenus . La place de parking est également très appréciable lorsque vous êtes véhiculés ou avec une location.

Je recommande totalement ce grand logement. !
Perfect spot to explore porto and the duoro valley. Nice big friendly space. would definitely recommend.

The apartment is equipped with everything you need.  We loved lounging on the couch and making breakfast in the morning. The bed was very comfy and the apartment is super clean.  We loved the free bikes for exploring but the location is perfect for local exploration and great cafes and restaurants.  Highly recommend staying at Francelina's.

La ubicacion es muy buena para desplazarse or Oporto. El metro esta muy cerca.
La zona es tranquila y el apartamento esta muy bien.
El único pero, es que el trafico se oye mucho en el dormitorio, tanto, que a veces, impide dormir

Francelina est très gentille aux petits soins elle nous communique de bonnes adresses en plus le logement à deux vélos et nous propose même par l'intermédiaire d'une autre personne de nous louer une voiture pour pas cher par rapport aux sociétés de location
It was much better than I expected! Francelina was charming every si gle minute, although she had to wait us till 1am. Thank u again!
We had a great stay in Francelina's apartment. The place is spacious and very practical with bikes and parking lot.
appartement très bien plasse , juste un petit problème de bruit

Francelina went above and beyond an AirBnb host with her help and promptness to responding. My husband had hurt his back before arriving, and upon asking Francelina with help for a recommendation for a chiropractor, she even called for us to make the appointment!
She was sooo helpful with everything and we Really enjoyed our stay. 
A large Lidl round the corner, with restaurants and public transport easy to access.
Highly recommend!

Siamo stati ospiti di Francelina in questo edificio su Boavista. Molto vicino alla Casa della Musica, e circa a 30 minuti a piedi dal ponte Louis 1. Un appartamento davvero confortevole. Luminoso e pulito. Completo di tutti i servizi. Francelina é un host meravigliosa e molto disponibile. A disposizione ci sono anche 2 biciclette, molto comode per spostarsi e godersi la città.

Very nice and tidy apartment, equipped with every comfort. 
The metro and bus stops are nearby. Excellent base for visiting Porto.
Un bonito piso, limpio y bien comunicado. Bueno para venir con el coche.

Very clean Apartment in the heart of Porto! 
We had a wonderful stay, the apartment was super clean and came with a lot of little helpful things like salt and pepper etc.
Franceline gave us nice tips and also answered to our questions that we had during our stay. The bikes were a great feature to discover the surrounding area and also to go to the beach. Also the Metro and bus Station are very close and it’s a quick Ride to the historic center of Porto. 

We would love coming back there, Muito obrigado Franceline!

Appartement très bien, un peu bruyant à cause de l'avenue principale, accès au centre ville très facile ,très bien situé avec un très bon restaurant  à proximité ( rosa de porto) à deux pas , séjour très agréable. Merci à Francelina
mooi, netjes verzorgd, goed geregeld

Excellent séjour dans ce bel appartement, très confortable! Accès au centre et a l'aéroport très facile.
La mise à disposition de vélos est un réel plus pour la découverte de la ville et du  bord de l'océan.
Lovely comfortable clean apartment with all cooking and dining facilities. comfortable bed. cosy living space with good TV. Great for a couple. Host very helpful and accommodating.

Appartamento molto bene attrezzato, ampi spazi, internet veloce, pulizia perfetta con posizione molto comoda per gli spostamenti in una zona dotata di tutti i servizi. Host molto simpatica e cordiale. Consigliamo vivamente questo alloggio.
My 4th time in the same apartement Francelina is very friendly and replies quickly to anything

A nice and spacious place within 40 Minute walk to old town. Francelina was super helpful with a later check-in and we had booked on the day of our arrival as our previous host cancelled the night before our stay. Cool area with cafes and food market nearby and metro to the airport only 5 min walk. Highly recommended!!
Great value. Quick response and the bikes are best way to see the city!
Nice apartment well connected to the city centre

name: Greenwich Village Townhome with Private Garden!
summary: This palace is just off the gold coast in Greenwich Village. Private garden apartment is stunning in every way. Brand new! Live among celebrities in this elegant townhouse on a tree lined street. Top of the line renovation in every way. Mix of contemporary and antique furniture. Plush linens and beds.
space: PLEASE SEND A MESSAGE BEFORE INSTANT BOOKING!!! This beautiful garden apartment located in an elegant townhouse has been fully renovated and converted to a 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath home. The parlor floor has a spacious living room, bright dining room, chef's kitchen & cozy library all with modern Chevron floors, 13' foot ceilings, central air & massive windows. French doors off the library to your private balcony leading to the lush garden. The Italian, Aster kitchen with breakfast table, Sub-Zero fridge, 2 ovens, 36" Viking range & wine cooler is just off the formal dining room which faces the garden. Two of the four bedrooms are en-suite and the master has French doors leading to the original, sunken garden from 1920 with mature plantings, grill & dining table. The master bath has a double sink, mosaic & marble tiles & a walk-in closet. This home is perfect for those looking for both a mix of old & new world charm all in the convenience of the heart of Greenwich Village just off the Gold

Fantastic, large 4 bedroom rental. Great bedrooms (3 great, one small) excellent kitchen, bathrooms and lounge areas. Super outside porch areas as well. Great location and professionally managed. I definitely recommend ( if it is within your budget $$$$).

stunningly beautiful and clean apartment with wonderful location.
highly recommended
The apartment is fabulously spacious and stylish and the outside space is great. The location is very convenient and Ralph was really helpful.
Very cool spot in the best location. It was great for our family doing a weekend in NYC.

Outstanding place in a great location. The service was excellent and everyone was extremely helpful. We came with 2 families, total of 9 people and had an amazing time. Very highly recommend. We will definitely be back

We just returned from a 2 month stay at this apartment and would highly recommend it.  It’s as photographed, spacious and also quiet.  The location is fantastic - a great springboard to the sights of the Village, Soho / Noho and Union Square areas.
