We do have BASIC beach essentials available. Folding chairs, sunscreen, inflatables, coo
neighborhood_overview: Located within a very quiet Cul-De-Sac in the Kona Palisades subdivision.
notes: Please ring main house doorbell if you need anything or assistance. If someone is home, we will be glad to help.
transit: Rental Car shops 5-10 minutes away. Personal recommendations with UBER Drivers available.
access: You will have access through the garage into your own private studio. Before your arrival, we will send you a message about your personalized code to enter your room. That way no one has to worry about keys being distributed or returned. Easy as that! No hassles!
interaction: Text and phone calls welcomed. Airbnb does not allow same day bookings after 11pm. This tip comes in handy for those who are stranded at the airport or for those who miss their flights. Please contact Sean or Rosie directly for other options. :)
house_rules: These rules are designed for guests of Sean and Rosie's Airbnb. Please read carefully and ask for any clarifications. -Only registered guests allowed on property -Clean grill after each use. -Only normal clothing can be washed and dried. If you have any questions on what is considered washable, please feel free to ask. :) You must provide your own detergents and softener. - Quiet Hours 11pm-7am  - No shoes in studio. Please keep outside next to your door mat or in basket provided. -All trash must bagged and disposed of.  -Please keep recyclables separated from trash in bin designated. -Leaving food in the room will attract bugs and critters. -Please park in the graveled area to the RIGHT of the drive way. Your vehicle must be facing the house. Please be careful to not fall on gravel and dig up.  *WE ARE NOT LIABLE FOR ANY INJURIES TO OTHERS OR YOURSELF OR DAMAGES TO YOUR VEHICLE. YOU WILL BE LIABLE FOR TO ANY DAMAGES YOU CAUSE.*

reviews.comments: Sean & Rosie were very accommodating in my needs and short notice request.  The check-in was a breeze and the place was really cute.  It was so close to the airport which was perfect for my flight out the next day.  I would absolutely recommend anyone to stay there and I would definitely stay there again.
Entire place was clean and just what we needed. Sean and Rosie were very welcoming and we would recommend to anyone

Thank you so very much, dear Rosie for helping me out and hosting me for one night. Because of unexpected circumstances I needed a very short termed solution for one night in Kona. I contacted Rosie at 8 p.m. and at 10 p.m. I was already in cosy, very clean, warm room and bed. Rosie is outstandingly friendly, helpful and lovely. And offered her help far beyond the description on airbnb. 
All information given on airbnb are absolutely true. My best wishes for her, her family and hopefully always having nice guest, aloha Miriam

Loved staying here! I booked last minute and Sean & Rosie were so sweet and accommodating and super responsive to any questions I had. The room was exactly as described and I felt like I had a little home away from home!

Rosie is a very lovely host and easy to communicate with at any time. 
The flat was very clean and lovely. 
My friend and I slept on a nice bed.
The apartment is very good located and safe, but a car is needed. 
Close to the airport and to the beach. 
We felt like at home. We can recommend that apartment!
thank you for the nice stay!
The location was convenient for my activities and the separate entrance is really nice. Very spacious room. Loved the ease of check-in and communication from Rosie!! I'd return for sure.

Very nice location!
The place is beautiful, clean and has all the amenities needed. Everything seemed new. The hosts are super available and helpful.
Great place right off the airport, super clean. Host accommodated us wonderfully after our flight was delayed. Would stay again.
Great location, wonderful amenities, easy access, and very quick communication responses!

Nice area, choose it because it was close to the airport
came in handy

Sean and Rosie were great hosts! Their place was like a mini hotel room! Bed was comfortable and the private bathroom was so nice! Location was outside of central Kailoua but perfect for seeing all of the west side of the island! Rosie was even nice enough to lend us some beach gear for our stay! Thanks again for a great stay!

Nice little studio that is perfect for one person, especially for a vacationer that is out exploring during the day and simply needs a comfortable quiet place to crash.  The studio was outfitted with just about everything you would need and the hosts are tremendously friendly so if you need something else they are there to help.  It can be very warm in the area without AC, but the studio is well shaded and is fine while using a fan for sleeping.  It had a refrigerator, big toaster oven, microwave, nice shower, big TV w/ direct TV, plenty of storage space via large closet.  Very good value.
very nice studio room. very good stay. clean. the neighborhood is very quiet. we loved this room. very well located to visit the center and surroundings. we recommend !
What a great little place. We stayed over night and they were very accommodating.

Meine Freundin und ich haben dort übernachtet bevor wir aus Kona weitergeflogen sind. Die nächste Bushaltestelle und der Flughafen sind 3 km weit weg. Insofern ist ein Auto oder Taxi für An- und Abreise notwendig. Das Zimmer war tadellos und der Selbst-Checkin problemlos. Wir hatten auf Grund des kurzen Aufenthalts keinen Kontakt zu Sean & Rosie.
Sean and Rosie made check in extremely easy and hassle free. The space was very clean and exactly what we needed for a good night sleep before our flight. Great place!
This space is comfortable and clean! Spent the night after arriving on an evening flight before setting out to our next location. thanks Sean & Rosie!
Perfect location for my early morning flight.
So convenient to the airport! Quiet neighborhood that is so close to all that Kona has to offer. Great amenities, micro, coffee maker toaster oven, mini fridge. Clean and nice.

게스트에 대한 배려가 많은곳이다.
직접 작성한 가이드북이 인상적이였으며
일회용품도 준비되어있다.
귀여운 치실까지 준비되어있어서 기분이좋았던곳!

Lovely,  clean room that is just as advertised!  We had everything we needed and extra little items were there in case we forgot something like shampoo, coffee, etc.  Very thoughtful of the owners and much appreciated!  Rosie was very helpful and so nice to communicate with throughout the booking and arrival.  I would definitely recommend staying here.
One of the best places where we have stayed. Will definitely come back. Very clean.
Great location, close to Kona town, Costco and the airport. Sean and Rosie provide a nice, clean,  secure room and answer inquiries promptly.

I booked less than a week before my arrival to the island and ended up not staying at the apartment at all. They have a very strict cancellation policy (7 days), which is fine. I politely asked to be refunded for the $30.00 cleaning fee, but was denied. They said the room had to be dusted and have the smell refreshed prior to next arrival that was coming in. So I paid for 3 nights and a $30.00 cleaning fee for a place I never set foot in. It does look like a nice place to stay though, thus why I did not give them poor ratings.

What a charming location in a very quiet neighborhood.  We found it to be the perfect respite in our travels back and forth from Hilo to Kona.  Everything was clean and nicely appointed.  The extras were so appreciated; microwave, refer, coffee pot with coffee and filters provided.  Bed and pillows were so comfortable and cozy.  Beautiful shower and cute little dog, Maile.  Made us feel very much at home.  Thanks Rosie and Sean!!
The room was perfect, very clean with all we needed. I recommande this place !
Super clean, perfect for a place by the airport

Awesome  peaceful location close to the airport. Separate entrance with washer & dryer. Rosie was very gracious and gave us tips and updates on sightseeing around the big island. Would love to stay with them again when I return.

They weren't very helping to get my money back   I called them not even two minutes after I booked the room. I made a mistake. I do not have enough money to spend on places I didn't even stay at. The taxi would if cost me 80 there and 80 back plus 112$ for the room in all American money

Location is wonderfully close to the airport and all things Kona, north and south, easily accessible beaches and places to explore. Very close to Costco and Walmart for supplies. Separate entry with keycode access was nice. Laundry was right there and available included in rental which was awesome. Just enough space for 2 people with private bathroom with stand-up shower. Loved access to wifi as well. Met both host and hostess who were very friendly and offered good tips for the island. Highly recommend!

Sean and Rosie's place is just a short drive from Kona Int'l Airport which is very handy when you land late in the evening.  My wife and I stayed 3 nights.
The room was very clean and the queen size bed was very comfortable.  The bathroom was a good size complete with shampoo, conditioner etc.
The microwave, coffee maker, fridge etc. made light meal prep very easy. An extra bonus was being able to use the washer and dryer which are just steps away from the suites private entrance. 
Rosie made us feel very welcome and was ready to answer all our questions.

게스트전용출입구가 있고 번호키로 셀프체크인에 바로 앞에 주차를 할 수 있어서 매우 편리했습니다. 코나공항에서 10분거리, 우리는 만타가오리 스노쿨링을 했는데 항구와도 15분거리여서 매우 편했습니다. 방에는 넓은 옷장이 딸려있어서 수납하기 편했고, 욕실도 넓어서 편했습니다. 호스트는 매우 친절했고 우리의 편의를 위해 최선을 다 해주었습니다. 전자레인지와 작은 오븐이 있어서 간단한 식사를 하기에도 좋고 일회용품이 전부 준비되있었습니다. 적극 추천합니다

Had trouble connecting to internet. Otherwise room exactly as depicted except even bigger than expected. Only stayed one night but with microwave, toaster oven, fridge and freezer, could easily stay longer.
Stanza molto carina ed accogliente! Letto comodissimo e stanza per i bagagli molto spaziosa ! Ottima posizione per raggiungere l’aeroporto in 10 min
Nice hosts! Response are very quickly. Good communication. Nice location. Good room size for a couple! :)
Nice place. Good welcome. Very clean. Very good for a short stay because it is a bit small, no chair to sit except for a folding chair at a small desk.

The place is very clean. Bed is comfortable. It's near the airport so good for late arrival. The room was a bit warm when we arrived, but it got cooler after some ventilation. In short, a good place to stay.

Sean and Rosie were so welcoming and hospitable! Even before arriving, Rosie was readily available to answer any questions we had and made sure we had everything we could possibly need. The studio had all the amenities, from kitchen supplies (including fridge, microwave, and toaster oven), to air conditioning, to all the bathroom supplies you could probably think of. They had a book full of information about the island and a list of beaches, restaurants, hikes, etc. to visit on the island. Very friendly, inviting us to a get together they were having with friends or offering honey from her family’s local beekeeping business. 10/10 would recommend and would stay with them again if I ever have the opportunity to return! Thank you for everything!

The toilet stopped working in the middle of the night and the host wanted us to pay for it even though we didn't do anything special. Very rude. 
The house is very hot and no AC during the day. 
They urge us to leave 10 minutes after checkout.
Will not come back.
离机场很近,时候短暂停留

Sean and Rosie were friendly hosts, along with their adorable 
dog, Maile. We appreciated their prompt responses to our questions. The private room was very clean and cozy with a nice 
touch of the amenities you would need in a vacation rental.  They provided convenient parking in a nice neighborhood . 
We would recommend their place to others. Mahalo.
Really nice place! Very professional! Everything is so perfect like hotel! If having a air conditioner it would be better.
It was a great space: clean, neat, close to the airport, quiet, and relaxing. We really enjoyed our stay and looking forward to staying here again in the future. A true gem.

The description provided was very accurate.  The room was very clean and it was nice for Sean & Rosie to leave shampoo, conditioner and soap for us to use.  The bed was very comfortable.  The location is great if you want to be close to the airport and it's very easy to get to and from Kailua-Kona from this location.  The owners were very fast to respond to any questions we had.  Would definitely recommend!

Our stay at Rosie and Sean’s house was wonderful! It was the most comfortable, clean, well-equipped room we had at any Airbnb on The Big Island! Rosie’s communications were wonderful and she was extremely helpful.

Excelente lugar, buena ubicación, muy limpio, cómodo y bello. Es incluso mejor que lo que se ve en las fotografías.
Sean & Rosi estuvieron siempre atentos a todas nuestras solicitudes, al igual que su familia. 
Estamos felices por haber pasado nuestros días en Big Island con ellos.
Recomiendo al 100% esta estadía.
Great place!

I was there for only one night, but the place provided everything I needed for my short stay. It was nice having a private bathroom and the mini fridge to keep my water cold. Even with both fans on, it was still pretty hot in there, which might have become an issue if I had stayed longer. Being so close to the airport meant I didn't have to wake up too early, which was perfect.

Sean and Rosie were very helpful! Room was just as I expected plus more. Location is real convenient close to airport and not far from shopping. My first time booking with Airbnb and thanks to Sean and Rosie I had a great experience :) thank you guys!

Il posto è piccolo ma accogliente, perfetto per due persone.. tutto è pulitissimo, bagno abbastanza grande con doccia ampia. Ci siamo trovati davvero bene e sean e Rosy sono davvero entili e disponibili, grazie per la bella esperienza!

Private room with all accommodations for the best price. The room was clean, quiet, and had everything we needed.

Thank you Sean & Rosie!

Sean and Rosie were great. There home is cute and comfy. We loved the Plumeria trees and loved being so close to Downtown. We had tv with satellite channels, fan, coffee, refrigerator, toaster, basically everything you need for your stay. Great location and nice and safe neighborhood. I would definitely stay here again.

Sean & Rosie provided a very nice room with great amenities. The TV was high quality and the room was over all very nice. They provided coffee and water and some snacks along with toiletries which was really sweet. They do charge an additional tax fee disclosed in the description.

Private room, private bathroom, private entrance and digital lock.  Large space and walk-in closet with TV, Microwave, Toaster Oven, Coffee maker, and some paper goods and utensils. Bathroom is large, private, and connected to the sleeping space. Parking was off street next to the driveway on a gravel space.

This was a perfect stay! comfortable bed, clean and close to the airport. had a private entry which is great for late arrivals. also had a small ac plus a huge fan to keep the place perfectly cool while we slept. loved all the added amenities such as snacks, water, coffee, tv, microwave, shower stuff, a booklet of recommendations. amazing hosts! would stay again :)

I stayed only one night but you can tell Rosie and Sean really have at heart your stay within their place! Shame I couldn't stay longer... I really enjoyed my stop there, the room was super clean, the  shower  enjoyable also with the aromatic soaps available... It was the perfect stop!

Nice place, 5min drive to the airport. Clean and pretty like the pictures. 
We experienced that they tried to charge us for a tax not mentioned in the ad. We booked this place in May and they sent us a message a couple of months before the trip; quite tricky to say no, is it? At the end, once in their apartment we decided to say no to pay extra as it wasn't mentioned when we booked the room. They agreed so we had no further issues. 
Funny facts: 
- They are quite cost-conscious so you will have to open the toilet key so the flush works.
- You can use their washing machine but with your own washing soap&softener (reflexion: as a 1/2/3 night host, would you buy a bottle of soap?)
- Hot water is available but had no clue how to turn it on. 
- They make you park in the gravel. Thing that is fine as soon as you don't break your leg as they won't be responsible for any damage to you or your car. 

Mahalo guys for host us!
We had a great time.
Thanks!

We had a lot of independence and it was great. Sean was super nice he told us about the best places to go.

Mahalo!

Pros: clean, provided little items you may need, easy check-in. 
Cons: unable to sleep until 4am due to loud party at the hosts’ home.

Sean and Rosie's place is very well furnished and comfortable. They have a lot of amenities that are useful so WE never felt lacking. They were very kind and took time to get to know each other. Great value and great location with GREAT hosts. Highly recommend!
Great Place! Highly recommended!
Very clean and great location

It's a comfortable, secure room, like a fully renovated garage. It is in a nice neighborhood. Everything is sparkling clean, they're considerate and helpful hosts. It was perfect for me for a rest stop.
Hope to come back and stay longer with them sometime!

Great value and highly recommend the place to anyone who is visiting Kona. The place is close to the airport and busy street area, especially if you have a rental car. The room is simple with the private bathroom. The hosts were very friendly and have two cute dogs. In the room, there are some local guides and their recommendations that will help you find things to do in town. They also provided the additional information about themselves which I found it is super cute and has the personal touch. Thank you for offering the amazing place! I really enjoyed my staying.
Small but very comfortable room to relax... great location and very clean
Great space and just what we needed near the airport before flying out early the next morning.
We loved the apartment. It was better than expected, nicely decorated and very clean. Perfect location nearby the airport.
Great place and wonderful people!
We loved staying here! It fit our needs perfectly, and was super convenient and close to the airport in Kona. Amazing hosts, and amazing value!
Great place to stay and courteous hosts. Definitely recommend.
A very nice place to stay
The room was perfect for my late arrival into Kona. The TV and coffee station were great touches. I could not get the wifi to work for me and I contacted the host but no response.
very nice folks, they put a lot of extra thought and care into their room, it was more than i expected
was a good room for a few nights.

Perfect spot to crash at for our late night flight arrival. Rosie and Sean just happened to be out front when we arrived and they were so friendly. The place was clean, well-organized, and had all we needed. Highly recommended!
We had a great time staying here. It is in a really good location if you are staying on the Kona side of the island. It was clean, comfortable, and classy.
Our stay was great. The space is perfect for 1 or 2 and the owners are fantastic as well. Quick responses and helpful when needed. Definitely recommend :)

Great location
Very clean
Would definitely stay there again!

The place was perfectly clean and very comfortable. Indications to get there and to access the room were great. We had a great stay and would have stayed longer if the rest of our trip wasn’t already planned. It’s very close from the airport which is very convenient to come and leave the island.
Sean and Rosie were very quick to answer and to help.
Would definitively recommend this place!
Very nice, lot of amenities, and even without kitchen, there was a microwave, small oven, fridge with deep-freezing, Coffe-machine, coffe, tea, ...all you need to have a small breakfast

We were pleased with our accommodations.  We had our own entrance with a private bathroom to ourselves.  The price was great and Rosie was particularly helpful.  We came in late in the dark and were having trouble reading the street signs.  We called Rosie and she got in her car and met us on the street and we followed her to her home.  We would definitely stay here again should we come to this area in the future.
Clean, accessible, and comfortable place for our short stay. Many thoughtful touches included in the space.

Great value in Kona and ver conveniently located! We loved that the room is completely separate from the house so it’s private. The washer and dryer are located outside so you can use them! Overall, clean and comfortable and we would definitely recommend.

My mother stayed here before embarking on a camping trip for her 60th birthday! Sean and Rosie were super sweet and accommodating, and the communication was excellent. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Sean & Rosie were amazing hosts. We had a pretty crazy schedule & they were very accommodating despite this. Their space had everything we needed & more! I highly recommend staying here if you’re wanting something in this area.
Very convenient location near the airport and town, in a nice neighborhood.  The space was quite comfortable for a short stay.

We were so impressed by our first night here that when we decided to extend our vacation by a day Sean & Rosie’s was our first choice. They have a binder with the house rules, their favorite local places, & information about them. I really appreciated the personal touch given by that & would stay a third time if I could!
Older accommodations but clean and comfortable. Hosts are great about trying to keep things “green” to protect paradise, ie. solar heated water, recycling.

We didn’t see Sean and Rosie while we stayed, but communication is very good, they answer my questions very soon even at night! The room is very clean and comfortable, I will choose this again next time if I come.
Sean and Rosie's place is clean and comfortable. We only spent an overnight there. We were happy with the accommodations!
Sean and Rosie’s Place is great! It’s clean and they were quick with responses. We recommend
Very clean, private and gives you that at home feeling.

Loved it! 
*Great Location - 5mins from the Kona Airport , Safe neighborhood , easy to find
*Room- Bed was very comfortable , microwave AND a toaster oven (can't find that at a hotel!) , clean , large shower, washer/dryer right outside your door , FREE WiFi , large TV and A LOT of amenities (Sean and Rosie thought of everything)
*Parking - Right next to your room!! This worked out great since we had a large drum to carry :)
*Host-Communcation was great! Host were very responsive!! 

Thank you guys for sharing your hale (house) with us!!!

We loved our stay here! Very pretty room with super comfy bed. Fresh flowers in the bathroom was a surprise and nice touch! Safe neighborhood and very clear instructions for parking and check in. We only stayed one night, but would have loved to stay longer!
Perfect for people coming and going from the airport. 100% as advertised. Would recommend to my friends and family!

name: apart Plateau Mont Royal,2 bedrooms
summary: Magnifique appartement  rénové au coeur du plateau. très lumineux dans un petit immeuble calme  à deux pas du parc La fontaine et de l'avenue Mont-Royal. 3ème étage d'un Triplex. Avec Terrasse.  Belle pièce à vivre avec mur de pierre , style montréalais, salle à manger, cuisine, espace salon, terrasse, et 2  chambres. WIFI , literie et serviettes fournies.Vous n'avez que votre brosse à dents, vos vêtements et ordinateur portable à apporter ! Nous vivons au rez de chaussée.
space: All you bring is your toothbrush, clothes and laptop! :-) WIFI / linen / towels  book for one week minimum.  Two block from La Fontaine Parc  and all amenities!!! INCLUDED: linnen and towels.    - Hydro-Quebec (heat, electricity, hot water); Metropolitain Gaz; High Speed Internet with Wifi;  television, DVD ;  ALSO INCLUDED: A non-smoking and clean environment;  - Two furnished bedrooms (new mattresses) ( one Queen Bed and 2 single bed )   - All appliances (refrigerator, gas stove, dishwasher, microwave, toaster,oven, tv ) - A balcony (with clotheslines )- A "House Guide" containing relevant details for the apartment such as recycling day and garbage, useful phone numbers, internet code, etc. * * * TRANSPORT: The bus 29 Rachel face at home, take you to the station Prefontaine (green line) 3 choices at  2 blocks for  the following three options: 29 Sherbrooke bus will take you to the station Sherbrooke in 10 minutes  (orange line) Bus 97 will take you to Mount Royal Station in 5 min (or

neighborhood_overview: Le quartier du plateau / Parc Lafaine / avenue Mont-Royal  Le Plateau-Mont-Royal est un arrondissement reconnu pour plusieurs raisons : Il est près du centre-ville (l'arrondissement de Ville-Marie). Il est près de diverses institutions et activités culturelles. Il accueille une population jeune, attirée en grand nombre par l'ouverture dans les années 1960 de l'Université du Québec à Montréal. * Il possède plusieurs boutiques spécialisées. Il offre une grande variété architecturale. Il a une réputation positive véhiculée par la population dite branchée. Il n'est pas nécessaire d'y posséder une automobile, car il est desservi par trois stations de métro (Sherbrooke, Mont-Royal, Laurier) et par un réseau de pistes cyclables dont l'axe numéro 1 de la Route verte qui le traverse. Il est le premier arrondissement à mettre en œuvre les ruelles vertes de Montréal; il y a 52 ruelles reverdies (2011)3.
notes: Vous serez comme chez vous, vous vivrez l'expérience Montréalaise dans un quartier familiale comme un habitant. Nous tenons à votre intimité, et nous ne vous verrons qu'à la remise des clefs. Je suis discrete mais je reste disponible pour mes voyageurs en cas de besoin
transit: Entre le metro Sherbrooke et Mont-royal.  face a une station de velo de location Bixi. TRANSPORTS:  Le bus 29 Rachel face à la maison, vous emmènera à la station Prefontaine ( ligne verte )  sinon  3  choix à 2 coins de rue pour les trois options suivantes:  bus 29 Sherbrooke, vous emmènera à la station Sherbrooke en 10 min ( ligne orange)  le bus 97 mont royal vous emmènera à la station Mont royal en 5 min ( ligne orange )  le bus 45 papineau vous emenera à la staion Papineau en 5 min ( ligne verte )  Sinon, 10 min a pied de la station Mont royal. La balade est trés agréable, la rue Mont-royal est l'une de mes préférées
access: all you indivudual apartment
interaction: Si vous avez des questions quant aux commerces, activités, regardez les conseils sur notre profil, ou n'hésitez pas à nous contacter. nous avons également créer un guide de restaurants et commerces que vous pourrez consulter.
house_rules: Appartement non fumeur.  Une pièce d'identité de la personne qui a fait la réservation, sera demandée à la remise des clefs.  Retirer ses chaussures en bas des escaliers. Merci de ne pas faire de bruit après 22 h 00.  1.GENERALITES ARTICLE 1 : Le locataire DOIT, pour assurer les meilleures conditions de vie de l’ensemble des habitants et des futurs locataires de l’immeuble : 1.	OBSERVER les lois et règlements locaux concernant la tranquillité, la sécurité et la salubrité publique de telle façon que son comportement ne trouble pas la tranquillité de ses voisins. Sont considérés notamment comme troubles de voisinage, les bruits caractérisés par leur durée, leur intensité, et leur répétition (appareils de diffusion du son et de la musique, réceptions tardives et bruyantes, utilisation d’appareils ménagers ou de bricolage la nuit, cris d’animaux, barbecues sur les balcons, etc.) 2.	Aucune transformation de nature à modifier l’intérieur ou l’extérieur des logements ne peut être entreprise s

host.host_about:
Nous sommes une famille avec deux enfants de 16 ans, nous avons fait l'acquisition du triplex et  l'avons totalement rénové. 
C'est la raison pour laquelle, nous préférons louer à des gens sérieux, respectueux et calmes. 
De plus, nous résidons au rez-de-chaussée.  ( juste en dessous de l'appartement. ) De ce fait, il nous est très facile de vous accueillir à n'importe quelle heure. Nous veillons à ce que vous vous sentiez bien chez nous, tout en respectant votre vie privée. 

Si vous avez des demandes particulières, des questions, n'hésitez pas. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------We are a family with two children, we bought the triplex and  completely renovated it last year.
This is why we prefer to rent to serious, respectful and quiet people .
In addition, we live on the ground floor. (Just under the apartment.) Therefore, it is very easy to welcome you at any time. We ensure that you will  feel at home, while respecting your privacy.

If you have any special requests, questions, do not hesitate.

reviews.comments: The flat was lovely and very open.  We were there during the hottest days of the year, and Carole had some fans set up - combined with the big windows throughout the apartment, it was perfect.  There is a very cute porch outside with a cafe table and chairs - ideal for coffee in the morning.  It's a pleasant 30 minute walk to the mountain/park in the center of the city, and just 10 minutes from several really great restaurants.
Lovely place, great location, extremely kind host. I would recommend this place without hesitation.

Accueil très chaleureux, une très belle rencontre! On peut échanger à la fois sur l'art et le milieu environnant, une joie. Appartement tout simplement génial (très confortable et à la fois inspirant par son savant mélange d'ancien et de design contemporain). Un grand bravo et merci à notre hôte!
It's a gorgeous space in a central location. exactly as described and a great base to explore montreal.

Hôte très accueillante,sympathique.
Quartier agréable.Proximité des commerces,et parc Lafontaine

Carole a été très réactive à ma demande. J'avais besoin d'un logement rapidement et elle a répondu quelques minutes plus tard. 
L'appartement, idéalement situé, est très confortable, propre et moderne. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut à proximité pour passer un agréable séjour : restaurants, magasins, bars. Pour ceux qui visitent le Canada en voiture, comme c'était notre cas, il y a un loueur de voiture juste à côté de l'appartement, ce qui nous a permis de rendre la voiture avant de séjourner à Montréal. 
N'hésitez pas à contacter pour un séjour idéal à Montréal !
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great stay in a clean, nice hip apartment in the plateau. Carole was a great host. There were many restaurants, coffee shops and supermarkets right around, as well as the park. I definitely recommend that place.

We had a great stay at Carole's place.  It is walkable to cafes, restaurants, and shopping in the Plateau neighborhood.

She was very accommodating and the apartment was clean, hip, and a good value. It's a walk up with several stairs, so be aware if you have mobility issues.
Great apartment- great host!
Très bien décoré, agréable à vivre et super bien placé dans Montréal.

Hébergement super sympa avec excellente literie et spacieuse, emplacement à 2min à pied du Parc La Fontaine (immense et magnifique), 5 min des lignes de bus, 15min du metro, a proximité boulangerie, superette, 24h/24....quartier tres calme et hyper cool. Nous etions 2 adultes et 2 enfants (7 et 11ans), c est parfait.

The apartment is in a great location - it's close to shops and restaurants. and there's also a grocery store nearby. The community felt very safe, even at night. It was very easy to get around - we either walked or rode the bixi bikes everywhere. The apartment was clean, check-in was efficient and Carole was very friendly. We had everything we needed and would definitely stay there again. We enjoyed sipping our morning coffee and people watching from the balcony:-)
Loved our stay. The place was clean and very convenient. Would definitely stay again!

Le condo de Carole est très bien situé sur le plateau de Mont-Royal. Il est grand, sa décoration street art/ indus nous a bcp plu. 2 "dépanneurs" à proximité sont très utiles. Et pour les plus grosses courses, il faut plutôt marcher 500 mètres, avenue Mont Royal. Vous y trouverez tout ! 
Carole a été aux petits soins.
Très belle appartement bien décoré et très propre. Carole est  très arrangeante.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Appartement très confortable
Très bien situé pour partir à la découverte de Montréal

Appartement parfait pour visiter Montréal, très bien situé sur le plateau (Vélo et bus au pied de l'appartement) super quartier et appart décoré avec goût, spacieux et bien équipé... Séjour parfait ! A refaire !

Carole est accueillante c’est une super hôte qui nous a donné de bons conseils pour les visites .
L’appartement est comme nous l’imaginions claire et meublé avec simplicité et de bon goût dans un quartier très bien desservi . 
Une semaine dans une Grande ville nous paressait trop long nous avons loué une voiture et sommes partis dans les Laurentides absolument magnifiques et à faire car pas très loin de Montréal .

Anita

Loved our stay here! It was very clean and the beds were all comfortable to sleep in. The balcony was our fav spot to hang out while we were at “home”. Carole was so helpful on a couple occasions when we needed her to be there to accept our lost luggage that was delivered. We didn’t really see her but she was there to help us any time we asked. Such a great space! We will definitely stay again. Bixi bikes are right outside the door and the metro is a short walk away.

Un accueil au top, Carole est très sympathique et arrangeante, son guide de son bonnes’ adresses est très pratique. Le logement est pratique et très joliment décoré, nous nous y sentions comme chez nous ! Il paraît également plus grand en réalité que sur les photos. Le logement est bien situé et nous avons pu nous rendre où nous le souhaitions grâce au bus et au métro. Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour et nous y reviendrions avec grand plaisir !

Superbe appartement bien placé, une super deco, un super balcon. Le quartier est calme et proche de tout en même temps. Nos hôtes étaient réactifs et super sympathiques. Le seul point négatif : la wifi que nous avions énormément de mal à capter, et une fois fait le débit était lent. Je recommande

Un vrai moment de bonheur,
L'appartement est en tous points conforme à la description. Joliment aménagé, très clair et très fonctionnel. Confortable et très bien équipé, (et décoré !), il vous donne l'impression d'être un vrai Montréalais ! La météo nous a permis de prendre les déjeuners sur la terrasse, en compagnie des écureuils. Carole et son compagnon sont des hôtes absolument charmants, disponibles et attentifs à votre bien-être. Un must sur le plateau Mont Royal !
Carole’s home was convenient and nice! More than just the bare essentials we were comfortable and had our needs met

Logement agréable et conforme à la description.

Such as Salsa, Bonjour, Fortress, Broadway, Chow Sang Sang, Chow Tai Fook, Milan Station (selling the famous brand handbags), from Mong Kok, the largest shopping mall Langhao Square only 2 to 3 minutes. There are seven restaurants in the world, and there is a wide range of food and beverage outlets in the world, and the hotel is located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Minute subway ride to the Hung Hom Stadium to see the concert can also be direct subway. From here you can take the subway to Hong Kong Disneyland and the Hong Kong Ocean Park!
notes: Check-in is at 14:00 and check-out is before 12:00 noon the next day(we need to be cleaning after you check out so that the room is ready for the next guest to check in.) If you arrive in advance, or if you check out, we offer free luggage service. Special note: once our room is confirmed, no change or cancellation will be accepted
transit: MTR: Mong Kok MTR Station Exit A1 ( Fife Street). It is about 2 min walk from Kingland apartment. Macau Ferry Terminal / Shun Tak Centre: Take the MTR Sheung Wan Station on Hong Kong Island Line. Transfer to Tsuen Wan Line. Get off at Mong Kok MTR Station Exit A1 ( Fife Street). It is about 2 min walk from Kingland apartment. Tsim Sha Tsui/Star Ferry: Take a taxi about 20 min.

Hi,我是Selena來自HK!旅行､美食､電影､音樂都是我生活的點點滴滴｡每到一座陌生的城市,走街串巷,逛逛當地的菜市場,鉆鉆當地的小巷子,吃吃路邊攤,逛逛自由市場,才能真正體驗當地人的生活,不虛此行!另外,去一些很少人知道的或者交通不那麽方便的地方玩一玩,會有完全不一樣的體驗和收穫｡我喜歡結交來自世界各地的朋友｡Airbnb提供給了我一個很好的平台和機會｡我個人有一些相當不錯的空房,我希望能提供給更多Airbnb的旅客,也希望每個人留在我們這裏都是非常愉快和舒服的｡當然啦,Selena的旅店是以結交來自世界各地朋友爲目的的平價旅店,成長路上難免有不足之處,望多一份溝通少一份誤解,Selena非常期待您和您的朋友光臨!

reviews.comments: clean and comfortable.  2 beds in a typical cheap mong kok hotel. you get what you pay for in hong kong and my symtay here was perfect for the low price charged. i am 6 feet tall anfmd the bed was definitely long enough. thanks!
Close to subway and central
总体上不错的入住体验｡预订之后房东反应迅速,马上发了欢迎邮件给我们｡而且宾馆地理位置很方便,离地铁口很近｡入住时梁小姐很贴心的给我们安排了带窗的房间,比较明亮干净｡推荐入住｡

Selena's place--like any place in HK--was small. It was very cheap though, which is perfect for travelers on a budget. Wi-fi was slow (connection didn't reach the room) and there was a leak in the bathroom that seeped inside the room. However, host was kind enough to let me leave my things even after check-out.
地理位置很好
酒店位置很好找,前台的服务员很热情,性价比很高!
位置不錯,入住的工作人員態度也不錯,就是衛生要加強,床上用品清潔度不是很理想
附件有很多美食
가격 저렴하고 위치 좋음
交通便利､好找,房间麻雀虽小五脏俱全,干净整洁｡楼下早餐店味道不错｡
very nice place at a very decent prize. friendly host and clean hotel
tiny space with hookers on the same corridor

地理位置OK
干净卫生 老板人很好 积极解决问题 好评

櫃檯登記的阿姨很棒很熱情,房東也很熱情,床舒適好睡,洗澡的地方較為小,以旺角的地段三人房來說,c/p很高了｡

我入住的時候,沒有找到充電的地方,請先詢問是否有插座｡
下次也會優先選擇這邊入住｡
Good to have short stay
房东超级好人呢,收拾房间的粱姐very nice,值得大伙选择哟!不过入住前,一定要看清楚开关设备的所有有用之处｡哈哈~

The place itself was in a decent location in Mong Kok, however, it was too small to accommodate 3 guests with 3 large check in luggages and carry-ons. Unfortunately, due to our busy schedule of visiting different countries and many different areas/attractions of Hong Kong, it is difficult to feel relaxed and comfortable in a place as such. There was also a bit of miscommunication between the host, Selena, as there were times it was difficult to reach her in a timely manner. (Keep in mind, sometimes tourists do not have the best reception from their service providers). Anyhow, we did not stay here and immediately had to look for other accommodations after checking in and took a loss on the booking— mainly due to the size of the place. She also took a while to set up the room for us and it did cut into our scheduled travel times which was unfortunate. We didn’t stay here so I can’t attest to anything else other than our experience for the first 2 hours.
Dont expect too much.
역이랑 가까이에 위치해 있어서 여러편의 시설을 이용하기 편했습니다. 아주머니께서 너무 친절 하셔서 방도 바꿔주시고 신경을 많이 써 주셔서 좋았어요. 다만 위치가 조금 찾기 어렵지만 익숙해지면 금방 찾아가실 수 있으실거에요.
Overall, ok. It’s common to stay in a small space. The bed is comfortable, I was able to sleep well thought out the stay.

i love that the place is accessible to the MTR and local markets. The room is
as expected.

优点:房间位置很好 交通出行便利 
缺点:房间隔音较差
总体性价比不错

周末去香港玩两天,订了在旺角的房子,地铁旺角A1出来后过天桥对面就是金轮大厦了,门口比较小不过香港的应该都是这样的啦~到16楼找到前台登记后房主就给了房卡还有密码下去10楼的房间了,因为定的时候没有房子了,两个人定了个3人房,房子虽然小,可是两个人也足够了,在香港寸土寸金的地方,胜在位置还是挺不错的,靠近地铁还有旺角这个商圈｡毛巾是可以自己去外面拿的,还有退房是第二天中午12点前,我们第二天九点多去退房,行李寄存在那里,外面逛完了才回来拿的行李,nice~

아파트안에  여러 호스텔이 있습니다 그안에  위 호텔도함께있구요 건물은 구글 위치따라 가다보면 아파트가 있는데 나오는데 그 안에 엘레베이터 모여있는곳 있어요 거기 가서 16층에 체크인하는곳이있습니다.
자리에없을 때가 많으니 전화를 하세요
好
马桶间断中没水,花洒出冷水,花洒挂不住,check in out 都简单,黄金地段,所以忍了,楼下一小食店的小食好吃｡
首先位置很棒 楼层非常高 可以看到远处的风景 隔音效果也还好 房间地产旺角 简直就是来香港购物住宿的首选 离地铁口真的很近 但是最近因为从地铁口直接过来的路口施工 需要绕一下 不过也没事 几分钟就可以找到 非常方便 而且楼下就有换现金的地方 如果你时间赶 也可以在楼下换 换小额的亏不了多少 最后 房东姐姐的房子还可以噢 心动的就不要犹豫了
还可以
What you see is what you get. Worth the price for a few nights stay. Cleans everyday. She let us leave our baggages after check out and just come back for it. Overall, nice stay.
Great place.
都挺好的,房东回复挺快,说实话房间比我预料中的要大一点,住三个女孩子完全没问题｡卫生间可能会有点小但还能接受,就是热水要先煮水过一会然后才会是热水｡还ok吧 地方可能有点点难找｡
地理位置不错,床上用品有点旧潮
很不错,房东人也很好,住的地方小而精致,距离地铁非常方便,
很好
Cozy, clean room. Checking in was easy. WiFi didn't work in the room but it did work in the hallway. Also walking distance to many things. Overall I would recommend staying here.

第一 宾馆地址挺好找的
第二 房间在香港来说不算小

不过总的来说除了很吵之外没什么毛病
地理位置真的很好   附近很多好吃的  就在地铁口附近交通超级方便
挺好

比预期差了很多很多,整个设施都很陈旧,大厦的电梯很老旧而且非常逼仄,房间里不太干净,门有问题很难打开和关上｡服务人员态度特别不耐烦｡总的来说,就是为了在旺角的地理位置勉强将就一下｡

很不错
交通方便

good for sleeping

跟想象中的没什么差~

가격대에 딱 맞는 시설 인것같습니다.
남자 둘이 자는데는 좁지 않았고 숙소위치는 좋은 편인것같습니다.
房间和介绍中一样,很好｡每天会有人来打扫｡服务特别及时,也很热情｡很开心的一次旅行
不是很好的感覺
离朗豪坊很近,地铁站也很方便,这个时间段入住性价比很高,能找到这样的住宿很不错啦~
Nothing much. Space is a issue in Hong Kong.
房间很棒,设施齐全,性价比很高哦!
什么都挺好的就是有时候wifi会突然断掉
游客要记得自己带毛巾等用品｡洗脸台的水使用很难受有点影响体验｡
房东您好,这次旅行在贵旅馆入驻真是十分舒心,感谢您给我们提供了这么好的超性价比的房子!不过有件事要跟您道个歉:因为早晨赶去澳门时间比较紧张,同伴收拾行李的时候没注意把您的两个转换插头一并收走了,我到今天整理行李时才发现,真的不是有心的,再次向您道歉!如方便的话请给我一个帐号,我把款子打给你可以吗?谢谢您!!
Great location and value for money. Easy to locate and helpful chap in foyer for check in

All air-conditioned apartments include stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, stove, microwave oven, and dishwasher), as well as a washer & dryer. All guests have free access to the fitness studio at any time.  *Amenities such as rooftop terrasse and fitness center will be available by September 2017. *Pet & Parking fee

Greetings to this wonderful Airbnb community! :)

I have been blessed to travel all around the world and experience many cultures! This has allowed me to understand much better travelers and I my passion is to take a good care of your accommodation!

Speak English, French and Spanish! :D
We would be pleased to host you when you come to Montreal for business, relocation or leisure! 

Thank you for checking our apartments and we hope to have you soon!

Alejandro.

name: A natural and calm corner in Barcelona
summary: Hello! My house is a 3 floor house situated in the foot of the Collserola Mountain in Barcelona. There are a wonderful view from the house that you can enjoy when having your breakfast in the balcony or the terrace.
space: The house is painted with clear colors and there is a bathroom only for you . It is very illuminated and quite. There is also a sweet cat.
description: Hello! My house is a 3 floor house situated in the foot of the Collserola Mountain in Barcelona. There are a wonderful view from the house that you can enjoy when having your breakfast in the balcony or the terrace. The house is painted with clear colors and there is a bathroom only for you . It is very illuminated and quite. There is also a sweet cat. Balcony, terrace, kitchen and living room. The days for this announcement I will be travelling so you will have total independency. It is a house neighbourhood, there are a few houses around, it is a very quiet zone. The house is in the mountain but quite near a metro station (10-15 min walking). There is also a bus station right near the house. You can go around walking, if you love nature and mountains you are at the right place! You will be at the beginning of the Collserola mountain. It is perfect if you rent a car. You can park for free in the sides of road. The living room TV has a fiber cable TV so you can enjoy a lot of channels
neighborhood_overview: It is a house neighbourhood, there are a few houses around, it is a very quiet zone.
notes: The living room TV has a fiber cable TV so you can enjoy a lot of channels without any issue. The living room TV is avaliable for everybody and is 50" with cable tv and USB ready. You can use the Dolce Gusto coffee machine and will give you some space in the fridge.
transit: The house is in the mountain but quite near a metro station (10-15 min walking). There is also a bus station right near the house. You can go around walking, if you love nature and mountains you are at the right place! You will be at the beginning of the Collserola mountain. It is perfect if you rent a car. You can park for free in the sides of road.
access: Balcony, terrace, kitchen and living room.
interaction: The days for this announcement I will be travelling so you will have total independency.
house_rules: - From 23:00pm you should take care how loudly you are. - Keep the house clean. - Don't open the door to strangers. - Don't invite friends to the house. - Turn off the lights before leaving everyplace.  - Don't break or stain anything (you will pay for it) and be careful with our things.  - You can't smoke inside the house, (you can do it in the terrace or the balcony). ----- - A partir de las 23:00 hay que ser moderados con el ruido. - Apagar las luces antes de salir de cualquier estancia de la casa.  - Mantener la casa limpia. - No abrir la puerta a desconocidos. - No invitar amigos a la casa. - No romper ni manchar los muebles de la casa (deberán pagar el importe si sucede). - Para fumar pueden salir a la terraza o al balcón.

name: Escape to Paradise
summary: Our 750 sqft. one bedroom is located in beautiful Kailua.Just minutes away from world famous Lani kai beach, this newly remodeled living space boasts a full kitchen, large bedroom, closet dressing area and a cozy backyard.
space: Located in the Enchanted Lakes area of Kailua, this great one bedroom is close to everything but just outside busy Kailua town.  Nestled in a prime location, a dozen local eateries, grocery store,Starbucks and beautiful cinema are all within a 5 min walk. Kailua town is home to several local grocery store as well as Whole Foods and Target. It also offers an array of restaurants both locally owned and familiar franchises. A wonderful backyard is perfect for afternoon drinks and relaxing. BBQ ready!
description: Our 750 sqft. one bedroom is located in beautiful Kailua.Just minutes away from world famous Lani kai beach, this newly remodeled living space boasts a full kitchen, large bedroom, closet dressing area and a cozy backyard. Located in the Enchanted Lakes area of Kailua, this great one bedroom is close to everything but just outside busy Kailua town.  Nestled in a prime location, a dozen local eateries, grocery store,Starbucks and beautiful cinema are all within a 5 min walk. Kailua town is home to several local grocery store as well as Whole Foods and Target. It also offers an array of restaurants both locally owned and familiar franchises. A wonderful backyard is perfect for afternoon drinks and relaxing. BBQ ready! Guests have full access to the backyard and washer and dryer. The house is attached but has its own private entrance. We respect that you are on vacation and we are available to help as much or as little as you'd like! Everything is within a 10 minute drive! Kailua has so m
neighborhood_overview: Everything is within a 10 minute drive! Kailua has so much to offer! World class beaches, kayaking, windsurfing, swimming, hiking, golfing, dining and shopping!
notes: Ample street parking right in front of house Items available upon request: Pack and play (With sleeping mattress) Baby tub sling Stroller Halo Bassinet Hair straightener
transit: While the bus system is fantastic here and uber is super popular we always recommend getting your own wheels so you can explore what our island has to offer!
access: Guests have full access to the backyard and washer and dryer.
interaction: The house is attached but has its own private entrance. We respect that you are on vacation and we are available to help as much or as little as you'd like!
house_rules: This is Hawaii! We don't wear shoes in the house! :) Pets may be allowed. Please contact us to inquire about your pet. Please throw out trash before departing:)

host.host_about: Friendly and easy going. Like to explore and love to eat! I must have a book with me when I travel. I enjoy music and dancing, also love to watch sports games cause we don't get to see any professional sports in Hawaii.

reviews.comments: Courtney's place was perfect for my stay on Oahu! The location was great. Kailua is a gorgeous town with one of the most beautiful beaches in the whole world. Grocery store, cafe and restaurants right down the street. Courtney was very responsive and helpful. The place itself was very nice. Open layout, bright and clean. Plenty of space and nice kitchen. Comfy bed. Would stay again in a second. Everything was spectacular!

We stayed at Courtney's place for 8 days while visiting Oahu on our honeymoon. We were destined to go to Puerto Rico initially but due to weather we had to reroute our trip last minute. Courtney quickly responded and helped us know how to enjoy the island by offering suggestions. Courtney and her family were exceptionally welcoming throughout our entire stay. This beautiful home was perfect and had everything we needed for our relaxing and eventful vacation. We were able to cook too! It was quiet and cozy with a great location near many beaches and places to eat.  We would highly recommend this place and hope to stay again in the future!
Great place for the price. we were out all day and the morning road noise was not expected but tolerable a great place to have a small family gathering for a BBQ and Courtney's family are the best.
Great place near our favorite place in the world! Lanikai Beach!

We arrived to a spacious and clean unit.  Check-in was easy-Courtney communicated quickly by text and was easily available.  The pineapple and coffee were greatly appreciated.  Central location makes travel easy.  Stayed 2 weeks and even spent a weekend in Maui.

Bright and spacious one bedroom. The bed was comfortable. The kitchen was nice with amenities. Thank you for the coffee supply. Conveniently located and walkable to supermarket, restaurants and gas station. Nice sitting area in the backyard for morning coffee and afternoon relaxation. Courtney was a great host.

Courtney’s apartment is spacious and well equipped with easy access to both Lanikai Beach and Kailua. Bed was nice and comfy but the noise from the road was very disturbing for us both day and night - take some earplugs if you are a light sleeper. The back yard could also have been a nicer place to hang out - as it was we didn’t spend much time there. Okay value for expensive Kailua.
Big place, good location, good value

Courtney's place was super spacious. It's a home away from home with all the amenities you'll need. You get access to the washer/dryer/street park/huge backyard. We didn't interact much with Courtney other than checking-out but communication through Airbnb was super quick. The house is on one of the bigger street but rather quiet. About 10 min drive to Kailua beach.

ive said it before to courtney, and ill say it again here. we thoroughly enjoyed our time in their home and would certainly recommend their BnB to any of our friends or family.
many, many thanks to our hosts!

Courtney's place is just as listed.  Spacious, separate entrance and private, but Courtney is available almost any time if you need anything.  The location is great because it away from the tourist areas and easy to get to places on the island.  It is on a busy street but it did not bother us at all.  Plenty of street parking any time of day.  Great value.

This was such a wonderful place to stay at during our trip.  The location is close and convenient to so many things in a nice quiet neighborhood away from the noise of a big city.  The space is just as advertised, and Courtney was a very welcoming host.  Great place to stay!!

Courtney’s place is very spacious and clean, it’s in a great location close to town
Courtney was very kind and I am greatful she was so accommodating for our crazy check in time

We had a lovely stay in this home on Oahu. It was so nice to be away from the hustle and bustle of Honolulu and have a (more or less) quiet retreat after days of exploring the island. Courtney’s place is extremely spacious, and having a kitchen was so nice - eating out constantly adds up fast! It was not the fanciest of Airbnb’s I have stayed in, but it was very comfortable and a very typical island home. It was so nice to be minutes from Kailua beach; we swam, snorkeled, kayaked to the Mokes, hiked all over the island, and explored many other places by car. Mahalo!

Courtney was extremely communicative and very nice. The place felt a little bit older than the photographs portrayed.  The space was large and it was nice having a full kitchen, but there were a couple ants here and there... so we made sure we sealed everything.

Our overall experience was fantastic and Courtney is a great host. Her response time is extremely quick and the place was exactly as described - large, functioning kitchen, ample street parking and very clean. You won't regret staying here :)

If you are looking for a place on the east side of Oahu during your stay here, look no further! This is great for anyone from a couple to a family of four. Amazing and incredible doesn’t even begin to describe it!
Very nice and friendly host and a relaxing place to stay

Courtney's place was very spacious and comfortable. The cool tile floors are a welcome comfort from the warm temperatures and easy to keep clean as well. The kitchen area has plenty of room  if you choose to cook and is even nicer than the pictures show. A huge master bedroom greets you and the extra bed in the living area is equally as comfortable. The split bathroom is a dream since my husband had one sink area and I had the other. Courtney's place is perfectly located for easy access to shops and restaurants, some within walking distance and equally easy access to routes to the rest of the island. Though she has a full life with her family she was always easy to contact and it felt more like you were staying with a close friend. In previous reviews road noise has been mentioned. We did not find it to be an annoyance and I think it might depend on how quiet your home environment is in comparison. I would definitely recommend her home and I'm sure your stay will be relaxing and as lovely as ours was.

We enjoyed our stay at Courtney’s place. She and her family did their thing and we did ours. Everyone was polite when we saw them. Otherwise it was quiet. The road noise was an adjustment as the windows stay open. The breeze is too enjoyable not to have them open. There is plenty of space to relax. The rooms are open and simple. We had plenty of room to move around.  The location was great to walk to McDonald’s or Starbucks or several other restaurants. Island Snow was a quick ride away. We would stay there again. Thank you Courtney and family.

Courtney’s place is very convenient to the beautiful beaches at Kailua and Lanikai. The Ohana was very spacious and clean and had everything we needed. We stayed a week and appreciated the use of the laundry facilities.

Thanks again to Courtney!
Lovely room, comfy bed,nice kitchen. We’d like to visit here again!

良かった点:
★どこへいくにも移動が便利
Whole Foods market, target, Kailua beachは全て10分程度で着きました!
★清潔で､おしゃれ
清掃が行き届いており､床もﾀｲﾙで涼しげでした!
ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞもふかふかで気持ちが良かったです｡
★広いｷｯﾁﾝ､大きな冷蔵庫
調味料も揃っており一通りの調理ができました!

注意点:
･甘いものを放置してると翌朝､蟻が群がっています｡(室内でも)
自分が悪いのですが､ﾚﾓﾈｰﾄﾞを飲んだｺｯﾌﾟを出しっぱなしにしていたら､蟻がぎっしり群がっていました(笑)

総じてとても満足度が高いです｡
利用していませんが洗濯機もあるし､広いﾃﾗｽではBBQもできます｡
次ｶｲﾙｱｴﾘｱを訪れる時は3泊以上したいです♪♪

My friends and I stayed with Courtney during a recent visit to Kailua for a wedding.  Courtney and I did not meet in person, but she was a welcoming and responsive host over messaging.  The space had plenty of room for four adults, and we all enjoyed sitting on the patio mornings and evenings.  Courtney’s place is close to shops, restaurants, and a grocery store—and a  quick drive to Kailua Town. Overall, we had a great experience and look forward to visiting again.

If youʻre wanting a central & quiet get-away with room for everyone this is the place to stay! We were able to relax, cook meals, grocery stores are literally minutes away. So happy that we found this gem! Mahalo again for everything Courtney!

Fantastic home, location, everything! Took in our family of 6 (including 3 small kids and our dog).  Had such an amazing stay and Courtney was a great host - super helpful and responsive.  It made our stay on island truly amazing.
交通便利,不遠處就有公車及購物商場

素敵なお部屋でした(╹◡╹)ﾎｽﾄさんは､いる時といない時がありましたが､会った時に洗濯機の使い方がわからなく英語も話せなかったですが､ｼﾞｪｽﾁｬｰでどうにかなり､まわしてくれました｡車も無料で停めれます｡近くにｽｰﾊﾟｰもあり､BBQができるﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰがあるので自炊にもってこいです｡
ｸｰﾗｰなしなのが気になっていましたが風通しもよく､とっても涼しかったです｡ｶｲﾙｱﾋﾞｰﾁ ﾗﾆｶｲﾋﾞｰﾁにも近く､よかったですｷｯﾁﾝﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰが切れてましたが､ｷｯﾁﾝ用品もほぼあり､ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑはﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｿｰﾌﾟがなかったので､近くのｽｰﾊﾟｰで買いました｡ﾜｲｷｷとは違う気持ち良さを感じました( ◠‿◠ )ﾊﾜｲにまた行く時は､次もお願いしたいです!!

We booked this place for three adults; 2 men and 1 female.  We could not have beeen happier with the accommodations.  Very clean and quiet.  There are a lot of places to walk to which is helpful if without a car which was our case.  Our stay was unique which was a crew to deliver a boat from Hawaii to California.  But, if you are a family enjoying Kailua, this spot would be ideal.  The highlights: Easy check in, clean and comfortable, close to the beach, close to shopping and restaurants.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.

I sent a message a little over a month before arrival saying hi and that my family and I were excited to come to Hawaii and stay in their home for 3 nights  in lanikai beach.  I never got a response.   Then I sent a message a couple days prior to arriving and still no response.  Me, my wife and 2 year old daughter arrived in Hawaii at noon and as planned went to pick up our rental car.  I then received a message from the property owner saying that there were plumbing issues in the home that she was unaware of.  That was it. No options or anything just that and to feel free to call her.  So I called and still no suggestions for alternatives other than we will try to get it fixed by tomorrow and a plumber was coming between 8-9am I gave the phone to my wife because I had to handle the rental car.  Her husband got on the phone and said their are no other air bnb  in lanikai beach.  So we ended up getting a hotel in Waikiki hoping that I would receive a call in the morning.  I also had a package delivered to the home so I had to drive out there and get it because it was on ice packs and could not sit too long outside.   The next morning I checked my account for refund and still nothing and no word from them.  I called air bnb at around 11 am and they said the reservation was still open and that they didn’t hear anything about the issue. So they called her and she told them that the issue was fixed and ready at normal check in which is 3pm. I was already supposed to be checked in the day before so i was confused on that statement.  I already had to check out of my hotel and get a different hotel for the night so my family wasn’t stuck in a car in limbo. At this point I just wanted to be refunded as there was too much going on.   Air bnb said they are refunding me for the 3 nights and it’s a bummer that we never got to stay in lanikai. The first part of our vacation definitely started rocky but we are still trying to enjoy the rest of our vactation.  Thank you to air bnb for your help in this situation.

私たちは家族5人で3泊しましたが､立地が非常によく､可愛らしい内装で､お値段も安めでよいお宿です｡
ﾗｲﾁの木のある庭があり､子供たちは毎朝おもちゃの車に乗ったり､走り回ったりして遊んでいました｡
ﾀｵﾙがたくさんあり､助かりました｡
ｼｭﾉｰｹﾙをお借りして近くのﾗﾆｶｲﾋﾞｰﾁで泳ぎました｡
洗濯機や乾燥機も無料で使わせてもらえたのは､ありがたかったです｡
調味料も色々あり､自炊も楽にできました｡
冷蔵庫の利きがあまり良くなかったように思います｡
冷凍庫は大丈夫です｡
そして､甘いものの放置にはご注意ください｡
蟻がたかります｡

お値段のわりに広々と清潔で素敵なお家でした｡
素敵なお部屋をありがとうございました!
Even if they have a code to enter to the apartment, they have been there waiting for us. We found everything we need and we could spend nice days there.

Really nice calm place, Kailua reminds me of my home town lots off breakfast and coffee shops which is why we chose to stay here. But Courtney’s place was very close to everything. We mostly just used it to sleep and headed out the whole day. Overall great place very spacious!
Great Location and Host. Easy to communicate with and solves problems if any. Would recommend dealing with host any day. Thank you for your help, hospitality, and accommodations.
Easy access to local town and beach.

The place is amazing, penty of space, courtney is a very welcoming person and made us feel right at home, the location couldn’t be better to explore the best beaches of Oahu, if you are looking for an affordable place and nice people around you, that’s the one! Thanks again for having us!
Clean, spacious, Comfortable, relaxing, minutes from everything.

This place is perfect for a family in Oahu. You can walk to the first supermarket (Safeway), you only have to drive few miles to go to the first beach (Kailua, Lanakai). As Oahu is not a big island, we could visit and drive from this place easily. The house is comfy, spacious, we appreciated to use the laundry machine, the backyard, the snorkeling gear, ....etc. Everything you need, like in your house, is here! It's very clean. But above all, Courtney is super kind and help you right away if you need something. It's  a safe neighborhood  and no problem to park the car in front of the house.
Amazing place in amazing area! Amazing value.

Courtney's place is very roomy, comfortable and clean.  A great place to stay for anyone but including families as there is access to a nice yard to relax, BBQ, or let the kids play.  Definitely a great value for popular Kailua, an easy walk to restaurants, stores, and a movie theater. A short drive to the beach also!
We had such a wonderful time in Kailua! Courtney was a great host:) The place was pretty near to the town and easy to access. It was street parking but very safe neighborhood and no need to worry.
Amazing location and great host. A very nice collection of books.

The outside is pretty unremarkable but the apartment is very nice with a great kitchen, comfortable living area and a nice bedroom. We only had two adults staying there but you could easily accommodate another adult or several kids. The back sliding doors didn’t seem to close very well but we didn’t have any insect problems. I just wouldn’t trust leaving a lot of valuables there although we certainly had no issues. All in all a very comfortable stay and definitely a good value. Courtney, the host, was very responsive and kind  and I have no doubt that she would have provided for any reasonable request.
This place is awesome.  Its big and very comfortable.  I highly recommend anyone stay here.  The location is good too.  Its right near a supermarket and movie theater and very close to the beach

reviews.comments: Very neet and tidy apartment, perfectly located near old Montréal and Palais des Congrès. Idea for business travellers looking for home away from home.

Johns suite was everything i hoped for, central to nightlife, steps away from old port, the location was brilliant. 

The apartment itself was fantastic, and everything was sparkling clean, nice comfy space, with a really nice bed. The amenities was an added bonus, not a single issue. Would definitely stay again.
Wonderfully located near Old Montreal, steps from the Metro  the condo is modern, clean and nicely maintained. Check-in was very convenient and the host very responsive. Would definitely return.
John's home is in a perfect location! Quick walk to the Port and St Catherines street. It was very clean and John was accommodating and quick to resond to anything. Definitely recommend his place!

Location is perfect as is the building I stayed in. It is seriously with walking distance to everything. The Metro and buses are nearby. Old Montreal is great. Host communicates very well. Book with confidence.
John's place is in a great location next to the old port.  The apartment is clean and in a new building.  Check-in and out was easy.  I would definitely recommend to stay here.

John's apartment was in a perfect location for exploring this beautiful city. Modern and spacious, it was close to main attractions as well as shops and public transport. John was easily contactable regarding check in and check out. This Apartment is perfect for the solo traveller.

Si vous souhaitez un séjour en plein cœur du centre-ville de Montréal, je vous recommande le condo de John qui est très bien situé.  Parfait pour une personne ou un couple.  John répond rapidement aux messages envoyés. Propreté des lieux et décor soigné!
Sylvie
Comfortable, quiet, convenient, excellent hosts when I managed to navigate to the wrong apartment block (my fault entirely). Definitely would recommend.

I had a great time staying at John's apartment. It's very clean and perfectly located in Montreal's old town, close to many restaurants and tourist attractions. Also John was super responsive and answered my messages and questions immediately.
John's place is really nice and clean; very well located, near walking of main tourist attractions. Also, near metro station Place D'Arms. I sure recommend John's place.

We were very happy with John's place as it is in an ideal location. It is walking distance to the metro and to old Montreal which is great for anyone visiting the city. The check-in was simple and seamless. The apartment itself had everything that was needed and I liked the fact that there were several toiletries available for use in case you forgot anything (shampoo, conditioner etc.). However, the apartment faces another building so there is not much of a view if you are looking for that. That being said, location cannot be beat and for the most part we only came back to the apartment for sleep. All in all this was a great experience and we appreciate John's timely responses whenever we had a question. Thank you for your hospitality !

The condo is in an excellent location for exploring both old and new Montreal. The place itself was very clean and quiet and John provided easy instructions for guests to follow and was very responsive to any questions. Highly recommend!

This was my first AirBNB and I am very pleased with my stay. John is quick to respond to messages and the apartment is stylish, clean, well-equipped, spacious and at a great location. Great experience & value, thank you!
The location can not be better. The condo is sparklingly clean. There is a paid indoor parking across the street. John was very easy to communicate.  Great value for the price.
Awesome spot. Highly recommended!
Great location . Very clean . Secure building . Make sure you park across the street for the best rates .

This property was absolutely perfect. It was in an amazing location, impeccably clean, well stocked with towels, toiletries, kitchen equipment and had a washer/dryer. John was incredibly prompt with communication and opened the unit within an hour of my enquiring if it was available! I can't find fault with anything about my stay. I even made use of the gym in the hotel which was free with the property. I would highly recommend this property for single or couple travellers. It offers everything you need and in a really beautiful place.
Superb.  Best we have experienced out of six or seven rentals.  Convenient and well-managed.
Great host, great location, would stay there again.
John’s place was clean, very hospitable and a great location to McGill University
Excellent!
Tidy, comfortable, with building access to a nice gym.
Great location and host, highly recommended
Great location for Old Montreal.  Clean and basic accommodation and amenities.  Good value for the area.

John’s apartment is very clean and modern with many amenities. It is conveniently located very close to Place-d'Armes subway (metro) station and Old Montreal. Check-in/check-out was easy, and John was very prompt and responsive with a few questions I had. It was a very enjoyable stay!

Super séjour à Montréal. L’appartement est situé à 2 pas du vieux Montréal. Parfait pour découvrir la ville. Hôte très arrangeant et vraiment sympathique. 
N’hésitez pas, c’est une adresse sûre ;)
A nice little place to stay and very convenient to the convention center and surrounding area.
Great unit and host! Strongly  recommend it

The apartment is very pretty. It is right next to Montreal's convention center, which comes in handy when you visit for a conference. It is also in the Old Montreal which, tourist-wise, I think is the best place to walk around. What I enjoyed the most was the amenities, e.g. iron, shampoo&conditioner, cooking supplies. John has been very responsive and easy to communicate with. I enjoyed my stay very much!

This place is everything you could need in a Montreal AirBnB. It’s stylish and homey, centrally located (near buses and subways), in a safe and secure building and with all of the amenities you need. I will choose this place every time!
John's place was elegant and had everything we needed. We felt so lucky to be in a beautiful apartment in such a convenient location for our vacation. John was communicative and accommodating.
John is a great host, very quick to reply. Apartment as expected - no complaints. All good.
This is a wonderful stay, location and value!  I would highly recommend and stay again.
Spacious 1 bedroom on high floor. Large windows and nice natural light in bedroom. Kitchen is dim. Great location close to RESO, metro and vieux Montreal.

name: Private Studio Sublet in Upper East Side
summary: This is a specious studio located in UES. Clean Pre-war building in a quite street facing backyard. Your own bedroom, bathroom and kitchen. No need to share with roommates. 2 minutes walk distance to Q train 72th Street station. 10 mins to Central Park. Tons of restaurants, bars, supermarket nearby. Don't miss this chance to live in the decent neighborhood in New York.
description: This is a specious studio located in UES. Clean Pre-war building in a quite street facing backyard. Your own bedroom, bathroom and kitchen. No need to share with roommates. 2 minutes walk distance to Q train 72th Street station. 10 mins to Central Park. Tons of restaurants, bars, supermarket nearby. Don't miss this chance to live in the decent neighborhood in New York.
house_rules: Utilities included but not with A/C.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

name: Sweet home!!!
summary: We would love to welcome  you to our place. Clean, beautiful and bright room. The apartment is just great for vacation, located on beautiful wide Avenue with palm trees leading to a clean new beach! Apartment with new renovation and new furniture! The apartment located 10 min walk to the seashore, big shopping center Diagonal mar, lots of supermarkets like Dia, Mercadona, Lidl. 2 min to the metro station L4 Besos Mar. Very friendly hosts!!!
space: It offers bright and cozy bedroom  as a separate  room, where you have a good rest, and elegant living room.  The room is located in 7 minutes from the sea. Great location, good transport interchange, close to many shops and cafes. Near Metro Station Besos Mar (line L4). The apartment is clean, comfortable, regular cleaning. Arrival at night from 23:00 to 06:00- an additional charge of 15 euros. Using the washing machine-5 euros.

Kitchen, salon, bathroom I am always available to solve any question and happy to help in case of need! I want them to fe
neighborhood_overview: Quiet area with many cafes, restaurants and shops. Supermarkets Lidl, dia, Mercadona around the corner. The beach is located 7 minute walk from the apartmens. A good place to go for a run along the beach with the sea breeze.  Convenient transport connections. Metro besos Mar is located 1 minutes. The centre and main attractions can be reached in 15 minutes direct!  Around the house there is free Parking. To get from the airport can take a taxi or the subway.
notes: IMPORTANT: please keep noises to a minimal especially late at night/early in the morning, to respect the sleep of others. We have a no-noise policy after 22, it is necessary to ensure that we can trust our guests to respect our space as well as our neighbors'. If you loose the keys of the apartment you will have to cover the costs of the replacement the copies of the keys(fee of 20 euros for each key). solve all problems only with me, do not go to neighbors!!! Be careful when using public transport, the theft of documents and telephones has become more frequent.  I am not responsible for the loss of valuable things.
transit: The metro is 2 minutes walk from the apartment. There are also buses, tram, leading to the center of the city.
access: Kitchen, salon, bathroom
interaction: I am always available to solve any question and happy to help in case of need! I want them to feel welcomed and comfortable!!! That is our priorities!!!
house_rules: Guests are required to wash the dishes for yourself. Take shoes off when at the flat. Be careful when using public transport, the theft of documents and telephones has become more frequent.  I am not responsible for the loss of valuable things. all questions are solved only with me, do not go to neighbors never!!!

name: Lucky House 2 Bed Rooms, 5 mins to MTR
summary: Newly renovated, located at the center of Mong Kok, next to the famous Lanham Shopping Arcarde, close to Lady's Street and "Sneakers Street", downstairs to quality restaurants ,3min to Mongkok MTR Station. 4min to Yau Ma Tei MTR Station
description: Newly renovated, located at the center of Mong Kok, next to the famous Lanham Shopping Arcarde, close to Lady's Street and "Sneakers Street", downstairs to quality restaurants ,3min to Mongkok MTR Station. 4min to Yau Ma Tei MTR Station The whole apartment Anytime
