host.host_about:
Hello My name is Lulu. I love travelling around and making friends｡ I hope you would enjoy my place like your home. The following are my apartment source:
https://zh.airbnb.com/rooms/5754247
https://zh.airbnb.com/rooms/8480074
https://zh.airbnb.com/rooms/11290379
https://zh.airbnb.com/rooms/6238727

reviews.comments: 非常好的房子,极其干净,周围非常繁华,坐地铁很方便｡房东人很好,沟通顺畅｡下次再来还会选择这里

House has super good space with 2brs room. It is so close to the MTR. The shopping district is so busy at later night which makes you never lonely.
Bounch of good food was downstairs. Lift is tight and slow but very normal in Hongkong. 
I will stay here again for sure.

We were really happy with this accommodation. We stayed here for a month and this made the perfect base for our time in HK. The apartment was really clean, and the location was super convenient- close to MTR and bus stops. By HK standards, this apartment is spacious- we had four guests stay here. Best of all, Lulu the host was fantastic- quick at communicating with us, and eager to help us out with extra requests, such as additional bed sheets and borrowing an iron. We definitely recommend this place!
Strategic location..Easy to access anywhere that you would like to..
很方便｡｡虽然小,可是还是住的很舒服｡｡靠近女人街｡｡楼下就有24小时的餐馆｡｡

Staying in Lulu’s home for the holidays had been great! We didn’t expect that the rooms will be big than expected knowing HK’s typical room area. She also responds quickly to our needs and queries. Definitely recommended for a group of family. And will definitely book a room again in Lulu’s home once we return to HK.

The location of Lulu's place is very convenient and accessible, just a 5 minute walk from Mongkok MTR Station. 
The house itself is neat, clean and big enough to accommodate 6 people. Also, the amenities provided were sufficient. 
Lulu is a very friendly and hospitable host. She was prompt in her replies and went the extra mile to provide us extra blankets when there was an unexpected cold weather. She also offered to personally pick us up from the MTR station to guide us to the apartment. 
Overall, we had a comfortable stay and we would definitely stay here if we visit Hong Kong again.

Place is small but in a great location and not too hard to find.  Just needed more towels and a heater during cold periods.  The doorman was friendly and the place was very secure.  Lulu was responsive when we reached out to her for assistance and recommendations.
It has been a wonderful experience for my family and me.. nice cosy place, very convenient as it is just a couple mins walk from mtr.. will stay here again on my next trip to Hong Kong

Lulu's house is very strategic.3-5 min to MTR Mongkok & Ladies Market. The place is safe as it has security door. The house is also very clean and well (Website hidden by Airbnb) just there were no heater and we were freezing cold. And the water heater is a bit problem. The house has wifi, washing machine,kitchen amenities, fridge, tv but no iron. The house can just fits 4 adults..(2 rooms with queen bed) Lulu has been very helping as she can also speaks english.She has arranged our transportation for arrival and departure from HKIA.Will definitely come again and stay at Lulu's house.See u in the near future Lulu..tq for the warm hospitality.
Lulu的房子乾淨,離地鐵,公交車站都很近,房東熱情,回覆快,還讓我們提前存放行李,就是冬天熱水不能維持很久,樓下會有點雜,不過晚上不下樓的都無所謂,總體來說很不錯｡

Our family (2 adults, 2 young kids) had a good stay at Lulu's apartment. Although it is located in the midst of the bustle of Mong Kok, it is high enough away from the crowds to be peaceful and quiet. It's spacious (by HK standards) with a decent shower and Wifi. The location was excellent. We didn't meet Lulu, but she was very quick with responses and friendly too. Recommended.
房间很干净,设施也齐全,交通比较便利
It is a very convenient and clean place. Larger than most homes in Hong Kong I believe. Don’t expect to see the host, but Lulu is very responsive.

Very Good and affordable restaurant just below the apartment..
Close to public transportation
We used taxi because we have 2 senior citizen
We are all 5 and In HK there are a lot of taxi good for 5pax same with taxi for  4pax..
Lulu’s place by taxi
to disneyland is 125HKD
To victoria  ferry harbour,tower clock or avenue of stars  is 50HKD
To victoria peak  is HKD 175
To macau ferry HKD 125
U can get taxi just infront of the (Website hidden by Airbnb) is also possible to use bus but no direct bus going to victoria peak and disneyland....very central,
I Recommend

Stayed in Lulu’s apartment for 2 weeks. She was really accomodating and friendly.. the apartment was comfortable and clean..We never had a problem in the duration of our stay. Definitely recommend Lulu..

Lulu's place is located strategically and is walkable to public transportion, eating places and shopping malls.

The sheets are clean and beds are comfortable. The place is small but is expected as HK houses are normally not huge. 

Check in procedure is smooth, the security guards on shift are also very friendly. 

We have had a great 5 nights stay here.

first time i have guts to try air bnb, we look foward so many homes,  and last we choose lucky house and the host lulu so nice and fast response also welcome us very
 well,  Thank you lulu,  for great hospitalized, for fast response when we needed a airport transfer.. will recomend lulu for sure..makes us feel homes at hongkong
As always Lulu’s apartment never disappoints us.. My go to apartment everytime I’m in Hong Kong.. she’s the best host and very helpful all the time..
交通十分便利,离旺角地铁站步行只要几分钟,下楼就走很多吃饭的地方……房子明亮干净,配套很全……
房子干净整洁,布置得很温馨｡“麻雀虽小,五脏俱全”｡交通便利,离地铁站､公交站都很近,购物､吃饭都很方便｡
Best place.

Good place and clean apartment (all picture same with real condition) and the place in center of Mangkok.  I think this apartment is good for 4 adults only, even Sofa can use for sleep.
Lulu also really fast to respond all my questions.  She was a nice host which was great for staying 7 nights!
This house is Close to MTR and lulu is fast responding and very nice.
Lulu was so helpful throughout my entire HK trip! Her apartment was also perfectly located within walking distance from MTR, Ladies’ Market, Temple St, and shopping.

Looking for a place to stay in Mong Kok? This apartment is perfectly located. About 5min walk to the MTR. There is good food just outside the building (street food and restaurants). Popular destinations such as the Lady’s Market and Temple Street Market are close (<10 min walk). The apartment is clean, and stocked with the necessities. I was expecting the beds to be hard HK mattresses but they weren’t as hard as expected and quite comfortable for a foreigner. Air conditioners in each room keep the place cool at night. Lulu is a great host and very responsive. Highly recommend staying here!!
Spacious, clean unit
Great location for shopping, food & near MRT station. Fast response & Clean. Highly recommended
The place is nice, clean, near from mtr n ladies market. i got discount for the day we go to macau and we can put our luggages in the apartment..
Lulu is a very nice host and the apartment is very good, we had a very good time in hk
A great place to stay. Very convenient. Near to MTR that can connect to all the places of interest. Many cafes and restaurants just down the street. Will come back again.

Have to get a clear instructions on where to collect the keys and which unit you’re staying as it wasn’t communicated until the last minute, especially with fussy toddlers, we would expect a clear instructions to prevent inconvenience
Good
Great location for MTR, food & shopping. Convenient store is within walking distance.
Very helpful host and convenient location
Place was fine but we were not informed the toilets in the entire 20+ story building would not be working for 2 days
地理位置很好,周边有万宁,莎莎｡
麻雀虽小,五脏俱全,出行方便,房东人也不错,图片真实,值得推荐

host.host_about:
I'm from İstanbul.I'm industrial engineer at Istanbul Technical University. I like meeting with new people from different countries so I believe that sharing my apartment with my guest is a good opportunity to know more people all around the world. I like travelling. (I visited Sevilla, Granada, Madrid, Barselona, Athens, Skopje, Sofia, Beograd, Budapest, Prag, Moscow, Krakow, Sarajevo, Chisinau, Lisbon, Napels, Amsterdam, Wienna, Milano, Foggia, Rome, Frenze, Venice, Thaossaloniki, Kavala, Thassos, Beirut, Lviv, Gent, Brussels)
You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read my all reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul and other things. I'll help you all your travel.

reviews.comments: he is the best thanks nice clean comfy home

Мы останавливались в комнате у Кубилая на 3 дня,нам очень понравилось и комната и общение с ним.В квартире очень чисто и комфортно,много времени проводили в гостинной,хороший интернет и вобще расположение квартиры очень хорошее для передвижения по Стамбулу-рядом автобусы,10-15 минут до всех известных стамбульских мест.Отдельно про хозяина-очень дружелюбный и общительный,встретил нас рано утром,все показал и рассказал,каждое утро предлагал завтрак и чай, после отъезда помог нам с поселением в другую гостиницу,т.к. в ней никто не говорил по-английски)Будем рады встретиться опять и остановиться в его доме.Спасибо за радушный прием,Кубилай!)

이 숙소에서 일주일정도 머물렀네요. 

숙소를 정할때 이것저것 꼼꼼히 따지지만 인터넷상으론 절대 알 수 없는게 주인은 어떤 사람일까 이잖아요. 아무리 좋은 시설의 숙소라도 주인이 별로라면 아무리 방안에만 있는다해도 마음이 편하지 않더라고요. 
Kubilay 는 게스트의 마음을 편하게 하는 법을 아는 사람이에요. 겸손하고 유쾌해서 대화를 나누어도 친구와 편하게 이야기 나누는 것 같았고 또. 혼자서 조용히 시간을 보내고 싶을때에도 그런 저를 배려해주었어요. 

전반적으로 집도 깨끗하고 사진에 보이는 것처럼 방도 넓어서 지내는 동안 불편하지 않았고요 또 과일이나 커피등도 마음껏 먹었습니다. 저녁에는 Kubilay가 직접 전통차를 내려주기도 해서 차 마시며 밤 늦게까지 이야기하기도 했네요. 

위치는 중심가하고는 조금 떨어져있어요. 버스타고 20분 정도 거리입니다. 보스 정류장은 집에서 멀지 않아요. 게다가 종점이라 중간에 내려야하느라 신경 곤두 세우는 일은 없습니다. 탁심이나 술탄에선 멀지만 이 곳도 쇼핑가와 먹거리길등이 있ㅇ요. 오히려 음식 가격은 중심가보다 훨씬 저렴해서 좋았네요  

다시 머물고 싶을 만큼 좋은 곳이었습니다!!

Thanks Kubilay :)

Kubilay is a very welcoming and kind guy, I can easily recommend anyone to stay with him. Comfortable bed, nice room and nice flat. The location is in a non-touristy area, which is great for good, cheap food and a better experience of local life. There are also good transport connections to the rest of the city for when you want to do sightseeing.

At this point Kubilay feels just like a member of my family , an older brother  I'd say (even that he's younger than me :) ). I always know that no matter what when I go to Istanbul there is a warm welcoming Kubilay there always ready to do what ever to make your stay more pleasant.

Don't miss having that delcious breakfast with him on the weekend.

We arrived home with wonderful experience. Kubi is excelent host, everything was exactly as on explanation on site. Happy that we have new friend in Istanbul, and our warm recommandation for everyone who want to stay in this city. Can not wait till summer to meet this wonderful guy again! 
Resime: PERFECT!

I throughly enjoyed my stay with Kubilay. Although he wasn't there the first few days he stayed in touch and made sure that my stay in Istanbul was going smoothly, as well as having his friend meet us and show us the neighborhood etc. 

Kubilay is very sweet, trustworthy, friendly and good person to stay with. He is dedicated to making sure that your stay is as good as possible and extremely helpful. Makes for great conversation with a great vibe. I hope to return to Istanbul and when I do I'll stay with him once more!

This apartment is very nice for the duration of your stay in Istanbul. Kubi best and very good man. Spacious and clean apartment. Near the apartment there is a restaurant, a market all the necessary. If you want to leave a good impression living in Istanbul, I Recommend Kubi apartment)))

I liked that Kubilay's place because was nearby public transportation. I liked that there mere many resturants and shops close by. I enjoyed the farmers market on Wednesday, that was in walking distance from his house.
Everything is simply satisfying and great, the host is very helpful and his english is really good so it was eazy for both to communicate, i advise everyone for this house

It was a wonderful time for me in Mr. Kubilay house , I spent almost a month in his beautiful house and enjoyed a lot of Discussion and talking about cultures and Istanbul with him , also the neighborhood is quiet and very warm.

Kubilay is the best! Truly a superhost, there are not enough words to describe how great the Istanbul experience is when your host is Kubi. Thank you Kubi for your hospitality, friendliness and for for being such an amazing person!

Its always great to return to my “second home”. Well, Kubi’s abode is always the perfect place to stay as not a single day you feel like a stranger renting at his place. He always makes you feel so welcome and treat you like his own family members. He will always be there for you in times of need during your entire stay in Istanbul. In addition to that, he has a great heart too as he also support me for my humanitarian work in Istanbul in donating brand new clothes for the refugees! Wow! Definitely a gret host to stay with... for my entire month stay in Istanbul!

This is my first AirBnB stay with a super host and now I know what it means.
Kubi truly is a super host, he made my stay in a Istanbul more lovely, he is really a very helpful person.
The place is nice, many shops & supermarkets nearby, Buses and metro are close.

Спасибо большое Куби за гостеприимство и молниеносный ответ! Оказавшись в аэропорту Стамбула, Куби очень быстро откликнулся на мой запрос  Квартира находится рядом с автобусным кольцом оттуда можно добраться до самого центра! Рядом очень много магазинчиков и очень вкусная пекарня.

I was a bit afraid to go to Istambul alone, but thanks to Kubilay I enjoyed my stay there. He is very hospitable, sociable, always ready to answer any questions and give advice. 
The house is very spacious and warm, with all necessary equipment, and the atmosphere is so that I felt like at home)  
You will need about 30-40 minutes to go to the centre of Istambul by bus, keep it in mind when you plan your trip.
But though it is a bit far from the centre, there are advantages too. The house is situated in the district for locals, not for tourists. So you can buy cheap food there. You can find locum for 6 lira/kilo, cheap nuts and other turkish delights. There are also local shops near the house with good quality cotton clothes, underwear, tights etc.
Definitely recommend this host! Thank you very much for your hospitality!

I  stayed at   Kubilay’s place for  7 days and it was everything as advertised. It is the best location and shortest walk to access the bus and metro and minibus . It is also very convenient to shopping, restaurants, . The location of  the unit is incredible. My experience with the Kubilay’s  was very responsive and helpful . He personally makes us breakfast every Saturday and Sunday . The bottom line is I received very good value for my money and  Kubilay’s place will be my first choice on future trips to Istanbul .

Kubilay house is amazing good. Kubi is good and so nice guy who help me to search everything. He inform me everything about what i need. This place near from everywhere you no need scare for hungry becuase this place really central place. You just need walk little to get bus station and the hostes really nice to help you. No dispointed to stay here. I will stay here everytime i go to turkey. Good experience. Tessekur ederiz kubilay for your services

Would highly recommend Kabulai. Friendly down to earth and very hospitable - dont hesitate. The guy is awesome and his place is very spacious and clean. Made me breakfast on the Sunday I was leaving which was a good gesture. Wish I could've stayed longer.
The gentle home of a gentleman's educator, he can give you the utmost enthusiasm and help. You can't be mistaken for living here.
EXCELENTE

Kubilay is the best!!! Very helpful person and lives in a very quest & central place in Istanbul. Very tasty breakfast and very warm welcoming home. 
Kubilay took us around in Istanbul(he knows the best of eateries, we are both Vegetarian) and is culturally knowledgeable for those who like history.
We would definitely recommend him to other people in Airbnb.  
Thank you Kubilay!!
很舒適的一個地方..房東人也很好..熱情的款待都吃得很飽^v^

It was indeed very memorable trip, Kubilay was very friendly and guided us for everything , including the maps , bus routes and turist locations. We still miss and talk about the turkish chai that we had together along with chit chat and baklawa.
Enjoy!
Kubilay is great host and human being  it was nice to meet and know him

My room had a window that was against another building wall so the room didnt have almost any natural light which for me was kind of depressing. On the other hand Kabilay is extremely helpful and friendly, always there to give you a tip or advice on how to get somewhere around Istanbul. His grandmas strawberry jam and insistence of feeding his guests is very admirable ;) There is another room for second guest that has windows turned to an open street, so probably there is a sense to ask about which one is available.
Nice place to visit Istanbul.  Kind and friendly hosting.

Hospitality at its best. Kubilay is very helpful and honest. A clean and safe environment. The kitchen is always stocked up and one can help oneself to whatever one wants. There are also jam and dried apricots from his mother who lives in a distant village. One can use the washing machine and iron. The bathroom has shampoo, soap, toothpaste, and shaving cream. One can sit and chat with him in the evening in the living room. From the beginning I felt as though I was visiting a close friend even though I’d never met him before. It was just like staying over at a friend except that he was more hospitable than many of my friends. He is very helpful with information regarding getting around Istanbul and Turkey especially if one is looking for inexpensive options. The neighbourhood has many shops. He really is a superhost and likes taking care of his guests. The WiFi and all the amenities were more than adequate for my needs. The location was convenient for me. He will be my first choice when visiting Istanbul again. Nic.

Kubilay es una persona muy amable. Nos proporcionó desayuno los días de nuestra estancia y además frutas y frutos secos de cortesía, además de prestarnos Istanbulkarts para movilizarnos por la ciudad. Estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y tuvo todo listo para nuestra llegada a pesar que reservamos con sólo un día de anticipación. Estamos muy agradecidos con sus atenciones.

This was my second stay at Kubi. I was happy he had another vacancy. We have become good friends and I can really recommend his hospitality and helpfulness. Some Ecuadoreans missed their flight home while I was there and their only language was Spanish. He was up into the very early hours of the morning helping them arrange another flight. This is just one small example of his helpfulness.

Besides that there is always food in the fridge and kitchen and one is free to help oneself and rustle up breakfast or any other meal. There is a living room to relax in, and he’ll help plan your activities advising on transport options and better shops and restaurants, etc, and the bathroom is always clean and functional.
Mr Kubilay was a great man

Kubilay can give the best options for everything that you want to do in Istanbul. He is great! The location is well positioned with 1 public transport to every place that we want to visit and it's quite

Muy aconsejable. Kubilay muy amable. Te ayuda y te explica lo que haga falta. Sin pedirle me escribió según llegue al alojamiento como llegar en autobús a los sitios más emblemáticos. Detallista. Me hubiese gustado hablar más con él pero mi inglés es reducido. . Si repito, vuelvo.

name: Chelsea Dream: Stunning Duplex 1,800sf Loft~6BEDS
summary: Stunning Newly Renovated 1,800 SQFT - 4Bedroom TownHouse Condo. In the vibrant & sought after Chelsea Area. Steps from Downtown & Times Square. Metro 1 block away. High ceilings, 1 King Size Bedroom & 3 Queen Size bedrooms. Brand new kitchen & Marble bath. Steps from Madison Square park, Empire State Building, sensational restaurants, bars, and couture. This amazing location is one of the most sought after in all of NYC. Enjoy your stay in a rare find & make it one to remember forever.
space: Amazing Duplex- Two FLOOR - 4 bedroom  Condo 1800 sq. ft. loft! Its like an entire house with over 6 beds on two levels with 4 bedrooms.  • Situated centrally near Chelsea & Madison Square Park and Penn Station and just a few blocks from Herald Square with access to every subway and tons of shopping. Just a few blocks from the hip Nomad neighborhood where you can stop by at the Ace for a coffee, the Breslin for some great food or head for a walk through Eataly. • The living room features a large flat screen TV with a Custom Tillary West Elm sectional couch. This couch can also become a single bed because the cushions come off.  • Adjacent to the living room is a dining area that seats up to 8. • Newly installed Air-conditioning units in each room! • Large gallery kitchen with new appliances. Kitchen includes utensils, glassware, pots, pans and everything else you would need to comfortably cook gourmet meals throughout your stay. • Master bedroom features King sized bed • The other thre
description: Stunning Newly Renovated 1,800 SQFT - 4Bedroom TownHouse Condo. In the vibrant & sought after Chelsea Area. Steps from Downtown & Times Square. Metro 1 block away. High ceilings, 1 King Size Bedroom & 3 Queen Size bedrooms. Brand new kitchen & Marble bath. Steps from Madison Square park, Empire State Building, sensational restaurants, bars, and couture. This amazing location is one of the most sought after in all of NYC. Enjoy your stay in a rare find & make it one to remember forever. Amazing Duplex- Two FLOOR - 4 bedroom  Condo 1800 sq. ft. loft! Its like an entire house with over 6 beds on two levels with 4 bedrooms.  • Situated centrally near Chelsea & Madison Square Park and Penn Station and just a few blocks from Herald Square with access to every subway and tons of shopping. Just a few blocks from the hip Nomad neighborhood where you can stop by at the Ace for a coffee, the Breslin for some great food or head for a walk through Eataly. • The living room features a large flat scr
neighborhood_overview: This area is Simply Amazing has everything nearby restaurants nightlife. You can walk to Time Square Flatiron Gramercy West Village East Village Greenwich Village. This is the best part about being here. You can take the train and be at Central Park after only a few stops. It's one of the trendiest and most sought-after areas in all of Manhattan.
transit: We are very close to 2 major trains. The 7 line and the C,E trains. Both trains are Only 100-150 meters away. You can easily walk and explore most of downtown and midtown or use the nearby trains to get anywhere. We are very central and convenient for getting to know Manhattan.
access: We provide most of the basics Linens, towels. Just bring yourself.  Included: -High-speed internet and Fast WIFI*** -Cable Many Channels.  -Basic cooking supplies -Linens and Towels -Hairdryer -Iron -A clean home to relax and enjoy your vacation -A work-friendly space to catch up on work while on vacation
interaction: We always make ourselves available to our guests. You can message us at anytime.
house_rules: House rules: -Respect the neighbours: there should be No parties/Loud music - as it's a quiet family community. And please - do not block the building entrance. It is narrow & can be a fire hazard.  -This is a Non Smoking apt, if you smoke outside - please don't leave the trash there. -No Pets ( allergies) -we don't wear street Shoes in apt: this keeps the space clean. And all the new furniture & designs intact for all to enjoy.  -please Keep apt. in good condition: Please don't jump on the bed or furniture or pile heavy bags on the sofa, tables or chairs. -Be green: Please don't forget to turn off the AC and light when you going out. -Check-in /out should be done while maintaining peace and tranquility of the building & common areas.  Things to Note: Late check-in fee: arrival after 10pm - 50$, arrival at midnight and later- $100 We don't keep the luggage in apt after chek-out . Please check for convinient storage in advance. We can provide an option if asked.  Lost key fine: 50$ per

host.host_about: Growing up and living in New York has made me appreciate this great city for what it is. I enjoying meeting new people from all walks of life and sharing my love for this city through my home. I hope to share my knowledge with all this city has to offer.

reviews.comments: Thanks Zach for a great stay in your amazing apartment, walking distance everywhere and amazing subway connections and supermarket/coffee/bagel options at our doorstep. Loved it!

Stayed at Zack's place for my duration and it was perfect for our group of four people. It was very convenient being 15 min from WTC where we had to work. For NYC this is a big appartment with 3 bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs and 1 bedroom downstairs. Overall I'd stay here again.

We had a great stay. 

Loved being so close to the subway (50 meters) and so easy to get everywhere. 

Beds were very comfortable with nice sheets and bathroom was nice with nice white towels. 

We got the train from JFK which was pretty easy and the stop on 23rd street is super close to the apartment. 

Couple of things to note- The bedrooms are small, but good for NYC I guess (queen beds). Also, the front rooms have some noise at night but not bad.

Overall a great stay in a good location in NYC!
Great for groups or families.  Not easy to find a 4 bedroom place in NYC at a great rate and great location.
This apartment has lots of sleeping options for a big group. It is very convenient to subways and shopping. Everything was clean and in good working order. Very comfortable and a good value.

Zach's home was great!
A great location.
A great space.
Great rooms.
....And great communication!

Thanks for a great stay. We will be back.
Lauren!
We had a great 2 day stay with Zach. The location is great, close by everything. We would definitely stay there again.
Great value for money, excellent location and wonderful space. Great host to communicate with and helpful guide for things to do and see and places to eat. Highly recommend it.

Awesome place to stay. Location is awesome very close almost everything you need and right next to a 24 hour  rite-aid. Place was clean and warm.  Zach was super easy to communicate with and very kind. Couple of the rooms were bit loud in the morning due to the recycling bins being next to it but still we had a wonderful time staying there. Thank you Zach!
Place was spacious and nice. Still needs some touch-ups, like fix flickering bedroom light, hanging ceiling panels, small dorm-room type refrigerator.

The apartment was clean and very well located (proximity of CVS, Whole Foods, and subway).
Everything was comfortable and well equipped. However, the rooms that are next to the street are a bit noisy, as other guests have commented already, and less luminous than in the pictures.
The communication with Zach and his partner could improve.
Great location and hospitality

Zach was so kind and friendly, he always responsed quickly.
The room was clean and cozy. The biggest bedroom at downstairs was a little bit cold, and it was hard unloading  own suitcase because the stairs was so narrow. 
He gave us the guide suggesting places to visit in NY,  so  we could spent really good time.

the location of the flat is really great. zach was super easy to communicate with and made sure we had everything we needed. We were a group of 7 people and the flat had a great size for it. I can only recommend it.
Clean, well-equipped apartment in a fantastic location!

Comfortable and clean apt in a fantastic location. Ideal for family or small group. Zach was great to communicate with and check in was exactly as arranged. Zach also sent us some useful information for our stay in NY.
Great stay and home is as advertised.  Location is great and the home comfortable.  Highly recommended!
Zach’s place was wonderful and offered a great place that was very convenient to many different areas of the city. The house was clean and tidy and perfect four out group.

Great host, very helpful and the apartment is in a convenient area. Very comfortable beds which is the key for our family. However the pictures can be deceiving as this is a very dark basement flat and unfortunately there was a pretty bad smell that permeated the place the week we were there. We may have been unlucky. Overall reasonable value, but this is the first Airbnb location our family has been disappointed by, and is our 10th.

So we lucked out on booking this spot last minute a week before our trip. The apartment is VERY spacious! 4 full bedrooms which was awesome. Kitchen and living area is smaller than in photos but not a deal breaker as you should be spending your time out in the city and not your apartment. 

Location was perfect. Whole Foods is right around the corner for grocery shopping needs in addition to a Walgreens and CVS. You MUST try the bagels at Brooklyn Coffee & Bagels right around the corner!

We walked everywhere from the apartment. The high line was a short 10 minute walk and we walked from Time Square as well. 

Thanks for hosting us!

Great spot in NY - Nice area with easy access to midtown Manhattan. Perfect if you want to do all the tourist stuff without having to stay in the thick of it. A short walk south is the more local side to NY - beautiful streets and great vibe. LOADS of places to eat and drink. I would definitely recommend.

The location of Zach's space is ideal - so convenient to anything you need. Check-in was a bit more difficult than necessary due to communication issues from the host's proxy, the dishwasher was broken, the couch needs cleaned, and the spiral staircase is very rickety and needs tightening. However, the space we needed and the convenient location outweighed the issues and we had a decent stay.

This apartment is really great! The location is perfect and so close to public transportation! Zach is very responsive and quickly answered all of our questions! The apartment has plenty of space and everything you might need for a stay in the city. I would definitely recommend this spot!

Cooles Apartment in einer guten Ecke von Chelsea! Wir waren dort als fünfköpfige Familie für eine Woche und können die Unterkunft sehr empfehlen. Man muss sich natürlich absprechen, was die Nutzung des einzigen Badezimmers angeht, und der Bereich „Wohn-/Esszimmer“ ist eher klein, aber die Schlafzimmer sind super, die Küche ist gut ausgestattet und die Wohnung ist relativ ruhig. Direkt um die Ecke ein Wholefoods-Store und alle öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel ohne Probleme zu Fuss zu erreichen.

The location is the best!  
The master bedroom is downstairs with a narrow stairs. 3 bedrooms and a bathroom on ground level. 
Perfect when you’re planning to go out all the time to enjoy the city and just go home to sleep.

Great things about this place:
1. location .. location .. location...smack in the middle of everything in the city and convenient to Whole Foods, CVS et al.
2. Clean place as promised,
3. Communications with the host and proxy is smooth 

Things to consider before booking :

1. Single bathroom.. suggest not to consider for more than 4-5 max through sleeps 8-10..

2. No daylight or views as this is 1st floor and basement as setup..

3. Not kids friendly ( under 7) as restricted staircase...sofa needs cleaning ..

Minor thing as needed to shop for toiletries but was refunded promptly ..

Unfortunately and contrary to all the other reviews we were very disappointed by this accommodation, despite its good location in Manhattan, all the windows overlook garbage cans, the steps of the building are the rallying point of the street beggars, he is dark, the area is not at all, for my part there is barely more than half of the advertised area, the living space is tiny or nonexistent, the staircase is very dangerous, despite the good will de Zach tell us all the good of her apartment, I am director of two hotels and I know what I am talking about. For families to avoid.

Malheureusement et contrairement a tous les autres commentaires nous avons été très déçu par ce logement, malgré son bon emplacement dans Manhattan, toutes les fenêtres donnent sur des poubelles, les marches de l'immeuble sont le point de ralliement des mendiants de la rue, il est sombre, la superficie n'y est pas du tout, pour ma part il y a à peine plus de moitié de la surface annoncée, l'espace à vivre est minuscule voire inexistant, l'escalier est très dangereux, malgré la bonne volonté de Zach de nous dire tout le bien de son appartement, je suis directrice de deux hôtels et je sais de quoi je parle. Pour les familles à éviter.

Les photos de l appartement sont plus jolies que la réalité
L appartement est en rez-de-chaussée donc extrêmement bruyant avec le container poubelle devant
En revanche Chelsea est un quartier très central

This stylish apartment was perfect- sparkling clean and in a great location for attractions, shopping, groceries, cafes and to the Metro.  Host was courteous, helpful and responsive to any questions or needs.  We will def come back to this apartment!

We are so glad we found this gem, the location is perfect and there is a CVS  and food located just steps away. We were a large group of nine and it may have been that everyone woke up at different times, though we did not have any issues with the one bathroom. The place was clean and had everything we needed. We had a fantastic stay and would definitely come back!

Thank you so much for the stay.  The location is perfect and close to the nearby subway.  The apartment was cozy and the beds were very comfortable.  There were nearby amenities and plenty of food option.  I really enjoyed Brooklyn Bagels nearby.
Great ground floor apartment in a good location on a quiet side street. Plenty of restaurants nearby. We would stay there again.
Adorable apartment  in a great location!  Perfect for big group. Easy communication. Thanks for a great stay!

Overall I would say it way an okay to good experience.

At the airport we asked a taxi driver to take us to the address but they were unable to find it, eventually settled on the Bagel Cafe.  Greeted by John here rather than at the apartment, he claimed it was a fire hazard to congregate outside the entrance, but after being shown around the apartment by John he asked us not to mention Airbnb but instead to say we were visiting friends.  Airbnb has been vilified in NYC as taking trade from hotels.

Apartment was not dirty, more grubby, but acceptable.  Most things were clean, but things like the light switches and doors were all covered in fingerprints.

It's an old building so had some quirks, e.g. the spiral stairs to the lower floor were quite wobbly and there was a water pipe from floor to ceiling in the kitchenette area.  This got very very very hot from time to time, too hot to touch or you would burn yourself. This surprisingly wasn't mentioned by John.  There was no way to control the temperature in the apartment and when the pipe heated and cooled the wooden floor would click noisily through the night as it expanded and contracted.  This was worse for the member of our group staying in the common area.

One of the front bedrooms was very cold, the AC unit in the window was poorly fitted and so let in lots of cold air.

Bring you own toilet paper!  What was supplied was single ply and was better at spreading rather than cleaning!!

The actual location in Manhattan was ideal with easy access to most areas either on foot or the nearby subway.  This made up for the apartments shortcomings as we were out most of the time.
It was also a good price compared to hotels and allowed the seven of us to have a shared area which would have been difficult in a hotel.  One bathroom was a challenge for us but this we knew about this in advance.

Finally, I wouldn't re-book or recommend this to a friend.

Here you can expect a nice apartment close to both the subway, shops and nice cafés within a couple of minutes walking distance. The best transport  to central Manhattan is the metro in 5-10 minutes or walking for 45 minutes.
Good
Very comfortable place. Great place to crash while visiting the city!
The flat was in an excellent location right by the subway and very good value for the area and size. Overall we had a great stay

This charming duplex was in an excellent location in Chelsea. We were given great instructions on check in and the house was very clean and tidy. Lots of extra room which is very hard to come by in New York. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking to enjoy a lovely stay in Chelsea and we will be back!
Fantastic location, noisy front rooms, one spacious bedroom in the basement. Good for 2-3 nights but a bit weird floor plan. Bring earplugs for the night. Overall great value.
great location. gym next door, coffee place and bagel shop on otherside. wholefood market down block. everything was sooooo convenient

Zach’s apartment was in a great location and met the needs of our group. The space was clean and updated. It was easy to access the subway system, find parking, and walk to many places. The bagel place was great and it was convenient to have CVS and Whole Foods right there. The value of the apartment was also very appealing for a large group. Things to note: 1. You cannot adjust the heat in the apartment and there is a pole in the middle of the kitchen that gets very hot. 2. The staircase is extremely narrow and hard to use, especially with luggage. 3.  There is a lot of street noise in the front two bedrooms. People chat outside beginning at around 5am.  4. The bathroom in the apartment is not the one pictured in the listing. It is much smaller and not what I would call “spacious”. 5. The pigeons hang out right outside all the windows and make noises day and night. (Don’t leave the windows open or they might come in!)

Overall, we enjoyed our stay and would come back again.

Great location in the heart of Chelsea, super close to central subway stations. The streets were noisy at night and you could hear this from inside the apartment. There is little natural light that gets into the place, as the place is on the bottom floor.

Overall, my family and I had a very nice stay in Zach’s place and would recommend it to other travelers. Here are the pros and cons:

Pros:
- Perfect location next to the metro, CVS, restaurants, bars, and a quick shot to many different parts of town.
- Very clean! The kitchen and bathroom are recently redone. The sheets were clean and comfortable.
- Great amenities! Coffee pot, tea kettle, and even a dishwasher were very nice to have breakfast in the apartment. He even has a stash of Tide if you want to wash a few things in the sink.
- Lots of seating - the main room has enough chairs (albeit plastic ones) that all 6 of us could hang out in there comfortably.
- The beds were all pretty comfortable. I could have done with fluffier pillows but I just stole pillows from the downstairs bed and that helped.

Cons:
- The stairs. If you really need that fourth bedroom downstairs, good luck. Fortunately we had 3 couples so everyone stayed upstairs. I would have been very concerned if someone had to go up this crazy narrow staircase in the middle of the night to use the restroom. Sadly, it’s the largest room with the biggest bed. Unfortunately it’s more of a loft space so there’s no door so don’t expect any privacy or quiet down there.
- 1 restroom. Not ideal for the amount of people this place sleeps, but that can’t be helped.
- The street noise and light. The con of having a first floor apartment next to a 24 hour CVS - people were outside the window at all hours of the night on the phone, fighting, etc. one of the windows was even above the building’s dumpster so you could hear people going through the trash at night. Also the light shines right from the street into the front rooms. Bring ear plugs and an eye shade.
- It was a bit strange that Zack wanted us to meet him at the bagel shop down the street and not in front of the apartment, but didn’t tell us until an hour before we arrived. Well, I missed the email anyway as we were trying to navigate transportation.

Le logement est idéalement situé, en toute proximité de plusieurs lignes de métro et de commerces permettant de s'approvisionner notamment en mufins pour le petit-déjeuner...
Le logement était adapté pour nous 6 (4 chambres avec rangements), au delà ça peut être un peu juste (pas suffisamment de chaises et table trop petite).
Nous avons trouvé le logement dans très bon état de propreté.
A renouveler le cas échéant !

name: Cheap Large Bedroom w/WorkDesk- 10min to JFK/Mall
summary: We're close to JFK airport,3 groceries (Walmart),2 Banks,1 Post Office. JFK airport is a 10-minute drive (cost $$16-22). Public transport to house takes 1 hour- Q111 Rosedale Bus (4min walk to house), LIRR Rosedale(20 min walk to house). To Manhattan- Q111 Bus to E Train or LIRR to Penn Station or x63 express Bus. Also, we are a 10-minute drive to Green Acres Mall,Walmart,Home Depot,Olive Garden,Apple Bees etc. There is a work desk available and yoga mat to destress.
description: We're close to JFK airport,3 groceries (Walmart),2 Banks,1 Post Office. JFK airport is a 10-minute drive (cost $$16-22). Public transport to house takes 1 hour- Q111 Rosedale Bus (4min walk to house), LIRR Rosedale(20 min walk to house). To Manhattan- Q111 Bus to E Train or LIRR to Penn Station or x63 express Bus. Also, we are a 10-minute drive to Green Acres Mall,Walmart,Home Depot,Olive Garden,Apple Bees etc. There is a work desk available and yoga mat to destress. In a 10 minute walk - there is the Rosedale Queens Library, Post Office, Walgreens, Jamaica Food Take out, Laundromat, Cleaners, local bar pub, local restaurants and grocery store. In a 20 minute walk there is the Rosedale LiRR Station that can take you straight to Manhattan in 25 minutes. neighborhood_overview: We are across the street of a playground/ school. We are a 5 minute walk to Brookville Park. In a 10 minute walk - there is the Rosedale Queens Library, Post Office, Walgreens, Jamaica Food Take out, Laundromat, Cleaners, local bar pub, local restaurants and grocery store. In a 20 minute walk there is the Rosedale LiRR Station that can take you straight to Manhattan in 25 minutes. In a 30 minute walk there is Green Acres Mall Center with access to Walmart, Target, Home Depot, Best Buy, Macys, TGIF, Arbys, Olive Garden, Red Lobster etc. If you take a car/uber/cab all of these locations are a 5 minute drive. JFK is a 10 minute drive.
transit: There is a parking space in front of the house and in the driveway. Look for the orange cones to signal the house. There is Q111 Rosedale Bus that stops 6 blocks from the house. There is an x63 express bus to Manhattan that stops in front of the house during the weekdays. There is the LIRR Railroad station that is a 20 minute walk from the house that goes straight to Manhattan.
access: Room and Bathroom Only
house_rules: We do not do checkins after 11pm. Kindly book an alternative listing if you need to check in at a later time. For every guest who overstays beyond the checkout time, there will be a fee of $25, every extra hour.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Everything was fine

Guelma is a great host and very nice person. The room was very spacious for myself and bed was so comfortable I slept really good after a long flight from Europe! Her place was easy to find and communication went very smoothly! I will totally recommend this place to you reading this comment. I would stay here again for sure!
They are so nice:-)
It's an old house. Old bathroom. Just a good price.
Very close to airport. Large room, could be cleaner.
Great host love the location. Excellent value
Very calm and collected host. Always on time to help you with a soft landing and get you situated in minutes. I had to extend my stay because they made me feel at home. Awesome!!!
As advertised!  Cheap safe place close to Jfk!  I’ll come back!
Lovely place to stay. Quiet and peaceful place to stay for a day or week.
Clean and great communication, perfect if you need to fly out of JFK
the room was great, bathroom could have been a bit cleaner though
Es amable
The place was amaze described and Guelma was swift in her communication. Would recommend for anyone who needs a place to crash on a layover from JFK.
Easy place to get to JFK
It’s a no for me dawg...

The place is ok would not come back again due to location there was dust on the floor garbage underneath the bed and it had a strong odor the place has wifi and its affordable for one person bed was a little uncomfortable and it was hard to sleep due to heater noise
There was a mouse making noise all night and crumbs on the bed . Although the bed was pretty comfy
Reasonably priced and close to JFK as advertised. Good place to crash for the night.
Very comfortable stay and Guelma was very respectful
A great host, it was on point for me. I got what I expected. Will definitely go there again.

Horrible experience in that I spent $30 on a train and on uber to get all the way out to her place which was in a purely residential neighborhood that had absolutely nothing within walking distance around to do,  after all that arrived at her front door,  I was supposed to have been there a few hours earlier but was held up in the city and didn't realize how incredibly long and far she was. I did arrive over 2 hours before the time that she listed as being the latest time allowable.  As I got there she didn't answer the knocks on the door or my doorbell rings, had to spend even more money to get an uber all the way back to the last subway stop.
Great deal and great place
Guelma was very friendly and helpful. My stay was quiet, clean, and comfortable.  On street parking was easy enough to find. Never more than a block away. I would not hesitate to stay with her again.

Stay far away very nasty & dirty & she has the nerve to say to people that they should be banned u should be banned everything bad they said about your place is the truth & I have pictures to prove it!!!

I really do think Guelma means well and she herself was a very welcoming host. There was a communication breakdown at the end but all in all she makes herself available and she is easy to talk to. For the place itself. You get what you pay for. Literally my only gripe was the fact that there was trash under the bed. But for the price my expectations were low and to be fair that was slightly exceeded. Now don’t get me wrong it’s not the Ritz, but hey for the price and if you’re looking for somewhere cheap to lay down then it’s worth a go.

Guelma  is a great host, and very thoughtful of you. The location is perfect for out of town travelers as it is close to mass transit as well as the airport. Uber/Lyft won't break the bank because of that close proximity to JFK There are shopping areas/mall nearby as well

name: Boutique Hotel-Like Room in Brooklyn With A View
summary: This 2 bedroom-1 bathroom boutique style Apt is located in north Williamsburg Brooklyn and is adjacent to Greenpoint. The building has a pretty rooftop with a view overlooking the Manhattan skyline. This low-key, vibrant, safe community is populated with restaurants, bars, retail shops, music venues, and an assortment of activities.  If you choose to plan or just freestyle, your stay will be enjoyable. I look forward to hosting people from all corners of the globe!
space: Just to clarify, you are renting one private room, in a two bedroom apartment, the other room I live in. Guests can make themselves at home! If you have booked a Room, then the above picture is your private lockable room with separate heat/AC controls and closet.
description: This 2 bedroom-1 bathroom boutique style Apt is located in north Williamsburg Brooklyn and is adjacent to Greenpoint. The building has a pretty rooftop with a view overlooking the Manhattan skyline. This low-key, vibrant, safe community is populated with restaurants, bars, retail shops, music venues, and an assortment of activities.  If you choose to plan or just freestyle, your stay will be enjoyable. I look forward to hosting people from all corners of the globe! Just to clarify, you are renting one private room, in a two bedroom apartment, the other room I live in. Guests can make themselves at home! If you have booked a Room, then the above picture is your private lockable room with separate heat/AC controls and closet. Common areas include: Rooftop, Kitchen & Cooking Equipments, Bathroom, Laundry, Living Room, TV As your host, I'll be available to welcome and answer any questions you may have, sometimes giving insider tips on local events. Most of the time I myself are out bouncin
neighborhood_overview: Brooklyn is home to the maker's movement, so there are always new an inspiring events happening: Here's a few in the neighborhood to plan around or check out: SMORGASBURG: Buzzy seasonal foodie market on Saturdays, offering 75+ vendors & city skyline views. Sundays BROOKLYN FLEA: a market of antiques, makers, and crafts. State of New York- East River State Park 90 Kent Ave NEARBY PARKS & RECREATION: Mcarren Park & McGolrick Park BROOKLYN CONVENTION CENTER: Nearby Greenpoint FOODIES: Greenpoint is home to the best Polish food-bakeries, and surrounded by many  other great global cuisines. CRAFT BEVERAGES: NY Distilling, BrooklynWinery & Brooklyn Brewery are 5-15 min walk from the apartment.  NORTHSIDE INNOVATION: One week every June, ov (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) creative and cultural trendsetters converge in Brooklyn to uncover the future of music, innovation, and content with over 350 bands, 200 speakers, media personalities and content creators.
notes: Dry Cleaner: across the street Guests are encouraged to use recyclable trash receptacles. *This space is not equipped to host children or pets.
transit: BY SUBWAY: Its a 5 minute stroll to the closest subway (L train) and a 10min train ride to lower Manhattan. The L train is the best to quickly access Manhattan, Queens, or even spend a day at the beach in the Rockaways. BY FLIGHT:  The apartment is 45 min subway ride to JFK international airport or a 25min Taxi/Uber.  LGA NY LaGuardia is a 15 min Taxi/Uber away. Newark International Airport is also an option, which requires a Amtrak train to Manhattan's Penn Station, and a Subway Blue Line to the L Line. BY CAR: Convenient street parking near the apartment, and 2 min away from the BQE 278 exit 31 on/off ramp.
access: Common areas include: Rooftop, Kitchen & Cooking Equipments, Bathroom, Laundry, Living Room, TV
interaction: As your host, I'll be available to welcome and answer any questions you may have, sometimes giving insider tips on local events. Most of the time I myself are out bouncing around the city.
house_rules: - No Drugs

host.host_about:
Global & cultural connections,  unique local insider experiences,  tasty food, and deep conception through great conversation all fuel my passion for Travel! I enjoy the all the cross-learning between people around the globe so I enjoy the Airbnb platform both to host and to explore. Two new  travel magazines I recently stumbled upon are "Camper" and food based magazine "Supper;" a fresh new approach!
Some favorite travel designations so far have been, Amalfi Coast, Turks & Caicos, Tallinn, Berlin, Andorra, Napa Valley, San Francisco, Austin, British Virgin Islands, Canary Islands. 
Places I'd love to explore:  Croatia, Japan, Peru, Norway, Himalayans, Portugal (the short list)

reviews.comments: My girlfriend and I had a great time trip to NY. The host was excellent and accommodating. The place was clean, and in a great location near Williamsburg and the L train.  I would recommend it to friends.
Great place to stay. Really liked it .

This is a great place to stay! Located in a quiet neighborhood a couple minutes outside of Williamsburg, my friend and I found it a great spot to return to after a day spent exploring Manhattan and Brooklyn. Samantha was a great host and the place is clean and welcoming. A train stop is about an 8 minute walk away which was very convenient. Stay here if you want calm and convenience.

Great stay in Samantha and Dell place. The apartment is close to the subway about 10 min by walk. The host was really nice, helpful and gave us good advice to visit New York and some nice places and bar to go out.

Very clean with a great bed! The host is so responsive to questions and truly warm and accessible. We were there during a freezing patch of winter and she took great care to find us accessible good meals.
I'd return! Brooklyn is great! Felt safe!

Our stay with Samantha and Dell was super fun and comfortable. Both are very friendly and really into making you feel at home. They gave us some great tips for local spots and answered every question we had with enthusiasm. Plus the adorable cats! Definitely would visit again, the location is great, the neighbourhood is filled with great bars, pubs and breakfast/brunch options, also L line takes you to Manhattan in no time, the walk is 10-15 min.
Amazing place, highly recommend.

Samantha is a gracious host with a beautiful home, has the the friendliest most delightful cats we've ever met, great location, 5 stars on everything, extremely comfortable bed and incredibly  delicious morning coffee.

My boyfriend and I had a great time at Samantha and Del’s appartement ! They were really welcoming and helpful. The appartement is beautiful and clean. The location is good : the metro station is « Graham avenue » on the L train - 10 minutes from Manhattan (it’s a 10 minutes walk from the appartement to reach the subway). We highly recommend this Airbnb !

Samantha and Dell are very friendly and the place were super organized when we first arrived to the apartment ;) I was glad to find this amazing place to be called a second home in NY ever since I walked in, they made us feel so comfortable being around at their place, and they both were too nice to share their wine with me during our stays! I highly recommend this amazing home to anyone who is looking for stylish, affordable, walkable to any restaurants/shop, subway station is only nearby around no more than 10mins walk! there here is! You won’t be disappointed! They both are the nicest people you will ever meet in NY :)
Amazing host! She completely took care of us, provided with the best advice and helped to make our stay in Brooklyn more than just awesome.

What a great Airbnb to stay in! It's at a great location close to local restaurants and subway stations and they're all at walkable distances. The apartment itself is super clean and comfortable and the hosts are nice and informative. The cats are also really fun and friendly. I highly recommend for those looking for a place to stay at not far from the city.

Could not have asked for better hosts anywhere. Samantha was so gracious and welcomed us with a glass of wine upon arrival (she also makes her own which is amazing, definitely try if you can). Dell is one of the most easy-going cool people you will ever meet. We really lucked out with this place, great neighborhood, easy access to the subway, a couple sweet kitty cats, and again just about the coolest & most gracious hosts you could expect to meet. Clean, well kept place, even access to the rooftop where Samantha has a small garden going. Wonderful experience!

Samantha was very welcoming and very quick to respond to my last minute questions.  The room itself was clean and very comfortable but she also made me feel that I was free to make myself at home and to use the kitchen and shared living room.  Samantha was very easy and fun to talk with and her apartment is in a great location as a base for exploring. I highly recommend it!

Samantha and Dell are great hosts! They are easygoing and responsive to your need. The place is super clean and tidy, has two cute cats. It's ten minutes walk from the subway. The neighborhood felt safe and has grocery stores nearby.
Samantha was so wonderful and inviting. The room is great and the location was perfect. It's a short walk to the subway and a short subway ride into Manhattan. Immensely enjoyed the stay!
Thank you for having us again :)

Samantha went above and beyond to make us feel at home! Her beautiful and tasteful apartment was super clean and equipped with all possible amenities a traveler could need. The rooftop has an amazing view to Manhattan's skyline and the apartment is located in a nice neighborhood close to the L line. I would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting NYC!

Samantha's place worked out perfectly. Check-in was effortless, the room is clean and very comfortable, and the apartment is very nice.  (Loved the view from the roof, too!) Lots of restaurants, coffeehouses, etc, are just a 5-10 minute walk away. Samantha is a great host.
Sam and Dell were amazing, made our stay that much better! super personable and accommodating! strongly recommend!!!!

Fantastic place and fantastic hosts. Highly recommend the place and the area. Really glad we chose to stay Brooklyn side because there are so many great little cafes, restaurants and bars to discover close by. Super easy to stroll to the subway as well and cross over to Manhattan in less than 10 mins. Samantha and Del are brilliant hosts who make you feel right at home. Their rooftop is also a perfect place to enjoy the sunrise & sunset. Oh and they have 2 of the friendliest cats you’ll meet!

Samantha and Dell were an absolute pleasure to be around! We truly enjoyed our conversation about wines and the dandelion wine they offered us was delicious! My cousin and I had an amazing time in Brooklyn and truly enjoyed staying at their home.

I stayed at Samantha's place with my sister whilst we were visiting New York and we both really loved it.

Samantha was super welcoming and gave us lots of tips on where to go in the area, the location is great, we walked into Williamsburg most days and loved the vibe there.

The room was clean and comfortable and the apartment was lovely, the views from the rooftop were amazing, especially during sunset, it was such a wonderful stay, I would definitely come back when I visit New York again.

Wow! What a cool place. Check in was a breeze and everything was absolutely spotless. And such a reasonable price for all this, combined with the 10-minute walk to the L train. And since we drove in, we were so pleasantly surprised at the abundance of free street parking. I would absolutely stay here again!
Samantha’s place is beautiful! We had a great time :) Great spot in Brooklyn, near a lot of good places to eat and close to the subway. Samantha makes some amazing dandelion wine!
It was great to stay at Samantha’s place. Very clean, short walk to L line subway.
Samantha's place was perfect. It's clean, stylish, and located in my favorite neighborhood in Brooklyn. Highly recommend it!

Samantha's and Dell's apartment is just beautiful. Super clean, both cats are lovely and we felt really comfortable. Although we just stayed two nights the location is a 15 min walk to get to Williamsburg, which was great. 100% recomendation :)
Samantha was the most friendly host, great recommendations, she has a really good taste.  Really confortable matress
El alojamiento de Samantha es fácilmente accesible en metro, hay tiendas de comestibles y otros comercios y es una buena opción de hospedaje en New York.
Good host and a nice and central place.
Lovely apartment with great parking and a super comfy bed. Slept like a dream and was a breeze to deal with . Thanks!
Great place, close to a metro station in a really great part of the city. The bed is extra confortable and the space is really clean.

Samantha was a great host, above my expectations. It was a really great experience. She provided us with decent accommodation in NYC, greeted with home-made wine, and nice conversations. Whenever we are around, her place will be the first on our list to stay :) It takes around 20 minutes to get to Manhattan from her place which is GREAT! Also, she has a terrace with an astonishing views over Manhattan's skyline!!!
Samantha was a great host and had a beautiful space. Would definitely stay again if I needed to be in NY.
Samantha is a great host, she takes care of everything and you'll feel like at home since the first minute. Oh!, her cats are really good hosts too!  Five stars ; )
Good place mais you must know that There is two people in the Little appartements. Nice terasse on the roof.

Samantha was a great host! Her place was very clean, and had great subway access on top of being in a great location. I will definitely stay here again on my next trip to the area. She provided everything we needed and went above and beyond to provide suggestions of what to do, where to eat etc. Her place met all expectations!

The apartment is a short walk from the subway and easy to get around to other parts of Brooklyn. The bed was very comfortable and I slept well. Samantha was a great host and will be on my list to look at for when I come back to the city.

Can't say enough good things about this place.  My friend and I just needed a place to crash for the weekend but ended up having a great time getting to know Samantha and her partner Dell- both incredibly warm and welcoming hosts.  The apartment was clean, comfortable and the room had plenty of privacy.  There's good coffee shops nearby and metro was just a short walk away so it was a perfect home base for exploring the city.  Would definitely stay again!

Samantha and Dell were great hosts. This was my second stay at their apartment. Clean, quiet room amidst the hustle and bustle of north BK. 

Great convo and artful accents abound in their home. Definitely recommend a stay.
Great place to stay and the hosts were nice! Samantha was nice to let us stay past the checkout time because we had a late flight. Very accommodating host and the location was nice and safe.
Samantha and her friend are great host. They were very helpful to find a parking place or to find the subway. It was really a pleasure to meet them. I strongly recommend.

Samantha’s place is in a great location. We had a great time! Samantha and Dell were great hosts and gave amazing tips on what to do in NYC. We really enjoyed our stay. We would definitely recommend it! Plus, the cats were adorable!

Great services! Really confortable and fully equiped. Close by the subway station, so very easy for visitors. 
Easy going host.
Samantha is a super host! We had an incredible time at his place, and she gave us great recommendations!

Samantha was a fantastic host with two loving cats that gave my fiance and I a place to unwind after spending our days in Manhattan exploring. the apartment was clean and easy to get to and she was readily available for any questions about the city or general things to do in the area.

reviews.comments: It is rare to find this kind of modern flat with a large outdoor swimming pool and gym on Airbnb, especially with such a reasonable price. Quite and professional neighbors living in the apartment (so in the morning everyone is going out to work-long queue for buses though-then you get to use an empty swimming pool during the day), walking distance to various supermarkets (Park n shop, 24 hr Wellcome, M&S, 759, etc.) and restaurants. Free shuttle bus to TST, many buses are available right outside of the tower. Host was very easy to communicate and kindly showed me the facilities of the apartment and shopping area nearby. Thanks to the host and I am willing to stay there again.

It is very lucky to have chance to stay in Jason's apartment. It is in the centre of Hong Kong and convenient to everywhere with various transportation available. The room is at 35th floor with  extraordinary harbour view.

As Jason's description, he is invisible during my stay as he is kind of busy man. However the response is in time and his roommate, Siying is also helpful and distributing to my happy leisure time in the apartment.

Just one thing is about the cleaning, it could be be better if the tower of shower room could keep away.

All in one, if chances, I would like to choose to stay in Jason's again.
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Enrich your experience in Sydney, be it for work or for play! Explore the spectacular array of Sydney local attractions during your stay. The playground of Australia, Sydney boasts some of the country's most iconic landmarks and we're in the perfect location to experience the wide array of things to see and do in Sydney. Experience unique Aussie tours, check out some of the world's best restaurants and bars and, of course, take in spectacular views of the breath-taking Australian scenery… There are tons of things to do in the city itself which are mostly a quick stroll away. I've included most of my favorite places and more in my extensive "Local Recommendations Guidebook" on this listings page, so please feel free to check em' out for awesome things to do and eat in the CBD area.
