Great location, only 2 minutes walk to Circular Quay and hosts were very accommodating, thank you.

We stayed for 2 nights in this apartment, very central and handy to Circular Quay, the Rocks area and the Sydney CBD. Communication with Jared and Ana (who met us on arrival) was very good. The apartment is accessible by lift, but there are a few steps up to the entrance of the building. The space is quite comfortable for a family or small group. There are a few minor quirks - e.g. the bathroom is rather small and water from the shower tends to spray onto the bathroom floor. There is a bit of street noise but that's to be expected in this very central location.
Can't go wrong. Nice and central with what you need. Basic setup, but nice and clean. Great price for a great location.
Unbelievable location at a reasonable rate
The apartment could not be in a better location if you wish to explore the heart of the city.
Great spot, very convenient for the train

Great location in the middle of the city. However, the apartment itself is below average. Even though it is clean and tidy, massive issues with construction noises in the building and also the bathroom. The washing machine and dryer is literally in the shower, so next to no room to fit. Also, shower drainage is blocked.
Great spot for 2 couples who want to have a fun night out and not worry about how to get home safely lol
It was a really great experience to stay, perfect location and place. Hosts were really nice and helpful.

The apartment is well located but be aware of the following: (i) there is a wash machine and a tumble drier in the shower which prevents the shower door from being closed; thus water splits all over the bathroom; (ii) there is no internet at all (even if Jared promises you that there will be one available by the time you check in; (iii) Jared is unreachable and unfriendly.
Very clean, great location!

Fabulous location for scenic views just down the road at Circular Quay and Botanic Gardens! Also extremely convenient for eating at Mr Wong right across the road and the bar underneath Palmer & Co.

Would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting for work or pleasure!

Great stay! Spacious unit for Sydney CBD. Perfect location for circular quay, Pitt st mall, train stations, the rocks, all just 5min walks away. Thanks Jared will definitely recommend your property to others.
Great location, very clean and comfortable stay!
Amazing location and very comfortable - bring some ear plugs though if you want to sleep - or have quite a few drinks like I did :)

Awesome place to stay in Sydney, Close to everything you need, all in waking distance. We have 4 adults and 2 children in the apartment, so the space was a bit small for big group with many things. If you are 4-5, plenty of spaces. Great hosts, will come back next time.
Great location, but that’s about it. Very overpriced and not clean enough.
Its very close to everything and Ann was very nice! Highly recommended!
公寓离悉尼歌剧院､海港大桥非常近,走路只需要5分钟,离维多利亚女王大厦只要10分钟,附近有两个train station,非常方便｡公寓内洗衣服很方便,有一个洗衣机和烘干机,厨具都有但没有调料

This unit is very expensive for what it is, namely a small loft style apartment with no views.  The unit has some cleaning issues, reported day 1, which have been ignored by the owner to date-not happy.

Excellent location BUT the apartment is small and especially the toilet and shower. The term "cosy" is very optimistic when describing the shower which is VERY small and without even a curtain to cover the splash. At the time of our stay there were lots of consideration work outside including weekend. If coming with a car, parking is an issue. Maintenance is okay although the doorknob seems displaced and duktaped and also more kitchen appliances can be very helpful. Apartment was clean. Beds are okay, more on the hard side but it's a matter of preference. An extra set of keys can also be helpful.
Location, as said, is second to none and Ana was very helpful!
Great location, very spacious!

Jared's apartment is located in a great spot in close proximity to circular quay. The apartment is of reasonable size and easily fitted the two couples staying. Access to the building requires a security fob for the front door and key to the apartment. Unfortunately only 1 set of keys is provided which makes it incredible challenging if there are more than 2 people staying. I contacted Jarad early in the stay however he wasn't willing to provide the key. It is also worth noting that the bedrooms back onto a laneway with rubbish trucks coming past in the early hours of the morning (we stayed on a friday/sat night). I would suggest bringing ear plugs and eye shades as the outside street light does shine into the rooms. The apartment was reasonably clean and apart from the access issues, was great value.

This is a great apartment, highly recommended. Situated in the heart of the city yet quiet, be assured of a good nights sleep in the super comfortable beds.
Good communication with an efficient checking in system. 
The apartment is spotlessly clean with everything one could possibly want supplied.
We had a very pleasant stay, Thank you Jared.
Amazing location!

What a fantastic spot- so close the circular quay and the rest of the city. Everything was super comfortable, plus nice and clean. We had a great stay and would definitely come back next time we go to Sydney
Great place. Highly recommend

If you would prefer a place in Sydney to use as a base, this is it. Perfectly positioned amongst everything Sydney-ish. A good space to lightly relax with another couple after a concert or night out on the town. Maybe not a place you would chill in for a weekend to 'get away from it all'.
Good beds, although light buffer to noise on Bridge St & George St, and air con in slightly larger room.
Bathroom tricky to feel comfortable in, but clean, as for kitchen.
Very reliable communication with check-in etc.
Easy, has the basics for what you need and notes well communicated in explanatory information.

Great Location near Circular Quay.  Home was suppose to have WiFi but host said company was having problems so no WiFi during our stay.  Washer Dryer is located in the shower. Washer discharges onto the shower floor. If shower is left on more that one minute, it overflows onto bathroom floor.

Thank you for having my partner and I stay a last week. The apartment location and layout / style were wonderful.
Fix the shower/laundry situation for future guests and you’re perfect.
Emplacement parfait!
房子的位置非常好,公寓看上去很高级,安保也很好,房源离地铁和商业中心都很近,房东回复也很及时,接待的小姐姐人很nice,楼下就有便利店,美中不足的是淋浴间的空间有点小,不过也算够用,还是一次不错的体验｡
Tolle Lage ! Zum weiterempfehlen!!
good location. everything is quite good.

Absolutely great location. Walking distance to everywhere within city. 

One thing should be mentioned is that the building is old and there is only one bathroom, so if more than 4 people live in there will be a problem. We had 6 people originally, but once we saw the apartment we booked a hotel suite immediately.
最便捷的位置,距离悉尼歌剧院和海港大桥均步行十分钟左右,距离达令港和鱼市场也不远
Great position.  clean.
Great location with a very accommodating host
Jared's place is really conveniently located.  His assistant ana was also very prompt in dealing with our requests and inquiries.  overall they are very helpful  will definitely stay again next time.

Awesome location in Circular Quay and close to Rocks as well as lots of bars and restaurants. Very few amenities including toilet paper and paper towels. Lots of nearby construction noise. Shower was awkward at best. I still highly recommend for its location if you don’t mind austerity.

Great location with a short walk to the port! We had 6 guests that slept comfortably and the host had everything set up to meet our needs! Ana was very helpful in getting us into the place and Jared was quick to respond.
Clean n spacious, close to tourist attractions, v convenient

Apartment was in a great location. Good size for 5 people. Shower was quite small as washer/dryer were in the same space. Water was slow to drain away so bathroom floor was always wet and the hot water ran out quite quickly. Apartment was easy to find and very secure. Close to transport. 

Thanks Jared.

Ana was lovely at the check in. The apartment is great, the only issue is with the toilet there is a washer and a dryer inside the shower which makes it super uncomfortable to have a shower. There is a temporary construction site next to the apartment that began working at 7am.

Apartment was in a great location close to Circular Quay and shopping. The apartment was what we expected and was plenty of room for four people to stay. It was clean, modern and was in a nice building/neighbourhood. The only thing that is stopping me giving it 5 stars is the bathroom - the shower doesn't drain properly and is quite small as the washing machine/dryer are in there; the shower curtain isn't long enough so the bathroom floor gets very wet (but this is something easily fixed). Overall, would definitely recommend.

The apartment is in a fantastic location a short walk down to Circular Quay. The beds & living area are comfortable & all basic kitchen, bathroom & laundry amenities are provided. Highly recommended for a stay in a superb part of Sydney!
Great to explore Sydney - almost everything is in walking distance
Lovely place. Close to circular quay
Really nice location of the apartment!

We were a family of 6 who really enjoyed our stay.  The location was outstanding being around 200m back from Circular Key.  I would highly recommend the apartment for anyone looking for a clean, well appointed apartment in the heart of Sydney.
ABSOLUTELY AWESOME LOCATION!

Jareds place is so central to the city and surrounded by wonderful amenities.  The unit has everything you need and 4 people can stay here very comfortably. The noise from the street is very minimal even with the works going on it was quiet. The host Jared was very quck to respond to all emails and checking in with help from Ana was so good she is wonderful  . I would definately stay here again.

The apartment looked exactly like the photos and was kept very clean. Location was great especially since it was close to 2 stations. The hosts replies where quick and helpful. Would recommend to anyone that wants an Airbnb in the CBD.
Awesome spot in the city easy to walk to great sites, restaurants and malls. Cosy vibe and spacious.
This apartment is in an excellent location in the CBD. Jared was quick to respond to all questions and a very easy check in process. The apartment was clean and tidy.
Great location, nice space and comfortable, especially the pillows! All communication was seamless and I was met on time and shown around the flat when I arrived.  I'd stay again.
The apartment was as expected. No problems except the noise at night time from the light rail construction.
Great clean place and ease of access
No description about the shower or warning about road works, also was cockroaches in the bathroom

Great place with good locality.Host is so helpful and easily contactable...all check in and check out procedure is easy...I really like your padlock with bruce lee picture...i hope i can get onei can’t find it in sydney
Great location, great space and easy communications with host - five stars
Check in was smooth and communication was easy! Convenient location and great security.
Would stay again!! Perfect location

The apartment was very spacious and roomy. 
Everything was very clean and the location is great!
Well located & good value
This is incredibly well positioned and close to everything! Little bit of noise from construction but that can’t be helped. Clean place and well appointed.
Awesome location, very clean and tidy

Nice accommodation clean and well appointed. Communication fast and Jared was very accommodating with my changes.
Thank you
Great location- close to the rocks and circular quay, Pitt st mall 5 min walk. Great communication, clean and tidy place. Definately would recommend.
Great location! We went with our daughters and had a great time.
very nice
Great location and excellent communication with host.

FANTASTIC position. Such a short stroll to Circular Quay. George St road works a bit annoying but any accomodation in the area would have the same problem at the moment. Will definitely stay again next time we are in Sydney. Thanks for having us.

Fantastic location provided walking to Circular Quay, Opera House, dinning and shops. 
You definitely want to use public transit as parking is quite expensive in the area. 
Very clean and well styled apartment. We got some noise from the street through the large bedroom windows but nothing that kept us up all night. 
One key for the elevator for our group of 6  was slightly inconvenient but manageable.
there was a lot of noise from roadworks outside the bedroom windows all through the night.
房子位置很好,离悉尼歌剧院很近｡步行15分钟｡超市也很便利｡唯一不足的是房间的沙发床,大宝睡的时候有一条缝,不舒服｡毛巾虽然有准备,但不适合洗刷使用｡最好用白色毛巾｡只是一点建议而已｡淋浴房很小,老人不方便｡其他的都还可以｡物业管理人员安娜非常好!
我和朋友两家一起住的,生活设施齐备,是个很温馨的小家,最主要是位置非常棒,毗邻悉尼市很多的景点,步行即可到达｡房东人很好,有问题也立即帮助解决｡这次是很棒的住宿体验｡
Idéal pour découvrir Sydney
Great Location
Perfect location to enjoy Sydney and great communication
Clean and comfortable spot in the Sydney central business district. Location is great being less than a 5 min walk to Circular Quay and The Rocks.
Jared place was really accommodating and great communication with Ana
Fantastic location. Very much enjoyed our stay. Thank you.
The property was nice and clean. Great location and value for money. Host was super quick in communicating and also provided airport pick up and drop service for a good deal. Cheers
Great to place to explore sydney. Very close to Circular quay and all major sites. Nice and clean appartment
great for a group and great location

Excellent location.  5 minutes walk to Circular Quay and 10 minutes to the Opera House with cafes and restaurants all over.  20 minutes to airport and Jared and Ana looked after our bags for the day so we could go round Sydney for the day.  Cost $8 per bag - well worth it! They also arranged a lift to the airport.  Very prompt and efficient.
Apartment was comfortable and well- equipped.  All good and will definitely stay again. 
Many thanks to Jared, Ana, Jeff and Francisco!
Great apartment in a great location.  Clean and tidy.
Great location in the middle of the city.
perfect location! apartment manager could provide airport pick up and drop off service, charge reasonable price,  that is very convenient for international family tourists, very recommend!
Amazing. We will be back. So central to everything. Incredible place which was spotless and clean. We came down for a work award ceremony and didn't want to leave!

Pros: Excellent location, clean and comfortable. Cons: A little bit of noise with the nearby construction during the day. No dishwasher if you plan to eat in. Shower would be tight for bigger people.
We enjoyed our stay and felt this place was good value.
Good experience at Jared place
Great location ... close to Circular Quay and a short distance to The Rocks !
Clean apartment in a great location. Owner was very helpful.

The location of the apartment was very good. Walking distance to the Rocks and Opera House. The apartment was nice and it was comfortable for the 5 of us. However, the bath area was a little small for us and it gets choked quite easily. The owner should get this fixed quite easily. But other than that, everything was perfect.
Beautiful and clean. Fit 2 couples and a child easily. Great location to Circular Quay and the Opera House. Would stay again.
房间很干净舒服,但是整体尤其是卫生间没有图片看起来那么大｡四个chen成人入住会略有点挤｡热水够热,但是多人使用的话间隔要开一些,不然会不够热水｡

Good location and cleaning linens. Ana was the one for communication and she has done a brilliant job. The kettle wasn’t working and the shower drain was blocked upon arrival, but Ana managed to get everything fixed within hours of notice. Highly recommend!
Conveniently located for cruises & provided needed amenities
The location is excellent. However, due to the works and services collections right outside the bedroom windows throughout the night it was impossible to get any sleep.
No tea or milk available. Disapointing considering the priceand its suppose to be a B&B
Fantastic location, clean, secure. Wonderful!

Had a relatively good stay at this airbnb, but could have been better. The best thing about it is the location. Location is everything when you travel, especially considering commute in Sydney is expensive. It's just about 10-15 walk to Circular Quay which leads you to other nearby tourist attractions. 

The apartment is very spacious. Lots of room to move around. I stayed with my family. We were 4 in total so the 2 bedrooms were good. It's nice they had a washer and dryer, although we didn't use them. Only issue was, the washer is hidden INSIDE the shower, meaning it took up half of its supposed space which made it so cramped and small. My parents are senior citizens so they had a hard time moving around. I honestly can't imagine a bigger man (Westerners/Europeans) being able to move around there comfortably as my parents are not that big to begin with. There were also a few stains on the sofa and carpet, but the rest of the area and furniture were clean.. Other than that our overall stay was good. 

Ana, our contact during our stay is great too. Kind and very responsive. However, we had some issues with the car service they offered. I'm not sure if this is an isolated case with the specific driver we were assigned to, but he was always late and he also got into an accident on our 3rd supposed pick up from him which made us have a hard time getting back very late at night. This accident also affected our airport transfer on our last day and we had not been notified sooner so we could hire another car service. OLA was suggested (an app like Uber that's supposedly cheaper) but we had a hard time getting a car the morning of our flight. In fear of missing our flight we had to get an Uber instead (good thing there was a car nearby) and it cost us A LOT of money. We just wish this could have been handled better...
Great location, so convenient for us as we were seeing a show at the Opera House. Loved it thank you

Location was fabulous. Walking distance to everything, including the Rocks, Opera House and Sydney Harbor Bridge. The Apartment was clean and had everything you need in regards to linens, toiletries, and kitchen necessities. There was a bit of construction noise but it seems like the entire city of Sydney is undergoing renovations. Would definitely come back.

Perfect location for weekend get away.  So close to Circular Quay, Opera House,etc.
Modern, Clean everything you need for a couple of nights away.  Thank you.

Great location. Flexible check-in which we appreciated. Pull out couch bed was made up perfectly when we arrived. The place is as in the photos, but feels quite plain when inside, bare minimum and nothing on the walls. If you're just using it for sleeping though I'm sure it would be fine. Needs more lights, not very well illuminated - not a big issue though. Best part is the location!!!
Great location and communication.

The location was perfect for what we needed, with the apartment being clean, tidy and easy to access. 
Apartment came as described and communication with Ana was faultless. 
The mattresses were firmer than our personal taste, but linen and rooms were clean. 
Noise levels can vary, but not something the owner can prevent or control. 

Overall the apartment comes accurately described and located in a great area!
Great place and a fantastic location if you're in the CBD for work
Fantastic communication, great location and the apartment was lovely. Highly recommend - wonderful
Great place and very accommodation to our requests.
Great location !!!
Great Location - quiet and comfortable

Really nice place to stay! The location is perfect, only few minutes walk to the Sydney bridge & the opera house. And the hosts were very nice, well communication, reply message quickly. 
Love it ~
excellent location. basic amenities and furniture. they give one key for door only...difficult to manage..
Great location to stay. All attractions are in walking distance and from circular quay you may easily reach Manly, Bondi Beach and the Airport.
Great location - short walking distance to Circular Quay and CBD.
Great location. Clean and check in/out was smooth.
Nice basic apartment close to city and circular quay ok for a quick stay.
Parking is a bit expensive, but necessary. We paid an additional $85 for the night for parking only. The location is excellent.

OK value, great location but parking is a nightmare if you are staying during the week. We stayed on Monday afternoon and looked for a park. Wilson was $86 per day. We were going to be up for $86 x2. We thought quick and called a hotel with valet parking nearby that I have stayed at before and got it for $57 for two days with 24/7 access.
If you are also going to turn up during the day in a car, don't expect anywhere near the building to park to off load your luggage. All streets are no parking in the area for a long way away. You will need to try find a loading zone and be very quick with your hazards on.

All was good but the lifts weren’t working. We had to carry our suitcases up 6 flights of stairs.  It wasn’t the best start to our trip. Also if you do stay here, be very mindful
Of the noise. It was worse than what we expected
Awesome place, super location.
位置很方便,比想象中小一些,但无碍｡入住指南没那么详细,所以费了些周折,不过总体还算好找
Great location
absolutely amazing little space so close to everything. can’t wait to return in the future!
Great stay at Jared’s place! We needed a night in Sydney, close to Circular Quay, and Jared’s place fit the bill!
Had a great stay, thanks

Jared's place is in a great location on the 6th floor of Bridge Street, in the heart of the city. He manages quite a few properties across the world, so we did not get to meet him personally. 

We took the train and got off at Circular Quay and walked about 10 minutes with our luggage. It was a great jump off point to catch the cruise ships, the Royal Botanical Gardens, and the Sydney Opera House. 

Ana, the local agent, had a limited schedule, but dropped off our keys at the apartment and was very communicative throughout the check-in and check-out process. The room was fit to sleep 6 adults and was spacious enough for my family. The place did smell of disinfectant and the carpet showed some signs of wear. 

Keep in mind that you are in the city, so train and traffic noise will be part of the experience. We  really enjoyed being in a centralised location. We would consider this place again for a future stay.
Great space in the city, walking distance from all the major sights of Sydney. couldn't think of a better way to introduce my in-laws to my home city :-)
Great spot for a couple nights in Sydney and spacious
Ana’s place is very convenient to the city and is a simple home with basic needs and amenities. Perfect for a little trip to the city.
Perfect central location to everything sydney !
A little older interior look, no window views but has the basic amenities.

What a great spot! Perfect location, great building, stylish apartment. 

Thank you so much!! 10/10 will stay again!
Great location in the CBD, close to Circular Quay. Apartment was as described. Check in was easy, and on time. Overall great location to stay.

This apartment is in the perfect location in Sydney: 5 mins walk to Circular Quay, Botanical Gardens and the Opera House. This was perfect for our short stay as we got to see a lot of Sydney in a short time and felt like we were right in the middle of everything. The flat is nice and clean and big enough for the five of us ( all adults) to comfortably sleep at night, maybe not so much for families with small children who want to spend a lot of time in the flat - but who would want that, it's Sydney and there's so much to see. Thanks for a great stay!
This spot is handy to everything and close to transport options from the airport. It was perfect for us for our transiting through Sydney.

The location is great as you can easily get to many points of interest. We were unlucky as there was a lot of construction work directly around the building the whole day and night during our stay. Jared gave us finally a refund for this, so we are okay with that. The apartment has not so much light as the pictures indicate but this is not a blocking point for visiting Sydney. Check In worked easily.
Great location. Clean, neat and tidy. Great for families.
good location, clean house and good communication

Jared's place is in an extremely convenient position being just 10min walk to Circular Quay.
Jared's place kitchen and bedrooms have bare essentials. Please take note that only 1 set of keys are issued.
We enjoyed our stay in beautiful Sydney
Great apartment ideally located for the CBD, Harbour Bridge, Opera House and many other areas of interest. Highly recommended.
地點方便
Gran ubicación en Sydney

1. 위치-윈야드역과 써큘리키역 중간에 위치해서 두 역을 5-7분 도보로 이용 가능해서  야간페리  이용이나 하버브릿지나 오페라하우스 야경보기에 편리합니다

2. 침실 중 한 침대커버에서 악취가 나서 침대커버 벗겨서 여분의 이불로 바꿔서 사용하였고

3. 주방의 겹은 손대기에 끈적거려서 주방세제로 2번을 씻어서 사용했습니다
Had a lovely stay at Jared SSP's place, so close to everything you need. Enjoyed a lovely dinner seafood cruise, walk around the Rocks, lovely meal at Cockles Bay and shopping at Darling Harbour.

Nice cosy place, great facilities, coffee shop downstairs, and only a short walk to Darling Harbour and Circular Quay. We stayed with 2 adults, and 3 kids and it worked perfectly for us. Would recommend!

name: Comfy & Quiet RM, City Center,Good Night Sleep#1
summary: Welcome to Our Home is a spacious apartment on the 7th floor, 800m from the Beach(Praia de Matosinhos), has 2 elevators and Free Private Covered Parking Garage. The Room has a Double bed Suitable for 1 or 2 guests, the bathroom is shared, but is always cleaned and maintained. If you wish to use the kitchen you may use, but you have to clean after yourself. Any queries you may have please feel free to msg us, will be happy to assist. Have a Pleasant Journey to our Hospitable and Sunny Portugal.
space: The Apartment is Spacious, the Airbnb Bedroom is Large, with a Double bed, ideal for a single person or a couple. The Bathroom is Shared. The Sunlight Rises in the Bedroom Window and sets in the balcony where the Living/Dining Room are, this Airbnb Bedroom has a 42 inch Smart TV With NETFLIX & YOUTUBE if you wish to watch a Movie after a long day. There is Free Parking in the Back of the building, but also we have Private Covered Garage, as we have 2 Airbnb listings, and only 1 Private Covered Garage, is first comes, first serves basis. We are Near Everything you need, as we are in the Center of Matosinhos.

neighborhood_overview: When you arrive I will provide maps and some suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. You will also find tourist information near the apartment.
notes: WIFI Password will be provided, and one of us will show you around the apartment. All linen, towels, blankets and pillows  are included during your stay. 1 x Roll of Toilet Paper Per Reservation will be Provided in Guests Airbnb Bedroom Laptop friendly workspace A table with space for a laptop and a chair that’s comfortable to work in WIFI Fiber Optic Cable with 200 MB/S Bed configuration: - 1 double bed (beds with 120*190cm) Hair dryer/ straightener available in Bathroom  Car Parking is available for Free in the rear side of the apartment, and also is where you have clear view of your vehicle from the Window of the Bedroom, Also there is cover car garage available upon request with gated key entry We accept domestic small animals (pets) that are well behaved & don't make noise, (such as constant barking) , as we have other people in the property and we have to be mindful and respect their well being. Also we charge a Animal Tax of 5€ per night, that is to be paid in full at the time o
transit: Metro is the best way to get around, it takes you literally anywhere you would like, but also the bus public network system is really efficient and nearby. Just in front of our door there are bus station that takes you wherever the Metro does not pass through, and the Metro Station is only 5 minutes Walking distance away (Câmara de Matosinhos) Metro Station, with the Metro you can Reach Porto in 5 minutes and the Airport in 35 minutes, if you need assistance, getting from one place to other we will provide you with assistance, so you won't get lost.
access: You can use the Kitchen, just remember to clean after yourself, same goes to the Toilet, Remember that is a Shared Bathroom, but is clean and maintained, but after you use it, Please Flush the Toilet, and you can also dispose of your toilet paper in the toilet, thank you.
interaction: My Wife Rosangela and myself David, will be able to help you on site, with anything and everything you would like, We will accommodate our Guests, and will be available online for any queries you may have, will be our Pleasure to assist you, having the most out of your Airbnb Experience, your Home away from Home.
house_rules: If you would like you can request a Microwave to be Placed in your bedroom. There is a full size Refrigerator/Freezer for our Loving Guests to use. Pets are allowed as long as they are well trained, and they can not be left unattended, if you leave you will have to take the Pet with you, but is case by case basis, depending on the Pet. Please keep the Common Areas ( Kitchen,Bathroom, Refrigerator) Clean & Tidy, the Cleaning Fee is to Cover for Toilet Paper, Cleaning products to clean your room, Before you Arrive(check In) and After you Leave ( check Out), it also covers to Wash & Iron the linen + towels, and all the utilities you consume (Water,Electricity & Gas), plus all the linen & towels that have to be replaced, in case of any tears or any irremovable stains. it is a set fee non negotiable.

host.host_about: We are a Happy Easy Going International Married Couple, that decided to make our Home available for guests around the Globe. Rosângela (Brazilian) is a Doctor in Oriental Medicine and David, myself a Night Auditor for Crystal Bach. We Welcome You to Matosinhos, Portugal.Enjoy your Stay. If you have any queries please don't hesitate in Contacting us.

reviews.comments: Famille très gentille et très arrangeante, petit problème de confusion pour l'adresse lors de notre arrivée mais cela s'est bien passé. Seul souci à noter cependant reste la barrière de la langue avec Rosângela qui ne parle pas du-tout anglais ni français (David étant absent), nous avons donc eu beaucoup de mal à nous comprendre; mais cela ne nous a pas empêché de passer une fin de séjour très agréable ! :)
Rosangela is an excellent host and offers rides and food to make your stay really enjoyable.

Gente, podem vir!!!
Adorei todos da casa: Rosângela, Igor , David - via internet e até o Falcão... Super atenciosos e hospedeiros, me senti em casa!!!

During our stay David was in some trip so he wasn't at home, but he responded for all messages and navigated us directly to the location. Tips were really helpful and clear.
On the place there was Rosangela - real angel :) Even she doesn't speak english perfectly, she is so warm and helpful, that you can't feel bad in her company.
Flat is clean and prepared. Really good stay!
Nice host and good location

David and Rosangela made our stay a pleasant one.  Their place is about 10 min walk from the metro. They are renovating, the kitchen it will be finished in December and the bedroom it was freshly painted. In the first night it was cold but David gave us a blanket and solved the problem. In the last night we shared a bottle of wine and had a great time.
Hospitalidade é o sinônimo desse lugar. David e Rosângela são atenciosos e não deixam faltar nada.  Recomendo 100%! Extremamente grato!

L'appartement de David et Rosângela est très bien placé, juste à côté d'une ligne de bus et à 5 minutes du métro pour aller à Porto. La chambre et la salle de bain étaient très propres ! Il y a de nombreux restaurants dans les rues de Matosinhos, tout est accessible sans avoir besoin de prendre la voiture. Rien à redire sur notre séjour chez eux.

O casal nos deixou muito a vontade. O David ajudou-nos com as bagagens. Tivemos uma casa muito bem localizada e limpa. O check in foi feito antecipadamente a nosso pedido e prontamente atendido. Agradecemos-lhes a estadia. Muito obrigado!

David e Rosângela, obrigada pela hospitalidade nas 18 noites que fiquei hospedada na vossa casa. O local fica 10 minutos a pé do metrô, possui parada de autocarros próximo, lojas, cafés, mercados a menos de 5 minutos, a 30 minutos a pé da praia. um excelente local para quem deseja tranquilidade e conforto.  O quarto estava limpo,tinha uma ótima televisão com Netflix, o banheiro se mantinha sempre limpo. Obrigada pela hospitalidade...Super Recomendo
The place is ok, David tells a lot about himself; a nice guy. We think the price for the room is a bit high. But our stay was ok.

David e Rosângela é um casal super simpático. Pessoas atenciosas que sempre estão disponíveis à ajudar. A minha certeza é que seremos verdadeiros amigos. Fico feliz em encontrar pessoas alegres como eles que se preocupam em deixar os hóspedes à vontade. A casa possui uma ótima localização, com espaços aconchegantes. Super satisfeito! ;)

We had a great stay in matosinhos. Lovely hosts and a nice and clean apartment. 
We arrived later then expected but David was still up and even picked us up from the metro station. Our hosts also gave us great tips where to eat and what to visit. The town is lovely and not crowded with tourists. 


We‘d definetly love to book here again ❤️

David e Rosângela são dois pessoas muito muito simpáticos e sempre disponível. A limpeza fue impecável e a disponibilidade de ambos é uma cosa que torna a residência mais agradável. A próxima vez que tenho que salir para Oporto, estou seguro que voltarei dos meus novos amigos! Se pudesse eu daria 10 estrelas!!!

David & Rosangela could help us with all questions and issues we had. They could give us information about anything. The location is near the sea and the metro, so you can get to the inner city fast. All in all highly recommended!

David and Rosangela's place is very confortable and clean, near to nice restaurants and close to the airport and the metro station. David was very precise and gave us all the information about the neighborhood and the region. Is a cool guy to have a conversation with! :)

We stayed one week with David and Rosângela and it could not have been better. The apartment and the room were very clean and everything was as advertised. We did not see Rosângela too often, but David was a communicative host and offered helpful tips for what to see and where to go whenever he could. Connection to both the city center of Porto and the airport are good (both easily reachable within 30mins) and the neighborhood itself is quite lively and close to the beach. We would highly recommend David and Rosângela! Thanks for hosting us,
Vanessa and Danny

I loved my stay at David & Rosângela’s place. The place is clean and quite comfortable. My only complain - it was somewhat chilly during the night. But after all, it was not a very good season (end of March). I think it is not a problem during a summer. The location is very good. Close enough to the public transport and not far from the beach. There are also many small shops and restaurants. I personally prefer to stay away from the noise of the city center. Plus you can better see how locals live. I didn't talk much with Rosângela, but had many interesting conversations with David. Very nice person, who is always eager to help you. Next time I visit Porto I will definitely stay there again. But this time I will probably go in summer.

Wszystko było zgodnie z opisem. Pokój mały ale w zupełności wystarczający na kilka dni. Nie było żadnych problemów ze swobodnym dostępem do wspólnej kuchni i czystej łazienki. Darmowy parking z tyłu budynku, kawiarenka tuż przy wyjściu i spokojna dzielnica ze świetnym jedzeniem w zasięgu 15min spaceru wieczorem były dla nas dodatkowym atutem. Gospodarzy przy naszym trybie zwiedzania widzieliśmy raczej rzadko, ale mimo to udało się odbyć kilka krótkich porannych bardzo sympatycznych pogawędek. Dzięki za gościnę!
Recomendo...........

한적한 주택가이면서 버스나 메트로 타는 곳도 가까워서 위치도 좋고 호스트들도 아주 친절하고 좋았습니다.

숙소도 깨끗하고 좋았으나
방안에 거울이 없어서 좀 불편했네요.
테이블도 하나 있으면 좋았을 것 같구요.

Merci pour tout ! David nous a accueilli très rapidement, malgré notre anglais plutôt nul, nous avons bien réussi à nous comprendre et à échanger.
Nous n’hésiterons pas à y revenir!
Emplacement de l’appartement niquel, nous avons pu tout faire à pieds!
David and Rosângela was very nice and give good advices! The room was very clean and so all the rest! Was a pleasure to stay there!

Excellent place at a good price, David and Rosangela are fantastic hosts, their place is comfortable and easily accessible, nice small cafe/bakery with great value food and drinks downstairs, can't recommend both places enough and definitely will be back! :)

David et rosa sont des hôtes très accueillant, si vous parler anglais vous n'aurez aucune difficulté à communiquer.
Très sympa, vous êtes à 15mn de la plage à pieds et à  5mn à pieds d'un très bon restaurant où vous mangerez de bon plat portugais pas cher "Sabot Tipico".
Encore un grand merci à David et rosa.

La chambre est à la hauteur du prix - simple, plutôt exigüe, sans charme, salle de bain à partager.
Bonne communication avec David. 
Bien située dans Matosinhos.
Perfect place, quite well located, spacious room, everything needed for cooking, lots of free parking place around and last but not least, very kind host. 10/10 would recommand.

Mieszkanie znajduje się blisko oceanu (15 minut pieszo), jest czyste i schludne. Pokój był przytulny, a łóżko bardzo wygodne. David udzielał wskazówek jak dojechać, odpowiadał nam na wszystkie nasze pytania. Gospodarze byli naprawdę gościnni, pomocni i otwarci. Zaprosili nas nawet na swoją prywatną imprezę. Polecamy to miejsce.
Thanks for having us David.

Pobyt u Davida a Rosângely bol fajn , dobrá lokalita , metro bolo asi 5 minút peši , naokolo veľa malých kaviarni a obchodov . Oproti cez cestu bol lunapark , z čoho sme sa veľmi tešili . Byt je asi 15 minút od pláže . Do Porta jazdí metro takže to bolo super bývať v kľudnejšej štvrti . David a Rosângela nás milo privítali a všetko ukázali a vysvetlili ( zabudli nám dať wifi heslo , ale aj tak sme boli väčšinu času mimo bytu takže nám to vôbec nevadilo :) ), dali nám typy , čo by sme mohli vidieť v Porte a vždy boli ochotní odpovedať na naše otázky . Byt bol vždy uprataný a čistý. Nemali sme žiadny problém s ničím. Pri odchode nám postrážili našu batožinu, kedže sme museli odísť doobeda a let sme mali až neskoro večer. Určite odporúčam toto ubytovanie

David & Rosângela have a very nice Airbnb with everything you need. The location is also very good. You can walk to the beach or take the bus or metro to Porto. They are really nice hosts and are always eager to help you.
Excelente sitio, la hospitalidad fue estupenda, el cuarto cumplia con todo lo prometido y hasta más el baño siempre impecable sin duda lo recomiendo y volvere

David & Rosangela's place felt really nice, they obviously care about their guests very much. David provided us with tips on what to do around in Matosinhos and city centre. Pro tip: do visit the bakery right next to the front door and have some pastels and coffee there for breakfast, you won't be disappointed. It's the best way to start your day, guaranteed. :)
Wonderful service, very convenient location.  highly recommend Lovely people.
This is wonderful host and we love it very much! David is so welcoming, and the house clean and nice!
I had a nice stay at David and Rosangela place, they are nice and helpful. The apartment is very clean and cosy.

these guys are really wonderful. we have enjoyed their place really a 5 star deserving.. outstanding hospitality and helpful from all aspects. we met them , the couple are really awesome, I recommended it always best place in Porto to stay !! .. cheap and very near to the public communication..
Très bon séjour !!! vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés

Asunto oli siisti ja majoittajat mukavia ja avuliaita! Viesteihin vastattiin nopeasti ja käytössä oli kattava keittiö. 

It was a very pleasant experience to stay in Davids and Rosangelas apartment! Messaging with the hosts was easy and we were warmly welcomed.
Buenísima estancia y aunque solo fueron durante 2 dias, fue una experiencia fascinante, una hospitalidad increíble y los servicios todos correctos.

David und Rosângela sind großartige Gastgeber. Die Kommunikation vor der Reise und während des Aufenthalts hat sehr gut funktioniert. Die Wohnung ist sauber und genau wie beschrieben. Die Lage, etwas außerhalb des Stadtzentrums von Porto dafür aber näher am Flughafen und am Strand, war für unsere Bedürfnisse perfekt. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln kommt man auch sehr schnell ins Stadtzentrum. Uns hat es so gut gefallen, dass wir direkt einen weiteren Aufenthalt bei David und Rosângela gebucht haben. Ich empfehle die beiden als Gastgeber auf jeden Fall weiter!
superhost!

Ubytování je blízko metra A, kterým se dá za 45 min dostat jak na letiště, tak do centra. Velká a čistá pláž je cca 15 minut chůze. Oba hostitelé jsou moc milí, David žil několik let v Americe, tedy umí perfektně anglicky a rád si take anglicky povídá. :-) Nebojte se poptat na karaoke večer, byla to opravdu sranda!

Great people and a really nice enviroment. We had a microwave and a fridge for our own and we could cook whatever we wanted. Great value and no unpleasant experiences  whatsoever. Really kind hosts and helpful at all time.  We rented a car and it was 20 mins to the center, but you can also go by tram and by bike (they have a pair for rent).
David & Rosângela were great host, definitely recommand to stay with them while in Porto.
위치가 정말 좋았어요. 시내랑 메트로타고 30분 정도 거리에 있었지만 가는 방법이 간단하고 편했습니다. 그냥 하루 날잡아서 시내 놀러가는거 추천합니다. 숙소 근처 24분 거리에 바다가 있어서 하루 날잡고 바다에서 노는거 추천합니다. 치안도 정말 좋아서 동네가 진짜 평화롭고 편안합니다. 최고의 위치! 다시 또 가고 싶네요.

Très bon accueil de la part de Rosangela et David. Ils ont répondu à toutes nos attentes malgré la barrière de la langue. Appartement très propre, literie de bonne qualité. Logement accessible à toute heure . 
Très bien desservi par les transports. Nous reviendrons chez eux avec plaisir.
Logement que nous recommandons




Muito boas-vindas de Rosangela e David. Eles conheceram todas as nossas expectativas apesar da barreira linguística. Apartamento muito limpo, cama de boa qualidade. Acomodação acessível a qualquer momento. 
Muito bem servido pelo transporte. Voltaremos para casa com prazer.
Habitação recomendamos
The room is wonderful, the location of the property super easy near the metro, squares, markets, and the beach, super clean place loved staying.

Le logement est bien dans l’ensemble, mais un peu à l’écart de Porto (le trajet se fait très bien en métro). Notre chambre était conforme à l’annonce. David était sympathique et donnait de bons conseils. Par contre, notez qu’il y a d’autres chambres à louer dans l’appartement et une seule salle de bain..!

David et Rosangela aiment que leurs invités soient à l'aise et sont prêts à déployer des efforts peu communs dans ce but. Nous avons beaucoup échangé dans plusieurs langues (surtout en anglais).Nous recommandons cette adresse, d'autant plus que Matosinhos est bien situé :au bord de la mer avec la possibilité de rejoindre Porto en métro!

David and Rosangela were very nice hosts and super flexibel with Check-In. Everything was perfect and just as in the description :-) it was quite easy to find a parking lot and it was a quiet area. In case you’re traveling without car you should know that it is a bit far from the center of the city but via car no problem, we reached the Ribeira within 20 minutes. Thank you again - we would come back and recommend.

Ver nice flat and exceptional kitchen, everything clean and tidy. The flat is easy to reach with the public transport and there is a metro nearby which brings you to the city center within 20 minutes. The hosts are very nice and we felt welcomed right away.
The hosts are friendly and helpful,  great place at a great price!

Dawid i Rosangela zawsze byli pomocny i otwarci na rozmowę.
Całe mieszkanie bardzo czyste. Wszędzie panowała miła atmosfera.
Perfect room and hosting

Rosangela's and David's place is in a good location to explore Matosinhos and go to the beach. The room we stayed in was very clean and the bed and pillows were comfy. The washroom was very clean as well. 

The kitchen is very modern and clean but it was tight sharing it with another couple and the owners in the morning.

Our host David, had a couple of friends over the night we stayed and even though it wasn't a big party we could hear people talking and going in and out of the washroom, which was enough noise to keep us up until 2am. 

The next day David mentioned it was a one time occurrence. The one big suggestion we have for him is to not have guests if you're planning to party at your place or at least mention it at the time of booking before accepting a reservation so the guest can know what to expect and decide if they want to stay there or not.

Rosangela was very nice, she apologized for the late night incident and did everything that was in her hands to make the rest of our stay comfortable. They were very kind to let us keep our bags for 5 hours after check out as our flight wasn't until later in the day.

Polecam! Bardzo pomocny właściciel mieszkania udzielił nam cennych wskazówek dotyczących pobytu w Porto, dodatkowo jako 100 goście w mieszkaniu otrzymaliśmy od Davida prezent, dzięki któremu nasz pobyt w Porto był znacznie przyjemniejszy!
Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt in Porto. Die Hosts sind zu jederzeit bereit einem den Aufenthalt zu verschönern.

Nós tivemos o privilégio de conhecer David e Rosângela, são pessoas especiais.
Sentimos como se estivéssemos na casa de parentes queridos.
Pena que não ficamos mais tempo com eles, pois fomos visitar outras cidades em Portugal.
Mas se voltarmos para Matosinhos com certeza iremos ficar com David e Rosângela.

Great hosts, easy communication - attended all our needs.
Highly recommended!

David & Rosângela are a really interesting, lovely hosts. They gave me a lot of good tipps for my stay in Portugal. The house was absolutely clean at any time, I felt very comfortable and welcome. I also rented one of the bicycles, what is amazing for this area. The bicycles are very special with a lot of extras and good to drive. I really recommend this place. Thanks so much again :)

Our stay with David & Rosângela was very nice, they always replied immediately to our questions and gave us great tips on what to do. The chats we had were entertaining and informative, which was a nice little extra to what we expected before.

Zdecydowanie polecam nocleg u Davida i Rosangeli. Bardzo sympatyczni i pomocni ludzie.  Zawsze służyli radą i cennymi wskazówkami. Mieszkanie w bardzo  wysokim standardzie, ponadto pokój zamykany na klucz. Do dyspozycji wszystkie akcesoria domowe, włącznie z pralką i TV. Bardzo blisko do metra i na plażę nad ocean. Po drugiej stronie ulicy sklep ze wszystkimi artykułami. Do Porto 20minut metrem.

Hey people, don't worry David and Rosangela are super host, friendly helpful and cooperative. Facilities at their apartment were beyond my expectations. Bathroom was shared but the host made sure it was always clean. We had used David's Netflix account, and also uber promotion coupon. just be assure you will have wonderful time at David's place. We can't wait to share our experience of Porto and our stay at Porto with friends and family when we go back to Nepal...

This is for David and Rosangela
डेविड र रोजाञ्जेला, तपाईंहरूको पाहुना सत्कार देखि धेरै खुशी लाग्यो । हामीले हाम्रो पार्टीको चार दिन बसाई निकै आरामले बितायौं । तपाइँहरू दुवै जनालाई धेरै धेरै धन्यवाद । म मेरा साथीहरूलाई पनि पोर्टो गयो भने तपाईंको घरमा बस्न सुझाव दिन्छु ।

Soba ki jo oddajata David in Rosangela je bila zelo prijetna in udobna. Stanovanje je bilo cisto in urejeno tako kot je potrebno. Stanovanje je imelo vse potrebne pripomocke za vsakdanja opravila. David in Rosangela sta bila zelo gostoljubna in vedno pripravljena pomagati ter podati kaksen nasvet. Poleg tega sta nam dala odlicne nasvete za par lokalnih restavracij ki jih je vredno obiskati. Stanovanje je na odlicni lokaciji saj je ne dalec stran od plaze in pa metroja, preko katerega se da hitro priti do centra mesta. Na koncu lahko zakljucim da je njun Airbnb odlicen in ga je vredno preizkusiti.
David and Rosangela were great hosts.  Warm and friendly with great communication- I would happily stay again
Blisko uberem z lotniska 8-12 euro, 10minut spacerem do pięknej plaży. 10 minut do autobusu 500 do centrum (1.8 euro bilet). ogólnie polecam, fajne spokojne miejsce, blisko marker, polecam!
very noisy place, shared bathroom, communicative owners
Bon emplacement, David est très communicant et sympathique

David and Rosangela were both lovely hosts! There for any questions and suggestions and a very clean accommodation! Super close to beach and being out of the city in Matosinhos was great. Would highly recommend :)
Adoramos. O David e a rosângela foram sempre simpáticos. Num dos dias esteve mais frio e tiveram a atenção de perguntar se precisávamos de mais um cobertor.

Top place to stay. It was my second time and I highly recommend. Thanks for all sympathy and disposability

See you soon

Unfortunately our room was very cold because there was a crack in the window, and we only had two thin blankets on the bed. The bed didn’t have proper sheets or duvet. This property was also listed as a ‘B&B’ which was incorrect. B&B means bed and breakfast. On the positive this was a nice apartment with a metro station near by. The bathroom was also very clean!

David & Rosangela are great hosts. We spend a lot of days in their house and we felt at home. Everything was perfect. 
Matosinhos is a really nice place to stay, close to the ocean and near to Porto centre (30 min by metro).   If you have a car you can park near the house. 
Recommended.
We only saw David and he was really welcoming and nice, always there if we had any questions. The apartment was nice and very clean, easy to find and to access. Really great!

Very good place to visit Porto and see the beach!  
very nice people!!! 
thanks for this week-end!

(mon séjour était du 27 au 31 janvier 2019)
Attention car les couvertures ne font pas tout, l'appartement n'est pas équipé de chauffage ni même de radiateur d'appoint. 
Il n'y a que 2 ceintres adossés à la porte de la chambre et pas de commode de rangement, c'est assez ennuyeux. 
Très peu de pression d'eau sous la douche et pas de tapis de sol....
brrrrr, j'ai eu assez froid pendant ces trois jours.
Really nice couple David and Rosangela. I was there only 2 nights but was a great stay and i highly recommend this flat to all.
Exlente localização

name: Quirky apt in great area
summary: Eclectic and bohemian two bedroom apartment in Brooklyn's trendy Bushwick neighborhood, just twenty five minutes from the city. We are a short 10 minute walk from the super convenient L and M subway lines giving you a straight shot to Williamsburg, the Lower East Side, East Village, SoHo, West Village, Midtown and more! A multitude of great cafes, bars and restaurants are right on your doorstep. We have two cats and a dog so animal lovers are a must!
space: Your home in Brooklyn is beautifully decorated with souvenirs from our travels - spacious, sun soaked and plant filled apartment on the 1st floor of a charming, pre-war house. Large sized private room with a comfy queen bed, armchair, clothing rack, ceiling fan,  TV with AppleTV (Netflix and HBO) plus cable, two large windows with tons of natural light, and plants. Sleeps 2 comfortably with bed linens provided. We also have a twin size airbed if needed. Full bathroom with tub and shower. It will be stocked with towels and essentials like TP, shampoo, shower gel & conditioner. Fully stocked kitchen with full size appliances that you are more than welcome to use! All the essentials are at your disposal, including dinnerware, glasses (juice, mason jar, wine, whisky, margarita, pint), a Nutribullet blender for smoothies and fresh ground coffee, a crock pot, a sandwich toaster, All-Clad and Lodge (cast iron!) pans, french press, stove-top coffee maker, microwave and an electric kettle. We a
