We are a short 10 minute walk from the super convenient L and M subway lines giving you a straight shot to Williamsburg, the Lower East Side, East Village, SoHo, West Village, Midtown and more! A multitude of great cafes, bars and restaurants are right on your doorstep. We have two cats and a dog so animal lovers are a must! Your home in Brooklyn is beautifully decorated with souvenirs from our travels - spacious, sun soaked and plant filled apartment on the 1st floor of a charming, pre-war house. Large sized private room with a comfy queen bed, armchair, clothing rack, ceiling fan,  TV with AppleTV (Netflix and HBO) plus cable, two large windows with tons of natural light, and plants. Sleeps 2 comfortably with bed linens provided. We also have a twin size airbed if needed. Full bathroom with tub and shower. It will be stocked with towels and essentials like T
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick is one of New York’s hottest neighborhoods.  A former working-class, industrial district in northeast Brooklyn (adjacent to Williamsburg), Bushwick has evolved into a bohemian enclave – home to experimental art, avant-garde performance, affordable craft cocktails and sustainable eats.  The neighborhood’s relaxed “go local” philosophy makes it easy to immerse yourself in Bushwick’s abundant culture Wander the streets and immerse yourself in the the neighborhood's world-renowned street art, take a tour of the Fine & Raw Chocolate Factory, go on a craft cocktail crawl, check out a few art galleries and sample some truly innovative cuisine to find out why Bushwick is fast becoming the new hipster epicenter of Brooklyn.
notes: We'll provide you with a unique neighborhood guide and can hook you up with tours and fun day-out ideas
transit: 10 minute walk from the Myrtle-Wyckoff L/M lines and an 8 minute walk from the Halsey St. L line.
access: Your private room and all the common spaces which consist of a bathroom, kitchen, outdoor patio, living room and entryway, you'll share with me. Please feel free to use the kitchen to cook and store food during your stay. Wifi throughout. There is typically some free street parking nearby if you are bringing a car but watch out for street-cleaning twice a week!
interaction: Interaction will vary. We live here and will be in and out with work, etc. My husband and I are happy to answer any questions before, during and after your stay.  We are friendly and outgoing and love to share our passion for eating and drinking in the city. Sometimes we might be down for a meal or a drink with guests but no pressure!
house_rules: PLEASE NOTE: We are flexible with check in times but you must arrange your check in time with us well in advance as we both work during the week and one of us will need to arrange to be home to meet you. Please text or message us with an ETA for any arrivals outside of the agreed upon check in time. For late arrivals (after 10pm) a late arrival charge of $45 will be imposed.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Sarah was an awesome host!

Apartment is really lovely, and is really close to the subway so it's easy to get around. Sarah and Jack were great hosts. They made me feel really welcome, were really flexible and friendly - couldn't ask for better hosts!
They are very helpful and friendly. The apartment is close to F train, so it's easy and convenient for us.

We had a great stay here, Sarah was a great host, the room is nice, the pets are adorable, there were cider and granola bars for us, the subway map and the recommendations for shops and restaurants were very helpful. And thank you so much for letting us stay longer than the checkout time because our flight only departed in the evening. We would stay here again and recommend this place to everyone. Very close to the subway, to Prospect Park and some nice food.

An excellent host and an excellent house. Sarah was extremely helpful with her suggestions and her communication, and she was really accommodating with our erratic schedule and odd arrival and departure. It was blessedly easy to get from Sarah's place to the rest of the city. Her pets were really, friendly, too. I wouldn't hesitate to stay with Sarah again on a future trip to the city.

I had a great time in NYC. The accommodation is as described. It is really close to the subway station, so I could get anywhere really quickly. Sarah and Jack were really helpful and their dog and cats were very friendly. I arrived in NY quite late, but that was not a problem for them.

Great stay, very well organized, and the room is very new yorkish, with lots of fancy little things. It's not a regular IKEA place, on the contrary many items are set to have something particular reminding of the good old days. The neighborhood was safe and the location is easy to reach with a subway or on buses. Highly recommending for the great value to anyone looking for a trip to NYC.

Sarah and Jack are awesome hosts. Their apartment is gorgeous and close to the subway which made it easy for us to get back after long days out in the city. The apartment is in a quieter neighborhood which we appreciated as it offered us a break from the bustling nature of New York City. The room is super comfortable and spacious, and the price is unbeatable for what you get. We didn't get the chance to interact much with our hosts as we were out and about but they were really friendly, as well as their pets. I definitely recommend Sarah's place!

Staying at Sarah's place was perfect for our trip to NYC, the apartment has a great atmosphere and vibe. It's located a stone throw to the subway with connections to Manhattan and further into Brooklyn. The subway took around 20-25 mins into Manhattan which was great.

Sarah and Jack are super nice friendly people who made us feel very welcome. They also provided us with lots of great tips for things to do, see and visit!

We loved their pets, they were super cute and friendly with great characters, they provided us with so many laughs and smiles during our stay. 

I would totally recommend staying at Sarah's, we are looking forward to when we can make a return trip!

We loved our stay at Sarah’s place and will definitely come back! The hosts are great, very welcoming and ready to help. The apartment is cool and stylish. The room is bright and clean with nice thoughtful touches (snacks, tips for travelers, maps, etc.). The place is very close to subway and has street parking available, if you arrive early enough. Highly recommend!
Very responsive and overall an amazing hostess. Very comfortable stay and t felt like a was visiting family or friends.
We were very impressed with how thoughtful they are with the guests stay. We had a table full of goodies and information about the city. We really enjoyed staying there.
Sarah is an excellent host. Her place is very clean, within a few minutes walk to the subway, and is very comfortable. I would definitely stay with Sarah again
The public transport is one street away from the appartment and it takes about 45 min to reach manhattan midtown
Es un lugar muy cómodo, limpio y cercano al metro, es bastante seguro. Sarah y Jack fueron muy amables, sus mascotas son adorables y muy cariñosas.
We couldn’t be more satisfied about it. Sarah and Jack are superb hosts and if we ever came back to NYC we would most likely stay with them again. Thanks for everything.

Fantastic hosts! They went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed for our stay. The apartment is really close to the subway and surrounded by a bunch of great restaurants. Would definitely recommend!
Nice couple, lovely and friendly pets

Very close to the F train, which is one of the main lines running into Manhattan. Jack and Sarah are super nice, and they're very knowledgeable about the area. Lots of nice little extras, like an available umbrella if it rains, Netflix on the TV in the room, etc.
Sarah is a warm and gracious host. The place is beautiful and its in close proximity to the public transit. I'd highly recommend this place!
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a great experience here - Sarah and Jack were super accommodating and flexible. We had a late bus ride out of NYC and they let us leave our bags there past check-out time so we wouldn't have to carry them around all day. Also a great place if you're an animal person because their cats and dog are very friendly. The nearness of the subway station was also convenient; the ride into the city takes a little while, but it's definitely worth it if you're not in a big rush. I really recommend staying here!

I highly recommend staying at Sarah’s. She was absolutely fantastic. (And I’m sure her husband is too! But we were only at the apartment to sleep, so we didn’t see him very much) Sarah was so quick to respond to questions when we were trying to figure out the subway system. Thoughtful little touches. Very comfy bed. And the pets were adorable. 

The train right by the apartment is so safe and a straight shot into the city. The neighborhood was very safe as well. We rode the subway late and got home late and never once did we feel uncomfortable walking from the station to the apartment.

Sarah and her boyfriend live with their cats and a dog in a beautiful appartment in Brooklyn. The next subway and good restaurants were just a few steps away. They were both very helpful and friendly. I would be pleased to visit them again in the future.

Sarah and Jack are amazing. They have a wonderful place in a great location with an insanely comfortable bed and seriously cute animals. They made themselves readily available, too, and had great tips on places in the area to check out.

Sarah and Jack were outstanding hosts! We would definitely stay with them again. The room was so cozy and their animals were super cute! It was our first time using AirBnB and they were amazing. We would definitely recommend them!

Clean, neat,cozy place. good and safe location . Within 10minutes walk to subway and supermarket, laundry service and cafes just at the corner. Appreciate Sarah and her husband help me to get uber last minutes from her place to airport(New York Uber don't accept cash payment). I have great time with them and their dog and cats.
We had a nice stay at Sarah's apartment and would definitely stay there again.
Loved the room and the pets! Located very close to the subway and would definitely stay at again

Sarah is a fantastic hostess. The apartment is spotless and filled with life. In addition Sarah was extremely kind and she went out of her way to make sure my boyfriend and I were comfortable. If you’re looking for a homey place to stay, with an awesome hostess and a killer pizza place (Fazio) down the street. This is the place for you.

We had an amazing stay here. Thank you so much for an incredible time. Sarah & Jack were thoughtful, helpful & had some great suggestions. We can not recommend them enough. If we’re ever back in New York we would definitely stay here again.

Ik boekte deze B&B toen Sarah & Jack nog op hun vorige adres woonde. Achteraf ben ik blij dat ik “mee gegaan” ben naar hun nieuwe adres. Prettige ruime kamer in een prettige, veelal door Puertoricanen bewoonde buurt. Prettige communicatie met mijn hosts. Ze hebben een lieve rustige hond en 2 katten, van wie er 1 erg gehecht lijkt te zijn aan jouw kamer. Als je daar geen prijs op stelt, zijn je hosts je daarbij graag van hulp. Prima B&B!

Comunicazione veloce con Sarah e Jack, quando c’è stato qualche piccolo malinteso abbiamo subito risolto. I loro animali domestici sono adorabili (ma chiudete la porta se non volete averli in camera, il primo giorno soprattutto tendono ad essere entusiasti di conoscervi e potrebbero invadere un po’ gli spazi). La casa è carina, l’unico difetto è il bagno un po’ piccolo ma è funzionale, la posizione è buona ma non ottima se si deve andare a Manhattan tutti i giorni in quanto è un po’ distante, ma tutto sommato ce la siamo cavata con i mezzi pubblici. L’aspetto positivo è che abbiamo avuto un assaggio della vera NY e di Brooklyn, non quella sempre patinata di Manhattan, ed è stato interessante.
Lovely couple to stay with! Very accommodating and made me feel very comfortable from the get go
Fantastic spacious room wit garden in Brooklyn. ..great hosts...what more is required?

You won't find a better place to stay in Brooklyn. The room was very comfortable and clean with clear instructions for check-in and your stay. Jack was full of insightful tips about the neighbourhood, such as things to do and places to eat/check out. It is conveniently located for the subway system and is around really great bars and restaurants. Also, the dog and cats just add to the already great experience!
Great hosts and a charming, spacious room. Great proximity to bus and subway, cool neighborhood with a variety of eats. Easy to reach via MTA from JFK airport. In all, a really pleasant oasis in NYC.
Clean place, cool neighborhood, great hosts! Would stay with them again.

The house is located very central in Bushwick Brooklyn and that’s a great place to stay! Young, vibrant, living... Sarah is a lovely friendly host. The house is small but clean and has everything you need. ( good pub and pizza around the corner, good bed, clean shower ). Be carefull: this is not Manhattan, but hey... Brooklyn is fine!

Nice house close from the subway. 
Lovely cats and very quiet neighborhood. 
Room clean and spacious. 
Also a back yard.
We love our stay with Sarah and Jake! They were nice and respectful. It was easy to communicate with them via airbnb. Thanks guys!
Great.

Sarah and Jake are great hosts! They gave me many advices and made me feel like home. The flat is nice and well equipped, with a small cute terrace where having breakfast. Everything was perfectly clean. The location is convenient too, just 10 min walking distance from the closest subway station to Manhattan and in a very interesting and lively district which has been a great surprise for me! And don't forget the 2 lovely cats and the sweet dog that will welcome you every time you come back home! But don't worry, they are very quiet and respectful!
I highly recommend Sarah and Jake's place!
Really nice room in a great neighbourhood. Not too far from the subway (about 10 mins walk). Lovely pets in the apartment :)

Amazing host with 3 gorgeous pets!! Location is about 40mins on subway into Manhattan - closest station is about 10min walk away. Great value and Sarah is a fountain of knowledge about the area and things to do/eat! Would totally recommend staying here especially if you don’t mind the somewhat long ride into the centre of Manhattan.

First time in New York for myself and a friend, we were honestly a little apprehensive to stay in Brooklyn because we didn’t know the area much but Sarah’s place was super cute we couldn’t pass it up. Our plane got delayed about an hour so we got to the apartment later than expected. Sarah and her husband Jack were super nice and accommodating! Gave us awesome tips and the few times we were able to talk to them they were always friendly and ready to eat about our NYC adventures! Also she has the most amazing pets Ruby, Lola and Zeplin! Definitely a recommended stay, definitely will book again :)

Had a lovely stay at Sarah’s. She not only had the place all clean and ready but also added personal touches like a cold bottle of water with a glass, a bowl of chocolates. 
The apartment is 10mins walk to the subway with a convenient commute to Manhattan.

This is one of the best finds on Airbnb. It’s amazing value for money, as it’s just such a nice room and apartment in a very cool area. 
Sarah has made a guide for food, drinks and things to do in the area and New York more broadly, which is amazing. We tried several of the places on their list and they were very good. The pets are very cute and well-behaved. 

Overall, it was just very easy to be a tourist when you stay in Sarah and Jack’s apartment and I would highly recommend it.
Good place to stay. The house is about  10 minutes walk from the station. the bedroom is really quiet and we did not hear a single bark from your dog. bed and linens good. we recommend it!

Sarah and Jack were wonderful hosts. Their place was very charming and had some lovely personal touches. The room was very spacious and clean. The walk to the subway was just a few blocks and the area had some really cool spots around for coffee and food. I highly recommend Sarah and Jack’s place and I’d love to book again in the future.

El apartamento y el cuarto son enormes considerando que estás en New York. 

Sarah y Jack son muy amables, te ayudan en lo que puedan. 

Como mencioné, el cuarto es enorme y tienes todas lo necesario. El apartamento a 30 minutos de Manhattan pero muy cerca del metro que te lleva a todos lados, te da la oportunidad de realmente vivir la vida como todo un neoyorquino. Regreso sin problemas!

AMAZING DEAL! The accommodations were lovely & we enjoyed the apartment so much! It was clean, cozy, and stylish. Sarah’s communication was top notch. Definitely would recommend to anyone wanting to escape to the city for a quick vacation & definitely would stay here again!
Sarah and Jack were great hosts. Amazing location, very close to the subway, spacious room. We would definitely stay here again!

Sarah is lovely, even with my mom not speaking very good english, they managed to have conversations, she is very understanding and understandable !
Her pets are very nice and friendly, and her dog is amazingly well educated, never barks, wont jump on you.
the place it self is nice and clean, room very stylish.
however, it is an appartment, meaning theres people under AND above, which makes the place really noisy. the walls are also quite thin so we can easily hear what's going on around.
it also is about 40minutes away from Manhattan, which in our opinion was a bit too far.. 
also, make sure you can contact them at all times, because due to a 2hours delay at the airport, we almost had to find another place to sleep at (her husband was kind enough to stay up till 1am though)
Sarah was very sweet in keeping in excellent touch with me daily, as our schedule changed due to unexpected events on our end. We hope to stay with Sarah and Jack next time we are in Brooklyn!

Sarah and Jack are very nice and helpful. The subway station is a few minutes away and has a lot of stores to buy food or cofee. The bed is really confortable. They have 2 cats and a dog... they are all very sweet! We sure recommend this place to stay when you travel to NY!
Stay here! The hosts and pets are super sweet, the locale is totally convenient, and the overall stay is spectacular for the price. 10/10, would recommend.
Very stylish space, nice hosts, sweet pets, near of the subways.. So perfect!
We enjoyed our four nights in Brooklyn. Sarah's place is great, close to metro, good facilities and a chill atmosphere. The cats and the dog are cute and we highly recommend staying here.

Me and my girlfriend had a couple very nice days there. The apartment has a very good location! By walking less minutes you can get to subway stations and to some super cool supermarkets and food bazars. The pets they have are so cute and curious. That's why we enjoyed our stay there. Sarah and Jack are so friendly, and we had a good communication with them. It's typical for New Yorker apartments that they have trouble with cockroaches, so we saw some there too. But Jack and Sarah immediately did the best they could to deal with this problem and to get rid of the very little number of cockroaches we saw there. That was very helpful. We would definitely recommend this apartment to any one! And we hope to be there some day again (not just because we miss the pets :) ) And if you want to eat one of the best pizzas of your life - please taste the delicious pizza from "Tony's" nearby the apartment.

name: Basin Homes
summary: Beautiful newly renovated ground floor 1bedroom apartment in the heart of Canarsie. One block from Seaview Park with an expansive trail for your morning runs. Multiple bus lines less than 5 minutes walking distance that can take you throughout Brooklyn and Manhattan quickly. As our esteemed guest you will have access to the entire apartment all to yourself. We will be right next door if you need anything, please feel free to reach out anytime!
space: The entire apartment is your kingdom
description: Beautiful newly renovated ground floor 1bedroom apartment in the heart of Canarsie. One block from Seaview Park with an expansive trail for your morning runs. Multiple bus lines less than 5 minutes walking distance that can take you throughout Brooklyn and Manhattan quickly. As our esteemed guest you will have access to the entire apartment all to yourself. We will be right next door if you need anything, please feel free to reach out anytime! The entire apartment is your kingdom You’ll have your own entrance for ultimate privacy as you come and go during your trip We will be right next door so if you have any questions or concerns, or just want to chat, please don’t hesitate to give us a shout Quiet, safe, well lit residential neighborhood There are multiple bus lines walking distance from the apartment that will take you to various train stations, or directly to manhattan. It is a residential neighborhood so supermarkets and restaurants are nearby. All guests must be accounted for on
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, safe, well lit residential neighborhood
notes: All guests must be accounted for on the reservation. No parties, no loud music after 9.
transit: There are multiple bus lines walking distance from the apartment that will take you to various train stations, or directly to manhattan. It is a residential neighborhood so supermarkets and restaurants are nearby.
access: You’ll have your own entrance for ultimate privacy as you come and go during your trip
interaction: We will be right next door so if you have any questions or concerns, or just want to chat, please don’t hesitate to give us a shout
house_rules: Please tidy up before leaving. Cleanup the kitchen, take out the garbage. Reminder: This is your home away from home in a quiet residential neighborhood: - please no loud music  - no loud noise  - lower the TV volume  No extra guests not originally on reservation unless previously discussed with host

reviews.comments: Great place

Audlyn and her husband were very welcoming and great hosts. Pictures don’t do this place any justice, it’s way better in person! Super cute, clean and everything was brand new. 

The apartment was in the southern part of Brooklyn close to Coney Island, the L train & airports. We visited in the winter but I can tell that this place would be a great option during the warmer months and will probably be booked! Please note if you want to be in manhattan all the time, that this place is a little far out. 

Overall great stay and I would recommend it to everyone - Wish you the best!

This was a very cozy place to stay while in town. I loved the warm and welcoming paint colors on the wall. Everything is clean and updated. The hostess even allowed me to check in early so I didn't have to wander around town until check-in time. The included parking was a plus. The only downside is this place does not have a TV. There are also children who live above that can be a little loud. The thermostat is controlled by the hostess. Would recommend! Thanks

The pictures does the place no justice, it is absolutely gorgeous in Audlyn’s home. Upon arrival she is very approachable and easy to talk to. The location was very convenient to the city, airport & other boroughs. Expect some noise from upstairs, and the WiFi does not work in the bed room and is a bit weak in the living room. The kitchen is fully stocked if you’d like to cook, the lighting in the home is beautiful. Overall, Audlyn’s home is gorgeous I cannot say this enough, especially the bathroom and the kitchen!
I came from Maryland. My stay was amazing and I loved It. Everything was just simply amazing.
This House Is So beautiful. The home is way better than the pictures I would definitely love to come back.
You won't be disappointed. Definitely a bang for your buck.  Very clean and comfortable.  The unit is also well stocked.  Truly enjoyed our stay

Audlyn's place was very clean and newly renovated. She provided breakfast food for us and was very responsive. The kitchen is fully equipped and perfect for preparing meals for lunch and dinner. We could park our car in front of the door which was very convenient. Access to the Beltway was very easy.
Great space! Very nicely decorated and all the amenities of being at home!

Anyone considering going to NY and staying in Brooklyn should definitely stay in Audlyns’ home! It was so clean and cozy, my husband and I were surprised by how beautiful the space was. She responds quickly whenever we had a question which was helpful, and she helped us understand the metro system as it was our primary method of transportation. While her location is far from the city getting to th city is an easy process. She was a wonderful host with a lovely personality. We would stay again.
Audlyn's place was lovely! It was so clean and cozy. She was such a pleasure to communicate with and made the process very easy for a first time Airbnb user. Highly recommend!

I absolutely loved staying here. The apartment was spacious and so quiet! Audlyn was an amazing host, she answered all my questions and gave great advice for getting around and places to eat. I loved staying here, and definitely will be back!

My stay at Audlyn 's place was simply wonderful.  The place is immaculate with great furnishings. There are plenty of towels, linen and a well equipped kitchen.  Audlyn and her husband were very attentive, making sure that we would be comfortable during our stay.  I felt like I was staying at a family member's home.  I would definitely stay here a again.

Personne très arrangeante, très grande sympathie à notre égard, je recommande ce logement à quiconque, lieu spacieux, propre agréable pour un séjour de quelques jours. 

Merci pour tout

Audlyn was very nice and attentive. The apartment has everything you need and I loved the kitchen. She keeps everything clean and tidy in the apartment which makes it very inviting. She was also helpful with information regarding the local eateries.

First of all, Audlyn’s place is beautiful. She’s a wonderful person and makes you feel right at home while not being annoying at the same time. We had our privacy and we came and went as we felt like. Everything was stocked up and well kept. Everything about this place was breathtaking. You won’t be disappointed. If you are looking for somewhere close to like Manhattan this might be a little far for you, an hour. But otherwise, LOVELY PLACE.
This apartment was very spacious and clean, something it is hard to find in NYC. Our host was very accommodating and it was overall a great place to stay.
Audlyn is great host. nothing to complain we had a great time. If we have to comeback to Brooklyn we are coming back there for sure.

Audlyn’s place was beautiful & very clean she made sure we had everything we needed. Her home definitely was comfortable to stay in we had a minor check in issue but they quickly resolved the issue. I would definitely come back to stay at her home again!
Second time staying with Audlyn. This apartment is beautiful (and spotless may I add!)

Audlyn è stata gentile e precisa, molto disponibile . La casa è uno spettacolo, bellissima, pulita e curata nei minimi dettagli. Ci ha anche aiutati nel depositare i bagagli dopo che abbiamo fatto il check out. Tutto perfetto! Grazie Audlyn
A beautiful space that I definitely plan on staying at again when I go back to Brooklyn.
Great place to stay in Brooklyn!
Audlyn's place was very clean and just like the pictures. My daughter and I spend the weekend there and everything we needed was provided. Would definitely stay here again next time I visit NYC.

The Host was very friendly and helpful. The sofa bed is not very usable as a bed. The description mentioned upstairs noise and weak wifi. Take note the wifi was virtually nonexistent.  The bit of upstairs noise was not kids doing homework it was a bit louder than that and began early in the morning.  We weren't disturbed by noise at night. The subway is about a  $17 average Uber trip away.  It's a decent place for 2 people.
Lugar limpio,  bonito y dotado con lo necesario, a 15 minutos del aeropuerto JFK  y a centros comerciales. Audlyn pendiente de lo que necesitamos es una persona muy amable y cordial.  Volveriamos

You will be so pleased with this place. What's not to love? Audyln's hospitality alone is outstanding. The home is beautiful from the kitchen, bathroom and bedroom in stylish décor and most of all super clean. Just a couple of blocks from the bus station which quickly led us to all the major train stations, super convenient.  If you choose to get this place, it will be a "WIN"!

Great place, everything is brand new.
Perfect location with a beautiful and huge park that grown ups and kids can enjoy, right at the corner.

OMG. This place was my 1st stay in an Air Bnb and it was much more than I expected. Her home is  very  beautiful and spacious, and most
 of all extremely clean. She provided toiletries and a well stocked kitchen.  Amazing!  We wanted
 to extend our stay..but she was booked was up. Thanks Audlyn for making our stay memorable.
The place is amazing. Very clean. I give it  a A++++
Great space!!

This basin house was amazing!! Very welcoming, we really used it as a crash pad after spending the day in the city. There is many bus stops within a few blocks that will take you anywhere. The towels were so soft and the shower felt great after a long day of walking. The fully stocked kitchen was great to have family meals in. 
Audlyn was very helpful in answering all of my many questions before and during our stay. 
If you do not mind the 1 hour commute into the city this is an awesome place to stay.
Clean space close to public transportation, takes about 1 hour to get into the city, so plan for that.  Great accommodating host

Audlyn has given me a fantastic first airbnb experience. She went out of her way to help us get our way around town. I would definitely recommend for anyone in New York. Very nice apartment. Great experience
Audlyn’s home is beautiful and spotless. Everything about her place was cozy and inviting. Would definitely stay here again.
This a great neighborhood in Brooklyn and I love led the separate parking !

Audlyn's place was exactly as she described it. Stylish, clean, and perfect for myself and my mom. She was very responsive, gave us suggestions, and friendly.  This was our first air bnb experience and it won't be our last. we rented a car and left it some days, the area was very safe. If you'd like to see what we did, places we visited, follow this link (Website hidden by Airbnb) Im still editing the videos so they will be up soon. Thanks Audlyn!
Audlyn is a great host...place was very nice and very clean and comfortable!!!

Audlyn à été géniale ! En plus d'être arrangeante, disponible et sourillante, elle a été aux petits soin pour nous et n'a pas hésité à faire au mieu pour nous rendre le séjour plus simple !
Je recommande son bien calme et accueillant.
Bien que plutôt éloigné du centre de Manhattan  (1h à 1h30 de trajet), l'appartement est très bien desservi par les transports  (bus à 5 minutes et lignes de métro desservant Manhattan sans nécessité de changement).
Nous reviendrons !!

Audlyn was awesome with us, she was very kind, nice and helpful.
I recommend her flat !
Even if it is fare away from Manhattan (1 to 1:30), it is very easy to take the bus and metro to the citycenter! In fact, the flat is near of a bus station  (5minutes) and well served by metro (the metro goes to Manhattan without transfer).
We'll come back !!
Audlyn’s space was exceptionally clean and convinient! I’d definitely recommend and stay again!
An amazing places to stay!!

audlyn place was sparking clean,bed was very comfortable, cable tv etc. and the location was
 perfect for me.thanks again for
 everything.ill book again in
 November

I highly recommend Audlyn's place. 
Indeed it feels like home, very beautiful  decor and perfectly clean. It's way better than what the pictures portray.

P.S: It's a great place for couples 

The kitchen is well equipped and you can even find some stored groceries.
If you want to shop for more, there are many options in the area and it's easy to get around via the bus and the subway especially to go uptown (Manhattan)

As for Audlyn, she is a special superhost, very considerate, warm and helpful.
She is always available to answer any of her guest queries, to assist them or to give them directions.
She even gave us a ride to a store one day.

Next time we're visiting New York, we will definitely go back to her place.

Thanks a lot Audlyn for such an awesome stay at your place. We hope to see you soon ⚘
Very clean, a little noisy and far away from all landmarks that you might want to see in New York.
excelente departamento, barato y con excelente mantenimiento, transportacion sencilla

bedroom and living room fabric both are very clean. host response very quick and she gives anything i ask immediately. there is backyard and host decorated for me. the house seems to have been recently interiors. so it is very new and clean. I was very pleased with this house.
Audlyn was a terrific host and her place is wonderful!

The apartment is like discribed. It was very clean. Audlyn is a very friendly host and helped us, if we had questions. The place is in a quiet neighborhood. You will need min. one hour with the public transport to the main attractions.
Très bon rapport qualité-prix. Equipement suffisant pour pouvoir cuisiner. Commerces à proximité. Quartier assez calme pour NY. En revanche assez excentré du centre de NY.

A spacious, clean and very well maintained apartment. Audlyn is available on time, always helpful. He was careful to leave food for our arrival, helped us with medicine when we needed it ... Impossible to think of somewhere else to stay in NY if not in his home. The subway station is less than 25 minutes walk, being a very quiet and pleasant walk ... arriving easily in midtown Manhattan. Perfect place!
Audlyn’s apartment is bigger than it looks in the pictures, very clean and welcoming. We would stay here again.

Oops I sent the public one the Host. The place was super clean and accommodating. She had all amenities that you would need. 
Audlyn went out of her way to make us feel welcome. 
She even help us secure some food items to put in the place. We were there for 6 days. This is very impressive service.

Audlyn’s place is super convenient and (Website hidden by Airbnb) very clean and spacious with great amenities and located in a quiet neighborhood. My friend and I really enjoyed our stay and I would definitely recommend Audlyn’s place.
Audlyn is a great host, her place is exactly as shown, extremely clean and very comfortable. I definitely would stay here again.

Audlyn’s place was extremely clean and had a large space for us. We stayed over New Year’s Eve, and commuted to the city via the train multiple times with no confusion or issues. Audlyn was helpful and kind and responded to messages quickly. Parking on site was a huge plus due to the large amount of people in the area over the time we stayed. Would stay with Audlyn again any time I go to the city!
good host

An amazing super Host. She is very responsive and attentive. Checks on you always to make sure everything is okay and to see if there is anything you need. Location is far from the city but worth every minute. It’s a 4 min walk to the bus safe neighborhood feels like you at home. The apartment is amazing warm and comfortable very homie. Perfect vacation spot for winter and summer
Wonderful place and a total value for money!

name: Sydney CBD Unique Loft Apartment with WiFi
summary: You will be comfortable in this unique warehouse loft apartment in a historic building in the heart of Sydney CBD, close to Darling Harbour and public transport. Upstairs there are 2 bedrooms/en-suite that we keep for our own use. Downstairs has an expansive living area with a well-equipped kitchen, internal laundry and we offer quality accommodation for 2 in the downstairs double bedroom with its full modern bathroom. It is a safe home away from home to enjoy Sydney's fabulous attractions.
space: The loft apartment is unique in the CBD - - a Heritage listed warehouse conversion, low rise building that used to be a winery in the 1800's; now comprising 21 units, only 10 of which are residential. It has CCTV for security, double glazing to moderate the buzz of the City, and every modern convenience to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. It is a direct train ride from the airport; and within walking distance of all major attractions.
description: You will be comfortable in this unique warehouse loft apartment in a historic building in the heart of Sydney CBD, close to Darling Harbour and public transport. Upstairs there are 2 bedrooms/en-suite that we keep for our own use. Downstairs has an expansive living area with a well-equipped kitchen, internal laundry and we offer quality accommodation for 2 in the downstairs double bedroom with its full modern bathroom. It is a safe home away from home to enjoy Sydney's fabulous attractions. The loft apartment is unique in the CBD - - a Heritage listed warehouse conversion, low rise building that used to be a winery in the 1800's; now comprising 21 units, only 10 of which are residential. It has CCTV for security, double glazing to moderate the buzz of the City, and every modern convenience to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. It is a direct train ride from the airport; and within walking distance of all major attractions. It is a shared apartment. You are provided with your own
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is unique: the CBD offers world class restaurants, the iconic Opera House, the renowned Botanic gardens, boutique theatres (e.g. Angel Place; The Genesian; The Ensemble Theatre just across the Harbour Bridge); Darling Harbour is right next to us; striking distance of the historic Rocks precinct if you wish to sample fantastic craft ales and enjoy a pub meal; three Olympic pools and gyms including Cross fit 1 block away, to work off the calories. 7/11 convenience store downstairs.
notes: Please note that there is no lift in this heritage listed building. Please arrange with the host if you would like assistance in carrying luggage and this will be gladly provided. The check-in / check - out time can be negotiated if there is no clash with other guests departure / arrival time, so please message me to check.
transit: 1 block away from Town Hall train station--a major hub and on the Airport line (25 mins from airport). But if you're keen to explore, the best way is on foot; with major world class attractions, shopping districts, restaurants, movies, opera, art galleries, museums, pools and gyms all withing walking distance.
access: It is a shared apartment. You are provided with your own security fobs to access the building, apartment key for the apartment, and room key for your own room.  You are very welcome to make use of living room, kitchen, and laundry. Please feel free to enjoy our book collections during your stay.
interaction: I live right next door to this apartment and I keep one upstairs room for my own use during the day. Thus I will be available to offer assistance throughout your stay. My flatmate Matt lives in the master room upstairs and he is overseas often with work.  We respect your privacy and value your comfort during your stay at our place,  but we are also very happy to have a chat or provide information e.g. good theatres, bars, pools etc. should you require.
house_rules: - Quiet hours from 11pm to 7am.

reviews.comments: Best that you could ever asked for
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Logement situé à 10 min à pied du city town, l'arrêt de train venant de l'aérport. 
Appartement charmant, très lumineux avec accès à une cuisine bien équipé si besoin.
Literie très confortable avec climatisation si besoin. 
Quartier commercant juste à côté, accès facile pour les principaux sites à voir (que ce soit à pied ou en utilisant les tranports).
Notre hôte Holly s'est montré d'une grande gentillesse à son accueil et était arrangeante.
A recommander sans problème.

name: Hale Ma Ke Kai (Home By Da Sea)
summary: Newly renovated 1,098 sq ft 2B/2B condo with 10'X24' lanai. Central air, new 65" smart TV, WiFi,  lg capicity washer/dryer.  8 miles to Kona International Airport, shuttle available. Near Hulihe'e Palace and Mokuaikaua Church.  30+ restaurants & art galleries within walking distance of our condo.  Kailua Pier a block away, offers deep sea fishing, parasailing, scuba diving, snorkeling, paddle board rental and submarine rides.  The absolute best location for a condo in the heart of downtown Kona!
space: This is a rare 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo with ice cold central air conditioning.  We also have a washer and dryer, and all kitchen appliances, including a new stainless s/s refrigerator/freezer with ice & water in the door.  There is also a reverse osmosis water filtration with dispenser at the kitchen sink.
description: Newly renovated 1,098 sq ft 2B/2B condo with 10'X24' lanai. Central air, new 65" smart TV, WiFi,  lg capicity washer/dryer.  8 miles to Kona International Airport, shuttle available. Near Hulihe'e Palace and Mokuaikaua Church.  30+ restaurants & art galleries within walking distance of our condo.  Kailua Pier a block away, offers deep sea fishing, parasailing, scuba diving, snorkeling, paddle board rental and submarine rides.  The absolute best location for a condo in the heart of downtown Kona! This is a rare 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo with ice cold central air conditioning.  We also have a washer and dryer, and all kitchen appliances, including a new stainless s/s refrigerator/freezer with ice & water in the door.  There is also a reverse osmosis water filtration with dispenser at the kitchen sink. Our Kona Hawaii guests will have easy access to our condominium using our smart lock door system. Our second floor home is handicapped accessible by elevator, and requires no stair climbing.
neighborhood_overview: Located on Alii Drive in the heart of downtown Kona, our condo is just across the street from the ocean and Kona Harbor.  Alii Drive is the ocean front street that offers many activities; including surfing, paddle-boarding, snorkeling, swimming, night time manta ray excursions, jet ski rental, parasailing, submarine rides, kayak rental, and many restaurants. The annual Kona Ironman Triathalon starts and finishes on Alii Drive, a block from our condo.  The annual Billfish Tournament (September) is held in Kona Harbor, just across the street from our home.
notes: Ma Ke Kai Hale is located 8-miles South of Kona International Airport in the heart of downtown Kailua-Kona in Kona Plaza.
transit: We now offer an airport shuttle service from KONA International Airport to our condo.  For airport pickup and delivery, call Shelly Mullin at (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Our guests may use our Infiniti Q-45 while staying at our condo for only $35/day.  Since our Kona Plaza home is located in the center of down-town Kailua-Kona, you can walk to most local attractions. Kona harbor and its sandy beaches are just across the street. There are taxi cabs, and tourist busses for local transportation.  You can also rent bicycles, motor scooters and motorcycles here.  In fact the local Harley Davidson motorcycle dealer rents Harley's for $90/day and is only two blocks from our condo!  You can swim, surf, fish, snorkel, scuba dive, wind surf, paddle a canoe or paddle board, or even join our canoe club and help paddle a 6-man outrigger canoe in Kona harbor.  Just walk to the beach in front of the King Kamehameha Hotel and take a ride in one of our KAI’ OPUA CLUBs outrigger canoes every morning
access: Our Kona Hawaii guests will have easy access to our condominium using our smart lock door system. Our second floor home is handicapped accessible by elevator, and requires no stair climbing. Our bathrooms also have grab bars by the commodes. Guests have full use of all amenities at Kona Plaza, including the in ground swimming pool, roof-top ocean view picnic area, elevators and under-ground, secure parking.  The below ground parking garage has a security door that requires guests to enter a security code to enter the parking garage. There is no overnight parking at ground level for our guests. On arrival, go to the office, complete the "Visitor Registration Form" upon and give to the site manager Melissa Nahale.  She will then issue a temporary parking pass to be displayed on the dash of your automobile.
interaction: Aloha from Paradise, KONA HAWAII.  As your host here on the big island of Hawaii, I want your Vacation experience to be so amazing that you will want to return to "PARADISE" again. I am always available through airbnb to answer any questions about our condo and address any concerns that you may have when you reserve our amazing "Hale Ma Ke Kai" (Home By The Sea).
house_rules: The condo association has a strict noise policy from 9pm to 8 am. Please respect association rules.

host.host_about: I'm a retired Registered Nurse who loves to develop and manage real estate.  My goal is to make people happy by providing a clean, comfortable at home feeling condo with easy access to shopping, dining and cultural activities not only in Kona, but throughout the Big Island of Hawaii!  We look forward to your return visit!  Mahalo, David Lynn

reviews.comments: Loved it. Will definitely book again.
Very conveniently located and close to everything. The place was very neat, and ready for use. The beds were very comfortable. Overall a great experience.

This place was great! Clean, very quick and easy communication with David. The location was perfect for walking around, finding restaurants, renting bikes and booking tours for our vacation. The condo had boogie boards, a few snorkel masks, and a shade umbrella for the beach- such great details! 
We loved the daylight cafe for breakfast, and fosters kitchen for dinner!
Amazing location in the middle of everything and completely walkable .... huge open space apartment great for a family

家族で休暇で3泊利用しました｡立地も最高､ｽｰﾊﾟｰやﾚｽﾄﾗﾝ､海も近くてのんびり過ごせました!
何より部屋自体が最高!お部屋で過ごすだけでも心地よいです｡
また､David は返事も早く､こちらのﾘｸｴｽﾄにも素早く対応してくださいました!
車もﾚﾝﾀﾙしていただいて､自分で業者に頼むよりも安くしていただけました｡
長期滞在するには安くてｵｽｽﾒです!!
I use 3days with my family.
Location is good near beach, supermarket and restaurants.
Most of all, this condo is awesome!
And David is very good owner, quick response, has good hospitality.
He gave rental car also.
I really recommend this condo!!

Sparkling clean!! (don’t take that for granted in Kona ;) The kitchen is really well stocked- which was great for us here over Thanksgiving, we were able to cook a full meal.  Location is excellent in Kailua-Kona, tons of fun activities and good restaurants & bars all within walking distance.

Highly recommended! David's place was perfectly located in the middle of all things fun in Kona. Walking distance to almost all the good restaurants, shops and the beaches were very close by. Great little coffee shop just out the front steps. To top it off, David was very kind and quick to respond during our stay. We had a magical time! Thank you!
Great location, roomy place with all the gear you need for a day at the beach!

Five of us stayed at David’s 2-bedroom apartment for four nights. Before I describe the series of events that took place, which soured our experience, I want to mention that the apartment is very clean, well located, spacious and well equipped.

On the day of check-in, our flight landed early and we reached the building at 1pm (check-in time in the Airbnb listing is 4pm). We met a housekeeper and told her we were early and just wanted to drop our bags. She told us we could go ahead and drop our bags in the apartment. We did just that and left the building. In 30 mins, we got a text from David accusing us of breaking into his apartment and of leaving some dead fish smell. We immediately came back and there was no smell in the apartment. Apparently, it was some mis-communication between him and his housekeeper. 

When I asked him if I could give him a call to clarify things, he gave a very rude and unwarranted response saying he won’t speak on the phone and we were at fault. 

David’s behavior was so unpleasant and unprofessional. 

Next, there was the car that he had agreed to lend us for our stay because he couldn’t apply some discount he had promised on the Airbnb listing. There was a lot of back and forth on this. He constantly kept asking for an additional $100 - first saying that  he forgot to add cleaning fee, then saying that we owe him that much for the car that, and then finally agreeing that it was a misunderstanding on his part.  Finally, When we arrived, he again said we should deposit $25 per day for the car in his account. After clarifying, he let us use his car for no charge. 

We took a picture of the fuel tank reading before using the car and filled up more fuel than we found the car with. Despite that he sent us rude texts saying we didn’t fill up his car. 

Overall – I would not recommend staying at David’s place because of the way we were spoken to. Maybe he’s nice to other guests but our experience was quite the opposite.

The condo was decent. We stayed here with one other couple and there was plenty of space. If you’re going to the beach, the condo has lots of supplies for the water. The kitchen is stocked with most things needed to cook a meal. 
We had difficulty with the car that was available. Unfortunately, it was not working properly (not drivable), and since I was the first to bring this to Dave’s attention, he didn’t believe me. We spent our own time taking a look at the issue, but he did not have it fixed during our stay, so we had to cancel plans for our trip that required driving (or pay $250 per day for a last minute car rental). If you’re familiar with this island, you’ll know that there’s not much to see if you don’t have a car. The lack of car ended up being pretty costly with multiple Uber rides. his definitely ruined our trip and I didn’t get an apology until I asked him for one. 
I’m pretty easy-going when it comes to Airbnb stays, but this was definitely not up to par. It’s very evident that this is a new property and Dave is learning as he’s going. Unfortunately, my Christmas vacation had to suffer because of this.

What an awesome location; so close to so many things.  Walking distance to many restaurants and shops and easy drives to other activities.  The condo was great with amazing outdoor space on the balcony.  We used the sleeper sofa and those that used it said it was very comfortable.  There were amazingly soft blankets as well that the kids greatly enjoyed.  It was so convenient to get in and out and David was so quick with the communications.  We really enjoyed our time at the condo!

Overall good stay, but could see a few improvements

Pro:
- Excellent location, walkable to the beach, to some of the best local restaurants and to the supermarket
- David was nice and responded quickly and tried his best to plan arrangements.
- Nice renovations, large space and comfortably sleeps all my family.
- David offered us to rent his Nissan Pathfinder during our stay. It was really useful having a four wheel drive car to navigate around Big Island.

To be improved:
- Not as clean and new as I wish it would be, there were small stains left on the towels, the washer and dryer were getting rusty - this could be easily fixed
- We had an incident where we have been unexpectedly locked out by the screen door and since we didn’t have the keys, we had to call a locksmith. This should be a one-time incident only and I hope David will avoid this situation in the future. David offered to pay for the cost of the locksmith to compensate for this situation.
- Communication wasn’t always clear. I suppose this is because of David’s many guests but there was a bit of confusion when making arrangements. A lot of information wasn’t concise enough and made it hard to keep track of everything.

Mahalo for hosting us!
Spacious and clean!! Perfect for families and near of Kona’s attractions. We recommanded it !
Perfect location the condo was clean and well equipped. David is a perfect host. Stay here!
Good location.

We recently finished a three week stay at the Condo.  David has been great to deal with throughout the entire time, from booking to check-out.    The location of the Condo is as advertised.  We specifically wanted a place that was centrally located in town, and boy does this Condo deliver in this regard!  The Condo is very clean and functional.  Also the parking garage is very secure.  At night you can expect some moderate city/town noise, but you are, after all, in the heart of town.

Lots of restaurants and shops to visit.  Great little beach for snorkeling and swimming just a 10 minute walk from the Condo.

It's a terrific property, and we really enjoyed our three-week stay.  Thank you David!  

Tom
The space was great, the maid was very rude and caused problems on two occasions during our trip.

Thank you so much for the lovely stay in your condo. You really thought of just about everything a traveller could need or want. Cooler, condiments, comfortable beds, new appliances, washer, dryer, dishwasher, beach cars,  towels, boogie boards, fishing rod and the list goes on!
Great job!
Mahalo 
Lauren, Ken, Debbie and Mark

This apartment was in a great location close to shops and restaurants. It was  in great proximity to the airport. It fits four people perfectly with two large beds and two bathrooms. We enjoyed the closed terrace dining room that is open to outside air. There were also beach towels, sunscreen, and snorkeling gear which made it very convenient. Would recommend this place on Kona side!

David's condo is located in the heart of the Kona and it is very easy to access to every where. The home is very clean and quiet. The new renovated kitchen is fancy with all cooking utensils and spices. there are also has additional sport equipments such as tennis rackets, Snorkeling equipment, bike, etc you may not have time to use it.
A great place to stay. Everything was as described. The location was perfect. Just a short walk to a ton of restaurants, shopping and even close to a beach! I would not hesitate staying here again.

As a couple with two teenagers we looked for a place that had three beds. David's nice place had two separate bedrooms and a pull-out couch which worked well for us. In the heart of Kailua, Kona the ocean shoreline, shops, 150 year old church and historical palace home was within one or two minutes walk. My net cost was $202 per night included a full kitchen and a block away the Marriott two bed room without a kitchen net was apx. $350.
Great place great value for everyone.

The condo is in a central location of Kona. The big issue I had was that David and his staffs assumed my family and I dirty the place without even inspecting the house in person.  I washed all the towels we used and cleaned up the house.  Be mindful, I paid $135 cleaning fee initially when I made the reservation. When the housekeeper came in person, she was delighted to see that I had washed all the towels and cleaned the place. In the end, David apologized.

We stayed at Dave's condo for 2 weeks. We loved the fact that it is walking distance to waterfront Kona, lots of fun shops, restaurants, local market and beach. We were pleasantly surprised to have beach chairs, boogie boards, snorkeling equipment and a ice chest. The fully screened Lanai has a ceiling fan, chairs, couch and a dining table. Beautiful kitchen with newer appliances makes you feel like you're at home. Washer and dryer were a huge plus!

It is very nice and clean place. Mr David Lynn is a very good communicator. It kept us update regarding Volcano  eruption situation . 

Thanks 

J Modi

Great great great location!! Walking distance to everything Ali'i Drive has to offer. Phenomenal host with great local tips made it very pleasant and comfortable to stay. We had a great family trip will return next year for sure Mahalo!!
Great updated space right in the heart of Kona, every where is walkable, and the space is very comfortable.

Location is right on main strip of Hilo, so you can walk to everything. The apt was clean and modern, which was a surprise as the building was on the older side. Had everything we needed, including air, which can be a real treat in Hawaii.
Great Clean and fresh home in Kona.  Very good location for all Kona has to offer. Neighbors are friendly.
The condo is in a walk to everything location in Kona and is adequate for 2 couples or a family of 4.

My family enjoyed our stay at David's condo, with its clean, comfortable space and plenty of room for everyone to sleep. The location to Kona was wonderful to be able to walk to the town's restaurants, water front, stores, and historical sites. Even though I would recommend a car if you want to go out and explore more than just the downtown, we loved being able to spend some of our days never having to drive and still getting to explore with just a short walk. However, the condo itself is in a quiet location. David was very good at responding to our requests and I was even able to call him directly the day of check in to get confirmation of an early check in.

Everything was as advertised, especially with the awesome amenities like the big TV and the induction(?) stove. My family could tell that the place was newly renovated with the new granite countertop. We were also able to utilize the terrace and had a nice breakfast there. As added bonus, there's even a closet with beach items like towels and chairs that you can borrow. Had some minor issues that wouldn't really affect one's overall experience like the door keypad not working (though they smartly put a manual key in a lockbox as a backup), and having to hold the shower head in one of the bathrooms. Can't beat the location as well.

Kona is all about location, location, location and David's place had it in spades. Easy to get into and out of, beautiful kitchen for us to cook in, private space for us and our kids. The screened in lanai was well-appointed - plenty of places to sit. David was very communicative with us as soon as we made our booking. We deeply appreciate all the information he passed along to us! We'd happily stay again!

David's place was in the best location and centrally located which was perfect for our family.  The kitchen was so well stocked with utensils and amenities, we didn't need to buy much of anything.  The beach towels, chairs, snorkeling gear, and umbrella made our beach trips great!  We will definitely stay here when coming to Hawaii again.

Great place to bring family for a Hawaiian getaway.
Starting with the excellent - great beds, good pillows, good hideabeds for extra sleepers. Kitchen and bathrooms were lovely, with great hot water, filtered drinking water, and well-stocked amenities such as soaps, towels, utensils, pots and pans, etc. You can bring groceries and start enjoying your vacation immediately.
As of 7-23-18 (when we left) there is heavy construction going on at the complex. THIS IS IN NO WAY THE FAULT OF THE HOST, AND IS COMPLETELY OUT OF HIS CONTROL. That being said, visitors need to be made aware because it might temporarily bother some vacationers. Check with the host first. When the construction is finished it will be a very lovely, quiet place to spend a relaxing Hawaiian vacation. The host has thought of practically everything for the comfort and convenience of his visitors.
Great location and responsive host. Apartment was very clean with well-marked instructions.
Great place with a better host in a magnificent location

David's place is definitely a perfect place to stay at. It is located in the heart of Kona which makes it very easy to come back from walking to relax. Shops, restaurants, and beaches are just walking distant. We walked everywhere and only used our rental to go exploring.  It's very clean and spacious and he is very responsive. We was there during Hurricane Lane so most of our activities were cancelled but still had a great time just enjoying the locals fish off of the shore. David was very kind and thoughtful and got my husband and I a dozen of roses for our 20th Anniversary that we was out there for. I would def go back to his place again and would def recommend to my friends & families.

David is warm, friendly and extremely hospitable.  I would recommend him for the host of the year.  His home was comfortable with all the mod cons and so very handy to shops, restaurants and the beach.

David’s home is gorgeous with a location that absolutely cannot be beat!! You’re right in town and can walk everywhere you need in just a few minutes. The condo is a nice size and David was incredible easy to work with!
if you are a traveler like myself that appreciates an immaculate and well appointed home with all the amenities provided by the host, David's place is an incredible value. There was
All facilities are well maintained to perfect.

The rest of my party and I agreed that this was a wonderful Airbnb and definitely made our first stay on the big island worth every penny! Dave was extremely accommodating and let us check in early. The place was clean and wonderfully furnished. It also came equipped with beach towels and snorkeling gear. Could not have asked for a better home and host!
A very nice apartment with great location!
We enjoyed our time here during the Hawaii Ironman- the location is perfect, and a short walk to everything we needed. The condo is clean and spacious with a large balcony, great for dining.

Place is very nice. Kitchen is updated and has everything you'll need. Bathrooms are clean and updated too. Mattresses are comfortable and we had no trouble sleeping. AC works well, room fans work great too and aren't too noisy. Balcony area has large table and nice chairs. Has no issues with bugs. Location is right by the ocean and shops (no ocean view but can get there around the corner). Never need to worry about parking in DT Kona since parking in the underground garage is included. Would definitely recommend this place.

David was a great host, he responded fast and let us do an early check in, very nice. The unit was very well equipped with everything you need, especially the kitchen! There were just a couple of things we didn't like: there was a little noise (we think from the elevator) that we could hear at night, it wasn't loud, but we could hear it sometimes. The second thing was that the outside of the building is a bit run down, and it looks like all the Airbnb's that are in a condo in that area don't look good on the outside, so if you're staying in an Airbnb condo in Kona you'll get the same outside.

Great condo, great host, and great value.  However,  I would not recommend this location to families with small children because the homeless population in downtown Kona is out of control.  I have vacationed in Kona several times over the last eight years, and the highly visible, drunken, and aggressive behavior of the once kind vagrant community frightened me and my young family.  No offense to the host--he rocks it--Kona proper just needs to follow his lead.
Amazing space with plenty of room for a big family! The patio is 100% screened in with a full size dining table. Beds were comfortable and the bathrooms were clean and stocked.

David’s place is very conveniently located in the heart of KoNa and it is beautifully decorated and squeaky clean. They unit had laundry / dryer which were very useful after our daily water activities. Extra couches which turned into beds were very handy. He was very responsive with all questions I had and the directions were also very clear. Highly recommend!
Really great place! Would highly recommend! Fabulous kitchen. Excellent location.

David’s place is located centrally in Kona with lots of amenities to get you started and complement your stay.  We had everything we needed and David was very responsive to our questions and needs.  We highly recommend this rental for your vacation to the Big Island!
Loved this place! Could not be closer to the shops/bars/beach! Being able to rent the car as well was a life saver and so easy! Would stay here again for sure!

David’s place was great it was so clean and comfy felt just like home!! It’s  close to the beach !!!  There are some great restaurants and shopping places in walking distance!!! Can’t wait to come back !!

reviews.comments:
Снимали номер с 3 по 9 ноября 2017 втроем - 2 взрослых и ребенок 9 лет. 
Местоположение и район.
Найти гостиницу очень просто. Если добираетесь сами, то выходить надо на трамвайной остановке Баязит, перейти на другую улицу, найти вывеску Burger King  и по этой улочке идти прямо вниз, никуда не сворачивая, ища вывеску гостиницы (она будет справа). 
Теперь о самом районе. Гостиница находится на торговой и оживленной улице. Первое впечатление - как будто ты попала на рынок, становится тревожно. Но потом уже понимаешь, что собственно это не совсем рынок - это магазины по оптовой торговле обувью. Я несколько раз проходила по этой улочке одна - все нормально - никто меня за руки не хватал, никуда не зазывал - здесь люди торгуют оптом, потому я как покупатель не особо интересна. Прогулка по этой улице до гостиницы занимает минуты 3. Зато поднявшись до трамвайной остановке Баязит, ты попадаешь сразу в исторический центр (Гранд Базар) и можешь прогуляться по одной из самых красивых улиц старого Константинополя. Пешком минут за 10 (может меньше, очень близко) доходим до площади Султанахмет, где в вашем распоряжении сразу несколько достопримечательностей - Храм Святой Софии, Цистерна Базилика, Голубая мечеть, колонны, рядом тоже Дворец Топкапы. Так что в плане местоположения гостиницы - все очень хорошо. И - ночью тихо, никто не мешает спать. В  5 утра кажется проходит молитва - её слышно, но еле-еле, я просто чутко сплю. Мы жили в номере 401 - на верхнем этаже. Из окна открывается вид на Мраморное море со множеством кораблей и крыши соседних домов.
Завтраки.
Каждый день одинаковые, но очень вкусные. Из горячего - яйца, картофель фри, омлет кажется (вроде без молока, не знаю, но вкусно), чай, кофе. Нарезки - огурцы, помидоры, оливки, маслины, 2 вида сыра, колбаса-ветчина, жареные кабачки и перцы, йогурт, хлопья. В кувшинах молоко и еще что-то типа цветного разведенного сока.
Номер.
Картинка соответствует полностью нами увиденному. Мебель неновая, но красивая и добротная, и видно, что дорогая. Матрасы толстые и удобные. Белье чистое и не пахнет хлоркой. Могу только добавить, что есть еще мини-бар, чайник электрический и чашки с блюдцами, тройник (поразительно!).  В ванне на троих человек - 5 тюбиков геля и один шампуня, три кусочка мыла и туалетная бумага. Полотенца также предоставляются. Есть сейф, проверили - работает, я так поняла он предоставляется бесплатно....вот только его к шкафу забыли прикрутить -
 спокойно взял под мышку и пошел. Посторонних и неприятных запахов нет.
В целом.
Гостиница очень приятная, тихая, уютная. Соотношения цена-качество оптимальное. Рекомендую данную гостиницу.
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We have spend a great time in this airbnb! The location is great ... near a lot of thing (hagia sofia, the blue mosque, the grand bazaar, ...), and we loved the terrace with the view on the sea!
This hotel surpassed my expectations. It’s very cozy hotel. Administrations and staff are very friendly and attentive. I was comfortable. Tasty breakfast. Thank you very much!

The apartment is great, big, confortable,good light and good bathroom. Is a little away from the noisy center street and that is nice. Muro is so nice, always offering tea, info and a nice chat. The breakfast is good, big and very practical to start the day and walk Istambul. We love staying here, because also has a roof top to watch the view.

Muro was nice, however as we've been experiencing a lot lately with airbnb the host has screwed up some important detail.  When we came to check in he said our room was taken and we were to move to another location.  First off, not cool, secondly he didn't offer to give us anything in return for this major inconvenience.  The other place was not up to our standards and we requested a refund which he made in cash.  This was kind of him, but still we want things to run smoothly.  Vacationing is amazing, but it's a costly affair that always adds additional stresses and one stress we like to avoid is accommodation issues.
Muro is friendly and good person.. all other guys who works there are helpful and nice.. just the room was not soo good looking like in picture.. otherwise eveything was Good :)

If you are looking for a place to stay and your budget is limited, this is your place, close to downtown, walking distance to Gran Bazar, Hagia Sofia even Topkapi, do not expect any fancy. Muro is a great host, he helps us to get a taxi, train, give us great tips about the city and always answer our questions. Breakfast is a plus, the variety, and taste make you feel in Turkey (instant coffee no my favorite all do).

reviews.comments:
Staying at Emmy's place was okay, and I would recommend it for the price, which is probably the cheapest you can find around. 
The house, as well as the room, is probably not the greatest, but you're absolutely paying what you get. 

I only had two minor issues:
1) I thought that 'flexible check-in' meant: 'tell me when you arrive and I'll open the door'. It's not like this, at least not in this case. I was arriving at 11PM/midnight and Emmy informed me she couldn't check me in and asked me to find another place where to stay. The problem was I didn't have the possibility to book another room as I was boarding the plane to get to Sydney, and I didn’t want to arrive to a place I didn’t know, late at night, without even knowing where to go to sleep. Luckily Emmy found a solution and I was granted access to the house. I haven’t seen Emmy during my stay, but I saw Patrick, who I think manages the room when she’s not there. They have both been nice and for any issues I encountered they were there to help. The house is a boarding house, so although you’ll have a private room, you’ll be sharing it with other people. The ones who were at Emmy’s when I was there were very nice as well! 
2) The bathroom wasn't too clean and the room was a bit dusty, which made it difficult for me to sleep, being allergic to dust. As I paid a cleaning fee, to be fair, I was expecting a higher standard in terms of cleanliness. If I hadn't paid that, it would have been totally understandable. But again, as it is cheap and they are nice, I absolutely recommend staying at Emmy’s!

name: Sunshine & Rainbows 402
summary: Sunshine & Rainbows 402 is completely remodeled.  It is next door to our other condo, 401. We have a large lanai where you can relax with a glass of wine or a cup of coffee and look out over the ocean.    We are in beautiful Kahana, a delightful little town just north of Ka'anapali and Lahaina.  There are restaurants and stores within walking distance.  We have a heated swimming pool & BBQ. We offer free high-speed internet service, cable TV, including Netflix.  Parking is free and convenient.

We will get your all set up on what information you need, then we do not interrupt your vacation. We are at the other end of the phone if you need anything at all.  We love hearing from our guests and love the photo's you share with us also.

reviews.comments:
This place was in a great location and had everything we needed for a very comfortable and relaxing 7 night stay.  

My wife and I would recommend unit 402 to anyone looking to have a peaceful relaxing time in West Maui.
Wonderful location and beautiful view!

Nous avons passé une semaine extraordinaire dans cette location avec La vue sur la mer, quel bonheur! L’appartement était très bien situé et très propre.
Jan a été une hôte qui répondait à nos questionnements rapidement, et ses commentaires nous ont été utiles dans la planification du voyage.
Je recommande cet endroit sans hésitation!

Marie-Hélène

What a beautiful place! It was clean, great amenities and the oceanfront view out of the living room is fantastic. Jan was really responsive and welcoming during our stay! We will definitely stay here again when we come back to Hawaii.

Beautiful, immaculately clean. This is a lovely quiet area, but with great bars (fantastic craft beers) and coffee shop just over the road. It has a beautiful balcony looking out to sea, we spent most of our time out here when we were not exploring the island. It was easy to jump down the road to Lahaina or Kaanapali. Jan was a great host and really prompt at responding to correspondence and supplied loads of helpful information, especially helpful for us as we were travelling to the islands for the first time.

Lovely and large one bedroom with a great view and easy beach access. We sat on the balcony daily and took walks along the water. Double sinks and double shower heads. No tub if you like to soak. Almost everything you need in the kitchen plus quiet in room washer/dryer. If we visit Maui again, we'll definitely stay here - good value.
Cooler, road to Hana CD, beach chairs and towels were amazing touches. Close to many good snorkeling places. Used the BBQ which was perfect and super clean.
Exactly as advertised.  Jan is an awesome host.  Khahna is a great part of west Maui ...right between Napili and Kaanipali/Lahaina so it’s all at your fingertips.  Have fun...we did...!
This condo was a great spot for our week visit. It's a quick driving distance to lots of great beaches and the property is really well maintained.

Right on the ocean.  Well kept grounds. Updated and well equipped suite. Jan is easily reached and provides some wonderful tips to get the best out of your island time. Ample parking. Location is great, walkable shops close by for a few things or some morning coffees. Short drive south to larger markets. Beach is swim friendly. Currently it is being protected with sand bags to prevent erosion which makes actually getting to the sand and water a little dicey but doable. If someone in your party has mobility issues, this might be a challenge but there is a beach access just south of the neighboring resorts that might be easier to access. Saw some snoozing turtles on the beach which was awesome. We had a lovely stay and would happily visit Jan’s place again.

Clean, organized, and a superb view of the ocean. We ended up having all of our dinners in the lanai and watched the sun set; it'd beat any restaurant in the area.

A very quiet beach just at the doorstep of the apartment where I enjoyed some swimming along the shore. Even spotted some turtles. 

Mahalo to Jan for sharing this place with us!

Wonderful view from the balcony. The unit was better than expected, very clean and so spacious with lots of storage for a family of four.  Conveniently located and a nice, well-maintained building.  So handy to have chairs and umbrella and beach towels already there.  Great stay and highly recommend!

Jan was an amazing host. Her tips are great! We loved staying at her place, it is way better than we expected. It feels like home. We had a great view+++ which we usually ended having our meals mosly breakfast at the patio.  Hearing those waves crashing and birds chirping is a way to start the day. It is a peaceful and relaxing place.
We will certainly booking at this place again!

This condo is a real paradise in the hawain  paradise. Everything was just perfect. Clean, clear, quiet place, good location. We will definitly want to come back. One word for our vacation at thïs condo: PERFECT.
Cet endroit est juste parfait. Tellement bien placé, très propre. Jan prend le temps de nous donner des explications claires sur toutes les activités que l’on peut faire, les meilleurs achats à effectuer. Cette hôte est juste PARFAITE. Un immense merci à Jan et Paul.

The pictures online are accurate of the condo, very clean with beautiful view.  Despite sandbags from the previous storms there was plenty of room to walk along the beach, swim or just enjoy the view.  We came with our children and they too felt it was a wonderful  comfy condo. Would definitely stay here again.

My wife and I stayed at Jan’s place for four nights in July and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  The views of the pacific were amazing and the condo was very clean.  You are within walking distance of a small variety store and rental store. If you enjoy snorkeling  there is an amazing place 15 minutes away .(Honolua Bay)
Très beau condo superbe vue douche fantastique cuisine très bien équipé

Jan’s place was paradise in paradise. The views were incredible and I found myself out on the lanai every morning. Jan was the perfect host from start to finish. She provided excellent tips on everything from food to activities to beaches and more. You’re right across from Boss Frogs where just about anything can be rented and if you love sushi you HAVE to stop over at Miso Phat’s across the street. It was a little toasty due to no a/c but we spent so little time there it wasn’t an issue. The unit is clean and well cared for. The shower is a HUGE plus. We didn’t want to leave!! This was my friends first time to Hawaii and he was already looking to buy his own place there.  This place was magical. We will definitely be back.
Very good value. Beautiful view.
Lovely view!!! Great location! exceeded my expectations :)
Comfortable conveniently located condo with an awesome view !
Try to stay at Jan's great,place!

Mahalo Jan and Paul for the use of your unit!
We stayed in unit 402 for two weeks in Feb 2019. The unit was lovely and had everything we could have asked for. The view was awesome and we watched many whales breaching off the lanai.  The condo was located right in the middle of two of our favorite beach hangouts so was an easy drive to get to. There was also a great pizza pub just across the road we could walk to.  The beach out front was nice to grab our morning coffee and walk along. Jan was easily reachable when we had a question. 
We are already planning another trip back!!! 

Toni Rotar
