neighborhood_overview: Sants is a neighborhood in the southern part of Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. Formerly an industrial town on the plain bordering Barcelona, known as Santa Maria de Sants, it belongs nowadays to the district of Sants-Montjuïc and is bordered by the districts of Eixample to the northeast, Les Corts to the northwest, and by the municipality of l'Hospitalet de Llobregat to the south. Although old-fashioned, its name is sometimes still written Sans in some Spanish-language sources. Sants is a neighborhood with a clear identity because of its historical origins. It was the main core of an independent village until 1897 when it became part of Barcelona, the former municipality of Sants included most of the actual neighborhood of Sants-Montjuïc district. By then, Sants had a population of 19,105 inhabitants, and the neighbourhood had a strong industrial character, home to some of the most important manufacturers of Spanish textiles, such as España Industrial and Vapor Vell. It has a total 2,45€/per day/per person to all tourists upper than 16 years old and for a 7 days maximum. Essentials will be provided (bed sheets, towels, soap and toilet paper), as well as water, coffee, tea bags, brown sugar, salt, olive oil, dish washing liquid and detergent.
transit: We do find "Estació de Sants" that connect us with plenty of Barcelona points such as the city center as well as the metro and other train lines. We do also find a close subway station 4 minutes walking. The quickest way to go to the airport would be through the aerobus that has its stop in Plaza España (10-12 minutes walking)
access: As a guest, you are able to use the entire apartment
interaction: Check In: The check-in and keys are provided in our office located in: Carrer Muntaner 430, entresuelo (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) rcelona. Upon your arrival, we will indicate the directions to arrive to the apartment from this point. Is also our pleasure to recommend you nice places to visit and give you the best tips to enjoy Barcelona according to your taste and budget. We also provide free luggage storage service, upon request. Monday through Friday in the mornings. (8:30 am 3 pm). we are very happy and ready to make your visit as comfortable and pleasant as posible.

host.host_about:
We are an agency located in Barcelona. We tend to offer our best service in each of our properties. We do currently offer short term vacation rental apartments in Barcelona, Madrid,Formentera, Menorca and Baqueira

Our purpose is to let our guests enjoy their Holidays :) !

name: BCN center / balcony - ensuite bathroom
summary: My apartment is located in the very center of the city (Born district) at 10-15 mins by foot to Gothic quarter, Ramblas, Cathedral, Picasso museum and the beach. The room faces the street and has a small balcony. I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT TO LIGHT SLEEPERS, STREETS IN BORN DISTRICT ARE VERY LOUD!!! I provide earplugs though. Room is equipped with a fan (warm season) and central heating (winter). WIFI, towels, soap, shampoo, hairdryer are included. Small ensuite bathroom (shower, sink and toilette).
space: Settled in an XIXth century building, my apartment has high ceilings, french windows in the rooms and restored chandeliers. The room I offer faces the street, has a small balcony and a small ensuite bathroom (shower, sink and toilette).  I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT TO LIGHT SLEEPERS, STREETS IN BORN DISTRICT ARE VERY LOUD!!!  The Born district is full of restaurants, bars and very popular to go out, it is not a quiet area!!! I do provide earplugs though. WIFI, towels, soap, shampoo, hairdryer are included. You also might want to be aware that I can't share the use of my living room since I am using it as my working space.
description: My apartment is located in the very center of the city (Born district) at 10-15 mins by foot to Gothic quarter, Ramblas, Cathedral, Picasso museum and the beach. The room faces the street and has a small balcony. I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT TO LIGHT SLEEPERS, STREETS IN BORN DISTRICT ARE VERY LOUD!!! I provide earplugs though. Room is equipped with a fan (warm season) and central heating (winter). WIFI, towels, soap, shampoo, hairdryer are included. Small ensuite bathroom (shower, sink and toilette). The Born district is full of restaurants, bars and very popular to go out, it is not a quiet area!!! I do provide earplugs though. WIFI, towels, soap, shampoo, hairdryer are incl
neighborhood_overview: The Born district is part of the historical center of Barcelona and a pedestrian neighborhood. Full of small restaurants, museums, little cafés, terraces, bars and boutiques, it is a great area to just walk around, wander through the tiny little streets and go by foot to most of the many things there are to see in the city.
notes: 2 metro stations at 5 mins by foot: "Barceloneta" and "Jaume I". 1 train station at 5 blocks, "Estació de França" that connects with the airport and other train stations.
transit: The entire neighborhood is pedestrian and at 10 to 15 mins walking distance to the Gothic quarter, Ramblas, Cathedral, Picasso museum and the beach! 2 metro stations at 5 mins by foot: "Barceloneta" and "Jaume I". 1 train station at 5 blocks, "Estació de França" that connects with the airport and other train stations.
access: SAFETY RULES: For safety reasons, the use of the stove, the washing machine and the dryer machine are not allowed . KEYS: A 20€ key deposit will be required for the set of keys (building, apartment and room), refundable when keys returned. ABOUT THE KITCHEN, PLEASE NOTICE: I don't have a coffee machine, (only a water boiler). I don't have a micro wave and my place is not really fit to cook or to have proper meals. Indeed, there is no table in the kitchen and I don't have a dining room. You can store anything you need in the fridge.  LIVING ROOM: I can't offer the use of that space since I am using it as my working space. PLEASE NOTICE: the room is for 2 people only, no extra guests are allowed. I rent 2 other rooms in my apartment.
interaction: I work a lot and don't have much time to interact. Peaceful and respectful people are very much appreciated.
house_rules: MEETING POINT AT ARRIVAL: Train station ESTACIÓ DE FRANÇA (2 mins walking distance from the house). Once there, please call me and I will come pick you up. PLEASE NOTICE: the room is for 2 people only, no extra guests are allowed.

host.host_about:
Born and raised in France, I lived in Mexico city for almost 15 years and moved to Barcelona more than 10 years ago: I like sunny places! I worked as an art director and creative director in advertising most of my life until I got quite burnt out. I have recently started a gift-concept store in the gothic district of the city and feel pretty happy about this life change.

I am a peaceful and respectful person who appreciates peaceful and respectful people as well.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

name: Mixed Dorm Bed#8 in Wan Chai (灣仔)(混合床位)(一張床位)
summary: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away!
space: The hostel is located at the most convenient spot you can find. We are well connected to every part of HK. Tram, buses, MTR and Ferries are all available modes of transport from our hostel. Our staff are friendly and experienced and always willing to run the extra mile to make your stay an enjoyable one. For guests who need a visa run, we are next to many embassy offices, e.g. China Visa Office, Vietnam Embassy. We are also close to the IELTS exam centre and Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition centre.
description: My place is close to everything travelers want. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the views. Friendly staff is guaranteed. The China Visa Office is a block away! The hostel is located at the most convenient spot you can find. We are well connected to every part of HK. Tram, buses, MTR and Ferries are all available modes of transport from our hostel. Our staff are friendly and experienced and always willing to run the extra mile to make your stay an enjoyable one. For guests who need a visa run, we are next to many embassy offices, e.g. China Visa Office, Vietnam Embassy. We are also close to the IELTS exam centre and Hong Kong Convention & Exhibition centre. Guests are most welcome to use the air conditioned common areas anytime. The common area on the Reception Floor is new and comfy. There are smaller common areas on each floor as well. Our reception is open 24 hours. The team is happy to provide all kinds of help, e.g. trip planning, restaurant recomme
neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai is for foodies! Why? Just look at the number of Michelin restaurants we have in our neighbourhood. Wan Chai is also an area with local colour (e.g. Blue House, Tai Yuen Street) but connected to the international part of HK, e.g. Central, Causeway Bay.
notes: There is WIFI available at every corner of the hostel. We have computers from guests too. There are multiple guide books and free maps.
transit: The hostel is two blocks from the Wan Chai MTR. On top of that, the Wan Chai Ferry Pier which brings you to Tsim Sha Tsui. Coach services to China is one minute from the hostel. For sure, there are buses and trams to all parts of HK as well.
access: Guests are most welcome to use the air conditioned common areas anytime. The common area on the Reception Floor is new and comfy. There are smaller common areas on each floor as well.
interaction: Our reception is open 24 hours. The team is happy to provide all kinds of help, e.g. trip planning, restaurant recommendation, ways to get around... Our guests are also enthusiastic to help each other out and to share experiences. Usually after the hiking, dim sum and horse racing trips, or a night in Lan Kwai Fong, they become friends and hang out together.
house_rules: We expect our guests to respect themselves and others. We have guests from all over the world and cultural difference is expected. However, we are sure that our guests are caring and are willing to think for others. *Smoking in this building: HK$1500 Penalty 在這棟大廈吸煙:罰款港幣1500元 *Damage or lose room key: HK$100 each 沒有退還､破壞或遺失房卡:每條港幣100元 *All beds and rooms are only for registered guests. Extra cost for non-registered persons: HK$500/head 我們只招待已登記客戶及每個床位只供一人使用｡如客戶被發現攜帶預訂以外的人入住,需被按人頭收費港幣500元｡

host.host_about:
Check Inn HK is located in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The hostel is well connected to most tourist spots and is close to metro stations. Check Inn HK is also the ideal place for tourists who come to HK for China Visa. Our hostel is just 5-min walk from the office.

Check Inn HK is a family-run hostel which aims to provide you the best hostel experience. Our friendly and well-trained staff is always ready to give you information about Hong Kong and China. We also provide a list of free service for our guests, to name just a few, iron, wifi, computers, hair dryer, adapter.

Check Inn HK is also a place for people who like to make new friends. As the hostel is a small one, guests find it easy to chat with each other in the cosy lounge area. Our staff regularly organizes dim sum gatherings and hiking activities for guests who have a taste other than shopping and drinking.

Check Inn HK, a place you could call it home.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: For the first time sleeping in a hostel ever, I was positively surprised. It was better than expected. Very clean. Best area in Hong Kong and really nice hostess. Overall I am glad that I chose this acc, could never find a better deal!
Friendly and helpful staff, good location, thanks guys
I had a great time there, the people welcoming you are very nice and they organized a hike to the Victoria Peak ! Excellent to meet some people !

Had a great time in Hong Kong with you, the room is so perfect and the location is great. I met a lot of friends inside the dorm and i must say it was a great vacation for me especially for solo travellers. Keep up the goodwork. I will definitely come back.
will definitely come back :)
Best hostel I've stayed at in HK
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It's an awesome location and pretty central to the whole HK island. The MTR bus just right in front of the door and Metro station within 5 mins walking distance. But, the internet is too slow( not just my feeling) and there are 3 levels of beds as a set when you are at the bottom level people may not notice you. I was in the 9 mixed bedroom and the room is tiny, the air was not fresh from midnight to the morning because it not circulated when the windows were closed and full of so much people though. The cleanness is really nice, they have people all day to change the sheet for each bed and you can always get the water to drink outside the door.
Overall, it was ok.I would choose it for a short stay but wouldn't stay here for more than 3 days.
The place is super small, the highest beds are uncomfrotable because are close to the ceiling, the experience depends about the others guests there, sometimes is quite sometimes noisy
服务真的很贴心!还有洗衣服务 还钱和卖卡,装修和设施很好!作为青旅 能有可以上锁的柜子 感觉很贴心!适合年轻人居住~~
Great people. Use the common areas, you’ll make new friends and discover new areas of the city w them.
Quick in response. Hospitable. Great people around!
No surprise. Good and convenient. Nice staff!
气氛还行,相比周围旅馆作为八人间,价格略贵,不过适合晚上喜欢和其他房客聊天的人

To be honest, I am not sure why this is listed on AirBnB. This is a traditional hostel, and a very good one I must say. The staff keep the rooms and common areas very clean, and all front desk staff are very helpful. Remember to bring a towel (or you can rent one), eyemask, earplugs and a lock for the locker, althought you can buy one here as well. I will def stay here in the future.
还不错
Good hostel and location
Great space in center location. Was very convenient to get around, and access was easy.
價格與實際入住品質差很多
Everything way as described. Not to complain about. Location is very good.

Had a great stay here in Hong Kong. Rooms are simple but don't need much more. Quite well priced in comparison to rest of Hong Kong. Staff are amazing. Super helpful. Location was great as well. Really close to the MTR just two blocks and in perfect location for my needs. Really close to Harbour as well. Definitely would recommend staying here especially for those on a limited budget.
性价比很高 在这里可以遇到不同国家的人 交流起来非常有意思

reviews.comments: Excelent place to stay! Lovely!
Amazing. Greatest experience ever. Definitely a top destination for anyone who loves having a home away from home.

This room is really great you will have a lot of space. The bed is very confortable and all the apartment is good. Big kitchen you can really live and stay at this place especially if you have to study or to work at the apartment. The location is very cool there is so much life the recreation center is so close if you want to do sport and you have the 4 line in express which means that you can easily go to manhattan (20 min) and the A line too. Very good deal in Brooklyn

Spacious clean room, The host and her families were nice, helpful, kind, friendly, the other tenents were also. I could very easily gent in touch with host. And She was also considerate about what I asked her.

Her place is good and comfortable, good bed and good shower. In the room you will find air conditioner for the hot summer. There subway station 5 minutos away that can take you to manhattan or Coney Island. Good to you pic up the train for the airport too. The wifi wasn’t so good but still be able to use. Big room to open the luggage’s or put clothe in the wardrobe. Good place to stay in Airbnb.

Denise is the perfect host. She is a warm and friendly person. She was very helpful and so nice to talk to. Denise and her family really made me feel at home.  My room was spacious and clean and had all the comfort that I needed. I really loved the neighborhood, very colorful and lively. I never felt unsafe, even when I came home late at night. The subway was nearby and I could walk to prospect park.

My stay at Denise has been great. She's really kind and responsive and makes you feel like home. The neighborhood is fine, always full of people and stores with everything you may need. The subway is very close, just 5 minutes walking and it's very convenient. Thank you Denise!

This place is a real shelter for every traveler, thanks to the kindness of Denise. I highly recommend to spend time there. Lots of groceries, subway, an amazing cafe close to the home (Lakou Caffe). I really enjoyed my stay!
A nice place to stay, close to the metro, even if it was a bit hot. We spent beautiful days

Thanks to Denise my trip in New York was amazing, because I knew I had home at her home! I highly recommend her house. It’s convenient and friendly. Lots of stores, groceries, subway station, an amazing caffe « Lakou ». Thank you very much!

I am very bad at writing reviews. This is actually my first review ever. Denise was a perfect and very helpful host. She is very organized and very motivating.  The room was very comfortable and the house was very close to grocery’s, deli’s, 8 mins walk to the Utica ave subway.

name: Superbe chambre à deux pas du métro Mt-Royal!
summary: Joli condo de style vintage au coeur du Plateau Mt-Royal! Quartier dynamique, au centre de tout! Beaucoup de restaurants, bars, boulangeries, cafés, parcs, etc. Transport en bus, métro ou à pieds!
space: Notre demeure est un joli appartement de 4 pièces qui se situe au niveau de la rue. Il est au coeur d'un quartier effervescent, le berceau des français et des portugais immigrants à Montréal. L'appartement est bien insonorisé des voisins et de l'extérieur; il constitue donc un petit havre de paix pour la durée de votre séjour!
description: Joli condo de style vintage au coeur du Plateau Mt-Royal! Quartier dynamique, au centre de tout! Beaucoup de restaurants, bars, boulangeries, cafés, parcs, etc. Transport en bus, métro ou à pieds! Notre demeure est un joli appartement de 4 pièces qui se situe au niveau de la rue. Il est au coeur d'un quartier effervescent, le berceau des français et des portugais immigrants à Montréal. L'appartement est bien insonorisé des voisins et de l'extérieur; il constitue donc un petit havre de paix pour la durée de votre séjour! Vous aurez évidemment accès à votre privée munie d'un grand lit. La chambre donne sur la cour arrière, donc assez tranquille. L'appartement dispose d'une cuisine toute équipée que vous pouvez utiliser si désiré. Vous avez aussi accès à la salle à manger et au salon. Une salle de bain moderne, avec bain-douche également partagée. Nous sommes à votre disposition pour toutes questions concernant Montréal ou le quartier. Nous aimons bien jaser avec les visiteurs mais nous n
neighborhood_overview: Le plateau Mont-Royal est un quartier unique par son architecture, mais aussi par les habitants qui y vivent. Une très grande proportion des résidents sont d'origine française ou portugaise. Ce qui apporte son lot de boulangeries, cafés, restaurants et bars!
transit: Le quartier est idéalement situé au coeur de Montréal, à seulement deux stations de la gare d'autobus arrivant de l'aéroport. Il est parfait pour pouvoir explorer à pieds ou en transport. L'appartement ne dispose pas de stationnement pour les voyageurs. Par contre, il est facile de se stationner directement sur la rue. La signalisation est toutefois assez compliquée à comprendre, même pour les résidents. Il nous fera un plaisir de vous indiquer si vous êtes stationné au bon endroit! Sinon, il existe un stationnement public au coin de la rue au coût de +/- 10$ par jour.
access: Vous aurez évidemment accès à votre privée munie d'un grand lit. La chambre donne sur la cour arrière, donc assez tranquille. L'appartement dispose d'une cuisine toute équipée que vous pouvez utiliser si désiré. Vous avez aussi accès à la salle à manger et au salon. Une salle de bain moderne, avec bain-douche également partagée.
interaction: Nous sommes à votre disposition pour toutes questions concernant Montréal ou le quartier. Nous aimons bien jaser avec les visiteurs mais nous ne vous embêterons pas si vous vous faites discrets! Nous comprenons que votre but est de voir Montréal et non vous faire des nouveaux amis! Nous sommes des personnes tranquilles et respectueuses et désirons des invités qui partagent les mêmes valeurs.
house_rules: - Pas de bruit après 22h00 - Il n'est pas possible d'utiliser la télévision

host.host_about: We are two cool French canadians from Montréal. We love to travel and laught! :)

reviews.comments: Isa et Jo sont les hôtes parfaits ! Bons conseils, calme et a l écoute. Leur appartement est charmant et idéalement situe. Un must!
Appartement très joli et idéalement situé. Hôtes très arrangeants et accueillants.

Magnifique appartement très bien décoré, très accueillant et bien en située. 
Des hôtes hyper accueillant
Merci beaucoup.
It was great time to stay

Isabelle and Jonathan are friendly and accommodating hosts. Beautiful and clean room with thoughtful touches such as bud schedules, guide books/brochures, and list of neighbourhood restaurants/cafe recommendations. We had a great time staying here.

Very nice apartment, centrally located (Metro station just a few minutes to walk), friendly hosts.
The room was tidy, clean and had enough space for a short stay in the city.

Isabelle and Jonathan have a great pad in the heart of the Plateau. The room was clean and comfortable with thoughtful touches like local maps and an info sheet upon check-in. Would definitely stay again--great hosts in a great city!

We had great time staying at Isabella's house. Isabelle has a very nice and well decorated house. Also, well located. There are great attractions in the neighbourhood! Clean and spacious room. We will for sure be back next year!

Condo bien situé, près du Metro, boutiques et bons restos.  Propreté impeccable. La chambre mais surtout l’accueil chaleureux par Isabelle et Jonathan, qui sont de bons conseil et très sympathiques, ont rendu mon séjour très agréable.  J’y retournerais dès que l’occasion se présente  :)

Isabelle et Jonathan sont très accueillants. Ils ont de bons conseils sur la ville et des bonnes adresses dans les environs de leur appartement. La localisation est parfaite, à quelques minutes à pied du métro et dans un quartier vivant, à quelques minutes du Mont-Royal. L’appartement est très agréable et la chambre très confortable. Week-end très réussi pour nous, nous vous les recommandons.

Isabelle and Jonathan were great hosts! Great communication from day 1, and they made us feel right at home. The location is on a residential/quiet street, but right in the heart of everything - 5 mins walk to the metro, bars, restaurants etc. Their space is lovely, and they have a really beautiful home. Would recommend to anyone visiting Montreal!

Appartement très agréable, bien situé pour découvrir Montréal. Propreté irréprochable. Isabelle est une hôte très sympathique (plein de conseils sur les cafés, bars et restaurants à proximité de l'appartement), la communication pour l'entrée et la sortie des lieux a été très facile. Je recommande sans hésiter !
Logement très confortable, très propre et conforme à nos attentes.
We had an amazing time at Isabelle's and Jonathan's lovely home. It was gorgeous and pristine, and in a great location. Would highly recommend.

El departamento de Isabelle esta en una de las mejores zonas de Montreal, cerca de muchos restaurantes, bares y lugares icónicos como el Mont Royal. 
Isabelle es una excelente anfitriona, te dará muchas recomendaciones de lugares a visitar y lugares para comer para todos los gustos. El departamento esta muy limpio y lleno de estilo. Sin duda alguna, si regresara a Montreal, me volvería a quedar aquí.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Isabelle et Jo ! Ils ont étaient très accueillants et disponibles, leur appartement est idéalement situé, je le recommande :)

My stay at Isabelle and Jonathan's apartment was fantastic — incredibly clean and comfortable, quiet (despite being right off of a main thoroughfare), and central to anything you'd need on the Plateau. Great communication, easy check-in and -out, and lovely people who gave many food/drink/activity recommendations and went out of their way to meet my needs. Highly recommend!

Isabelle y Jonathan fueron increibles anfitriones. Además de tener una casa con una excelente ubicacion, cerca de restaurants y bares, y  a 5 minutos caminando hasta la estacion de subte mas cercana. La casa es hermosa, muy comoda y hasta pudimos estacionar nuestro auto alquilado en la puerta de la casa, sin pagar un centavo. Ellos no estaban al momento de la llegada pero pudimos coordinar facilmente entrar a la casa.

Je suis venue pour un we prolongé. L’appartement est idéal, en plein centre du Plateau, calme, tout est fait pour se sentir bien et l’accueil d’Isabelle et son ami est top! Merci à vous 2. Je recommande vivement et je reviendrai!

Isabelle and John are great! The house is very clean, the room is nicely decorated and the bed is really comfortable. We are very happy that we chose this place. They welcomed us with certain recommendations to visit as well as good tips for restaurants in the area. We would definitely repeat our stay if we would come back to Montreal!
A beautiful, clean, and private space in the heart of the Plateau.

My partner and I had an excellent stay at Isabelle's apartment. The location is wonderful and the place was very clean and comfortable. There were lots of nice little touches throughout as well. One of the best experiences we've had on Airbnb!

L'appartement était vraiment agréable, particulièrement propre et bien situé (restaurants, bars et métro à proximité). La réception des clefs s'est fait grâce à une key box ce qui a facilité notre arrivée (idem pour le départ). Nous avons passé un très bon séjour et recommandons vivement ce Airbnb (lit confortable, chambre spacieuse, thé à disposition). Isabelle vend également du sirop d'érable (fait maison) à moindre coût. Jonathan et elle sont discrets et très sympa. Ils partagent d'ailleurs leurs meilleures adresses dans un petit livret rédigé à l'attention de leurs hôtes.

Super hôte et super endroit paisible pour s arrêter quelques jours et découvrir Montréal. Isabelle donne des bons plans et c'est très agréable d échanger avec elle sur le Canada. Super bon plan concernant le sirop d érable de son papa :) . On recommande les yeux fermés.

Nous avons apprecié notre séjour chez Isabelle !
Chambre confortable dans un joli appartement, le tout très bien situé pour découvrir la ville. 
Merci pour votre accueil et vos conseils !

Nous avons passé un très beau séjour. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Isabelle et Jonathan, qui sont de sympathiques hôtes. L'appartement, quant à lui, est bien situé, très propre et joliment décoré. La chambre était de même en plus d'être confortable. Nous recommandons cette chambre et nous serons heureux d'y revenir!

Très bel appartement idéalement situé ! 
Isabelle et Jonathan sont adorables et nous ont offert un accueil unique !
Chambre bien décoré et très confortable :-) nous recommandons cette chambre !

The location of the this apartment cannot be beat. It is in one the prettiest/coolest neighborhoods with tons of shopping and restaurants a short walk away. Isabelle and Jonathan were very kind and provided maps and helpful tips for where to go. They were also very responsive when I called with questions. The only thing I would caution is that they wake up early, so you want to be quiet at night (but it's ok to stay out late). I would definitely stay here again!

Extremely clean and tidy place with warmth of thoughtful touch in every corner. The hosts are very helpful with any need of ours with their welcoming packet. 
The property itself has one of the quietest room I've ever slept in. However there are several fantastic music venues/nightclubs, cafes and restaurants within 5-minue walk. 
Highly highly recommend!
Isabelle is a good host. She give me a lot of suggestion for Montreal. Especially, the Japanese restaurant is very delicious, my wife love it so much.

We spend a couple of nights at Isabelle’s place and we loved it! We loved the house and every single detail of it, perfectly clean and well located. We didn’t have the chance to speak a lot with Isabelle but was enough to understand how nice is she. Definitely recommended!

Very cosy room, well located and the owners are really friendly! 
I can't find anything wrong with this Airbnb. Wifi is good, they have a nice shower, the bed is cosy, there wasn't any noise at night... Those are the things that were important to us.

Un séjour très agréable, des hôtes attentionnés et bienveillants. Le logement est très bien situé.
Nous recommandons ce logement sans réserve!!!
Amazing hosts, very easy going, would definitely recommend it to anyone! :)

Isabelle's place is magical. It feels like a home that people care deeply about. There are all kinds of nice little touches (pieces of art, plants, jars of beans, etc.) everywhere, without the place feeling cluttered. It inspires me to make my own home nicer. Oh, and Isabelle is a gracious host. Highly recommend.

Isabelle et Jonathan sont très sympathiques ! Ils nous ont fourni des adresses utiles pour visiter Montréal. Le logement est très bien situé. La chambre est nickel et décorée avec goût ! On recommande sans hésiter ;)

Isabelle and Jonathan's place is located in the beautiful French neighbourhood of Montreal and was the perfect spot to spend a few nights. They gave me a list of great local cafes, bakeries and bars to check out, as well as where to get classic poutine and smoked meat. Their home is very stylish and clean – I would definitely stay again!
it doesn't get better.

Our stay was great - location is perfect and the place is super clean and organized. 
100% recommended!

Isabelle's place offered the perfect accommodation while I did my business in the city. The plateau location is the perfect combination of a lively, fun neighbourhood during the daytime, and a quiet place to lay your head at night. Both Jonathan and Isabelle were extremely welcoming hosts, and everything exceeded my expectations.

Hemos estado muy agusto en el alojamiento de Isabelle y Jo, la casa es muy confortable y acogedora, han cuidado todos los detalles, limpieza genial, estuvieron muy atentos y nos dieron algunas indicaciones para movernos por alli. Lo recomendamos 100%

Isabelle et Jonathan nous ont très bien accueillis, rien à redire !
Les indications données étaient très précises. L'appartement était décoré avec goût et nous l'avons trouvé impeccablement propre. Les idées de bonnes adresses à proximité du logement sont un plus très appréciable. 
Nous recommandons !
Very nice and well located flat. Convenient to Montreal downtown attractions. Isabelle and Jonathan have been very kind and helpful with a lot of hints about our visit

Fantastic little place, perfect walking distance from a bunch of great places in the area. Living space was very comfortable and communication with the host was quick and easy. They were very kind hosts!

The apartment is really nice, clean and well located.  It is close to bars and hip streets, as well as to Metro Lines and the Tourist Areas. You may almost become a Montrealer. I enjoyed the stay very much.
Great place in a great area! Would recommend

Superbe location chez de supers hôtes .  Nous avons aimé la possibilité d'arriver plutôt, la propreté impeccable de ce charmant petit appartement, la disponibilité d'Isabelle pour de riches échanges, l'ouverture d'esprit, l'esprit voyageur, la mise à disposition de la cuisine, la situation exceptionnelle de l'appartement dans un super quartier. .. on serait bien resté plus longtemps à vrai dire. ..! Merci pour tout!

Wonderful couple, great house and space and their location is very central. House was just as the photos show, and we greatly enjoyed our time there. Isabelle was extremely attentive and offered to cater to our traveling needs. Many thanks to both of you!
Un super séjour! Des bons conseils et un appartement décoré avec goût!
Amazing house in a great location with wonderful hosts!
Excellent place, lovely couple and were very friendly.

name: Clean and Tidy room near Austin Station
summary: Well located, 5 minutes walk from Austin station (10 mins walk from Jordan), quiet place and recently renovated, suitable for tourist with short stay.
description: Well located, 5 minutes walk from Austin station (10 mins walk from Jordan), quiet place and recently renovated, suitable for tourist with short stay.

host.host_location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark

reviews.comments: Highly recommended! Great location! Ken and his Mom are very nice and helpful!
Nice experience. Ken and his mum are quite nice. The room is clean and tidy.
Great cozy room. Super clean and well thought out. I would stay again.
Fantastic stay! Couldn't expect more. Very convenient to metro station. The room was tidy, clean and cosy.  The host was of great help and hospitality. Definitely 100% recommended!

The location is really ideal, the room is as it is described, tiny with a tiny bathroom but perfect for a lone traveller like myself! I spent 4 nights there and I never actually met Ken but he immediately replied if I needed help, like when I was checking in. His mum was there and she made sure I was all right, always asked in the evenings if I’d eaten. :) She doesn’t speak much English but she understands and speaks Mandarin. Overall my trip was fantastic and I would really recommend Ken’s place for short term stays in Hong Kong!
Ken’s mom is very nice, make me feel as warm as home.

Ken's place was awesome! It's small but very cozy and incredibly clean, located in a very convenient area with easy access to 3 different metro stops. Ken's mom is such a lovely lady too! Although she doesn't speak much English or Mandarin, she still made me feel so warm whenever we spent time together. Highly recommend this stay for solo travelers who like to explore different areas in HK but still enjoy a good night sleep and good shower at a cozy and warm place.
Very good location. Jordan. Close to MTR Austin and walking distance to Airport Express MTR. Very kind of Ken’s mother. Thank you!

Ken was so helpful and his mum was super sweet. She actually reminds me of my mum who I have missed a lot since I live abroad! The place is exactly as described and I am coming back to stay again. Thank you!!!
Thanks again! Thanks ken and thanks to your Mum for being so wonderful!
Good location ,Clean,Tidy.Ken’s mum is super super nice and sweet.I would highly recommend to stay at this place!!!! (The dessert store downstairs is 10/10 ;) )
Clean and cozy room with great hospitality from Ken and his mom! Highly recommend❤︎
Ken的媽媽很熱情,讓人感覺很舒服｡

Ken's place is just as described and worked perfectly for me for my short stay in Hong Kong. As I only stayed for one night I didn't have the chance to meet Ken but his mother was there to greet me. Overall good value for money.

Best value for money! The place is extremely clean and close to the MTR. You'll find everything you need. Special note for Ken's mom who is the most adorable person ever. She doesn't speak english but she truly is a lovely human being that made my stay unique. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a cheap stay in HK while at the same time enjoying unique hospitality, great location and confortable stay.
下次会再次选择Ken的房源,一切都很棒,是我在香港过的最棒的一晚

Ken is a great host with a very cozy place. The room I rented was tiny (as expected in HongKong), but it has everything you need, including a private bathroom. The host is very helpful with directions and advice on local areas. The location of the airbnb is wonderful, it is close (about 3 min) to Austin station. It is near convenience stores and restaurants (including a decent dimsum place).
非常良好的住宿體驗,交通方便,生活機能佳,房間舒適整潔,還有很熱情友善的女主人 : )
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
很完美的香港一周,一切都很好!非常感谢房主,房主的妈妈以及妹妹,在这里感受到了港剧中的香港人情味｡房子楼下就有几个好吃的餐厅,另外离庙街非常近,逛完街可以直接步行回来,强烈建议大家住这里,你们将会有美好的体验!

Ken was very communicative and the pictures show exactly how the room looks like, small and renovated. Location was very central close to cheap local restaurants and Austin MTR. However, I wouldn't come back again since I had constructions every day during the week between 9am and 6pm. If you're planning on a late night out be sure to check that issue with Ken. To be fair he offered me a full refund in exchange of switching a flat. Also, note that the WiFi signal is very weak, and I wouldn't count on it for working or having video calls. I hope that these problems would be addressed by the time the next guest will arrive, but if non of these bothers you, this room would be an excellent choice for you!
Nice and clean room, with everything you need. Best hospitality in Hong Kong

I was very happy with my accomodation in Hong Kong. Probably the best option for the price(for a single traveler). 
The room is small(as any room you'll find in Hong Kong), but very clean and tidy. It also has an attached bathroom, which is very unusual for Hong Kong, but sooooo convinient, even if its tiny - but it is yours! :) 
The location is great - only 1 minute walk to Austin MTS station and 1 min walk to the nearest bus stand. 7-11 shop is in the same building, as well as dry-cleaning and any other shop you need. 
Ken and his mother are an amazing people and very thoughtful hosts. The Mom doesn't speak english, but it was never a problem - she reminded me so much of my Mom, big heart and a lots of love :) She provided everything(hot water for tea, fresh towels etc.) and yet kept very delicate distance (important thing when you are renting a room at someones family apartment). 
Will definitely come to Hong Kong again - as now I know the best place to stay where :)
Five stars to Ken as a host!
Had a nice stay at Kens place. and his mum was lovely to chat with. :)

I booked it one day in advance coz it's a sudden trip. During the whole booking process, I asked the location, and says I'm gonna arrive late and if it's ok to book. Ken only said it's ok and then he disappear. The whole afternoon and night he was not replying, and the next morning no replying as well, also cannot reach by phone call. I was about to head to airport and had no idea how to check in.... I had to call Airbnb to cancel it and book a new place on the day I'm travelling. I'm super mad at this bad experience.

I had an awesome time in Hongkong and Kens place was just perfect for my short stay. The apartment location is close to the metro and it is easy to get around in the city from there. The room was small, but nice and clean. It has everything you need. I really liked the hospitality of Ken, his mother and his girlfriend. I can recommend this room to anybody who wants to experience Hongkong for a few days.
Had a pleasant stay at Ken's place. Really kindhearted and always happy to help. Highly recommend!
Ken's apartment is clean, renovated, and comfortable.  I had a great time staying at Ken's place and would definitely recommend him to others looking for a place to stay in Hong Kong!
작은 화장실이 딸려있는 방 입니다. 공항에서 접근이 편리하고 바로 앞에 AUSTIN 역도 있어 지리적 입지는 꽤 좋은 편입니다. 객실에  기본적인 어매니티는 구비되어 있지만, 욕실용품은 따로 챙겨가는 것을 추천합니다.
The unit is within walking distance to the MRT station and it is extremely clean and tidy. It is highly recommended for single traveler.
非常好!雖然只是個房間,但是衛浴是自己的這點很棒!也很乾淨!房東阿姨非常客氣熱心!只是要從九龍站出來的標示不清楚,當時繞了很久~正常的話,扛著行李大約10-15分鐘路程

From the bottom of my heart, the place was absolutely fantastic and had everything I need. In particular, Ken's mum offered amazing hospitality, voluntarily offering breakfast and helping me wash my clothes. She was genuinely an amazing host at this very clean and cosy place. I highly recommend this place anyone who visits Hong Kong.

I really enjoyed my stay with Ken’s mum who is very sweet. We could communicate easily without a common language and she was always helping with everything. The room is small but there was everything i needed and even an own bathroom! The apartment is also very cozy and stylish. Very good experience!
This was my second time to stay in this unit. No words can explain my feelings. I hope that Ken is still able host my stay when I am in Hong Kong next year.
깨끗하고 역에서 가까워서 좋았어요

name: Bright charming studio in quiet treelined Brooklyn
summary: A little slice of Parisian charm nestled into a quiet tree-lined street of Brooklyn. Lovely luminous studio with private entrance on the second floor of a quintessential Brooklyn brownstone. Complete with one bed, one desk, several chairs and table and chairs. Note there is no common area, rather two separate bedrooms (one with my lovely roommate Savannah) and joint kitchen. All the amenities you need with personality galore!  All are welcome to enjoy my romantic abode :)
description: A little slice of Parisian charm nestled into a quiet tree-lined street of Brooklyn. Lovely luminous studio with private entrance on the second floor of a quintessential Brooklyn brownstone. Complete with one bed, one desk, several chairs and table and chairs. Note there is no common area, rather two separate bedrooms (one with my lovely roommate Savannah) and joint kitchen. All the amenities you need with personality galore!  All are welcome to enjoy my romantic abode :) Everything! I will be away but my roommate can help with anything! The multicultural, quickly-growing Crown Heights is the perfect blend of families, young professionals with rich Caribbean roots. Quintessential Brooklyn experience that has yet to become too commercial or gentrified. Quiet, green and relaxing after a long day in the city! Walking distance from hip cafés, restaurants, wine shops, groceries. 15 minutes walk from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Library. Easy access to Williamsburg, Cl
neighborhood_overview: The multicultural, quickly-growing Crown Heights is the perfect blend of families, young professionals with rich Caribbean roots. Quintessential Brooklyn experience that has yet to become too commercial or gentrified. Quiet, green and relaxing after a long day in the city! Walking distance from hip cafés, restaurants, wine shops, groceries. 15 minutes walk from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden and Brooklyn Library. Easy access to Williamsburg, Clinton Hill, Fort Greene and other incredible BK destinations.
notes: The bathroom is accessible down the hall. The interior entrance is through my roommate's studio. But only one couple lives on the floor above us in the whole brownstone (they have their own), so it's still very private. Must be puppy-friendly- my roommate has an incredibly quiet, loving adorable Beagle-mix. He wouldn't be in your studio but good to note. He will love you to bits!
transit: 2 blocks from nearest train (3), 5 min walk from 2,4,5 and a short bus or longer walk to A express (same line as JFK Airport)
access: Everything!
interaction: I will be away but my roommate can help with anything!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi! I'm a writer and stylist from NYC who is most inspired by art, culture and aesthetics. I've been to 5 continents and 30 countries.. the list is always growing! 

I am very independent and love exploring new people, places and cultures. 

I also am very respectful and grateful to stay in an authentic local apartment rather than a touristy hotel environment. I will treat your space as if it were my own.

Thank you for your consideration xx

reviews.comments:
At the heart of Brooklyn and very well connected with Manhattan, this place is a little Tresor for Airbnb hunters. 
Riahnna is a great host, very flexible and helpful.
Great location, clean and really cute! Felt like a home away from home. The location was really cool- around the corner from bodegas, bagels, and cocktails.

name: Entire Private Brownstone in Brooklyn
summary: Entire newly furnished brownstone home in Bayridge/Dyker Heights area in Brooklyn. If you're looking for a clean, comfortable, and cozy home than look no further. This home is equiped with polished wooden floors, cathedral decorated windows, and natural artistic architecture structure.
space: This two-family home is equipped with polished wooden floors, cathedral decorated windows, and natural artistic architecture structure. Must climb stairs. The apartment is on the 2nd floor of our two family house and please be aware there are tenants on the first floor so the main entrance will be shared.
description: Entire newly furnished brownstone home in Bayridge/Dyker Heights area in Brooklyn. If you're looking for a clean, comfortable, and cozy home than look no further. This home is equiped with polished wooden floors, cathedral decorated windows, and natural artistic architecture structure. This two-family home is equipped with polished wooden floors, cathedral decorated windows, and natural artistic architecture structure. Must climb stairs. The apartment is on the 2nd floor of our two family house and please be aware there are tenants on the first floor so the main entrance will be shared. Yes we can be reached via (Email hidden by Airbnb) and here on the app. It's located next to Mckinley Park (tennis, basketball, baseball courts) across St. Ephrems Church, minutes from local shops, pizzeria, and of course easy public parking and transportation (bus stop is 40 feet from the house). Walking and biking is all you need. Manhattan (Times Square) is about an hour away in the subway and downto
neighborhood_overview: It's located next to Mckinley Park (tennis, basketball, baseball courts) across St. Ephrems Church, minutes from local shops, pizzeria, and of course easy public parking and transportation (bus stop is 40 feet from the house). Walking and biking is all you need. Manhattan (Times Square) is about an hour away in the subway and downtown brooklyn is about 30 minutes away. Close to Staten Island and New Jersey.
notes: The highway is seconds away. 86st is a few minutes walking distance with tons of shopping/retail  stores and restaurants. We do offer Laundry Service only for guests staying minimum 3 days. Extra Charge will be applied. Please NO Pets Allowed! Please NO Smoking! (Smoking Fee up to $150 will be charged)
transit: Parking is very convenient and easy (from 9am-8pm) in this neighborhood. Car, bus, subway, ferry, bycicle, motorcycle, and walking.
interaction: Yes we can be reached via (Email hidden by Airbnb) and here on the app.
house_rules: Please NO Smoking of all kinds on premises.

host.host_about: Dining out, movies, parks, reading, traveling, dancing, and pizza!

reviews.comments: Sam was friendly and responded quickly I will repeat when I'm back in BK

Sam's house was comfortable, clean, and in an excellent location. Parking was tough to find, so use public transit if possible. Small issues with TV and issue in the bathroom were handled very quickly, his communication was excellent. Home is a two family house, so upstairs door doesn't have it's own lock, only downstairs one. Wasn't an issue, but wasn't clear in the listing. Overall, good experience and would stay here again.
Sam has a nice flat, quiet neighbourhood  and good communication.

Cozy spot. We spent a lot of time inside due to weather and having a new baby and the home was very comfortable to be in. The neighborhood is safe, sound of church bells was a lovely morning greeting, hosts were very hospitable.
Sams place was great, centrally located and very comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay.

Amazing place to stay, great area and quiet. Host was great with communication and helpful with any issues. I’d definitely recommend staying at this place and next time I’m in the city I’ll look to stay here again.
Beautful home in a great, quiet neighborhood.  Subway entrances in walking distance.  Sam was very quick to reply to messages and was very accommodating.
Nous etions 6 adultes, l appartement est équipé pour 5 mais Sam nous a procuré un matelas supplémentaire.  Tout a été parfait. J y retournerais avec plaisir.

Sam's place was even better than advertised. The apartment was clean and spacious enough for my friends and I. The area was great as well. There is a supermarket nearby and a clutch pizzeria (Maria's) in walking distance. There are a couple of lively bars nearby that we visited as well. Sam was a great host and did not have an issue meeting us at the place despite us being an hour behind due to traffic issues.
Sam is a grat hosy, his place so nice, every thing is around train, bus, restaurants. I highly recommend him.

Sam and Amani were great hosts. The apartment is amazing, spacious, clean and just bright and beautiful. 
Forgot the phone after checking out and the hosts made sure to find it and I got it back. Would definitely stay there again! Thank you guys.

The house was very nice. Good amenities. Sam was easily accessible and made sure our stay was easy and convenience. More than enough room for our group of 5. Quiet neighborhood, stores and local restaurants were easily accessible by foot.

Sam's place was exactly what we needed! I am an AirBnB host in Toronto and can attest that Sam is a terrific host. Was very responsive and over any time we needed anything. Place was great, clean and great quiet spot in Brooklyn. Thanks again Sam!

Sam was an attentive and accommodating host. I would definitely stay with him again and recommend his flat to others staying in Bay Ridge. The location is very quiet and convenient to shops, movies, parks, and MTA - ideal for a family visit. The decor is a great mix of old world Brooklyn and contemporary convenience. This is a small detail, but the flat had tea! I’m a tea drinker and it’s rare that hosts offer both coffee and tea options.

Great space. Very large, entire top floor of brownstone. Three real bedrooms with very comfortable beds. Eat in kitchen, large dining room and living room. It is a great space for two couples or large family to share. Also, right across the street from a large park and church. Parking is easy compared to rest of area because of park and church. Sam is great. Was accommodating and did exactly what he said he would. We plan on staying there again when we return to Brooklyn.
Great location in brooklyn! My family had a wonderful time and really enjoyed their stay. Sam was easily accessible and very cooperative.

VERY spacious and comfortable home!  Lots and lots of room to spread out -- three bedrooms and tons of closet space.  Full kitchen with high-top table and 4 stools PLUS a full size family dining room!  Amazingly ample and super comfy couches and recliner.  Truly like staying in a family home  -- no "studio apt" here!  :)  Historic brownstone details that have been beautifully preserved.  Amazing woodwork that you just don't see in modern construction -- millwork, parquet flooring, gorgeous doors/hardware.  Bountiful towels/linens as well as all you need in the kitchen and bath.  Amazing natural light in the house as well as a HUGE gorgeous architectural skylight in the bathroom means the light switch never needs to be flipped during the day!  :)  The hosts were always available and super sweet.  The apartment is in a family oriented, very safe area just blocks from shopping and restaurants.  Felt safe walking at all times of day/night.  You'll have plenty of room to spread out whether it's just one person staying there or a whole family!
Great place to stay
We enjoyed staying here. The apartment was spacious and perfect! Would definitely want to stay here again.

Sam and Amani were great hosts. We were in town for a Baptism and the location could not have been more perfect as it was steps away from the church and 2 blocks from the restaurant. The place is very spacious and very clean. Free Wifi and they had a Roku player so we could log into our Netflix account. My kids were very comfortable and I would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in Brooklyn.

This is a great apartment in an older building in an interesting neighborhood. There were six of us, from age 6 to 69, and it was a perfect place for us. Sam was very attentive and helpful, and even saved us a parking place when we got there!  He provided an extra  sleeping pad so our little guy could sleep near his parents. The place was clean, and there were extras such as coffee in the kitchen. All in all, we were very happy!

If you are driving from south of the city perfect location. Close to many spots.
The neighborhood is full of culture

Sam was a courteous host and very cooperative. He addressed our concerns in a timely fashion and offered a luxurious home in Brooklyn that was spacious and very clean. If you are visiting Brooklyn choose Sam's for you and your group.
性价比不错,距离地铁站10几分钟路程,住的地方很安全｡不足是没有洗衣机和烘干机,空调太小,功率不够,中间的房间里没有空调,很热
wonderful ! we felt so at home.

Sam’s place was clean, close to Manhattan and very cost efficient. Sam was a great host. Our flight was delayed and Sam stayed up late to greet us. Very thoughtful. Thank you Sam. We would love to stay at your place on our next trip too
Gute Unterkunft mit Subwaynähe, ruhige Gegend , ruhige Unterkunft, netter Gastgeber ,,,

Expect a pleasant stay in a spacious airy space . The location is accessible to public transportation that is in a lovely part of Brooklyn . Sam is a great host who responds immediately to any concerns that you may have. I honestly felt like I was staying at a relatives house that’s how comfortable it was!!

For NYC, the space is HUGE. It's an old building so does have some "character" but it is lovely. Little details were nice like a sky light in the bathroom. Super comfy living and dining area, and the layout of the place is nice.I also like that part of Brooklyn because it's central to a lot of different areas of it. Also, Sam was very friendly and accommodating as well.
It's a great place to stay esp. with a group of friends or family. Just make sure you communicate with the host about the house rules and late check in / out. It'll save alot of confusion and hassle.

Sam was there to greet us and answered all our questions. We contacted him a couple of times for recommendations and he got right back to us. The place itself was extremely clean and in a lovely neighborhood.  It was well kept and updated, but kept the beautiful architectural features. Parking was always available which is a real plus in Brooklyn. We have family in Brooklyn and will definitely stay again when we have a family get-together.

This is a really great Airbnb spot especially for families with small kids. Brought my mom,  brother and sister-in-law here with their kid - it was their first time in NYC - and everything went smoothly. Sam is a great host, would definitely stay here again.
When you want an awesome place to stay....book here no questions asked! Superb communication and ease of access to shops. Safe neighborhood, will definitely be back
It was a pleasure for me and all my group, we stayed two weeks and everything worked perfectly.

Thank you again Sam! Sam is very nice and thoughtful host!!! The place is super clean and cozy!! My family love the place. They wanted to stay there again when they come back to visit NYC. We look forward to seeing you soon :)

great place to stay. it worked well for us, and there were 5 of us. lots of space. good pressure in the shower which was great thing after a day of sightseeing.  close to where we needed to be. it is located close to 2 subway stations ( about 15-20 mins away).

Nous sommes restés chez Sam une semaine avec une famille de 5 adultes.
Le logement est spacieux et très propre, conforme à la description du site.
N'ayant pas de vehicule nous avons utilisé les transports en commun: comptez au minimum une heure pour vous rendre à Manhattan mais les trajets se font très facilement.

Thank you so much for being an amazing host! We had a wonderful stay and will definitely be staying again in our future visits to Brooklyn! The space was perfect for our family, everything was so clean and Sam was able to help with everything we needed! He even helped us carry our luggage up! We can’t say enough great things about this experience and we look forward to staying with them again!

Everything was great! Exactly as described. The place was clean, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing. Located in a nice, quiet area with plenty of food and a park within walking distance. Sam was very communicative and hospitable.
Amazing stay ❤️❤️ Everything was perfect

Sam is a super host for a reason - he goes above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. He holds your spot in the rain for 15 minutes while you circle the block. He carries your luggage upstairs. He answers texts and phone calls right away. And his place is very budget-friendly and clean. We would definitely stay here again!
Our experience with Sam’s place was a good one.  There were ample towels and listed supplies.  Host very quickly responded to any questions.  He made it easy for us to check in early.
Great space much larger than most we have stayed in near nyc so was really good value. Nice and warm and very clean. Sam was so welcoming and even helped us with our bags!
I really enjoyed staying with Sam. He was extremely prompt in responding to my questions and was flexible. Would recommend!
Just perfect all amenities are perfect and they are so friendly.
Very comfortable home. There’s lots of stores near by and great places to eat. It was very accommodating and located in a great neighborhood.
Sam was one of the very best hostess that I have ever came across. His place was very well organized and clean. He accommodated our every need. I would honestly come back and stay again.
Our family enjoyed our stay. The space was very comfortable!
Nice place to stay in this area weather your visiting family or just vacationing to NYC. Great host and good location.
Very homely accommodation, and a comfortable stay. Perfect for a family.

name: Charmoso Studio em Ipanema
summary: Compacto Studio de 36 metros quadrados entre Ipanema e Copacabana. Conta com TVHD, ar condicionado, internet WI-FI de 10 mega. O Studio é perfeito para grupos de 1 a 4 pessoas. O entorno do apartamento ainda conta com ótimas opções de bares e restaurantes e fica a 5 minutos da estação do metro da General Osório.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, visitante! 

Se você chegou até aqui, significa que você está planejando visitar o Rio de Janeiro, a nossa Cidade Maravilhosa. Nós, do Estadia Carioca, damos boas-vindas a você e esperamos que sejamos a sua escolha de hospedagem nesta viagem.

Por que escolher a Estadia Carioca?

* Experiência 

Temos mais de 5 anos de atuação no ramo de aluguéis de temporada e receptivo com atuação em todo o território nacional. Desde 2012, já atendemos mais de 5 mil clientes de 43 países! Mas, ainda não estamos (Website hidden by Airbnb) a sua ajuda, queremos aumentar muito esses números. Queremos ser a sua escolha nº1 para hospedagem no Rio de Janeiro.

* Assistência Profissional 

Nossa equipe é composta por profissionais gabaritados (advogados, corretores e guias turísticos) para dar toda a assistência necessária aos viajantes. Os hóspedes podem contar com nossas dicas sobres os pontos turísticos mais famosos da cidade e também sobre quais cidades próximas os viajantes não podem deixar de visitar, como Búzios, Ilha Grande e Visconde Mauá.  


* Atendimento Diferenciado 

A Estadia Carioca é reconhecida por seu estilo e atendimento diferenciado e por sua confiabilidade, flexibilidade e expertise, garantindo sempre a satisfação e o conforto dos seus clientes, sejam eles proprietários de imóveis ou viajantes.

* Portfólio de Imóveis Diversificado

São diversas opções de imóveis, em localizações privilegiadas do Rio de Janeiro; com espaço, privacidade e todas as amenidades necessárias para que os hóspedes se sintam em casa. Nós ajudamos nossos clientes a fazer a melhor escolha de acordo com as suas necessidades, e pelo melhor preço possível.


* Segurança

Todos os imóveis em nossa listagem foram verificados, as fotos representam a realidade dos apartamentos, o visitante tem a tranquilidade de saber que não terá nenhuma surpresa desagradável ao chegar no imóvel.

 Conte com a Estadia Carioca para achar a sua melhor hospedagem!

English version:

Hello, traveller!

If you are here right now, it means that you are planning to visit Rio de Janeiro, our “Cidade Maravilhosa”.

We, from Estadia Carioca, welcome you and hope that we will be your choice of lodging on this trip.

Why should you choose Estadia Carioca?

* Experience

We have more than 6 years of activity in the business of vacation rentals with operations throughout the national territory. Since 2012, we have served over 5,000 customers from 43 countries! But we are still not satisfied. With your help, we want to greatly increase these numbers. We want to be your # 1 choice for housing in Rio de Janeiro.

* Professional Assistance

Our team is made up of qualified professionals (lawyers, brokers and tour guides) who are able give all the necessary assistance to travelers. Guests can count on us for tips on the most famous sights of the city and also on which nearby cities travelers can not miss, such as Búzios, Ilha Grande and Visconde Mauá.

* Special service

Estadia Carioca is renowned for its style and differentiated service and for its reliability, flexibility and expertise, always guaranteeing the satisfaction and comfort of its clients, whether they are property owners or guests.

* Diversified Portfolio

 We have several rental properties in privileged locations in Rio de Janeiro; with space, privacy and all the necessary amenities to make guests feel at home. We help our customers to make the best choice according to their needs, and for the best possible price.


* Safety

All the properties in our listing have been checked, the photos represent the reality of the apartments, the visitor has the peace of mind that will not have any unpleasant surprises upon arriving at the apartment.

 Count on Estadia Carioca to help you find your best possible housing option!

reviews.comments:
O apartamento é próximo das praias, bares e restaurantes ótima localização.
O único problema foi a internet do apartamento Que Não funcionou nenhum dia d hospedagem
Apartment in a very good location, walking distance to restaurants, beach.  No noise while in apartment. Good neighborhood.

I really liked staying in this apartment. It's small but a perfect size for 1-2 people. It has a fully equipped kitchen, and the bed area is separated from the living room/kitchen. It's beautifully decorated and in a great location between Copacabana & Ipanema. The host was very quick in responses and even came to fix the shower when I told him the warm water is not running and brought a new wifi router cause the wifi was too slow. Thank you for your hospitality! I would definitely stay again!!

The apartment is perfectly located and reasonably priced. It is a small studio which has been smartly partitioned into a sleeping space and a kitchen/living room.  Cozy and comfortable for 2 people.  Diogo and his staff were responsive even though it was one of the busiest times of year. I would recommend staying here to others.
Beautiful little Home in a good location:)

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, sou formado em administração de empresas. Trabalho no ramo da saúde a mais de 10 anos. Em 2012 comecei a gerenciar apartamentos e por isso, ofereço por aqui apartamentos por temporada no Rio de Janeiro, localizados na zona sul, próximo a praia. Chamamos nosso grupo de Rio Habitat.
Nosso objetivo é oferecer um lugar muito agradável e estamos em desenvolvimento de uma estrutura ao turista.
O grande bacana é que estou começando a conhecer pessoas por aqui.
Essa comunidade tem tudo a ver com o conceito que tento trazer para a minha vida pessoal e empresarial.
Não estou sozinho operando os apartamentos. Posso contar com uma equipe que me ajudam no dia-a-dia.
Então, não se surpreenda se falar com os três na sua hospedagem.
Adoro tecnologia e espero que isso seja o nosso grande diferencial. 
Iremos recebê-los com grande prazer.

reviews.comments: El apartamento es muy lindo. Esta muy bien cuidado, es como las fotos. Muy buena ubicacion y muy seguro. Diogo, Gilmario y Anadeia son muy amables y siempre dispuestos a resolver cualquier inquietud. Sin dudas, volveriamos a contactarlos para una nueva visita en Rio. Muchas gracias Diogo por tu dedicación.!

Lovely apartment located in a gorgeous spot, a block away from Copacabana beach. The flat is airy, clean and relatively silent compared to most places around the area. Diogo and Gilmario are very responsive and provide a first class service. I would definitely go back and stay over again. Recommended.

La ubicación es perfecta para conocer Rio. A media cuadra de Av. Nossa Senhora de Copacabana por donde pasan buses para todos los puntos turísticos de la ciudad, y a pocas cuadras de la estación de Metro Cantagalo. Muy cerca –para ir caminando- de la orla de Copacabana y de Arpoador e Ipanema. El barrio está repleto de lugares para comer (salgados, bares y restaurantes), hay dos supermercados a una y dos cuadras. 
El apartamento es muy amplio, cómodo, luminoso y asomando por la ventana se puede ver la playa de Copacabana. Como es un piso alto se puede dormir con las ventanas abiertas. 
Muchas gracias Diogo, el apartamento nos permitió aprovechar al máximo una ciudad increíble como es Río. Adoramos!

A localização é ótima! Perto da Av. Rio Nossa Senhora de Copacabana, onde tem buses que vão para todos os pontos turísticos da cidade, a poucos quarteirões da estação de metrô Cantagalo. Muito próximo a pé das praias de Copacabana, Arpoador e Ipanema. O bairro está cheio de lugares para comer (Salgados, bares e restaurantes), há dois supermercados perto.
O apartamento é muito espaçoso, confortável, e você pode ver a praia de Copacabana pela janela. Como é um andar alto você ate pode dormir com as janelas abertas! 
Muito obrigado Diogo! Adoramos Rio!

Perfect location, near the buses, metro and a few minutes walk from the main beaches (Copacabana, Arpoador, Ipanema). There are plenty of bars and delis just around the corner, and supermarkets which were useful to make it cheaper for us. We really enjoyed Rio thanks to being there. ThankU so much Diogo!

O apartamento é otimo, exatamente como descrito no site. Não tiver problema nenhum, Diogo estava sempre disponivel.  A localização é muito boa, proxima a supermercado, bancos, farmácia, restaurantes. Recomendo a todos.
El apartamento muy limpio, espacioso, con ropa de cama limpia, conexión de wifi muy buena.   Todo como ofrecido.
Excelente, el apartamento es exacto como en la foto, buena atención, siempre pendiente y buena ubicación.

O apartamento estava impecável e a estadia foi super tranquila. Não cheguei a encontrar com o Diogo na hora de pegar ou devolver as chaves, mas seu funcionário estava sempre à disposição e nos ajudou com todas as dúvidas.
Thank you for staying at your apartment, Diogo is a fine guy!!
Appartement très bien situé mais sale et sans eau chaude!
Diogo was a perfect host. He fixed everything if there was something at once and was always available. Thank you for a very good stay in Rio.

Todo correcto, el depto es tal cual se presenta.
Muy buena atencion en la recepcion y en la despedida. Puntualidad.
Respuesta inmediata ante pedido de mantas.
En resumen, una buena estadia.

Todo excelente, el apartamento tenía lo necesario para una estancia agradable, magnifica ubicación, cerca del metro, a un paso de la playa copacabana y de las principales avenidas, lo que permitía poder tomar los buses hacía cualquier destino, Gilmario excelente conserje siempre dispuesto a brindar su ayuda y bueno Diogo gracias por permitirnos quedar en su apartamento,volvería sin pensarlo.

Wonderful location, nice flat, very spacious.
The check-in and out were easy, on-time and without any problem.

Parabéns para a recepção e pela liberdade que tivemos durante a estadia. O imóvel correspondeu às minhas expectativas. Tudo conforme o anunciado. Parabéns ao anfitrião Diogo e ao colaborador Gilmário, que nos recebeu com muita simpatia e presteza. Abraços. Max
Fajne mieszkanie w bardzo dobrej lokalizacji. Blisko autobusów, metra, sklepów a przed wszystkim blisko plaży Copacabana. Dobra lokalizacja dla osób które chcą zwiedzać oraz plażować.
Apartamento bien ubicado en zona tradicional de copa capabana. Muy cerca de la playa y de via principal para coger taxi. Comodo para hasta 3 personas.

Tudo ok conforme prometido !! Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Gilmario e o ap era Conforme descrito . A localização é ótima e estão de parabéns pela ótima recepção . Facilidade de transporte público e a mercados etc
Great location.  Comfortable bed. Host was quick to respond to messages.

Amei a estadia no apartamento de Diogo. 
Localização perfeita e o funcionário muito atencioso.
Voltando ao Rio, com certeza será a minha primeira opção.
The host canceled this reservation 388 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Apto bem localizado e conforme descrito. Diogo e GilMário mto atenciosos e dispostos a ajudar. Recomendo
The host canceled this reservation 386 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Tivemos uma ótima estadia no apartamento do Diogo. O apartamento é exatamente como descrito no anúncio e fomos muito bem recebidos pelo seu funcionário Gilmário. A localização é ótima, fica próximo a restaurantes, supermercados, pontos de ônibus e de táxi.

Apartamento conforme descrito. Um dos sofá-cama estava quebrado e foi trocado durante nosso período de estadia conforme solicitado.  Wi-fi instável mas o funcionário buscou solucionar. A única observação negativa que faço é que não foi trocado um jogo de lençol que havia necessidade.
Imovel conforme descrito em anuncio, perfeito, otima localização, ficamos bem acomodados.Recomendo.

Our stay in this flat was very pleasant. The location is ideal as well - close to the beach, shops and subway station. The furniture and equipment were sufficient too. The only drawback was the waiting upon our arrival. Even though we agreed on meeting at specific time there was nobody to accept us so we called the owner. But with no response for two hours. Except for this fact we were overall satisfied.
Nos sentimos a vontade, o anfitrião foi mto simpático

O Diogo foi um excelente anfitrião, prontamente nos mostrou o apartamento e entregou as chaves. O apartamento é exatamente como da foto, muito confortável e próximo a tudo. Tem wifi, ar condicionado coisas que eu valorizo muito. O Diogo gentilmente possibilitou o uso da garagem que foi muito útil. O prédio é muito bom, com porteiro 24 horas, fácil acesso e muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei e recomendarei a todos!

Fui recebida no horário agendado e Diogo foi muito gentil! O apartamento está a poucos metros do Posto 5 em Copacabana. Nas imediações há supermercados, farmácias, bares...agencias bancárias. O apartamento é exatamente como esta nas fotografias, no entanto, os utensílios disponíveis na cozinha são apenas para uso em pequenos lanches. Sugiro verificarem o funcionamento dos utensílios, pois no meu caso o ar condicionado estava com problemas na parte elétrica, o que foi ajustado no dia seguinte a minha solicitação. Boa opção para estadias rápidas! Recomendo!

The experience at the apartment was amazing. The staff was very attentive and friendly. The apartment location is close to all the proximities. Close to the beach (walking distance). Close to all the Attraction tours. I would definitely recommend this apartment and many listings from Diogo. I will be back again next year.
Nice host, appartment located really close to the beach and ideal for a short stay.

Hola, la habitación se encontraba muy limpia y ordenada al momento de la recepción.
El edificio tranquilo con seguridad las 24 horas.
Se podía llevar mascotas, ya que en el edificio había varias.
Es un lugar muy cómodo para dos personas, a lo sumo tres.
Lo mejor de la estadía fue la ubicación; a cuadra y media de la Avenida principal y a media de otra avenida. 
A una cuadra de la playa de Copacabana. Puesto numero 5
Además teníamos los negocios muy próximos; bancos, farmacias, supermercados, bares, etc.

Recomendable!

Muy buen apartamento. Al llegar vimos el sofacama y pensamos que seria incomodo pero fue todo lo contrario, super comodisimo. El edificio con seguridad y camaras las 24 horas nos hicieron sentir tranquilos el apartamento limpio y ordenado con sabanas limpias y toallas. Tiene una pequeña estuva y nevera para cocinar. Super cerca de la playa a una calle o dos. Area turistica llena de restaurantes el anfitrion Diogo super amable y carismatico nos aconsejo que lugares visitar y nos dio muy buenos tips. Nos divertimos mucho y sin duda si volvemos a rio de janerio, nos quedariamos nuevamente ahi. Excelente relacion precio/comodidad.

El departamento es tal cual se ve, cómodo. El edificio es muy seguro, lleno de cámaras por todos lados y con portero abajo las 24 hs. La cuadra tiene mucho movimiento, sobre todo en los locales al lado del edificio por lo cual da tranquilidad. 

Diogo estuvo siempre disponible para cualquier cosa que necesitáramos, incluso ofreciendo varios consejos sobre que hacer durante nuestra estadía.

Nice clean apartment, with good security.   Perfect location for me, close to the beach.  Diogo is was always available if i needed anything.   I will rent from him again and i will recommend his places

Great place in a convenient location (posto 5, Copacabana).
We have been welcomed by ED, who stayed in contact with us during all the stay.
Only negative point: the noise at night due to the agitated street.
Overall experience: satisfied!

La atencion de ED fue excelente. El apartamento esta en una zona estrategica para las tres playas cercanas. Tiene todos los servicios en condiciones. Le falta algo en elementos cotidianos de cocina, vajilla. También la ropa de cama podría mejorar.
LA experiencia fue muy satisfactoria. Lo más destacable del departamento es su excelente ubicación.

O anfitrião foi super receptivo e acessível. A localização é ótima. O apartamento é exatamente como na foto. No banheiro havia um pequeno vazamento do box para o piso externo, o que gerou um pouco de bagunça e minha sugestão é colocar alguns itens básicos na cozinha como fósforo e detergente. Para quem for ficar por um tempo maior, sugiro levar um liquidificador e uma mixteira. Mas no geral foi muito bom.

Apto. Perto dá praia e de  varios comercios locais.
O Edi a pessoa que nós recebeu foi muito atencioso é simpático.
Apto. Igual como as fotos.

Great place to stay really close to the beach and shops and restaurants! Location was perfect. Stayed there for New Years and we got a Champagne bottle too! Very nice detail. The apartment had everything we needed, towels, dishes, wifi, tv, AC, fan. We really loved staying at this place and would definitely stay there again if we go back to Rio. 
Best,
Wendy

super-duper recommendable! The place is very near to the beach, there are also restaurants and convenient stores around. It is also spacious and can accommodate 5 person. Towels, beddings, everything is clean. Muitoooo obrigada Ed for assisting and accommodating us! blz! ciao!
Todo re bien. Como dije antes muy amables, muy linda la zona. Con supermercados a 1 cuadra. Todas las líneas de colectivos en la esquina. Excelente
Excelente localização. O apartamento é muito bom e a equipe do Diogo recebeu muito bem os hóspedes.. Recomendo

Melhor localização de copacabana! O apartamento é lindo, cama confortável, decoração incrível, tem até rede! 
Wi-Fi muito bom!
equipe do Diogo muito prestativa, receptiva e atenciosa. O apartamento é muito bom! Quero voltar sempre!
Ótima localização, próximo de mercados, restaurantes, cinema e praia. Apartamento super limpo, estiloso, simples e confortável além do anfitrião ser super receptivo. Super recomendo!!!!

This apartment is an exceptional deal. Lots of space. Stylish. Great location just steps from the beach. Listening to the waves from bed in the morning was serene. Going downstairs at night to listen to samba. The kitchen is well equipped and the shower is clean and hot with good pressure. I absolutely loved my two month stay here and highly recommend. Ed will take care of anything you need!

name: Appartement au coeur de Montreal pour OSHEAGA
summary: Appartement de 3 chambres tout meublé dans un triplex tranquille et sécuritaire. Parfait pour familles ou amis. Internet haute vitesse sans fil et électricité compris. Très bien placé, près de la rue Masson, cafés, restos, épicerie, commerces, etc. Laveuse-sécheuse sur place.

host.host_about:
Française d'origine, je vis au Québec depuis plus de 10 ans. J'aime voyager, rencontrer de nouvelles personnes et cultures. Je suis une amoureuse de plein air mais aussi très urbaine. Sportive et aussi pratiquante du 5 à 7, je suis toujours de bonne humeur. Je me ferais un plaisir de pouvoir vous faire découvrir tous les attraits que Montréal recèle et aussi les nombreuses activités et beautés des Laurentides et de l'Estrie.
Au plaisir de vous rencontrer...

name: Charming room near Casa da Música
summary: The flat is very cosy and bright. It is located in a rather quiet area and it's only a 10 min walk from Casa da Música where you will find metro and bus stations to take everywhere you want. I live in the flat as well and I will be glad to help you with everything you need! And I have a cat, a very friendly and cute one;)
