reviews.comments:
Fatimu's place was very nice. New flat with all we needed. Even a balcony. We booked the place in the last minute and Fatimus replied within a few minutes.
We enjoyed our stay and would recommend the place.

The appartement was modern, comfy and welcoming in a calm neighborhood well located because not far from the city center by walking (20 min) or by metro (2 streets away). It was good because you're not in the agitation of the center but you're still very close. 
But what really made my stay even more enjoyable was Fatimuse. She's the best host you could wish for. She's always ready to help if you need any advice or information. She was kind and lot of fun. 
Thank you for everything and for making my stay so nice (:

The apartment is very nice, bright, comfortable and well facilitated. It's close to the metro station, 5 minutes walking. 
Fatimuse is a wonderful person and helped with information, tips and solving spacial needs in every way she could. 
I'll recommend to others and when I'll get back to Porto be glad to stay in Fatimuse place again!
Lovely, very clean flat, perfect for two persons, supermarket nearby. Fatimuse was so friendly and helpful at any time. We felt very comfortable and can absolutely recommend this stay!

5 star stay! Everything was perfect, fast communication, very nice and available host, all amenities needed available, exceptionally clean apartment and fantastic location in quiet neighborhood but close to metro. Recommended!

Great value for this place. Fatimuse was always very easy to reach and helpful.
I definitely recommend her as a host, and hope to come back to her apartment in Porto.

Brand new flat and great location near the casa musical metro station. Fatimuse is the best friend when u staying in Porto. She always replied your question at the first time as she can. I will visit you again in the future. 

If you are going to visit Porto this beautiful city. I'm sure you will enjoy the stay in this flat. And if you are cycling lover she has a bike free for the guests;) just go and enjoy it ;)
This is a great apartment in a nice area!

La estancia fue muy buena, apartamento es tal y como se describe nuevo y limpio a 20minutos andando del centro de Oporto. Fatimuse fue muy buena anfitriona, contestó rapidamente todas mis preguntas y cuando llegamos nos proporcionó un mapa y nos explicó como llegar al centro, donde comer etc. En definitiva, lo recomendaría!
The host canceled this reservation 81 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Fatima's house is very close to casa do musica. The house is very cozy and the bed is amazing. 

I had a fantastic stay with my boyfriend. Fatima is a fantastic host, very warm and keen to have a conversation. She even lets us drop the bag at her house for the entire day becoz my flight is late at night. 

Thank you and keep your smile coz you are beautiful in it.

Hello, 
Bon séjour, bon accueil, un balcon à dispo.
Un peu loin à pied du centre et des bars et petits shops sympa mais quartier résidentiel agréable (surtout la ruelle très jolie).
Pas de chauffage (et quand tu tombes sur la seule semaine où il pleut et il fait froid, bin tu gèles. donc prévois un gros pull et ton pilou pilou polaire).

Fatimuse's apartment is ideal for a short stay in Porto. If you don't need to spend a lot of time in the house is perfect just to sleepover.
Fatimuse is a super attentive host and make yourself feel super comfortable at her home.
very good apartment, Fatimuse is not only a best host, but also a good friend! she offers everything you need, give every detail about the trip and living! strong recommend !!
We really enjoyed our time at Fatimuse‘s place. It was clean and comfortable, in a good area and Fatimuse was a great and helpful host. Thank you!

We had beautiful day's at Fatimuse's flat. The room is tiny but absolutely enough for a few days in Porto. The communication was quick and easy. We enjoyed her candid kind.
Her cat is awesome too!

A Fátima foi muito simpática desde o check in ao check out, inclusive sempre se mostrou prestativa no que quer que fosse e o Sonic é também um gatinho muito amigável.
Relativamente à casa, não foge muito ao que é mostrado nas fotos, é somente mais preenchida de livros e pequenos detalhes que a enchem de personalidade. As divisões estavam todas bastante limpas e o próprio bairro é muito calmo, tanto durante o dia como durante a noite. Fica bastante próxima de supermercado e transportes públicos.
Super recomendo!

I had a very nice time at Fatima’s place, she was hospitable and respectful and has a lovely cat, Sonic :). The flat is 20 min from the city center by foot and close to public transport. I stayed there for 2 weeks and the area really suited me as it is more quiet than the very center of town, with a more residential vibe, but still allowed quick & easy access to the city center by foot or bus.   Recommended

Nice apartment in a perfect area in Porto. Fatima is the perfect host: flexible and always willing to help and to give advice! The location of the apartment guarantees a good night sleep. I really enjoyed my stay in Porto. Thank you!

A Fátima foi uma anfitriã muito amável e atenciosa, tendo-se mostrado flexível em relação ao horário de check in, e tendo-nos deixado bastante à vontade na sua casa. O apartamento é ideal para uma rápida estadia no Porto, num bairro calmo, com os transportes públicos e um supermercado na rua ao lado, e a uma breve caminhada da Casa da Música.
A casa é tal como mostrado nas fotografias, o espaço é acolhedor e a cozinha tem as comodidades necessárias para preparar refeições. 
Gostei muito da minha estadia e recomendo a quem visitar o Porto :)

Appartement impeccable, chambre jolie et literie très confortable.
Zone calme et centre ville facilement accessible à pied.
Fatimuse est une hôte attentionnée et accueillante.
Je recommande vivement !

Dit is een hele fijne locatie als je wilt genieten van alles wat Porto biedt en tóch lekker en rustig wilt kunnen slapen. Fatimuse is een hartelijke en zorgvuldige host. Het appartement nieuw en fris en het bed ook.  Porto centrum heel goed beloopbaar en openbaar vervoer is vlakbij. Wij waren met de auto en die kon veilig en vlakbij geparkeerd worden. Een aanrader dus!

The place is in a quiet neighbourhood, which is great for sleeping after a long day in Porto. The cat Sonic is a cute and charming old cat, which might let you pet him if he likes you.
The bathroom is great with sunlight falling in through a window in the roof.
Fatimuse is a great host, who likes to have a nice chat with a glass (or two) of wine after you come back from the city centre.
Altogether the place is a great one to stay at, if you want to explore Porto.

Excellent séjour! Fátima à été très disponible, toujours bienveillante, et très accueillante! Elle m'a même aidé à trouver un excellent resto végétarien pas loin de chez elle.. 
Très communicatif, et toujours de bon humour..

Es war super zwei Nächte in Porto bei Fatimuse zu wohnen. Die Wohnung ist super sauber und Fatimuse ist schön eingerichtet. Sie hat mir sogar einen Stadtplan geben können und mir dabei geholfen meinen sightseeing-Tag in Porto zu planen. Da ihr Apartment direkt auf dem Jakobsweg liegt konnte ich direkt von dort aus loslaufen :)
The apartment is in a great location from walking distance to the metro, market, cafes. Fatimuse is a great host, very helpful and i love stay as her guest again. And her cat Sonic is a cute cat.
Fatimuse is very helpful, friendly host. The apartment is very nice, cozy and clean. We were pleased with our stay. Recommended.
Fatima is very nice and helpful person. Her cat is sweet and friendly. She gave us very good advices about sightseeing Porto. She welcome us very warm and was very good host.
The place is in a great location. Fatimuse is a great host and provided insightful information about the city itself. Thanks a lot!
I had a great stay at Fatimuses lovely apartment! You won't regret it. She can give you a lot of helpful advices to discover Porto :)
Ubytovani bych rozhodne doporucula, ciste a relativne klidne (kazdopadne doporucuji spunty). Fatimuse byla fajn a poradila nam kam zajit. :)

We booked Fatima’s place last minute as our plans changed. We were delighted when we met Fátima
In person and she welcomed us to her home and gave us some excellent local tips. Highly recommend!

Recomendo muito a experiência, Fatimuse é uma pessoa super simpática e prestativa, sempre pensando em ajudar o hóspede a se sentir confortável e acolhido, gostei demais de ter ficado no apartamento, esse tipo de vivência não se tem num hotel, muito obrigada Fatimuse!!! ❤️
A Fátima foi uma anfitriã atenciosa e simpática, bem como prestativa. O apartamento é confortável, acolhedor e com uma localização privilegiada, com transportes e comércios próximos.

Staying with Fatima and her cute little cat Sonic was amazing. The house is a great place to stay, very comfy and quiet, really close to everything and Fatima is a wondeful host. I really recommend it.

Das Zimmer ist nicht gross, aber hell und freundlich.Die Wohnung ist sauber.Fatimuse ist  diskret aber sehr herzlich und hilfbereit.Das historische Zentrum kann man leicht mit der Metro erreichen.Ich empfehle diese Unterkunft.
We had an amazing stay with Fatimuse! She was so kind and friendly and her flat was clean and well equipped - would highly recommend!

name: Charming appart in Outremont, near boutiques/metro
summary: Endroit charmant, tranquille, dans un immeuble bien tenu, entouré d'arbres et fleurs. Voisins respectueux et discrets . Près de commerces et de transports en commun. À deux stations de métro de l'Université de Montréal et tout près du Parc du Mont-Royal. Un très beau quartier avec de jolies rues, de superbes maisons et plusieurs parcs pour marcher, jogger ou pour un pique-nique. Ce n'est pas un endroit pour faire des partys par contre, mais un lieu pour se reposer suite aux visites de la ville.
space: Un logement idéal pour un couple
description: Un logement idéal pour un couple
access: Les voyageurs ont accès à tout le logement. Je leur laisse l'appart mais je serai là pour les recevoir. Je quitte ensuite, après leur avoir présenté les lieux. Et je serai joignable en tout temps.

reviews.comments: Excellent !!
A very homey experience! It truly feels like your staying at a friend's house in this listing.  We felt right at home and enjoyed our time here.
Perfect for a couple visiting family in Outremont.

My husband and I stayed a total of 16 nights in Andrée’s 4-room cozy and well-furnished apartment. We literally had a home away from home — breakfast on the balcony, cooking our own dinners and even having guests, helping ourselves to Andrée’s amazing collection of spices, getting to know the staff at nearby Young’s grocery, curling up in front of the tv, sleeping in late in the quiet, comfortable bedroom, and even trick-or-treating on Halloween since this is a residential neighborhood. Andrée’s den/office was so practical that my husband actually worked too much most days, but then I could get out and shop and visit Outremont‘s many beautiful parks with our daughter and new baby grandson. We pushed the stroller up to the top of Mont Royal a couple times too. I loved the proximity of Mile End and Plateau. We walked there easily (coming back by Uber). To go downtown we used the metro, a 10-minute walk away. Now whenever we visit our daughter who lives in Outremont, we’ll hope Andrée’s very affordable place is available!

Appartement de style, entièrement équipé pour un long sejour, bien situé dans le quartier Outremont, arrêts de bus à 5mn, métro à 10/15 mn. Je remercie encore Andrée pour son accueil et sa disponibilité. Je recommande.

Andrée est une personne très accueillante, hospitalière et accommodante. Mon épouse et moi avons passé 4 jours dans son appartement et avons eu du plaisir. L'appartement est propre, ensoleillé et bien équipé. Endroit que je recommande à tous. Vous ne serez pas déçu!
The host canceled this reservation 67 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had the pleasure of staying at Andrée’s place for a week and I highly recommend it. Andrée was such an excellent, attentive host. Once I arrived, she took the time to show her house and to provide tips on places and events. The kitchen is stocked with pots, pans, and dishes so I had everything I needed to cook my meals. She also made sure everything was fine during my stay. I needed an iron board and iron for a business meeting and she gladly made them available. I really enjoyed staying in a traditional French residential neighborhood with several options of groceries, restaurants, and shops. The apartment is well located, close to the blue line station Outremont that takes you downtown in thirty minutes. It is also relatively easy to come from/go to the airport (about $30 uber trip). The apartment has paid laundry (four loonies) in the building basement so it was a perk not to leave the building. Unfortunately, I came during the winter so the days were cloudy, snowy, and gray so I didn’t have the chance to see the greenery Montréal is famous for. The city wasn’t quiet, though. Montréal en Lumière was taking place on Avenue Sainte Catherine during the weekend so I was able to check a famous city festival. I’ll definitely be back in the summer.

Andrée est une hôte merveilleuse et l'appartement est spacieux, propre, sympathique et très pratique. Nous y avons passé 6 jours. Métro et commerces à proximité.  Je recommande cet appartement sans réserve! Au plaisir d'y retourner :)
This is a great place to stay, very nice, clean, and a pretty close drive to major places like the gay village and Museum of Fine Arts. Andrée was very nice to us and very accommodating.
Lieu très bien situé pour découvrir Montréal. Appartement très ensoleillé et très agréable.

Super appartement proche du metro et facile d'accès, appartement très propre et spacieux, lit confortable, la terrasse coté calme très agréable, Andrée nous a été fait une super accueil et a eu plusieurs attentions à notre égard. sejour au top!
Appartement très bien situé, près du Métro et du Mont-Royal. Andrée est très accomodante et est une hôte parfaite. Tout était comme prévu et on n'a pas eu de mauvaises surprises. Beau travail

I had a great stay at Andree's place.  The flat is spacious, and well layed out.  I had a presentation to write and I found that the balcony surrounded by pine tree branches was a perfect place for that (though Andree also has a nice office).  The neighbourhood is great:  quiet tree lined streets with brownstone houses (some villas around Outremont park are particularly beautiful), and excellent cafes and restaurants within walking distance.  Metro is just under 10 minutes walk, and so is Dax cafe for a morning espresso with pastry.  I went to a conference at the HEC Montreal, and it was 20 minutes door to door.  Andree herself is lovely and welcoming.  I've been to quite a lot of AirBnBs, and this is one of the best.

Très beau quartier, à proximité d'une station de métro et de la très jolie rue Bernard. Deux belles terrasses, idéales pour la détente en fin de journée. Excellente communication avant et durant le séjour. Merci Andrée !

Accueil sympathique et convivial par Andrée. Son appartement est spacieux,  lumineux et très bien équipé avec une  agréable terrasse qui permet de prendre son petit-déjeuner et les repas en toute tranquillité. Les petites épiceries sont accessibles à pied et les transports en commun sont également très proches.
L'appartement d'Andrée est incontestablement une excellente adresse pour un séjour à Montréal. Encore merci Andrée pour votre accueil chaleureux.
Lovely place with everything you need and a charming balcony. Andree let us in and took her time to explain where. everything was. Highly recommended.
Très bon séjour chez Andrée. Très chaleureuse et sympathique. Je vous recommande son appartement !

The worst part of experience while visiting Montréal after an over 7-hour drive from the states. The host kept complaining for arriving late and was even not happy about our early leave. I asked her about late arrival before booking and she still invited me to book this place. After the late arrival happened, I apologized and explained to her a lot of times, but she just kept complaining to us, and was even blaming us for early leave... said this ruined her weekend plans... I mean if you have plans for the weekend why inviting us to book your room? Why even put on the availabilities on Airbnb? We were not staying at your place for free, we paid to stay but we did not feel welcomed at all. Felt like we did something wrong just by staying at her place.. Also, be aware of flying spider. 2 stars for the cozy bed
Vous vous plairez  lors de votre séjour chez Andrée. L’accueil, la propreté des lieux, les attentions de l’hôte sont autant de facteurs qui sauront vous mettre à l’aise.

Andrée was an incredible hostess. She showed me around her home personally and made sure to explain where everything was. 
The unit is in great shape, but the building is fairly old. The water pressure wasn’t the best in the washroom and the unit isn’t exactly in the downtown area. 
Those are the only things about the unit that weren’t great, because everything else was perfect! It’s a very rustic place that’s very well kept. I felt very comfortable there, and there was a sweet homey feel to it. I’d definitely recommend staying there if you’re willing to walk or commute to the downtown area. 
Otherwise, the area itself has many great things to offer!
Andrée is also a great hostess. She replied back to any questions I had almost instantly.

super accueil, super équipement, super équipement, super emplacement, super Andrée quoi !
merci encore !
Très beau logement, situé dans un beau quartier résidentiel.Superbe acceuil!
Andrée est très accueillante et son appartement chaleureux et confortable. J'ai passé un excellent séjour.

name: 田居
summary: 半底下室套间,有一个房间,一个客厅,一个厨房,一个洗手间和一个洗衣房｡客厅里有一个双人沙发床｡离地铁购物中心比较近｡离市中心地铁坐15分钟左右｡离奥林匹克公园可以步行10分钟左右｡
description: 半底下室套间,有一个房间,一个客厅,一个厨房,一个洗手间和一个洗衣房｡客厅里有一个双人沙发床｡离地铁购物中心比较近｡离市中心地铁坐15分钟左右｡离奥林匹克公园可以步行10分钟左右｡

name: Blissful Bronte
summary: Your accommodation is a 5min walk to Bronte and Tamarama beaches & along the coastal walk to Bondi. Sculptures by the Sea October/November.  Vivid Sydney Harbour -WOW light Show May /June.  It's a newly renovated, private, self-contained apartment in the front section of my home.  Your entry leads into a spacious, open plan living area with fully equipped kitchenette, smart TV & comfy couch + reading nook. The bedroom features a top quality mattress.  Bus Transport close by leads to everywhere!
space: Guests have exclusive use of the front entrance which has views of the ocean. This leads to their living room, bedroom and bathroom areas.
description: Your accommodation is a 5min walk to Bronte and Tamarama beaches & along the coastal walk to Bondi. Sculptures by the Sea October/November.  Vivid Sydney Harbour -WOW light Show May /June.  It's a newly renovated, private, self-contained apartment in the front section of my home.  Your entry leads into a spacious, open plan living area with fully equipped kitchenette, smart TV & comfy couch + reading nook. The bedroom features a top quality mattress.  Bus Transport close by leads to everywhere! Guests have exclusive use of the front entrance which has views of the ocean. This leads to their living room, bedroom and bathroom areas. Guests have exclusive spaces for their stay of the living room bedroom and bathroom I am always happy if guests want to chat face to face. But also available on my mobile text or call The accommodation at Blissful Bronte is close to Bronte and Tamarama beaches which are to the right and left just down the road. A bit further along the world famous coastal wal
neighborhood_overview: The accommodation at Blissful Bronte is close to Bronte and Tamarama beaches which are to the right and left just down the road. A bit further along the world famous coastal walk is Bondi Beach. The immediate neighbourhood is quiet and very neighbourhood friendly. A Convenience shop nearby and a park with a small community garden. Across the gully is a row of some of the best cafes in Sydney
notes: Each guest is given a special combination to access the key lock at the front door There is no fixed Stove but cooking appliances include a benchtop oven which roasts, bakes, steams and grills; a dual hot plate with small pot and frypan, microwave, slow cooker, sandwich press, toaster and kettle.
transit: Sad to say no parking st Blissful Bronte itself. But lots of free long term parking in the street and nearby streets. Although a bit competitive during Sculptures by the Sea. The City Surf Marathon and lovely sunny hot weekends.  Buses are handy to get to Bondi Junction and the train station or with a 10 minute walk bus to Bondi rd. a bus directly to Circular Quay, The ferries opera house and Vivid in May/June
access: Guests have exclusive spaces for their stay of the living room bedroom and bathroom
interaction: I am always happy if guests want to chat face to face. But also available on my mobile text or call
house_rules: Guests not to wear high heels on polished floors.  Guests should clean dishes and leave the place as they found it. Turn off air con and electrical appliances when leaving the accommodation.

reviews.comments:
Lovely, homey little place. Beautiful location. You can see the water from the front door. 

We really enjoyed our short stay. Jenny the host was very friendly and helpful but left us to do our thing which we liked.

The bed is super comfy too. 

(Also thanks for breakfast Jenny! )
Best host! So lovely! And the house was perfect and very close to the beach ...

All goes for show when you read the tittle 'blissful bronte'! Could see the beach from our front door, such a immaculate stylish home cosy feel. Close to all the amazing cafes, 5 min walk to the beach... no worries! Jenny was helpful sweet host and answered questions we had and followed our requests. This is my first airbnb experience also and was def a great one! Would def stay here again if I return to Sydney :)

This boutique size apartment was clean, stylish and very good value. 
Close to two lovely beaches. Jenny was thoughtful and happy to help with anything. 
We will be back.
Really cute little appartment right near Bronte beach. It was spotless when we arrived and Jenny was accommodated our check in time really well! Would highly recommend

I had a lovely /comfortable stay at Jenny’s place. It is well equipped and interiors are tastefully done. A good size bedroom and bathroom. Close to cafes ands pleasant walk to the beach. The air conditioning is a plus! I thoroughly recommend this host!

Jenny's home is in the most idealic picturesque coastline of Australia. You are also a stone's throw away from Tamarama or Bronte beach. Upon arrival, there was snacks, fruit and breakfast goodies for our stay and also celebratory champagne for our honeymoon. The furnishing was gorgeous, the aircon was amazing after a sunny day on the beach and communication was superb if we ever needed a thing. We cannot wait to return! Thank you so so much

Jenny was a gracious host. She made sure we had everything that we needed. She even left some bread, butter and jams. The house was stocked with milk and tea as well. Very comfortable bed. Clean spacious living area. Beautiful view. The experience was wonderful. I would definitely stay there again.
Great place and Jenny is a lovely host. We had a great time in Sydney!

Jenny is a wonderful (Website hidden by Airbnb) was our first Airbnb ever and Jenny did everything to make us feel like home...we are actually coming back to Jenny's in 2 weeks before to go back to France...Jenny =

I had the most delightful holiday thanks to Jenny. She really did make the difference, and went above & beyond the call of duty to ensure I was comfortable & happy.She was helpful without being intrusive, and by far exceeded any experience I’ve had with any other Airbnb Host’s I have met/ dealt with to date. The place itself is very comfortable and certainly exceeded my expectations.I would quite happily stay at Blissful Bronte again . Thanks again for your amazing hospitality Jenny.

Warm regards,

Harrison

Jenny is a wonderful person, the house was an amazing place to stay. Great location, great amenities, great communication and great advice . Well for our first and 4th Airbnb that was an amazing experience, hope to be back there one day...also hope to see Jenny in France soon!!!thanks again for everything. Merci beaucoup!!!!
We loved staying here. The location is ideal, being moments from the beach. The space is as described and I would not hesitate to stay again.
One holiday with two stays here! Fabulous place would return again!

Spotless apartment in fantastic location, sea views, excellent bus links to Bondi Junction and from there excellent rail links into Sydney and the surrounding area - very easy to use, just get Opal card and top up as needed.
Jenny is a very thoughtful host and groceries were in fridge for our arrival, fantastic not to have to find supermarket after long haul flight.
Will definitely recommend to friends and family, very comfortable base, would not hesitate to book again.
Many thanks Jenny for letting us stay.

We had a lovely time at Blissful Bronte. Jenny was great at communicating and made us feel very welcome. Everything that we needed was there, from air-con to beach towels! The place was immaculate and we don’t have a bad word to say about it. The location is perfect for couples or families as it is very close to Bronte beach and very close the bus stop. If we visit Bronte again, we will be sure to book into Blissful Bronte :-) thank you for making our experience so smooth.
Great place great location, would recommend
Jenny was a great host, super friendly. Property was very clean & tidy. Great location with everything you want in walking distance
Beautiful, cosy Airbnb. Location is amazing. Thank you Jenny, I loved my stay.
Fantastic location with glimpses of the beach and 15 mins walk away to beach and cafes. Bus just across the road to Bondi Junction. Great front of house and very private. Lovely hostess
Beautiful apartment, exactly as described, in peaceful location 5 minutes walk to the beach. We stayed 3 nights and had a lovely time, thanks Jenny :)

The amenities are excellent and Jenny is a thoughtful, helpful and very welcoming host. There are all the things you needed,  a real home from home, even beach towels, picnic bag and some food in the fridge for tired travellers. The location is excellent - just a couple of minutes from the beach.  Excellent value for money.
Great location with the beach down the road and every thing you need.
Fantastic host. Great location. Sparkling clean. There were some really thoughtful touches for our little girl. We hope to come back.
Perfect place to stay.  Comfortable and immaculate presentation. Close to the beach.  Jenny is just lovely and very hospitable.  Thoroughly recommend this lovely house and location.
Nice place, beatifull area to spend some days and perfect hospitality

Blissful bronte was amazing , Jenny is amazing ! The location is great, 5 minute walk to the beach and a bus stop to bondi basically outside of the flat. Jenny gave us milk and bread for when we arrived, we arrived to Sydney at 7- so this was amazing ! The place was super clean, and had everything that we needed. Jenny replied to messages so quickly which was really appreciated, she gave us fresh sheets and towels after the first week. There was air con and heating which is great as Sydney does get cold at night time. I really recommend staying here, it’s great for the price in a amazing location and really comfortable. Thanks so much Jenny for everything and will stay in contact! Thanks, Anna and John

Blissful Bronte is an excellent choice if you want to stay in a well-equipped apartment, a lovely host and stunning nature close by! 
Public transport (bus stop) is very close by, and the city centre and the airport easy ro reach. A small shop just across the street provides you with basics, but Jenny even ensured that the fridge was not empty upon arrival.

The apartment is cosy, and you‘ll find everything you need. Wifi was stable, which is always important, if you also have to work. Cars can be parked on the streets for free. 

Bronte beach is a 5 minutes walk away, and less crowded (and thus more lovely) as Bondi. But the Coastal walk connects all Eastern suburb beaches, which is really great and nice hike. At Bronte you‘ll find nice cafés for having a coffee or great breakfast.

I would definitely recommend Jenny‘s apartment, and actually I already did! 
Thanks again, Jenny!

Blissful Bronte was such a beautiful place to say. Only a 5 minute walk to beautiful Bronte beach. Jenny was so lovely and helpful. There was nice touches to the place - including some milk and English muffins which was so nice considering we didn't get there until late. The place/amenties/furniture were all lovely and immacutely clean. A walk from bronte  to bondi is must. Jenny recommended having lunch at the Bondi icebergs (casual bistro area) which we did. We are so glad she told us about it as we had no idea you could eat there and it was lovely with a beautiful view! It is also super easy to get transport from the street or beach. Will definitely be recommending blissful bronte to friends and family!

I will keep my stay with in Sydney and in Bondi / Bronte in a very good memory and it also made a significant contribution to staying in a holiday apartment where I felt so much at home. Jenny welcomed me warmly and provided me with all kinds of useful information and was always available to answer my questions.
Thank you very much, Jenny!

My partner and I had the most amazing stay at Blissful Bronte, it’s a stunning, sparkling clean and spacious apartment minutes walk from incredible beaches and cafes. The apartment is very private and comfortable and has everything anyone would need.  
It’s close to everything, we walked to both Bondi beach and Bondi junction. 
Iv stayed in many air Bnbs in Sydney and this will be the only one we will book from now on.
Can’t wait to return!! Thanks Jenny :)
Jenny was fab! Lovely, welcoming and her place is in the perfect location.

Thanks for the wonderful time in your apartment. Was a wonderful time and we felt like home. There was even stuff in the fridge and all basic items you need. When we come back to Sydney we will for sure come back. The beach is really around the corner and the connection to the city is perfect and easy. Thanks for the perfect time!

Best possible location to visit the beaches, Bronte, Tamarama, and Bondi. The City is only a bus ride away.
Jenny is really nice person as well as a very professional host.  You will like this place.

Awesome location.
The space is clean, spacious and comfortable and I’ll be staying again next time I’m in the area

我要用汉语来写这个评价,就是想告诉大部分中国朋友,你若来悉尼,Jenny家是个不错的选择,当然,用汉语写评价也是因为我英语水平有限啦｡
我和老公来度蜜月,看到澳大利亚很多漂亮的景色便订了机票和住宿,但我们的英语真的很差,还好Jenny特别热情,又很有耐心,会为我们解释一切工具的使用方法,听不懂时还会给我们找来图片｡
房子的位置在邦迪海滩附近,附近有360公交站,虽然离悉尼市区有些远,但交通很方便,而且走的也很快｡房内的设计很温馨,各种东西都很全,真的像是住在一个家的感觉｡再次感谢Jenny的招待｡
Perfectly clean, modern facilities, ocean view, great access to public transport, quiet neighbourhood. As a young couple, Jenny’s space was perfect for our weekend getaway!
Friendly,  Spotless. and very helpful

Jenny was an amazing host who provided our stay with all the necessities for us and my daughter. She was thoughtful to even provide toys for my daughter and ensured we were comfortable. The location was a huge win as we had to walk down the streets and we were at the beach. Definitely recommend this place to anyone who is visiting Bronte

Great apartment.  We were amazed at what Jenny provided. It was not only a generously sized, lovely decorated and sparkling apartment with great aircon and perfect location to beach and public transport but Jenny was professional and  charming. From brand new beach towels to beautiful soft and large bathroom towels and crisp, ironed lovely bed linen to a fridge with essentials and a larder with coffee, tea, biscuits it felt like a home away from home.  The price service ratio is phenomenal. No wonder she’s booked well in advance.  We already recommended her to friends from overseas.

This was even more than perfect - definitely one of the best Airbnb experiences we have ever met. There were so many amenities given to us, such as food, bath utensils and so much more. The apartment is equipped with all devices you might need. Jenny and her daughter Emma are excellent hosts. We can only highly recommend to stay at this place.

I cannot recommend this apartment more highly - we arrived late at night to find the fridge stocked with milk, cheese, jam, butter and English muffins. The apartment itself is roomy, bright and very private. It was so very clean and all linen and towels were of a high quality. In terms of location, the beach is literally a moment away with a short walk to the end of the street. You can see the ocean from the front door! I worked from here for a day using the table and was very comfortable. Overall an awesome place to stay and experience the eastern suburbs. I particularly liked Bronte as it didn’t feel as busy and as cluttered as Bondi. Jenny is a lovely host and was only too happy to assist in any way required.

108 Hewlett Street Bronte is a small hidden paradise. It is appealing from the first moment. So close to the beach and only a short bus ride to Bondi Junction, it is positioned beautifully- far enough from the city to feel like a getaway but close enough to be convenient. 
The apartment smells lovely, looks modern and well appointed and it is very private. Jenny is a superb host- extremely friendly and thoughtful- she provided breakfast staples in the fridge and cupboards to get us on our way the first morning.  All of the appliances were modern and in great shape, the furniture modern and comfortable- the bed was lovely, made up with fresh crisp sheets and pillows, with warm blankets in the cupboard. If we’d needed them there were also beach towels. 
The bathroom was very clean and modern and Jenny had supplied shampoo, conditioner and shower gel.
We had a wonderful time- there was great detail provided by Jenny regarding public transport routes and timetables. Jenny was the ultimate super host- even holding an umbrella to shelter us from the rain whilst waiting for our departure taxi!
You’ll love it!

I had a wonderful time at Blissful Bronte. Previous guests describe very accurately and eloquently how great this place is. Definitaly recommendable, great location, superb host; I hope I can come bay some day. Thanks, Jenny, for a perfect stay in my old street from student days.

Awesome apartment, location and host. Can’t recommend highly enough, and we will definitely be back. The home has been furnished with much love and the extra touches are so appreciated and go above and beyond 
Easily one of the best bnb we have enjoyed! Thanks Jenny

What a lovely, stylish space.
Spotlessly clean, stylishly appointed with modern appliances.
Ample space, bathroom a little tight but totally satisfactory and shower i (Website hidden by Airbnb) quite roomy which is the main factor. 
The BB is elevated with screened windows that can open to let the sea breeze and the partial sea views in.
Excellent location, few minutes walk to Bronte or Tamarama Beach, (personally our pick of the Sydney beaches).
Jenny is a wonderful host, and  has taken great pride in the way she has set up her BB.
Happy to help though never intrusive.
Would we return?
In an instant!
It was a pleasure to meet you Jenny.
Thanks for providing a lovely and much needed break.
cheers,
Mark and Leigh.

Excellent place, had a lovely calm air about it.  Jenny was wonderful from beginning to end and a very kind hostess, thoughtful little touches made the world of difference, would stay again here in a heart beat!

We had a great stay at jenny's place. Jenny's communication was prompt and clear. The apartment was clean and the kitchen had lots of supplies, including breakfast food for our 3 days. It is a very easy 5 minute walk through the park to the beach and of course the Bondi to Coogee coast walk is at the doorstep. I highly recommend Jenny's place.
This is the best it can get on AirB&B

I loved my stay at Jenny's. In addition to the flat being as shown in the pictures and lovely, it is a short walk to the beach - a bit uphill on the way back. Jenny has thought of everything you could need to stay there and extra touches like sunscreen were much appreciated. 

Jenny always responded quickly to any messages I sent. She was flexible with my check in time as I arrived early after a long flight. 

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a place to stay in Sydney.

Nothing but praise for this wonderfully located, spotless and comfortable apartment in Bronte. Jenny is a warm, friendly and accommodating host with prompt communication; nothing was too much trouble. The apartment is adjoined to the main house,  but with your own front door and a completely self contained living space with kitchen, large lounge room, separate bedroom and bathroom, as well as respectful hosts, the space feels entirely your own. Five minutes walk to the beach and with a bus stop out the front, it’s a quiet spot but not too far from the action. A really great base for a relaxing stay in Sydney.

Jenny was a superb host and everything about the accommodation was excellent.  Situated in a prime beach location ideal for all beach lovers, early morning swims and evening walks are at your doorstep.  

A great comfortable bed, air conditioning and a great fan for warm nights made this stay comfortable.  

The living area is light and spacious, the bedroom was great with storage options, and it has a really good shower within a small bathroom. 

The stay was great and we will be returning in the future.

This is a wonderful airbnb in easy reach of the glorious beach's and Sydney itself.We were visiting our son who lives in Bondi Junction and it couldn't have been more convenient.The accommodation has everything you would ever need and is beautifully clean. We were even given fresh sheets and towels for our second week. Jenny is lovely and a great help. Don't hesitate just book it.

Jenny was one of the most accommodating air bnb hosts I have experienced, the communication was clear and very helpful and the place itself was relaxing, clean and overall very enjoyable. 10/10 would recommend to all looking for a quiet beach getaway!

name: Princeville studio, high ceilings,bright and airy
summary: This bright sunny studio is conveniently located in beautiful Princeville.  The unit is on the upper level for extra privacy.   Features 14 foot lofted ceiling for excellent ventilation and a wonderful open feeling. There is a full size fridge, kitchenette, large lanai, pool, hot tub and barbeque facilities in the complex.  Very neat and clean, super convenient. Pricing includes all taxes including  Hawaii TAT.
space: IMPORTANT: Please tell me a bit about yourself before requesting to stay. Any inquiries without a profile pic, and a bit about the guests will be automatically declined Bright and airy with a high lofted ceiling and great cross breeze.  Full size fridge, safety hotplate, microwave, toaster oven,  coffee maker,  Beach gear, cooler, umbrella, chairs, beach towels,  shampoo, and soaps, hair dryer. Everything you need to enjoy Kauai.   The unit is split into separate sleeping and living areas for convenience and has a large lanai for outdoor living/dining
description: This bright sunny studio is conveniently located in beautiful Princeville.  The unit is on the upper level for extra privacy.   Features 14 foot lofted ceiling for excellent ventilation and a wonderful open feeling. There is a full size fridge, kitchenette, large lanai, pool, hot tub and barbeque facilities in the complex.  Very neat and clean, super convenient. Pricing includes all taxes including  Hawaii TAT. IMPORTANT: Please tell me a bit about yourself before requesting to stay. Any inquiries without a profile pic, and a bit about the guests will be automatically declined Bright and airy with a high lofted ceiling and great cross breeze.  Full size fridge, safety hotplate, microwave, toaster oven,  coffee maker,  Beach gear, cooler, umbrella, chairs, beach towels,  shampoo, and soaps, hair dryer. Everything you need to enjoy Kauai.   The unit is split into separate sleeping and living areas for convenience and has a large lanai for outdoor living/dining 2 people max please. Check
notes: 2 people max please. Check in any time after 4PM by lockbox.  Check out is 10AM, Park in any unreserved spot, parking is on a first come first served basis.
house_rules: -2 people max - Quite hours between 9pm-8am please  -No parties -Check in any time after 4PM, check out 10AM -Check in is by lockbox code at your convenience -No shoes in the house -Absolutley No smoking anywhere in the unit, including the lanai -Park in any unreserved spot, parking is  on a first come first served basis -Please do not use or attempt to take down my surfboards,  mahalo.    Thank You        I also urge all guests to purchase travel insurance in case of need to cancel.  Refunds will not be made due to weather or circumstances beyond my control.  Thanks

host.host_about: Hi   I'm originally from New York,  now I'm lucky enough to live on the beautiful Garden Island. I Love to surf, I'm easy going, neat, and quiet.  No smoking or bad habits.  I love to travel and make new friends.

reviews.comments: This Airbnb was amazing. The apartment was absolutely PERFECT. It was spacious, brand new and clean. The bed was very very comfortable, the kitchen was well equipped and the shower was large and good. There is also a great large lanai, very very nice, even on rainy days. The complex also had a pool, jacuzzi and BBQs. The apartment was amazingly well equipped. Larry thought of EVERYTHING: sunscreen, beach gear, many many towels, shampoo, conditionner, bandaids, snorkel gear, great beach chairs, ustensiles, plates. The communications with the host were very easy and he always answered very quickly. He was also very helpful and flexible. I highly recommend this place, it was absolutely PERFECT!
Great studio great location! Helpful host!

My partner and I couldn’t recommend Larrys place enough! An ideal location for two, spacious and clean! We cooked all our meals at the apartment and packed our lunches for the day with containers that were provided by Larry which is thoughtful. Princeville is an amazing suburb and super safe. We enjoyed the pool/spa facilities which is family friendly. Could go on but a 10/10 from us. Larry is responsive and courteous. Mahalo
This place has all you need. And more. Great.
Description and pictures are accurate. Comfortable and clean space. Had no trouble finding parking. Instructions were easy to follow. Ideal for 1-2 people.

With the aid of a car, Larry's place was a perfect base for exploring the island. It's close to beaches, shops, and nice hiking spots. He was even kind enough to leave us snorkeling and beach equipment. The place itself is immaculate with a huge balcony and a comfortable bed, it's perfect for 2.
Larry’s place was absolutely perfect. We had everything we needed. Great location. Definitely recommend!

This is a cute little condo located in Princeville. The decor was cute, the place was clean, and Larry was a good host (clear directions and timely responses). Access to beach chairs, snorkel equipment, and a beach umbrella were welcome extra amenities. 

Just know that this is quite a small apartment so pack lightly or be prepared to walk around your suitcases.

It is very close to the queen’s bath (must see) and there is a shopping complex nearby (driving distance) with a variety of amenities.

Beautiful and comfortable small studio perfect for 2 people. Although we didn't have a chance to meet Laurence personally he was always accesible easily to help with any doubt. It was very clean and it was also possible to take snorkel set to discover the island, which was perfect!

Great, clean place in Princeville. Responsive & helpful host. The place was great for simple meal cooking and perfect takeoff for all our adventures. Super close to hideaway beach. The bed was a little uncomfortable, but if you’re out & about all day & super tired you don’t notice too much. Everything was great including the on hand snorkel gear & beach towels. Would absolutely stay here again.

We truly enjoyed staying at Larry's studio. It's located within a short driving distance from Hanalei Bay and other beautiful northern beaches, Na Pali coast hiking trails and only a stroll away from the Queen's Bath. Princeville shopping center with a supermarket, several restaurants and a coffee shop are also conveniently close. Larry was a great hosts, - he contacted us on several occasions to make sure that we got there fine and have everything we need. 

The studio is very comfy, beautifully designed and clean with a spacious lanai. We also really appreciated having an access to the beach chairs & sun umbrella, snorkeling gear, access to the community pool and the BBQ area. We highly recommend Larry's place!

This place was fantastic! Great for 2 people looking for a nice jump-off spot on the North Shore. It was very clean and had a nice, modern design. The bed was comfy, there's a nice Lanai, and there's even beach/snorkeling gear to use! Larry was super quick to respond to all questions pre check-in and also when we had a minor issue after arrival (we were without hot water for about 30-45 minutes due to a power outage). He also helped us get an early check-in. We would definitely look to stay here again if we return to Kauai in the near future.

Laurence's place is exactly what you need for a comfortable  and enjoyable stay on the North Shore. Like everywhere on the island, you need a car as the flat is situated in residential area, very short drive to Hanalei and only a few minutes from food shops. The flat was super clean and offers everything you need including simple kitchen and terrace that we enjoyed after coming back from whole day trips. It is little noisy, but that's nothing you can do about it. Laurence is a great host, he responded quickly to all our messages and also invited us to his band concert, it was very nice to meet in person. Thanks Laurence!

Lawrence recommended some great attractions for us and his place was just awesome! The decor is really cool and its super well equipped! Perfect size for a couple. We couldnt be happier, and hope to rent it again next year!
Wonderful place to stay. Super nice to have extras like beach chairs and snorkeling stuff.
A great little space with everything you could ever need! Very thoughtful touches and lots of style. It was about a 20 minute walk from the closest bus stop and supermarket.

Laurence’s place is a great location on the North part of the island. Easy to get to several beaches- Moloa’a,Secret Beach, and all the beaches at Hanalei- hikes - Nepali Coast/Kalalau Trail(go early before 8 am to get a good parking spot), shopping, and places to eat. It’s also easy to prepare your own meals as all the basic kitchen equipment is in the condo. Beach chairs, umbrella and scuba equipment also provided. The bed was comfortable. Everything as pictured and described on the Airbnb is accurate.

Great accommodation that is close to the beaches and town, very clean and comfortable, and a whole collection of beach items available to use such as coolers, chairs, snorkels. Larry was easy to get a hold of and i can definitely recommend this place

This is such a gem on the North Shore! I had a great stay here and would 100% recommend it to any travelers.

The space is so well thought out and has everything you need - kitchen supplies, snorkel stuff, beach gear, towels (both for beach and for after hikes!!), shampoo/conditioner, etc. The bed is really comfy, the lanai is great, and everything is thought about for your comfort and convenience. I came as a solo traveler but think this space would easily accommodate two - while it is smaller, it has a ton of storage and is really nice to hang out in - you don’t feel cramped.

The location couldn’t be better for exploring the beautiful North Shore. You can walk into Princeville, drive to Hanalei, explore Ke’e, as well as easily go further south to Kapa’a. 

This is such a special place to visit and staying at Larry’s place made it even better! Check in was easy even though I was delayed and Larry was so responsive and helpful. All in all, one of the best experiences I could have asked for!

Very cozy and clean, fully equipped with beach chairs, snorkeling, and a cooler! Off the bedroom was a very spacious deck with chairs and a table. Lawrence was a great host - very responsive and went out of his way to make our stay a great one!

Great neighborhood in a private condo. All the amenities you can think of including beach towels, mud towels, toiletries. Cable tv was great and a patio to do some work. Would def recommend to stay again! Lawrence’s place was truly awesome in a cool area
Great little place, everything you need and the neighborhood is amazing!

We were lucky to have found Laurence's studio in Princeville. The unit is located in a well maintained condo development at Princeville close to The Westin, St. Regis and adjacent Golf Courses. The unit looked newly decorated,  clean and we'll stocked with towels, soaps and and all amenities including beach and snorkel gear. We took advantage of the nearby community pool, BBQ area and hot tub which were better maintened then the hot tub at the nearby Westin. Laurence was a great host and we highly recommend this unit and will return in the future.

We had a great stay at Larry's Princeville studio. The communication and check-in experience was easy and smooth. Larry was a very thoughtful host and provided snorkeling and beach gear which we appreciated. He even provided towels for muddy hikes which was a nice touch. Thanks again!
Lugar, comodidades, limpieza, hospitalidad y todo lo que puedan imaginar, está en este lugar. No duden en contactar a Laurence y disfrutar de algo increíble. Excelente. Gracias
Great space for a quiet escape. Highly recommended!
Beautiful and very clean stay! Great communication and everything you'll need is there. We highly recommend this stay!

Larry's place is an outstanding spot for traveling all over the island. The studio is great to recharge after a day at the beach or hiking. The pool/bbq was fun, and there is a grocery store within walking distance. Larry was also very responsive to our questions with quick and helpful replies. Highly recommended!!

The studio apartment in Princeville was great- location, style, value, comfort, amenities and cleanliness! It was the perfect home base for us to explore the north shore and the south. Bed was comfy and haveing a full size fridge allowed us to eat breakfast in (on the lovely lanai) and pack lunch every day. Highly recommended!
Appartement très agréable, tout confort. Très bonne communication. On aurait aimé y rester plus longtemps !
Great location and has everything you need. I was traveling solo and it was the perfect size. Would recommend.
I loved Laurence’s place! So comfortable and clean!

We stayed 4  days at the Princeville studio. It was perfect for visiting the north of the island. The studio is small but there is a big porch were we take all our breakfasts. The bed is comfortable and the kitchen has everything. At our arrival we found the shelf of the kitchen and the fan a little greasy but the rest of the studio was perfectly clean. There is a lot of towels and all the stuff for the beach. 
the exit of the dryer of the neighbor arrive on the middle of the lanai. On laundry days, it could be really bothering.
Larry's place in Princeville is super cute and uber clean.  He is also one of the most involved and communicative host we've encountered.  Will definitely stay at his place again in future.
The unit was just perfect for the two of us. We loved that  the beach chairs, snorkel gear, umbrella, and beach towels were ours to use. Made it very convenient. Larry was great to work with as well!
Clean & convenient location to stay for all of your north shore Kauai activities, with a nice lanai for hanging out on rainy days. Larry was a great host as well!

Larry's apartment made for an excellent stay! Perfect cozy space for two, filled with thoughtful amenities such as snorkeling gear, beach towels and chairs, and even aloe for our sunburns! There is a beautiful deck great for morning coffee or an afternoon read. It is a bit far from the activities we wanted to do in the eastern and southern parts of Kauai, but we would definitely stay here again.

This was a great place to stay. We used the pool and/or hot tub every day. Good location for walks. Hanging out on the outside patio was lovely. The chairs and umbrella were nice for when we went to the beach. The bed is comfy and the place very clean. I would definitely recommend Laurence’s space in Princeville!
Great location, close to shopping and beaches.

Great location for exploring the North shore. The place was actually larger than the pictures indicate. It was very clean and stocked with nice beach amenities, shower soaps and extra towels. Very happy to have stayed here. It's the perfect spot for a couple. I would highly recommend this unit. Larry was quick to reply and to make sure everything was running smoothly.

The pictures and description were accurate. We enjoyed the additional space while we had our coffee and meals out in the lanai.  I also liked the fact the unit is on the second floor.  The place was clean and at first it was a little bit awkward doing dishes in the bathroom sink but the sink is big and deep and really we didn't use too many dishes.  We made a Costco run before arriving but there is a Foodland market and  restaurants about  a mile away. Because of the major flooding in April we weren't able to explore the coastline after Hanalei which was one of the main reasons for staying on the North Shore.  In hindsight and on our next visit to Kauai we would probably stay somewhere more centrally located as we really loved Waimea Canyon (two hours away from Princeville) or maybe split up our accommodations.  Larry responded in a timely manner and we would stay at any of his places again.  Kauai is a beautiful place and we did a lot in our one week trip, i.e.  Hiking at Waimea Canyon, Sleeping Giant, Queen's bath, kayaking on the Wileau river and snorkeling at St Regis beach.

Laurence was an amazing host.  He responded to our messages very quickly. One day we had trouble with something and  not even a minute after contacting him his girlfriend was over to help us out.  His place was bright, cozy, charming and very clean. He provided everything from all the right toiletries to flippers and snorkelling masks.  Laurence made our stay incredibly comfortable.  I’d definitely recommend staying at Laurence’s place when visiting Kauai.
Great location! Larry responds very quick! Overall we enjoyed our stay!

The apartment is much nicer than it appears in the pictures! It’s small but well equipped with everything you need. Even beach stuff is there for the guests to use. The apartment is located in a really nice neighborhood and there are great beaches, foodtrucks and restaurants nearby (you can reach those by car within 5 min). We enjoyed staying there very much and would always come back!
It's everything need. Clean and met expectations.

Laurence's place had lots of things to appreciate: 1. affordable. 2. close-ish proximity to Queen's Bath (20 minute walk) so that we never worried about a parking spot 3. the pool-we went in one night when it was raining 4. extras like beach towels, snorkel gear and beach chairs. The fact that the sink is next to the bathroom took a little getting used to, but the bed was comfortable and the place clean and well-stocked. Heads up that there's no laundromat in Princeville, so if you need to wash clothes you may want to make a day trip to Kapa'a. Laurence was very communicative and checked in via text. He gave a great recommendation for a surfboard rental shop in Hanalei.

Great Place  to stay on North Shore of Kaua'i!
:-)
We couldn’t have asked for a better stay at Laurence’s place! Everything was perfect, and we were so happy about the location. We can’t wait to go back!
Perfect location in Princeville! Laurence's place was quaint and provided everything we needed for a short stay in Kauai.
Great location! Nice place, nice host, couldn't ask for more.

Exactly as advertised. Perfect home-base for a single person/couple to get some rest after a long day of exploring. Great location in Princeville, very short drive to great town of Hanalei/Kilauea. Larry was very responsive in giving us local recommendations. Highly recommend! Great value!
Had a lovely time!  Great location and the pool was well maintained.

Strongly recommend this place - exceptionally clean, comfortable, beautiful interior design details, fast internet, spacious lanai. Includes beach gear. Host responded to my questions within 10 minutes - amazing! Will definitely be back!

Great spot for exploring the north shore, the place is really clean and airy with everything you need and a ll the beach and snorkeling gear too! Great communication, bed was comfy and a great bathroom not mention what a great value, really quality all around

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay. The studio was the perfect size for us and had everything we needed. It was really cool that Larry had some beach items for guests to use. Check-in was really easy and convenient, we would definitely stay again!

Me and my husband had a great time. We met a lot of locals that lived in the area and they were all super friendly. The space is a lot bigger than it looks in pictures which was a great surprise. And Larry was super quick to respond and gave us some tips on where to go and what to do when we got heavy rain. All the tips were helpful. We would stay here again.  Not having AC was something we had to get used to but it honestly got super cool at night and we weren’t there so much during the day anyways. All in all it was a great stay and the apartment had everything we needed and more! Thanks Larry!
Great place! Small and quaint loved it! Super clean! Great place would recommend!
Loved the cozy simplicity! The compact kitchen provided just what we needed. Clean and uncomplicated. Short drive to the surf and good food!
The space was very functional and comfortable. Having amenities like beach chairs made our island activities easier and more fun. Also, great location close to all north shore activities.
Wonderful time in Princeville. Larry was an outstanding host and the location is great!  Very clean apartment.

Despite being mid-October, the apartment was often unbearably hot (at least 10F hotter than the temperature outside). The ceiling fan and portable fan did little to help.

Other than that, enjoyed the apartment and all the extras in it (such as beach items, etc.). Princeville is a quiet area, and perfect if you're going to do a lot of golfing or hiking. The host was great. 

The outdoor covered porch was perfect, and we spent quite a bit of time out there to escape the heat inside the apartment. We slept on top of all the covers most nights. Wouldn't book this location again due to that reason alone, unfortunately.
Great location in Princeville and well stocked with beach gear! Appreciated that Laurence was very responsive to our questions before and during our trip. Would definitely stay again!

Larry’s was a good place to stay - accessible to all the North Shore sights, located in a peaceful neighborhood where you could walk along the golf course or to various beaches. Larry was very communicative & the place had all the amenities needed away from home & for the beach.

Laurence’s place was nicely furnished and had a lot of kitchen amenities— it served as an excellent home base for our island explorations. We enjoyed staying in Princeville and attending a guitar and ukelele concert at the community center. It is also a short drive to restaurants, shops and beaches in Hanalei. It is also close to the Princeville Botanical Garden. We highly recommend their tour :)

Ask questions of your host pre-booking; will I have a designated parking spot? What is the general population on the grounds, i.e. children, families.  What if any are the cooking facilities? Are there separate sinks in kitchen & bath? The unit is priced reasonably low for the nature/style of living space, and grounds, pool and hot tube are nice. People seem to follow quiet-times rules, but can be noisy in early morning hours. These are tight units, with shared walls and floors, small living/lounge areas. Larry is trying his best, so definitely communicate with him before you book.

Everything was just great. Larry was an excellent host and responded almost immediately.
Appartment was super clean, very cosy and well equipped. We got everything we needed and even more.
The area ist nice, clean and quiet.
Shops only 3 minutes with a car.
Nice beaches like Anini and Hanalei Bay are just a few minutes away.
We love Kauai and we would come back to this appartment.

Great studio in a perfect location. Larry was always helpful and a great host. The condo is big enough for 2 people. Perfectly clean and a lot of nice amenitys. We had a wonderful time. Thank you Larry!
Such a wonderful adventure in a magical place. Beautiful location, wonderful, kind host.  So clean and happy. Absolutely perfect for my trip. Thank you for making this journey to Kauai so special.
Great place, comfy and very clean. Hot tub and community pool nice, lovely walk to hidden beach and princeville resort. Good value overall. :)

Cute place! Beautiful beaches and great restaurants nearby.  But please know that the  kitchen isn't a full kitchen - it doesn't have a stove or a sink, and the fridge is loud and directly across from the bed with no partition in between. Larry, the manager, was great and got back to us with info very soon!
This apartment was great! Very clean with a comfy bed. The kitchenette was very useful for visitors who don’t want to go out for every meal.
The unit is simple, cozy, and modern and has everything you need. It was great to have access to the beach gear Laurence provided. We loved staying here and would recommend it to others!

It had everything we needed in a compact but well laid out space. The balcony was perfect for morning coffee and after grilling dinner. Plenty of beautiful beaches within a walk or short drive from the studio.
A great apartment in a great location

Nice spot in a great location. Was small but comfortable and had everything we needed. Located near grocery, shops, restaurants, beaches like Hanalei Bay and Anini Beach. Larry was very responsive and fixed a broken latch on the door to the balcony. I found the bed very soft and uncomfortable.
The studio was nice and clean.  All instructions waiting for us.  The complex was close to shopping, grocery and dinning.  Communication with Larry was timely.  We’ll stay again!  Thanks, Larry!

We enjoyed our stay at Princeville, a lovely community with close drive to beaches. The studio was clean, bed was comfortable, amenities as described...there was only a single flipper but Lawrence didn’t know and would replace missing ones ASAP. It was relaxing sitting out on the lanai, which also gave you more space. Walls were a little thin but the place was pretty quiet. We would recommend.
Norma and Wayne

Laurence’s condo is in a great spot on the north end of Kauai, we had a lot of fun exploring Princeville and the surrounding areas. The condo is small but clean and had everything we needed for the 2 of us to enjoy a nice vacation on the island. The bed’s mattress is very soft and lumpy and the pillows are pretty flat. If you have back or neck issues then you probably shouldn’t stay here. Also note that this is a condo and the walls are very thin, so we could hear our neighbors’ conversations and doors slamming at all hours very clearly. These two issues made it harder for us to sleep, but may not be a problem for others.
Larry and his partner were very warm and informative. They keep an excellent space and I loved the proximity to Hanalei.

This is the perfect Airbnb. It was really cute, thoughtfully appointed with everything you could need, and in a great location. The area is very safe and a nice drive from the airport. We would absolutely stay here again!

Larry was great and really communicative. he checked in with me to make sure I had everything I needed and even provided a local guide book and tips for restaurants and entertainment.  the condo was clean,  comfortable and had everything  I needed. if my travels find me on kauai again I will definitely stay here. great spot!
Exceptionally clean, well appointed and functional.  Larry very responsive, helpful and accommodating.  Would gladly stay there again.

房东姐姐人很好,房间很干净,设备齐全,重要的是位置很好,出地铁站就是楼下了｡

店主热情

除了小一些,其他的都挺好的,没有窗户,大旅行箱有点进不去房间,其他的都挺好的吧

为弟弟和爸爸订的房间,他们过的fei chang非常开心｡虽然他们到的很晚,但是房东还是耐心的等了~
香港的房间小在预料之中 但旅馆的位置和基本设施还是可以的 老板娘也挺热情好说话
老板超级热情,而且心底善良,我定的是双人床,看见我带了宝宝,给我换双人床,而且不加价

This is a room in a guest house. The 2 ladies guarding the guest house were available but could have been more joyful and smiling according to me… Also, I would have preferred them to tell me the exact address, floor and guest house name (as they are there all day) before my arrival so that I could go there directly and not have to call them once I arrived in HK. I had trouble with my phone and had no means to find them. I found a place for wifi and sent them a message but no answer in 15 minutes so I left the wifi place to wait in front of the building. Hopefully I met completely randomly my family who arrived one day before and lived in the same building and they lent me their phone so that I could find the host. Also, during the rest of my stay, I asked one of the host to lend me her phone to contact my family as they disappeared and I was very worried but she refused… what I understand but I think it would be very kind if she did… Otherwise the room is ok (very small but I guess it is the case everywhere the same in HK).
키 190 넘는사람은 불편할거 같아요 제가 180인데 침대 길이 안습...
雖然在重慶大廈旁邊,但是居住環境品質很好,跟別人說的完全不一樣,如果是想省住宿費的朋友我蠻推薦的喔!
这个价格相对还行!定位和实际地标不一样 建议去的旅客直接定位美丽都大夏
可以在遇到問題的時候幫忙協助,是個很棒的房東!
很棒!
